name: Les Chiens du Guet
description:
Les Chiens du Guet is located in the heart of Saint Malo, just 50 metres from the beach and 550 metres from Saint-Malo Marina
You can relax on the terrace with a drink from the bar and dine at the on-site restaurant
Free Wi-Fi access is available.

The simply decorated rooms feature carpet flooring, a desk and a private bathroom with shower
A hairdryer is also available at reception upon request.

Breakfast is available each morning, with an additional cost
The hotel’s restaurant serves à la carte dining prepared with local produce.

Dinard is 11 km from the hotel
Cancale is 17 km away.

name: Hotel De La Mer
description:
Located just 150 metres from the beach in Saint-Malo, Hotel De La Mer offers free WiFi access throughout and an on-site bar
The train station is only a 10-minute walk away.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV, wardrobe and heating
Each room has a private bathroom that includes a bath and free toiletries.

In July and August, a continental breakfast is available each morning at Hotel De La Mer
From September to June, it is served from Tuesday to Saturday
Restaurants can be reached within walking distance of the hotel.

Saint-Malo Port is 2 km away and Espace Duguay Trouin Convention Centre is 1.1 km from the property
Naye Ferry Terminal is 2.4 km away.

name: Hôtel Bristol Union Intra Muros
description:
Hotel Bristol Union is located in the heart of Saint Malo, within the city walls of the old town and 180 metres from Saint-Malo Marina
Its rooms and suites are en suite with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi internet access.

A daily breakfast service is available
It is served in the dining area or in the comfort of your guest room
The bar offers a nice place to enjoy a quiet drink or evening aperitif.

The Bristol Union benefits from a convenient location for those wishing to explore and discover Saint-Malo and the picturesque region of Brittany
Mont Saint Michel is just a 45-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Alba hotel
description:
Alba hotel is located in Saint-Malo facing the beach and beside the port
It offers a bar and rooms with sea views.

Bar open daily from 11:15 a.m
to 7:00 p.m.

Each room has simple décor and is equipped with free Wi-Fi, cable TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room and guests’ are invited to have a drink at the hotel’s bar or on the terrace while enjoying the sea views.

A 24-hour front desk service is available at the Alba hotel.

Gare de Saint-Malo Train station is a 15-minute walk away
Places that guests can visit in the area include Chateaubriand’s tomb on ÎIe de Grand Bé, St Vincent Cathedral and the city’s Castle.

Parking charged at 9 €
Number of places available 4 on request

name: Hotel Ajoncs d'Or
description:
Hotel Ajoncs d'Or is located in the heart of the historic fortified city walls of Saint Malo, 350 metres from Saint-Malo Marina
It offers individually decorated rooms, which feature original artwork and free Wi-Fi access.

Each soundproofed room has a private bathroom and satellite TV
Rooms are accessible by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the spacious bright dining room
Guests can enjoy a drink at the Ajoncs d'Or hotel bar.

The hotel is conveniently placed to make the most of St Malo's many famous restaurants
In the summer, Saint Malo is a lively seaside resort featuring numerous outdoor and beach activities
Gare de Saint-Malo Train station is 1.8 km away
Private parking is available for an additional fee and must be reserved in advance.

name: Hôtel Ar Iniz
description:
Providing a direct access to the Sillon Beach, Hôtel Ar Iniz offers a regional restaurant, a bar and a terrace with a view of the sea
The modern-style hotel is situated 1.5 km from the city centre.

The elegant rooms at Hôtel Ar Iniz have a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a safety deposit box
The bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available daily and the restaurant on site serves dishes made with fresh and local products
Additional facilities are available such as free WiFi access and bicycle rental.

The property is located 12 km from Cancale and its beaches and a 45-minute drive from the city of Rennes
The train station is 3 km away and there is a private car park on site, available at an additional cost

name: Les Charmettes
description:
Les Charmettes, on the seafront in the Brittany town of Saint-Malo, offers direct beach access and a guests can sample a drink at the beach bar
Each guest room has a private bathroom, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.

All seaside room feature a balcony, while other rooms look onto the courtyard
All rooms come with a nautical theme.

The hotel Les Charmettes serves a continental breakfast, which can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the comfort of your room
The on-site restaurant serves traditional meals including seafood platters
Guests can also relax on the hotel terrace, overlooking the sea.

The Sillon beach is situated directly in front of the hotel and the Saint Malo Train Station is 2 km away
Guests can reach Saint-Malo city centre within 30 minutes by walk.

name: Hôtel Oré, Saint-Malo
description:
Hôtel Oré, Saint-Malo (Inter-Hotel) is located at the entrance to Saint-Malo, near the aquarium
The hotel offers family rooms with baths or showers, flat-screen TVs and free WiFi access.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and guests are invited to relax with a drink in Hôtel Oré's bar
There is also a terrace and a floral garden.

Free private parking is available on site and Hôtel Oré is easily accessible by the N137
Cancale, Mont Saint Michel, Dinard and Dinan are nearby.

name: Logis Maison Vauban - Hotel St Malo
description:
Hotel Maison Vauban is located next to the Saint-Vincent Cathedral in Saint-Malo
Just 200 metres from the beach and 450 metres from Saint-Malo Marina, it offers comfortable accommodation with free Wi-Fi.

Guest rooms at the Palais are brightly decorated and equipped with a telephone, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

A buffet-style breakfast is served every morning
It can be enjoyed in the hotel's breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms.

name: Hôtel La Porte Saint Pierre-Logis Hôtel Intra Muros
description:
Situated inside the historic walls of Saint-Malo’s old town, this hotel is just 10 metres from the beach.

The guest rooms at La Porte Saint Pierre are decorated in a contemporary style and have a flat-screen TV and an electric kettle
Optical fiber access and a private bathroom, and some also have panoramic sea views.

In the mornings, guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

A meeting room for up to 20 people is available on site.

Saint-Malo Train Station is 2 km from La Porte Saint Pierre
Numerous ferry connections to the Channel Islands and the UK are possible from Saint-Malo port, 1.5 km away.

name: Hôtel Le Nautilus
description:
Hôtel Le Nautilus is set in a renovated 17th-century building and is located in the walled city of Saint-Malo
This hotel offers a bar, luggage storage and a shared lounge
The property is a 2-minute walk from Saint-Vincent Cathedral and 50 metres from the beach
The property offers 4 Dutch bikes for free according to availability.

All the rooms feature soundproofing, a desk and satellite TV
Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries
The bed linen has been upgraded for a 5 stars sleep quality.

Hôtel Le Nautilus is 300 metres from Saint-Malo Marina and 50 metres from several restaurants
Rennes Airport is 80 km away and free WiFi is included.

name: Hôtel France et Chateaubriand
description:
The Hotel de France and Chateaubriand is located in the heart of the historic city of Saint Malo, 210 metres from Saint-Malo Marina
It offers breathtaking views over the sea and le sillon.

The Hotel de France and Chateaubriand offer comfortable rooms with a refined decoration.

The restaurant serves many traditional seafood and regional specialties.

Its unique façade to Saint Malo, and the presence of the birthplace of Chateaubriand make the building to be classified a historical monument.

name: Hotel Le Croiseur Intra Muros
description:
Located in Saint Malo, 400 metres from Saint-Malo Casino, Hotel Le Croiseur Intra Muros has a number of amenities including a terrace, a shared lounge, a bar and free WiFi
The property is close to several well-known attractions, 400 metres from Cale de Dinan Ferry, 600 metres from Espace Duguay Trouin and 600 metres from Palais du Grand Large.

At the hotel, every room has a desk
Rooms include a private bathroom, and certain rooms at Hotel Le Croiseur Intra Muros have a balcony
All rooms include a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property
Near the hotel you will find numerous restaurants and shops as well as a Thalassotherapy centre.

Ferry Terminal du Naye is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Petit-Bé Fort is a 14-minute walk away
The nearest airport is Dinard Bretagne Airport, 8 km from Hotel Le Croiseur Intra Muros.

name: Hôtel La Villefromoy
description:
Located beside the sea in Saint Malo, Hotel La Villefromoy is an attractive mansion situated in a residential district of the city
The 26 elegantly decorated guest rooms include free Wi-Fi.

Each of the guest rooms is equipped with a flat-screen TV with foreign channels, as well as a minibar and facilities for making hot drinks
The private bathrooms are complete with bathrobes, slippers and a hairdryer.

A continental or English breakfast with local produce is served each morning in the communal lounge
You can enjoy a drink in the lounge bar, or sit out on the terrace or in the garden when the weather is nice, while admiring the stunning sea view
Bicycles are available to rent at the property.

Go for a relaxing stroll on Rochebonne Beach, or walk into the walled city to see some of the important historic sites
Dinard-Pleurtuit Airport is a 15-minute drive from the property and the ferry terminal is a 5-minute drive away.

name: ibis Styles Saint Malo Port
description:
Offering a snack bar and free WiFi, ibis Styles Saint Malo Port is located in Saint Malo, less than a 10-minute walk from the sandy beaches and 1 km from Saint-Malo Train Station
Emerald Coast is located 2 km from the property.

Each of the contemporary rooms features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a wardrobe
They all have a private bathroom complete with a hairdryer.

At ibis Styles Saint Malo Port you will find a 24-hour front desk and a bar
Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and a private parking with a supplement.

The hotel is only 1 km from the Ferry Terminal du Naye and close to the pier, providing access to the Channel Islands
It is also a 5-minute walk from the Olympic swimming pool of Saint Malo
Rennes Airport is 67 km away and the famous Mont Saint-Michel is less than an hour away by car
Dinard is 10 km away.

name: Hôtel Cartier
description:
Situated within the fortified walls of Saint-Malo, the Hotel Cartier is just 280 metres from Saint-Malo Marina and 500 metres from the beach and the English channel
It features a modern décor and air-conditioned guest rooms with free internet access.

Flat-screen TVs are provided in all of the soundproofed rooms
The guest rooms offer en suite bathrooms and carpet flooring
fully renovated.

A buffet-style breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the hotel's breakfast area or in the comfort of your room.

Saint-Malo Cathedral is 120 metres from the hotel
The Saint-Malo Train Station is a 5-minute drive away.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel des Marins, Saint-Malo (Inter-Hotel)
description:
Located within the walled city at the heart of Saint-Malo, The Originals Boutique, Hôtel des Marins, Saint-Malo (Inter-Hotel) offers modern rooms with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi
It provides a ticket service at the 24-hour reception.

Renovated in 2019, the soundproofed guest rooms feature extra long beds and interconnecting rooms are available
Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries
All rooms are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room at Hôtel des Marins
Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar while reading the newspapers provided.

Many shops, restaurants and historic landmarks can be found in the neighbourhood.

The harbour is just a 2-minute walk from the hotel and the beach is 200 metres away.

name: Hôtel de la Gare
description:
Hôtel de la Gare features accommodation in Saint Malo near Casino Barrière Saint-Malo and National Fort
Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property
The property is non-smoking and is situated 1 km from Sillon Beach.

At the hotel, the rooms include a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near Hôtel de la Gare include Eventail Beach, Bas-Sablons Beach and Palais du Grand Large
The nearest airport is Jersey Airport, 72 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel De L'univers
description:
Hotel De L'univers is located in the walled city of Saint Malo in Brittany, and is walking distance to the ferry port and train station
The property is 400 metres from Saint-Malo Marina and offers free Wi-Fi.

Rooms are comfortable and equipped with TV, telephone and private bathroom.

Friendly staff are available to offer personalised service and advice on the area.

Hotel De L'univers is located directly in front of the castle, close to the sea, with a view of the main square
From here you can easily explore the historical city on foot.

name: Hôtel San Pedro
description:
Hôtel San Pedro is located in Saint Malo, 50 metres from the beach and 400 metres from Saint-Malo Marina
Decorated in a nautical and traditional style, the hotel features a free Wi-Fi access and en suite rooms.

Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer
Some have a view of the sea and the beach.

A homemade continental breakfast made from local produce is served daily and include savoury and sweet items
Restaurants specialised in crêpes and galettes can be reached within a walking distance.

An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking
The hotel is 400 metres from Cale de Dinan Ferry, 500 metres from Grand Bé and 600 metres from Saint-Malo Casino.

name: Hotel des Abers
description:
Set in a property originally built in the 16th century, Hotel des Abers is situated in central Saint Malo, 400 metres from Saint-Malo Casino and 500 metres from Cale de Dinan Ferry
Saint-Malo Marina is 290 metres away.

The rooms have a flat-screen TV
The hotel features free WiFi throughout the property.

National Fort is 500 metres from Hotel des Abers, while Espace Duguay Trouin is 600 metres from the property
The nearest airport is Pleurtuit Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Otonali Hôtel by Breizh Café
description:
Our hotel is ideally located on the port of Saint-Malo facing the Duguay-Trouin basin, a few minutes walk from the Sillon beach, 5min from Intra-muros and 10min from the train station.

Comfortable and elegant, the rooms are equipped with amenities such as a flat-screen TV, private bathroom, safe and free WIFI access
The bathrooms are equipped with a hairdryer.

Breakfast is served on the ground floor of the hotel from 7:00 am to 10:00 am.
The breakfast for the kid sare at 9€ until 10 years old.

Viennese pastries, breads served with Bordier butter and homemade jams, buckwheat cakes, organic coffees and teas, homemade apple juice and regional products are offered in buffet form.

The OTONALI hotel also has a bar area open every day from 7:00 am to 10:00 pm.
Natural wines, champagnes, sakes and ciders have been carefully selected by the director and sommelier of our restaurant OTONALI located "next door" to the hotel.

name: Domaine de la Barbinais
description:
Set in a 7000 m², landscaped park, Domaine de la Barbinais is a hotel located in the countryside of Saint Malo
WiFi access is available throughout.

Each individually decorated room features a flat-screen TV and a desk
Each also includes a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

Breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room with an additional cost.

Other facilities offered at the property include physical reception is from 5:00 p.m
to 9:00 p.m
a telephone reception is provided 24 hours a day.
An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling
The property offers free private parking on site and it is located a 5-minute drive from the beach.

name: Escale Oceania Saint Malo
description:
Escale Oceania Saint-Malo is located on the seafront, facing the Sillon Beach and a 14-minute walk from Saint-Malo Train Station
It offers modern rooms, a sunny outdoor terrace and 24 hour-a-day food service.

Guest rooms feature a flat-screen TV and some of them offer a sea view
Free Wi-Fi internet access is provided.

Free of charge guests have at their disposal a PC with internet access and a printer
Bikes can be rented on site.

Breakfast is served every morning, and evening meals can be enjoyed at the hotel
Snacks are available throughout the day and packed lunches for picnics are also available.

name: Hotel Le Prieuré et La Résidence
description:
Located in Amiens city centre, Hotel Le Prieuré et la Résidence are at the foot of the Amiens Cathedral
It offers free Wi-Fi internet access and individually-decorated rooms with antique furnishings.

Guest rooms at the Prieuré et la Résidence have a private bathroom with a bath or shower
They are each equipped with a TV and a hairdryer.

A breakfast buffet is served daily in Le Prieuré's breakfast room, which features crystal chandeliers
Guests can relax on the hotel’s terrace and courtyard.

Hotel Le Prieuré et La Résidence is just 900 metres from the Amiens SNCF Train Station
The Amiens-Glisy Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Moxy Amiens
description:
In the heart of the city and a stone's throw from the train station, our Moxy Amiens hotel is the ideal place for your business or sports trips, for a trip with friends or a discovery stay with your family
Our 3 star hotel, entirely renovated, offers 109 air-conditioned rooms for 1, 2 or 3 people, free wifi and 49 inch connected television.

A dining bar open to all 24 hours a day where you can eat on the go or taste our regional dishes in a warm and modern atmosphere
Our meeting room with its atypical format will meet your
expectations.

Close to all the major assets of the Picardy capital, let our teams guide you to discover the life of Jules Verne, the Hortillonnages and the largest Gothic Cathedral in France
An underground public parking lot is in the immediate vicinity.

name: Hotel Eden
description:
The charming Hotel Eden is located 100 meters from the beach, with direct access to the old town and the congress centre
It offers comfortable rooms.

Start the day with a delicious breakfast in the Hotel Eden’s spacious breakfast room
In the summertime you can dine on the pretty outdoor terrace.

Hotel Eden makes a great base for exploring the sites of Brittany and Normandy
The hotel is located on the road to the Mont Saint-Michel.

After a busy day sightseeing you can enjoy a drink and a snack back at the Hotel Eden’s cosy lounge bar.

The hotel is only 2,3 kilometres from Saint-Malo's TGV train station and 3 kilometres from the ferry terminal to Jersey and Guernsey.

name: Holiday Inn Express Amiens, an IHG Hotel
description:
Holiday Inn Express offers comfortable guest rooms with free WiFi
It is located in the centre of Amiens just 50 metres from the Train Station and a 10-minute walk from the Cathedral.

Serviced by a lift, all of the rooms include air conditioning and a flat-screen HD TV with satellite channels
There is also a safety deposit box and an espresso machine.

A free buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Holiday Inn Express Amiens
Many restaurants can be found nearby.

This non-smoking hotel also has a bar, a fitness room and laundry and ironing services
Underground, public parking is available nearby for cars up to 1.80 metres high.

name: Hotel Central Anzac
description:
Centrally located, Hotel Central Anzac is a 2-minute walk from the train station and a 7-minute walk from Amiens Cathedral
It offers modern accommodation and a continental breakfast.

The ensuite guestrooms are decorated in warm colours giving them a cozy feel
They come with a satellite TV and WiFi access.

Every morning breakfast is served in the dining area and features a selection of fresh, homemade pastries and jams made from seasonal produce
Guests can choose between a continental or full English breakfast
Newspapers are provided at reception.

The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the St Leu district and 15 minutes from the famous canal ways.

name: ibis Styles Amiens Centre
description:
Featuring a bar, ibis Styles Amiens Centre is located in Amiens in the Picardy region, 300 metres from Amiens Train Station and 3.9 km from Zénith d'Amiens
Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom
The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from The Floating gardens Park.

Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
At ibis Styles Amiens Centre each room has bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Ibis Styles Amiens Centre offers a sun terrace.

With staff speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, guidance is available at the reception.

Berny's Museum is 400 metres from the hotel, while Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens is 400 metres away
The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 66 km from ibis Styles Amiens Centre.

name: Au Spatial
description:
Au Spatial is located in the heart of Amiens, a 2-minute walk from Amiens Train Station and a 6-minute walk from Amiens Cathedral
It offers free WiFi access.

Each room includes a flat-screen TV with Canal+ and BBC channels
They also have a private bathroom with a bath or a shower.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room at hotel Au Spatial
The buffet includes homemade jams, cereals, pastries, bread, cheese, cold meats and yogurts.

Amiens Zoo is located 3 km from this hotel and private parking is available on site at an extra cost per day and subject to availability.

name: Le Vivier
description:
Set in Amiens, 2.4 km from Zénith d'Amiens, Le Vivier offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant
Located around 3 km from Amiens Train Station, the inn with free WiFi is also 2.9 km away from Berny's Museum
The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests.

At the inn, every room has a desk
Selected rooms also feature a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a minibar
At Le Vivier the rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Amiens, like golfing.

There is an in-house bar and guests can also make use of the business area.

The Floating gardens Park is 3.7 km from Le Vivier, while University of Picardie Jules Verne is 1.4 km from the property
The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 64 km from the inn.

name: B&B HOTEL Amiens Centre Cathédrale
description:
Offering a restaurant and free Wi-Fi, B&B HOTEL Amiens Centre Cathédrale is located in the centre of Amiens.

Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV and a desk
The private bathrooms come with a shower.

At B&B HOTEL Amiens Centre Cathédrale you will find a 24-hour front desk, a bar and a snack bar
Other facilities offered include luggage storage
A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away
Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

The hotel is 1.3 km from Zénith d'Amiens, 800 m from Berny's Museum and 1.1 km from Amiens Train Station
Beauvais Tillé Airport is 50 km away
The property offers parking at an extra cost.

name: Mercure Amiens Cathédrale
description:
The 4-star Mercure hotel is situated in front of France's biggest medieval cathedral, which is listed as a Unesco World Heritage site.

Each room and suite recently renovated, is spacious: from 25 to 41m2, sound-proofed and air-conditioned during summer months
They come with free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, which includ French and international channels
tea/coffee making facilities, minibar with one free bottle of water.

L' Echanson, the hotel's restaurant, serves a wide range of delicate dishes and regional specialties made with local and regional products.

name: Grand Hotel de L'Univers
description:
This Grand Hotel de L'Univers is located in the heart of Amiens, just 100 metres from the train station
It offers soundproofed rooms equipped with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access.

The Grand Hotel de L'Univers provides a 24-hour reception
All rooms are serviced by a lift.

Grand Hotel de L'Univers is just a 5-minute walk from Notre Dame Cathedral and the floating gardens
Several sites dedicated to the Great War can be visited in the region.

name: ibis budget Amiens Centre Gare
description:
Ibis budget Amiens Centre Gare is set in Amiens city centre, a 5-minute walk from Amiens Train Station and a 15-minute walk from Notre-Dame of Amiens Cathedral
Free WiFi is provided.

All rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

A buffet breakfast can en enjoyed every morning.

The nearest airport is Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport, 50 km from the hotel.

name: The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud
description:
Situated in Amiens, 3.6 km from Zénith d'Amiens, The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar
With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space
The property is non-smoking and is set 3.8 km from Amiens Train Station.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk
Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms come with a seating area
At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels.

Berny's Museum is 3.7 km from The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud, while The Floating gardens Park is 4.5 km from the property
The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 61 km from the hotel.

name: Logis hôtel - La Chambre D'Amiens
description:
Set in Amiens, 900 metres from Zénith d'Amiens, Logis hôtel - La Chambre D'Amiens offers accommodation with a bar, free private parking, a shared lounge and a garden
Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace
The accommodation features luggage storage space and free WiFi throughout the property.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area
At Logis hôtel - La Chambre D'Amiens all rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Continental and buffet breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation.

The Floating gardens Park is 3.3 km from Logis hôtel - La Chambre D'Amiens, while Berny's Museum is 3.8 km from the property
The nearest airport is Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport, 61 km from the hotel.

name: Le Saint Louis
description:
Le Saint Louis is located in Amiens town centre, 300 metres from the train station and the Cathedral
It offers rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Guestrooms at Hotel Le Saint Louis are individually decorated and have private bathrooms.

Le Saint Louis is close to the town’s main tourist attractions such as the Rue des Piétons (pedestrian street) and the house of Jules Verne and the Perret Tower.

Public parking is available near the hotel.

name: Hotel Victor Hugo
description:
Hotel Victor Hugo is a hotel offering accommodation in Amiens
The property is located 2.2 km from Zénith d'Amiens and 100 metres from Berny's Museum
The property is a 7-minute walk from The Floating gardens Park and a 3-minute walk from Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens.

At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk
Hotel Victor Hugo features certain rooms that feature city views, and all rooms include a private bathroom and a wardrobe
The rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

University of Picardie Jules Verne is 3.5 km from Hotel Victor Hugo
Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport is 50 km from the property.

name: Comfort Hotel Amiens Nord
description:
Comfort Hotel Amiens Nord is just 4 km from Amiens city centre and offers accommodation in a hotel with a terrace
Free Wi-Fi, free private parking and meeting rooms are available on site.

The hotel’s rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
The en suite bathroom features a hairdryer, free toiletries and a bathtub.

Every morning, guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet.

Amiens historical centre and cathedral are just 5 km away, together with Amiens Zoological Garden
Amiens Train Station is 4.5 km away and there is access to A16 Motorway 20 km away.

name: Hôtel Spa Marotte
description:
Located in the centre of Amiens, 500 metres from the train station and set in a traditional building from the 19th century, Hôtel Spa Marotte offers a tea room, a champagne and wine bar and elegant accommodations.

All of the accommodations at Hôtel Spa Marotte have a flat-screen TV and a minibar
Some also include a balcony and some have a sauna.

A continental breakfast is available every morning
Guests can enjoy a tea on site.

Other facilities are a safety deposit box and a luggage storage
Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the property.

Hôtel Spa Marotte has his own and private shuttle service (airports, railway stations, etc.) available on request for an extra fee.

You can enjoy a 1h30 access to the spa for an extra cost of 30 € per person per day
We can offer massages, body or face treatments, alone or in duo (extra cost)

It is 200 metres from the cathedral and 300 metres from Jules Vernes House
Musée de Picardie is 800 metres away and Amiens Train Station is a 5-minute walk away
Valet parking services is available upon request.

name: Hôtel De Normandie
description:
Hôtel De Normandie is located only 100 metres from the train station in the heart of Amiens
It is just a 5-minute walk from Notre-Dame d'Amiens Cathedral, Perret Tower and plenty of shops.

Each room features a flat-screen TV, desk, telephone and free WiFi access
A hairdryer, electric kettle, ironing facilities and adapter can be provided upon request for free.

Each morning breakfast is served in the form of a buffet and it can be enjoyed in the hotel's art-deco breakfast room
A communal lounge is at your disposition to relax in.

The N25 motorway is a 10-minute drive from the Hôtel De Normandie.

name: Hôtel Inn Design Resto Novo Amiens
description:
Located in Dury within a business zone (office), the Inn Design hotel offers you all the necessary comfort for your visit to Amiens.

The rooms are all equipped with a flat-screen television with the Canal+ package, free Wi-Fi, a kettle with tea and coffee, and a private bathroom.

Come and enjoy your breakfast and dinner in our RestoNovo restaurant, and why not continue the experience with lunch before hitting the road again.

Breakfast is available every day:
From Monday to Friday from 6:30 am to 9 am
On Saturdays and Sundays from 7:30 am to 10 am

The restaurant is open from Monday to Friday:
Lunch: from 12 pm to 1:30 pm
Dinner: from 7 pm to 9 pm

The hotel is ideally located:

2 minutes from the Amiens Sud shopping center (Auchan, restaurants, shops)
45 minutes from Beauvais Airport
5 minutes from the A29 motorway exit
12 minutes from Amiens train station and the city center
10 minutes from the Palais des Congrès, Mégacité, and the Zénith
10 minutes from Amiens Sud Hospital and the Polyclinic.

Don't hesitate to visit the Picardie Museum, the cathedral, or the hortillonnages, all within a 15-minute drive or 20-minute bus ride.

name: Première Classe Amiens
description:
Première Classe Amiens is 3 km from the centre of Amiens and its cathedral
This hotel offers free WiFi access and a garden.

All rooms at Première Classe Amiens feature a wardrobe, a desk and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
They include a bathroom with a shower.

Breakfast is served between 6:30 and 10:00 on weekdays and between 7:00 and 10:00 during weekends
Vending machines for drinks and snacks can be found at the reception area.

This property is 5 km from the A16 motorway and 9 km from Amiens Golf Club
Free WiFi is provided.

name: Campanile Amiens - Glisy
description:
Campanile Amiens – Glisy is conveniently situated just outside Amiens – Glisy airport and the access to the A29 motorway
It features air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access and has a restaurant with a terrace.

Each room is equipped with a TV and has a private bathroom with a bathtub
A buffet breakfast is served daily.

Campanile Amiens – Glisy provides a meeting room and there is free private parking available
The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Amiens town centre.

name: Kyriad Prestige Amiens Poulainville - Hotel and Spa
description:
Located in Poulainville, 7.8 km from Amiens Train Station, Kyriad Prestige Amiens Poulainville - Hotel and Spa provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant
This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi
Guests can make use of a bar.

Zénith d'Amiens is 8.9 km from the hotel, while The Floating gardens Park is 7.5 km away
The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 75 km from Kyriad Prestige Amiens Poulainville - Hotel and Spa.

name: B&B HOTEL Amiens
description:
B&B HOTEL Amiens is set in Longueau, 12 km from the centre of Amiens
Free WiFi is featured and free private parking is available on site.

The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels
All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served every morning at B&B HOTEL Amiens
Vending machines for drinks and snacks are available on site.

Albert is 32 km from B&B HOTEL Amiens, while Abbeville is 46 km away
Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport is 55 km from the property.

name: hotelF1 Amiens Est
description:
hotelF1 Amiens Est 12 rue des indes n0ires 80440 glisy is set in Glisy, 6 km from Amiens and 25 km from Albert.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV
All rooms have a shared bathroom
Guests can purchase microfibre towels at the hotel at an extra cost of EUR 3 each.

Abbeville is 47 km from hotelF1 Amiens Est 12 rue des indes n0ires 80440 glisy, while Péronne is 41 km from the property
Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport is 49 km away.

name: Novotel Amiens Pôle Jules Verne
description:
The hotel is located 7 km from the centre of Amiens, the Cathedral and the Hortillonnage market gardens.

Guestrooms are modern and comfortable and equipped with modern en suite facilities.

Novotel Amiens Pôle Jules Verne offers Novotel Cafe serves modern cuisine
Featuring a swimming pool and private car park the hotel is ideal for a business trip or a holiday in Amiens.

Up to 2 children (16 years and under) stay free when sharing with parents
Exit 51 on the A1 motorway is only a 5-minute drive away.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Le Marignan,Le Havre Centre Gare
description:
Set in Le Havre and with Le Havre Beach reachable within 2.3 km, The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Le Marignan, Le Havre Centre Gare offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar
The property is located 2 km from Eglise St-Joseph, 23 km from Norman Museum of Ethnography and Popular Arts and 23 km from Honfleur's Old Harbour
The accommodation provides karaoke and room service.

The units at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box
Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, certain units at The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Le Marignan, Le Havre Centre Gare also provide guests with a city view
All guest rooms feature a desk.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Le Volcan, Saint-Michel's Church and Perret Model Appartment
The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 37 km from The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Le Marignan, Le Havre Centre Gare.

name: Holiday Inn Express - Le Havre Centre
description:
Our hotel, located in Le Havre downtown and at 600 meters from the SNCF train station, welcomes you for a professional and leisure stay
Our location is ideal to quickly reach the city center or the beach by the streetcar, accessible in front of the hotel
You will appreciate the quality of amenities: Wi-Fi, snacking, buffet style breakfast and the lounge bar
In order to facilitate your arrival by car, you can enjoy our private parking

Book one of our large cosy rooms and enjoy your stay!

name: Hilton Garden Inn Le Havre Centre
description:
Hilton Garden Inn Le Havre Centre is located on the beachfront in Le Havre, 350 metres from Le Havre Beach and 300 metres from Eglise St-Joseph
Popular points of interest nearby include Musee des Beaux Arts Andre Malraux, Normandy Business School and Museum Maison de l'Armateur
The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests.

All units will provide guests with a small fridge.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet and a continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Hilton Garden Inn Le Havre Centre include Le Volcan, Perret Model Appartment and Eglise St-Joseph
The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: JOST Hôtel Le Havre Centre Gare
description:
Set in Le Havre and with Le Havre Beach reachable within 2.3 km, JOST Hôtel Le Havre Centre Gare offers express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar
The property is around 2.3 km from Eglise St-Joseph, 23 km from Norman Museum of Ethnography and Popular Arts and 23 km from Honfleur's Old Harbour
Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options
At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Chinese, French and Indian cuisine
Vegetarian and halal options can also be requested.

You can play billiards and darts at the 3-star hotel.

Speaking German, English and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Popular points of interest near JOST Hôtel Le Havre Centre Gare include Le Volcan, Saint-Michel's Church and Perret Model Appartment
The nearest airport is Le Havre Octeville Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel d'Angleterre, Le Havre, centre, plage
description:
This hotel is located in the town centre of Le Havre, just 100 metres from the sea and next to the Malraux museum
It offers free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

Each guest room at the The Originals Boutique, Hôtel d'Angleterre, Le Havre, centre, plage has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom
A buffet breakfast is served every morning.

Parking is available in front of the hotel, which is free during the night and on Sundays and public holidays.

The The Originals Boutique, Hôtel d'Angleterre, Le Havre, centre, plage is a 30-minute drive from both Honfleur and Etretat
Deauville and Trouville are 40 km away.

name: ibis Le Havre Centre
description:
The ibis hotel is located in the centre of Le Havre, close to the SNCF railway station, ferry ports and International Trade Centre
It offers free Wi-Fi internet access.

Ibis Le Havre Centre provides guest rooms equipped with private bathroom, satellite TV and ironing facilities.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away
Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Ibis Le Havre Centre is within easy access of the A29 and A131 motorways
Deauville is 40 km from the property, while Honfleur is 22.8 km from ibis Le Havre Centre
Parking is possible on site for guests arriving by car and there is also a meeting room.

name: Best Western Plus Le Havre Centre Gare
description:
Located in central Le Havre, Best Western Plus Le Havre Centre Gare is a 4 star design hotel offering free WiFi just 10 minutes' drive from the beach.

The en-suite rooms all feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
The private bathroom includes a bath or shower and all rooms feature a hairdryer.

Best Western at Le Havre Centre Gare serves a daily buffet breakfast
Additional facilities include a bar.

Honfleur is just a 20-minute drive from Best Western at Le Havre Centre Gare and the seaside towns of Trouville and Deauville are a 45-minute drive away
Le Havre Train Station is opposite the property and gives direct access to Paris.

A catering offer signed" Boco "is available at any time of the day: balanced and varied dishes prepared by starred chefs to be savored in our bar area or in your room.

name: Hotel de Charme La Bonne Adresse
description:
Just 150 metres from Le Havre's beaches, Hotel de Charme La Bonne Adresse is located in a residential neighbourhood in Sainte-Adresse
It offers en suite rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Hotel de Charme La Bonne Adresse are equipped with a telephone, flat-screen TV and private bathroom
Each room has a courtesy tray with tea and coffee and some rooms overlook the sea.

Guests can relax on the hotel’s terrace or in the courtyard.

Hotel de Charme La Bonne Adresse is a 2-minute drive from the centre of Le Havre
The hotel is a 35-minute drive from Deauville and 20 minutes from Honfleur and Etretat.

Hotel completely renovated in 2021 keeping the family house style
Come and discover the new decoration.

name: Premiere Classe Le Havre Centre-LES DOCKS
description:
Magnificent Première Classe Le Havre Centre-Les Docks; ideally located near the Océane stadium and the docks.

We offer a personalized reception 24/24 with a private paying and secure parking.

Come and discover our 86 modern rooms with private bathroom and shower, flat screen TV and free wifi.

Treat yourself to a buffet breakfast served daily in our dedicated room or on our terrace on a sunny day.

Take advantage of your stopover to discover the historical and cultural heritage: the church of Saint Joseph, the shipowner’s house, the museum MUMA, etc...

A 15 min walk from the station, you will also have easy access to the various transports to radiate on Normandy: Etretat, Honfleur, Deauville.

Also enjoy your stay in Le Havre, to put your towel on our beach.

name: Best Western ARThotel
description:
The Best Western Art Hotel is located in the heart of Perret in Le Havre, just a 10-minute walk from the beach
The main destinations in Normandy are located within driving distance, such as Honfleur, 20 minutes away, Etretat, 30 minutes away and Deauville, which is 40 minutes away.

Decorated in a contemporary style by various artists, all rooms feature free Wi-Fi access, a flat-screen TV, iPod docking stations and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the guest rooms or in the dining room
Guests can also relax in the Art Hotel's bar.

A buffet breakfast is served only daily in the dining room.

name: Nomad Hotel le Havre
description:
Nomad Hotel le Havre is located in Le Havre and offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access and a modern-style decor
Guests can enjoy the on-site bar
Dock Océane shopping centre is 900 metres from this hotel and the city centre and its city hall are a 5-minute drive away.

All of the rooms at Nomad Hotel le Havre feature a tablet and a video projector
They all include a bathroom with free toiletries and a shower.

A breakfast is served everyday
Restaurants, bars and shops can be found in the surroundings.

Le Havre Train Station is a 2-minute walk from the hotel and André Malraux Modern Art Museum is 2 km away.

name: Ibis Budget Le Havre Les Docks
description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Ibis Budget Le Havre Les Docks is located in Le Havre, 4.4 km from Volcano
Free private parking and free WiFi are available on site.

The air-conditioned rooms features a TV, a desk and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a separate toilet.

Buffet breakfast is served daily at the property
Restaurants can also be found in the surroundings.

Perret Model Appartment is 4.4 km from Ibis Budget Le Havre Les Docks, while Saint-Michel's Church is 5 km from the property
Honfleur is a 20-minute drive away while Étretat is a 30-minute drive from the property.

name: Birgit Hôtel Le Havre Centre
description:
Welcome to Birgit!

When visiting Le Havre, there is nothing better than to stay in this 86-room hotel, completely renovated in 2022
Enjoy the friendly atmosphere surrounded by antique objects and travel souvenirs.

Located close to the city centre, the train station and public transport, you can reach the beach and the esplanade of Le Havre in 10 minutes.

Stay in the cosy and designer rooms, suitable for couples, families, friends and business travellers.
Enjoy our breakfast made with love by our team from healthy and local products
Take time to enjoy one of our local drinks in our bar.

The B!rgit Le Havre hotel is the ideal base for your travels with family or friends and will be perfect for a break during a business trip.

name: Hôtel Carmin
description:
Hôtel Carmin is located in Le Havre town centre, 700m from the HAVRE beach It offers en suite rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at the Carmin are equipped with a telephone and a flat-screen TV
Each guest room also has a private bathroom with bath or shower.

A breakfast is served at this hotel at an extra charge and upon prior reservation.

A number of Le Havre’s sites are near Carmin Hotel including St Joseph Cathedral and City Hall
There are also a number of restaurants within walking distance.

name: Hotel Spa Le Pasino
description:
Located at the heart of Le Havre, Hotel Spa le Pasino features an indoor swimming pool, a spa with sauna and a casino on site
It offers guest rooms with a flat-screen TV.

Each air-conditioned guest room features a queen-size bed and some offer views over the harbour
All private bathrooms include a hairdryer and bathrobes.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room.

Free Wi-Fi is available throughout Hotel Spa le Pasino
Guests can work out in the fitness centre or relax in the spa bath at the hotel's spa.

Le Havre Train Station is a 6-minute drive from the hotel and free private parking is available on site
Malraux Museum is 1 km away.

name: Mercure Le Havre Centre Bassin Du Commerce
description:
Mercure Le Havre Centre Bassin du Commerce is located in Le Havre’s city centre, opposite the Bassin du Commerce and near ferry-port
It offers air-conditioned guestrooms with LCD satellite TV and WiFi.

Guests of the Mercure Le Havre Centre Bassin du Commerce can relax with a drink and a snack at the bar and enjoy modern and local food in the hotel’s restaurant, Happy Dock.

The Mercure Le Havre Centre Bassin du Commerce is located in the historic town, 800 metres from the the National History Museum and Le Havre Cathedral
Honfleur is 24 km away and Deauville is 42 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Spa Vent d'Ouest
description:
Located just 550 metres from the beach in Le Havre, this hotel is a 5-minute drive from the ferry terminal
It offers free Wi-Fi access, and the 200-m² Nuxe spa includes a hammam, 3 massage rooms and 2 lounges.

Each guest room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, a safe and a private bathroom with free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning at Hôtel Spa Vent d'Ouest and can be taken in the guestrooms for a fee
Guests can enjoy bistronomic cuisine at Les Enfants Sages, located a 10-minute walk away or relax with a drink in the hotel bar and tea room.

Le Havre Train Station is 2 km from the hotel and private parking is available nearby.

name: Oscar Hôtel Le Havre Centre
description:
Oscar Hotel is located in Le Havre's Perret quarter, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site
It offers free Wi-Fi and views of The Volcan concert venue and the Bassin du Commerce.

Rooms at Oscar Hotel have wood floors and are decorated with a mix of modern and traditional furnishings
Each room is equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and private bathroom.

Hotel Oscar is a 5-minute walk from Hotel de Ville and Le Havre’s casino
There are a number of restaurants nearby.

The Oscar is 1.5 km from the train station and a 30-minute drive from Honfleur
Deauville, Pont de Normandie and Etretat are also a short drive away.

name: LOGIS HOTEL - La Petite Rade
description:
Located in Le Havre, this hotel is just a few steps from the coast and offers panoramic sea views
It provides direct beach access and free Wi-Fi.

Each guest room at LOGIS HOTEL - La Petite Rade is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom
A free welcome tray with tea, coffee and snacks is also offered.

Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast in the dining room or in the privacy of the guest rooms
Guests can also benefit from discounted prices in nearby restaurants and a bar is located in the hotel's building.

Le Front de Mer is a 20-minute drive from both Honfleur and Etretat
Trouville and Deauville are a 40-minute drive away.

name: Eklo Hotels Le Havre
description:
Eklo Hotels Le Havre is a modern-style hotel located in Le Havre
You will find a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and dining room
Guests can enjoy a terrace at the property.

The small soundproofed rooms at Eklo Hotels Le Havre have a walk-in shower, a toilet and a mirror
They feature a flat-screen TV.

A self-service continental breakfast is available daily at an extra cost
Private parking is available on site and other services (toiletries and late check-out) are available at the hotel for an extra fee.

André Malraux Modern Art Museum is located 5 km away and the Docks Oceane Shopping Centre is 4 km from the hotel and Le Grand Cap Shopping Centre is a 2-minute walk away
Deauville is 46 km from the hotel and Honfleur is 28 km away
A Tramway Metro Station can be found in front of the hotel and leads directly to the Train Station or to the beach.

name: ibis Styles Le Havre Centre
description:
The ibis Styles Marly Le Havre Centre is located in the heart of the district rebuilt by Auguste Perret, which is classified as a UNESCO World Heritage site
It is a 35-minute drive from Deauville and a 20-minute drive from Honfleur.

All of the en suite rooms have free Wi-Fi internet access and a TV with cable and international channels
The bathrooms are fitted with a shower or bath and they include a hairdryer.

The hotel is conveniently located near shops and restaurants, casino, theatres and city hall
It is only a 5-minute drive from the beach, train station and ferry port.

name: Novotel Le Havre Centre Gare
description:
The Novotel Le Havre is located on the waterfront at the Vauban Docks, near the centre of Le Havre and offers modern and comfortable accommodation
It is a 30-minute drive from Honfleur and Etretat, and Deauville is 40 km away.

This modern hotel features contemporary guest rooms equipped with modern en suite facilities, satellite TV and a Wi-Fi internet connection.

Enjoy simple, tasty, healthy and balanced cuisine at the Novotel Café
The restaurant is air-conditioned and has a terrace
Room service is also available 7 days a week.

Guests also have access to two public car parks and a fitness centre making it well suited for a business trip or a holiday in Le Havre with your partner or family.

name: Hôtel Le Petit Vatel - Centre ville & Plage
description:
Hôtel Le Petit Vatel - Centre ville & Plage is located in l’espace Perret, 500 metres from the city hall in La Havre and 1 km from its train station and ferry harbour
Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

All of the rooms at Hôtel Le Petit Vatel - Centre ville & Plage have a private bath or shower and a TV with cable and satellite channels.

The buffet breakfast offers a range of French pastries, fruit, and hot and cold drinks
Tray-meals can be provided upon request.

Le Havre is 2 hours from Paris by train or by car and is in the heart of the Côte Normande
Its city centre has been rebuilt by Auguste Perret following the bombings in September 1944 and is now part of the UNESCO world heritage
It is 24 km from Honfleur and 44 km from Deauville.

name: Hôtel Les Gens De Mer Le Havre by Popinns
description:
Les Gens De Mer is situated in the heart of Le Havre, opposite the central covered market and close to the Bassin de Commerce
It offers free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Guest rooms are equipped with a private bathroom, a TV and are serviced by a lift.

The hotel restaurant serves regional specialities, including seafood, and offers a range of set menus
Guests can enjoy an after-dinner drink in the sailor’s bar, the Seamen’s Club.

Les Gens De Mer provides a 24-hour front desk and has an on-site private parking
The resort of Deaville is 40 km away.

name: Hôtel Le Green
description:
Located in the centre of Le Havre, this hotel is just 300 metres from the train station
It features a terrace and free Wi-Fi access is provided in the non-smoking guest rooms.

An LCD TV and safe are provided in the individually decorated rooms, which feature patterned fabrics and wooden furnishings
A minibar is available upon request
The en suite bathrooms include a hairdryer.

Enjoy a continental breakfast while reading the newspapers provided in the breakfast room at Hôtel Le Green.

Low-cost public parking is possible nearby and Hôtel Le Green is located just 2 km from the beach
Malraux Museum is 2 km away and Octeville Airport is a 13-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Hotel Chagnot
description:
Hotel Chagnot is situated in Lille city centre, directly opposite Lille Flanders Train Station and a 10-minute walk from Lille-Europe Station
It offers modern accommodation and free Wi-Fi access
Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre and Grand Palais Convention Centre are both 1 km away.

All of the soundproofed guest rooms have a private bathroom with shower and they are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

Hotel Chagnot serves an express breakfast to takeaway.

The hotel is located 8.8 km from Lille-Lesquin Airport
Le Palais des Beaux-Arts Museum is 15-minute walk from the hotel
Department stores Printemps and Galeries Lafayette are a 10-minute walk away, while the Opéra de Lille is 450 metres away
Pierre Mauroy Stadium is a 16-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Lille Europe
description:
Located just 250 metres from Lille-Flandres Train Station, this 3-star hotel is set at the heart of the international business district
Pierre Mauroy Stadium is a 17-minute drive away
This hotel has a 24-hour reception and free internet access.

All soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a TV with cable channels
Each colourful room includes a private bathroom with a hairdryer
All rooms at Hotel Lille Europe are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and guests can use the microwave in the breakfast room featuring panoramic views.

Lille Europe hotel is accessible via the N356 motorway
The Opéra House is 750 metres from the hotel and Notre-Dame Basilica is a 10-minute walk away
Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is 1.1 km from the hotel and the Grand Palais is 1.3 km from the hotel
Private parking on site is available and upon request only.

name: Moxy Lille City
description:
Conveniently set in Lille, Moxy Lille City provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace
This 3-star hotel offers a bar
Private parking is available on site.

All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV
The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and French.

Popular points of interest near Moxy Lille City include Coilliot House, Printemps Gallery and Hospice Gantois
The nearest airport is Lille Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Eklo Hotels Lille
description:
Offering a terrace, Eklo Hotels Lille is set in Lille in the Nord-Pas-de-Calais Region, 2 km from Zénith of Lille
Lille Europe Train Station is 2.7 km away and Lille Flandres Train Station is 2.6 km away.

All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom
Other services (toiletries and late check-out) are available at the hotel for an extra fee.

You will find a 24-hour front desk and a bar at the property
Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant called Barbapizz', which serves pizzas and salads
A self-service continental breakfast is available daily at an extra cost.

A shared kitchen, a library as well as board games and a table football are at guests' disposal
Bicycle rental and electric charging stations for cars are available at an extra cost
The nearest airport is Lille Airport, 7 km from the property
Free private parking is available on site.

name: Brueghel
description:
This hotel is located in the heart of Lille
It is 300 metres from Gare Lille Flandres, 750 metres from Gare de Lille Europe and 10 minutes from Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre by walk
It has views of the Gothic St Maurice Church, which is situated across from the hotel.

All rooms are furnished with antique furniture
They include free Wi-Fi access, a TV and a private bathroom.

The hotel Brueghel has a unique antique design with statues and paintings on displayed, also a feature is the 1930's lift that can take guests to their rooms.

A continental breakfast is served every morning, and the hotel offers 24-hour front desk service.

Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre is a 20-minute walk from Brueghel
Euralille and Les Tanneurs shopping centres are only 120 and 450 metres away.

name: OKKO Hotels Lille Centre
description:
OKKO Hotels Lille Centre has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Lille
This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi
The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 600 metres from Hospice Gantois.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower
At OKKO Hotels Lille Centre rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation features amenities such as an on-site business centre and sauna.

Popular points of interest near OKKO Hotels Lille Centre include Lille Flandres Train Station, Printemps Gallery and Grand Place Lille
The nearest airport is Lille Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Lille City Hotel
description:
Set on a pedestrian shopping street in Lille City Centre, this low-cost hotel is 260 metres from the Palais des Beaux-Arts Museum, 1.2 km from Lille Grand Palais and 9 km from Pierre Mauroy Stadium
Rooms feature satellite TV and free internet access.

Each air-conditioned guest room at Lille City Hotel is equipped with a telephone
All of the rooms have a private bathroom and are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Lille City Hotel
There are many restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.

Lille-Flandres Train Station is just a 10-minute walk from Lille City Hotel
The Opera House and Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre are 600 metres from the hotel and the historic centre is 1 km away.

name: Holiday Inn Express Lille Centre, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located in Lille city centre, this hotel is 350 metres from Lille’s Palais des Beaux Arts and 9 km from Pierre Mauroy Stadium
Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is 900 metres from the property and Lille Grand Palais is 2 km away.

Rooms at the Holiday Inn Express Lille Centre are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a telephone, hairdryer and tea and coffee making facilities
All rooms are serviced by a lift
Free WiFi access is available.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast daily.

The Holiday Inn Express Lille Centre offers a 24-hour reception desk and secured, underground parking (subject to availability)
Additional facilities include 1 meeting room and a dry-cleaning service.

The nearest Metro Station is République Beaux Arts, which offers direct access to Lille Europe and Lille Flandres Train Stations
The hotel is located 800 metres from La Grande Place and 1.5 km from The Citadel of Lille.

name: Hotel De La Paix
description:
This charming hotel is located in the central pedestrianised area of Lille, only 300 metres from the Monument à la Liberté de Lille and 550 metres from Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre.

Hotel De La Paix features a traditional 19th-century staircase and is decorated with artwork
Guest rooms boast free WiFi access.

Enjoy a drink in the hotel’s Art Nouveau-style cafeteria before setting off to explore Lille.

Lille Grand Palais is 1 km from the property
Lille Flandres Train Station is 350 metres from Hotel De La Paix, while Lille Europe Train Station is 1 km away.

name: Grand Hotel Bellevue - Grand Place
description:
On the Grand Place in Old Lille, Grand Hotel Bellevue - Grand Place is set in a building of Flemish architecture and the rooms offer a marble bathroom and antique furniture
Rihour Metro Station is 100 metres away, Le Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is a 2-minute walk from the property and Lille Grand Palais is 1.4 km away.

The hotel was renovated in 2018
Each air-conditioned guest room is equipped with satellite TV and free WiFi access
The elegant, soundproofed rooms include a minibar and some have tea and coffee making facilities
Staff is available 24 hours a day.

An extensive and varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Grand Hotel Bellevue - Grand Place
Guests can enjoy cocktails in Le Windsor bar and there are restaurants 50 metres away.

The historic centre is a 5-minute walk and Lille Flandres Train Station is 900 metres away
Bois de Boulogne Park and the Citadelle are 1.5 km away and Lesquin Airport is 11 km away
Meeting rooms are available on site
There is a public car park 100 metres away.

name: Hotel De La Treille
description:
Hôtel de la Treille is located a 3-minute walk from Lille old district, 650 meters from Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre and 1.5 km from Lille Grand Palais
This pet-friendly accommodation offers free WiFi throughout.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Lille's Opera is 350 metres away, while Lille Europe train station is 15 minutes away by walk
Hôtel de la Treille is a 17-minute drive from Pierre Mauroy Stadium.

name: greet hotel Lille Gare Flandres - Groupe Accor
description:
Bienvenue dans le tout premier Greet de Lille
Notre hôtel vous accueille en face de la gare de Lille-Flandres.

L'emplacement idéal pour vos déplacements professionnels ou pour une visite de notre belle région.

Nous mettons à votre disposition différents types de chambres aménagées et décorées avec soin dans le respect de nos valeurs éco-responsables.

Depuis le 1er Septembre 2023, nous vous offrons également la possibilité de déjeuner ou dîner dans notre toute nouvelle brasserie bistronomique : Chez Simone.


Par sa vitalité culturelle, sa qualité de vie, son dynamisme économique et son énergie festive, la ville de Lille se présente désormais comme l'incontournable capitale de l'Eurorégion.


Toute l'équipe du Greet de Lille Flandres est heureuse de vous accueillir prochainement à Lille
Nous vous attendons avec impatience pour une expérience conviviale dans un lieu chaleureux et éco-engagé.

name: Hôtel Saint Maurice
description:
Located in a quiet pedestrian area in the centre of Lille, next to the Saint Maurice Gothic church, the hotel offers free WiFi access in all areas
Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre is 850 metres from Hôtel Saint Maurice.

Hôtel Saint Maurice features 38 rooms accessible by lift
Each room features a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access.

The hotel is 10 minutes walking from the old town and its museums
Lille Grand Place is 450 metres away, while Lille Grand Palais is 1.5 km from the hotel
Public parking is available at a surcharge near the property.

name: Hotel Kanaï
description:
Hotel Kanaï is located in the centre of Lille, in a pedestrianised area, only 200 metres from the famous Grand Place, a 15-minute walk from Lille Grand Palais and a 6-minute walk from Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre.

All rooms feature flat-screen satellite TV and modern furnishings.

A breakfast is available daily and is composed of produce from local farms.

Shops, restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance.

The friendly and attentive staff at the Hotel Kanaï will be happy to help you organise your stay in Lille 24 hours a day
Lille-Europe TGV Train Station is 1 km away and Lille Flandres Train Station is 550 metres from the property.

name: Grand Hôtel Lille
description:
Located in the centre of Lille, just next to Lille Flandres Train Station, Grand Hôtel Lille offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage and a lift
The hotel is 900 metres from Lille Grand Palais and 650 metres from Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre
Lille Old Town is a 5-minute walk away and the Grand Place is only 300 metres from the hotel.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a telephone
The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at Grand Hôtel Lille
Guests can find a choice of restaurants within walking distance.

Additional features include free WiFi access and room service
Lille Europe Train Station is 600 metres away from the property and Gare Lille Flandres Metro Station is only 50 metres from the hotel
The hotel is a 18-minute drive from Pierre Mauroy Stadium.

name: Brit Hotel Lille Centre
description:
Set near the Gambetta Métro station, in the city centre of Lille, this hotel-restaurant welcomes you 1 km from the Fine Arts Museum, 2 km from Lille Grand Palais and 300 metres from the Maison Folie de Wazemmes.

The Brit Hotel Lille Centre is ideal for both business and leisure stays
It offers easy access from the main roads, secure, covered parking, bicycle storage and a restaurant serving buffet food.

The rooms are all equipped with a working area with high-speed, free Wi-Fi.

Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is 1.6 km away.

name: Kyriad Lille Gare - Grand Palais
description:
Located 1 km from Lille Grand Palais and the Euralille business district, the Kyriad Lille Gare - Grand Palais offers soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi
Free closed private parking is also available.

ATTENTION: the hotel is currently undergoing renovation and may be noisy during pre-set hours; however, everything is in place to welcome you in the best conditions.

Each room at Kyriad Lille Gare - Grand Palais includes a flat-screen TV, telephone and tea and coffee-making facilities
The attractively decorated rooms feature a bathroom with shower and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available every day
You can enjoy your meals 24 hours a day in the comfort of your room
After dinner, you can relax with a drink in the hotel bar or watch TV in the lounge
Other facilities include a meeting room.

The nearest metro station to the hotel is Caulier (Line 1), 450 meters away
The hotel is ideally located 7 minutes' walk from Lille Europe station and 10 minutes' walk from Lille Flandres station
The Zenith and Aéronef concert halls are 8 and 10 minutes' walk respectively, and the Grand Place is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

The Pierre Mauroy stadium is 10 km from the Kyriad Lille Gare - Grand Palais
The N356 motorway is within easy reach, a 3-minute drive away.

name: B&B HOTEL Lille Centre Grand Palais
description:
This hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Lille Grand Palais Metro station
With a 24-hour reception, it offers soundproofed rooms with free unlimited Wi-Fi, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

A breakfast buffet is served daily at the B&B Lille Centre Grand Palais.

The B&B Lille Centre is 600 metres from the Lille Grand Palais and paid private underground parking is available subject to availability and reservation at the hotel.

name: Alliance Lille - Couvent Des Minimes
description:
Alliance Lille - Couvent Des Minimes is a 17-century former convent located 5 minutes from the centre of Lille
Nouveau siecle Convention Centre is 450 metres from Alliance Lille Couvent des Minimes
The hotel offers a luxurious lounge area and patio covered by a glass roof.

Each air-conditioned room has stylish décor and equipped Canal+ satellite TV and a minibar
They also have a marble bathroom and free Wi-Fi access.

Le Jardin du Cloître restaurant serves a buffet breakfast daily and local cuisine based on fresh market products
L’Échiquier Piano Bar offers live entertainment every evening.

Alliance Lille - Couvent Des Minimes sits just 150 metres from Bois de Boulogne, a leafy 50-hectare park
It is also 15 minutes from both Lille Europe and Lille Flandre SNCF/TGV Train Stations by car
Lille Grand Palais is 6 km from Alliance Lille - Couvent Des Minimes, while Pierre Mauroy Stadium is 6 km away.

name: Hotel Art Deco Euralille
description:
Located 1 km from Lille-Europe Train Station, Hotel Art Deco Euralille is situated in the heart of the Euralille business district
The Grand Place is a 20-minute walk away, while Lille Grand Palais and Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre are 1.7 km from Hotel Art Deco Euralille
This hotel features an on site bar.

Rooms are bright and have an Art Deco design
They each have air-conditioning, a satellite TV and free WiFi access
All rooms are serviced by a lift.

In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the hotel’s bar, which features a stained glass ceiling from the 1930s and leather chairs
There is also a library at the disposal of guests.

Romarin Metro and Tram Station is located in front of the hotel and offers direct access to Lille Flandres Station.

name: Best Western Urban Hotel
description:
“When elegance and modernity meet an old mansion…”

The Urban Hotel is originally the home of a former spinner, Monsieur Pouillet, at the time when Lille and its metropolis prospered thanks to the weaving industry.

Dating from 1880, it continues to shine as a hotel complex with its Napoleon III style, marble floors and original mouldings.

Located 2 km from the centre, 1.4 km from the Grand Palais and 2.5 km from Old Lille, take advantage of our free parking to walk, by metro (Porte de Valencienne 4 minutes, directly connecting Lille-Europe and Lille-Flandres stations) or by bike thanks to the V'lille station, which is also less than 4 minutes away.

Our rooms, renovated in 2022, invite you to a moment of rest after a day of tourism or work & before a tasty breakfast where we prefer local products.

Our rooms will seduce you with their sleek design as well as their comfort and amenities.

The Rococo Restaurant offers creative cuisine based on local products offered by our Chef Jean-François and his team.

On sunny days, relax in the sun on our terrace or in our garden.

name: Ibis Budget Lille Gares Vieux-Lille
description:
Located in Lille, Hotel Ibis Budget Lille Gares Vieux-Lille is 400 metres from the Old District and 400 metres from Grand'Place
It offers free WiFi access and a 24-hour front desk.

Serviced by a lift, each non-smoking room features a TV and a private bathroom with a shower
Extras include a desk and bed linen.

There are vending machines for drinks on site and a large range of restaurants can be found in the area.

Hotel Ibis Budget Lille Gares Vieux-Lille is 750 metres from Lille- Europe Railway Station and 600 metres from Lille Flandres Train Station
Lille Airport is 8 km away.

name: Le Napoleon
description:
Located right in the centre of Lille, 100 metres from the train stations and the main square, hotel Le Napoleon offers free WiFi
Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre is 750 metres away.

The hotel boasts 19 comfortable rooms with free WiFi access, television and all the amenities you need for a relaxing stay.

Guests can enjoy a meal at the hotel's own Brasserie serving lunches and dinners to all gourmets wishing to discover the flavours of Northern France.

Located 200 metres from Lille's ring road, Hotel Napoléon is easily accessible by car
Euralille shopping centre is 260 metres away, while Lille Grand Palais is 1 km from the property.

name: Novotel Suites Lille Europe
description:
Set in the city centre, this 4-star hotel is just 600 metres from Lille-Flandres Train Station, a 11-minute walk from Lille Grand Palais and 10 km from Pierre Mauroy Stadium
It features a fitness centre and offers suites with free WiFi access and a microwave.

Each modern suite has a flat-screen TV and tea and coffee making facilities
The private bathrooms include a hairdryer
All of the rooms are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Novotel Suites
Relax in an armchair while enjoying a drink from the Comptoirs Nomads Bar
Luxury food is sold in the hotel’s Boutique Gourmande.

The reception open 24 hours/24.

Grand Palais-Zénith is 800 metres from the hotel, Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is 1.7 km from Novotel Suites Lille Europe and the Palais des Beaux-Arts Museum is 1.3 km away.

name: Hotel Reine Mathilde
description:
Hotel Reine Mathilde is situated in the medieval district, just 300 metres from the Bayeux Tapestry Museum
It offers free Wi-Fi access and modern guest rooms with private bathrooms.

The guest rooms are decorated in warm, neutral colours
Each has a TV and a work desk
The private bathroom provides a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily
The restaurant, Le Garde Manger, offers continuous service throughout the day
Guests can enjoy a varied selection of traditional dishes in the dining room or on the south-facing terrace.

Omaha Beach Memorial Museum is 24 km from Hotel Reine Mathilde
The American Museum is 19 km away.

name: ibis Styles Lille Centre Gare Beffroi
description:
The ibis Styles Lille Centre Gare Beffroi is located in the centre of Lille, 600 metres from Lille Flandres and Lille Europe train stations
Lille Grand Palais Convention Centre and Nouveau Siecle Convention are both 1 km away.

All rooms come with a private shower room, free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV.

Breakfast is served every morning
Guests can relax at the bar and corporate events can be catered for in three modern meeting rooms.

It is a 10-minute walk from the Euralille business and shopping district
The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Pierre Mauroy Stadium.

name: Hôtel De Brunville & Spa
description:
Just 400 metres from Bayeux Cathedral, this hotel offers an outdoor heated pool, a jacuzzi and a sauna which are accessible all year round
It is ideally located in the centre of Bayeux, near the Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry, and few kilometers away from the D-Day's beaches.

Rooms at the Hôtel de Brunville & Spa are comfortable and well-equipped with modern amenities.
A continental buffet breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel De Brunville & Spa
Fresh, regional products are served in the hotel’s restaurant and guests can enjoy drinks in the bar, or by the pool.

The Spa du Grand Luxembourg, located in an indoor 200 m² space, is the result of our quest for the very best in well-being treatments and equipment.

Come and discover our new offer, unique in Bayeux: jacuzzi, sauna, hammam, 4-season sensory shower, ice fountain, salt cave with infrared deckchairs and PHYTOMER treatments.
The indoor wellness area and treatments are available on reservation.

A limited number of paid parking spaces are available

Bayeux Tapestry Museum is 650 metres from Hôtel De Brunville & Spa
Bayeux Train Station is 1.3 km away.

name: Domaine de Bayeux
description:
Located in the centre of Bayeux, the Domaine de Bayeux is set in an 18th century house featuring a tree-lined park
There are guest rooms in the main building and a further 11 air-conditioned designer bedrooms available in the extension of the orchard, each with private terrace or balcony.

Featuring a unique decor, the rooms will provide you with an LCD TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A local breakfast is prepared daily at this property, and is served in the bright dining room featuring a chandelier.

With free parking, this hotel is 300 metres from Museum of Bayeux Tapestry, 600 metres from Baron Gerard Museum and 900 metres from Notre Dame de Bayeux Cathedral
The property is just a 5-minute walk from Bayeux Train Station.

name: ibis budget Bayeux
description:
Between Caen and Cherbourg, near the exit 36 on the N13 motorway, Hotel ibis budget Bayeux is just 13 km to the D-Day landing beaches
It offers 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi Internet access.

Guest rooms are soundproofed and equipped with satellite TV
All rooms are serviced by a lift and have their own bathroom with shower.

For your safety, breakfast and dinner are served in guest room
Snacks and drinks are available from the vending machines
Guests also have access to a free online newspapers and magazine service at Ibis Budget Bayeux.

Free private parking is provided on site making this hotel an ideal base for those exploring Normandy by car
The American cemetery is 30 km from the property and the Bayeux Tapestry Museum is an 8-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Le Lion D'Or et Restaurant La Table Du Lion
description:
This former 18th-century post office is now a charming hotel located in one of Bayeux’s oldest quarters
It offers 24-hour reception and is just 400 metres from the Bayeux Tapestry Museum.

Free Wi-Fi access is provided in each soundproofed room
All rooms are light and spacious and have their own bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning
The hotel’s restaurant serves creative French cuisine
After dinner, guests can relax with a drink of Calvados and listen to some music by the fireplace in the lounge bar.

The staff at Le Lion D’or can help arrange local excursions through their concierge service
Massage treatments can be arranged near the property upon request.

name: Hôtel Le Saint Patrice
description:
Featuring 2-star accommodation, Hôtel Le Saint Patrice is situated in Bayeux, 800 metres from Baron Gerard Museum and 1.2 km from Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry
The property is around 8.5 km from German Battery of D-Day, 11 km from D-Day Museum and 12 km from Arromanches 360
The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux.

At the hotel, every room includes a desk
Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Hôtel Le Saint Patrice also provide guests with free WiFi, while certain rooms will provide you with a city view
The units in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Hôtel Le Saint Patrice offers a buffet or American breakfast.

Omaha Beach Memorial Museum is 20 km from the hotel, while Omaha Beach is 20 km away
The nearest airport is Caen–Carpiquet Airport, 28 km from Hôtel Le Saint Patrice.

name: Hôtel Le Bayeux
description:
Hotel Le Bayeux is located in the historic centre of Bayeux in the Lower Normandy region
It offers en suite accommodation with free Wi-Fi internet access.
