Rooms at Hotel Le Bayeux are equipped with a flat-screen TV, telephone and work desk
There are also family rooms that can accommodate 4 to 5 guests.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at the hotel and vending machines are also at the disposal of guests
Additional services at Le Bayeux include a laundry service, daily international newspapers in the hotel lobby and a shuttle service for excursions and airport transfers which is available on demand.

The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Bayeux Train Station
The Bayeux Tapestry Museum is 350 metres from the hotel and Notre-Dame Cathedral is 550 metres away
Bayeux is located 10 km from the D-Day beaches.

name: Château de Bellefontaine - Teritoria
description:
Located 800 metres from central Bayeux and its cathedral, this 18th-century mansion offers guest rooms and a traditional restaurant open for dinner upon reservation
The park has a tennis court and a pond, and is planted with 200-year-old trees.

Each room is individually decorated and feature a minibar, free WiFi access and a flat-screen TV
The bathrooms include a hairdryer, free toiletries and a bath or a shower
Some rooms have a seating area.

Enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning at the Château de Bellefontaine - Teritoria
A continental breakfast can also be delivered to your room at a reduced rate
After breakfast, you can use the computer with internet access in the lounge, which also features a fireplace.

Bayeux Train Station is 1 km from the hotel and free public parking is available on site.

name: Hôtel d'Argouges
description:
This 18th-century hotel is situated in the heart of Bayeux
It is set back from the road, ensuring guests the calmness of the countryside
Free Wi-Fi access is available for 1 device per room.

The rooms at the Hotel d'Argouges are divided between three buildings offering a soothing view of the garden or the yard
It features satellite TV and a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served in the living room which features preserved floorboards, woodwork, a fireplace and a period mirror
When the weather is fine enough, it can also be enjoyed in the hotel's lush garden.

Being mostly spared by the ravages of WWII, Bayeux has preserved its heritage and rich architecture
Guests can discover the famous Tapisserie of Queen Mathilde, Notre-Dame cathedral, Baron Gerard's museum, and the memorial of the Battle of Normandy.

name: La Maison de Mathilde
description:
La Maison de Mathilde is set in Bayeux, 100 metres from Baron Gerard Museum and 200 metres from Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry
The guest house, dating back to the Middle Ages, features a sun terrace with views of the garden.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV and some rooms offer views of the Cathedral of Bayeux
A terrace or patio are featured in certain rooms
Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer.

There is luggage storage space at the property
Guests can enjoy lunch or dinner at a restaurant located across the street from the hotel.

The guest house also offers bike hire and is 10 km from Port-en-Bessin
The Cathedral of Bayeux is 300 metres from La Maison de Mathilde, while Museum of the Battle of Normandy is 800 metres away.

name: Premiere Classe Bayeux
description:
This Première Classe is just a 5-minute drive from the N13 highway on the outskirts of Bayeux
It offers air-conditioned guest rooms with free Wi-Fi access and free private parking.

The accommodations are simply decorated and each has its own bathroom with shower
A TV with satellite and Canal+ TV channels is provided in each room
All rooms are serviced by a lift.

A simple buffet breakfast is served every morning at Première Classe Bayeux
A range of cafes and restaurants can be found in the centre of the town, a 15-minute walk from the hotel.

The Bayeux Tapestry Museum is 900 metres from the hotel
Omaha Beach, site of WWII allied forces landings, is 23 km away.

name: Château Saint Gilles
description:
Situated in Bayeux, 4.6 km from Baron Gerard Museum, Château Saint Gilles features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge
With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service
The hotel has a terrace and garden views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests at Château Saint Gilles can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and bike hire is available.

Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux is 4.7 km from Château Saint Gilles, while Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry is 4.8 km from the property
The nearest airport is Caen–Carpiquet, 29 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Campanile Bayeux
description:
Located in a peaceful area just outside the centre of Bayeux, the charming Campanile Bayeux offers en suite rooms with free Wi-Fi internet access
The hotel provides free private parking.

The Campanile makes an excellent base for exploring the history of Bayeux and visiting the famous D-Day beaches.

The staff at the Campanile Bayeux are dedicated to making your stay both enjoyable and memorable.

name: Grand Hôtel du Luxembourg & Spa
description:
This 17th-century mansion has been converted into a charming hotel with an outdoor heated pool, a jacuzzi and a sauna which are accessible all year round
It is ideally located in the centre of Bayeux, near the Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry, and few kilometers away from the D-Day's beaches.

Rooms at the Grand Hôtel du Luxembourg & Spa are comfortable and well-equipped with modern amenities.

The Spa du Grand Luxembourg, located in an indoor 200 m² space, is the result of our quest for the very best in well-being treatments and equipment.

Come and discover our new offer, unique in Bayeux: jacuzzi, sauna, hammam, 4-season sensory shower, ice fountain, salt cave with infrared deckchairs and PHYTOMER treatments.
The indoor wellness area and treatments are available on reservation.

A limited number of paid parking spaces are available

name: Novotel Bayeux
description:
The Novotel Bayeux is situated between Caen and Cherbourg in Normandy
It is just 1 km away from the famous Bayeux Tapestry and the historic town centre.

Guestrooms are modern and comfortable and are equipped with modern en suite facilities, Wi-Fi access and air-conditioning.

The hotel offers a restaurant, bar, car park, swimming pool and garden
Guests can use the business corner with free internet in the hall.

Up to 2 children (15 years and under) stay free when sharing with parents.

The Novotel Bayeaux is located near the beaches of the Allied landings.

name: Churchill Hotel Bayeux Centre
description:
Situated on a pedestrian street in the heart of the historic centre, this hotel is just 400 metres from the Bayeux Tapestry Museum
It offers 24-hour reception, an on-site bar and a gift shop with gourmet products from the region.

The guest rooms have a flat-screen TV with international channels
Each has free WiFi, air conditioning and a private bathroom.

A continental breakfast is available every morning
Guests can also sample dishes from a range of cafes and restaurants in the streets surrounding the hotel.

Staff are available to help with tours and other sight-seeing suggestions
Departure for the D-Day beach tour is just behind the hotel
Omaha Beach is 25 km away.

name: Le Mogador
description:
Le Mogador is set in Bayeux, 100 metres from Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux and 15 km from Omaha Beach.

Each room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV with international channels
All rooms have a private bathroom with a shower.

The hotel also offers bike hire
Baron Gerard Museum is 400 metres from Le Mogador, while Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry is 700 metres from the property.

name: Grand Hôtel "Château de Sully" - Piscine & Spa
description:
Offering a restaurant, Grand Hôtel "Château de Sully" - Piscine & Spa, is a 17th century property located in Bayeux, a 5-minute drive from Bayeux city centre
The property is 11 km from Omaha Beach
Guests can enjoy a spa with a sauna and hot tub for free
Massage treatments also can be requested at an extra cost.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar, as well as a safe and a telephone with free international calls
They all have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer
Bathrobes and slippers are provided.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning
Guests can enjoy Chef Nicolas Fages’ cuisine in the gourmet restaurant, served for dinner from Wednesday to Sunday, and for lunch and dinner on a Sunday
Closed on Monday et Tuesday

Guests can enjoy the heated indoor pool, open all the year

Bayeux Train Station is a 12-minute drive from Grand Hôtel "Château de Sully" - Piscine & Spa
Free private parking is available on site.

name: Relais des 3 Pommes
description:
Set in Bayeux in the Normandy region, this hotel features a restaurant, bar and rooms with private bathroom
Free private parking and free WiFi access are available on site.

Each room at Le Relais des 3 Pommes has a wide window opening onto a private terrace
They all have a private entrance and feature an LCD TV and a telephone.

A buffet breakfast is served daily, children menus and organises business meals
The bar is open every day and provides you with free newspapers.

The Tapestry Museum is an 11-minute walk from the hotel and the Museum of the Normandy Landings is 9 km away
Bayeux Train Station is 2.3 km away and Caen is a 30-minute drive away.

name: DOMAINE DU GRAND CAUGY
description:
Located in Saint-Vigor-le-Grand, within 3.8 km of Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry and 4.5 km of Baron Gerard Museum, DOMAINE DU GRAND CAUGY provides accommodation with a garden and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive
The property is situated 4.7 km from Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux, 10 km from D-Day Museum and 11 km from German Battery of D-Day
Guests can enjoy garden views.

At the hotel, each room includes a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available daily at DOMAINE DU GRAND CAUGY.

Arromanches 360 is 11 km from the accommodation, while Juno Beach Centre is 20 km away
The nearest airport is Caen–Carpiquet Airport, 26 km from DOMAINE DU GRAND CAUGY.

name: Villa Lara Hotel
description:
Villa Lara is a small luxury boutique hotel in the historic centre of Bayeux
It faces the 11th-century cathedral is is just a 2-minute walk from the Bayeux Tapestry.

The luxury accommodation features period-style furniture, a flat-screen TV and a minibar
They have an individual colour theme using neutral tones and printed fabrics
Each has a private bathroom with a marble floor, bathrobes and slippers.

A buffet breakfast of fresh pastries and hot coffee is offered every morning in the dining room
Guests can also relax in the empire-style bar before dining in the nearby restaurants.

Private parking is free on site and Omaha Beach is 10 km from the hotel
It can be accessed from Bayeux SNCF Train Station, which is 850 metres away
Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

name: Les Villas d'Arromanches, Teritoria
description:
Set in a stone building dating from the 19th century, Les Villas d'Arromanches, The Originals Relais is located 100 metres from Arromanches in the Normandy region
It is just 200 metres from the D-day beaches
It offers free parking and free internet access.

Guest rooms at Les Villas d'Arromanches, The Originals Relais have a TV, work desk and en suite facilities
A buffet breakfast is served daily at the hotel and you can relax at the lounge bar.

Les Villas d'Arromanches, The Originals Relais is also 10 km from the Bayeux Tapestry and Port-en-Bessin golf course.

name: Hôtel Restaurant le clos de l 'Ancien Pressoir
description:
Located in Commes, 2.7 km from Crique Vauban, Hôtel Restaurant le clos de l 'Ancien Pressoir provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant
Providing a bar, the property is located within 4.3 km of German Battery of D-Day
The property is non-smoking and is set 8.9 km from Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk
With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Hôtel Restaurant le clos de l 'Ancien Pressoir also offer free WiFi, while selected rooms are equipped with a sea view
Guest rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is available daily at Hôtel Restaurant le clos de l 'Ancien Pressoir.

You can play table tennis at this 3-star hotel.

Baron Gerard Museum is 9.4 km from the hotel, while D-Day Museum is 10 km away
The nearest airport is Caen–Carpiquet Airport, 36 km from Hôtel Restaurant le clos de l 'Ancien Pressoir.

name: Hôtel De La Marine
description:
Facing the sea and the famous museum of the Allies Normandy landings of 1944, The La Marine Hotel enjoys the best location of the area fitted in a beautiful bay between two steep rocks.

Our professional team is here to turn your stay in an unforgettable one
A very tasty cookery..
You are at home at "La Marine"
28 rooms with satellite television.

The restaurant oriented on the seaside and breakfast service will suit you and add to your comfort
Discover this region full of History and charm.

name: ibis Bayeux Port En Bessin
description:
The ibis Bayeux Port en Bessin is located in the heart of the fishing village near the D-Day landing beaches, Golf course Omaha beach and in a seaside town full of charm and attractions all year round.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away
Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Guests can enjoy a snack whenever they like with the 24-hour bar service.

This is a modern hotel with 62 highly comfortable air-conditioned rooms and benefit from the facilities offered by the hotel.

name: Hotel Luna Park
description:
Set in a lively district, Hotel Luna Park is situated in Paris, a 10-minute walk from Place de la République and the Canal Saint Martin
It offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage and vending machines
Free WiFi is provided.

All heated rooms are equipped with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV
Some rooms comes with a private bathroom, other have shared bathroom facilities.

A continental breakfast is served every morning at Hotel Luna Park.

Opéra Bastille is 2 km from Hotel Luna Park, while le Marais district is 20 minutes away by walk
Paris - Orly Airport is 18 km from the property.

name: Motel One Paris-Porte Dorée
description:
Located in the 12th district of Paris, Motel One Paris-Porte Dorée provides a garden and an on-site bar
The property is located a 6-minute walk from Porte Dorée Metro Station, 4 km from Opéra Bastille and 6 km from Notre Dame Cathedral.

The air-conditioned rooms feature a desk and a flat-screen TV
They also have a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries
All rooms are serviced by a lift and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at the property, which includes organic and fair trade produce.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a luggage storage at the property.

Louvre Museum and Pompidou Centre are 6 km from Motel One Paris-Porte Dorée, while Place de la République is 5.4 km away
Paris - Orly Airport is 12 km from the property.

name: France Louvre
description:
Located central Paris, next to the historic Marais district, this typical Haussmann style hotel offers accommodation with flat-screen satellite TV and free WiFi.

All of the rooms at the France Louvre are elegantly furnished in Louis XV style
The private bathrooms are equipped with a bathtub or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A full buffet breakfast is provided daily in the vaulted cellars
It can also be served in the comfort of the rooms
Guests can enjoy a cup of tea in the lounge, from 15:00 to 20:00.

Guests can relax in the common lounge room
Daily newspapers are provided.

France Louvre hotel also offers a 24-hour reception and shuttle service to the airport
It is a 5-minute walk from Hotel de Ville Metro Station, providing direct access to the Champs Elysées, La Defense business district and the Louvre Museum.

name: Altona
description:
Altona is located in Paris, 450 metres from Gare du Nord Train and Eurostar Station and 950 metres from Sacré-Cœur Basilica
It has a 24-hour reception and offers free Wi-Fi access.

Each room has simple décor and is equipped with a TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer
All rooms are accessible by lift.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the dining room at hotel Altona.

It is 120 metres from the Barbès-Rochechouart Metro station, which gives direct access to Chatelet and Pere Lachaise
The Montmartre district with the Moulin Rouge is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel de L'Union
description:
Hotel De L'union offers accommodation in the 20th district of Paris
All of the rooms feature parquet floors, minibar and free WiFi access.

Each room includes a flat-screen TV and some rooms have a private bathroom with a hairdryer
Tea and coffee facilities are provided.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Maraîchers Metro Station is just a few steps away from the property and will take you directly to Opera Garnier and Avenue des Champs Elysées via the line 9
AccorHotels Arena is 2.6 km from Hotel De L'union, while Opéra Bastille is 2.6 km away
Père Lachaise Cemetery is 2 km away and Chateau de Vincennes is 3 km from the hotel
The nearest airport is Orly Airport, 14 km from the property.

name: HOTEL LOUVAIN
description:
Attractively set in the 9th arr
District of Paris, HOTEL LOUVAIN is situated 600 metres from Gare Saint-Lazare, 700 metres from Opéra Garnier and 1.8 km from Musée de l'Orangerie
The property is around 2.1 km from Louvre Museum, 2.3 km from Orsay Museum and 2.4 km from Gare du Nord
The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels
The rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box and certain rooms come with city views
The rooms have a wardrobe.

Guests at HOTEL LOUVAIN can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Pigalle Metro Station, Tuileries Garden and La Cigale Concert Hall
The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18 km from HOTEL LOUVAIN.

name: Hôtel de Bordeaux
description:
Situated within walking distance of the Sacre Coeur Basilica and not far from the famous Galeries Lafayette department store, Hôtel De Bordeaux offers modern accommodation.

Guestrooms at Hôtel De Bordeaux come with a private bathroom
Modern facilities include a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access.

Every morning a continental breakfast is served in the hotel's vaulted cellar
For lunch and dinner options, guests have a wide choice of cafes and restaurants in the area.

The Eurostar terminal , Gare du Nord is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel and an airport shuttle service is available on request.

name: Hotel Hippodrome
description:
The Hippodrome Hotel is located in Montmartre, one of the liveliest areas in Paris
It is a short walk from the Moulin Rouge, Amélie's Café and Sacré-Coeur, and offers free fibre optic WiFi.

All guest rooms at the Hippodrome have an LCD TV and an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer.

Breakfast is served daily and guests can choose to have it served in their room.

Place de Clichy is the Hippodrome’s closest Metro Station (Line 13), offering easy access to the Champs Elysées and the Stade de France for soccer games.

name: District Nation
description:
Located 500 metres from Place de la Nation in Paris, the hotel District Nation is a non-smoking property offering a 24-hour reception and luggage storage.

All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom
For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer
District Nation features free WiFi throughout the property.

Continental breakfast can be enjoyed at an extra cost, either in the breakfast room.

Bastille lively district is 20 minute away by walk and Pere Lachaise can also be reached within 20 minute
Guests can easily reach the Champs Elysées within 20 minutes by public transport
The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18.5 km from the property.

name: Hotel Meslay Republique
description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Meslay Republique is set in Paris, 100 metres from Place de la République.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer in the bathroom.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Pompidou Centre is 1.5 km from Hotel Meslay Republique, while Notre Dame Cathedral is 2.5 km away
Orly Airport is 20 km from the property.

description:
The hotel Luxelthe is located in the heart of Paris’s Montmartre district, just 80 metres from the Pigalle Metro station
Provided with free WiFi, it offers rooms with flat-screen TVs.

Each guest room at the Luxelthe has a private bathroom, and some also feature balconies

The staff at the Luxelthe are available to assist 24 hours a day.

The Sacre-Cœur Basilica is less than a 10-minute walk from the Luxelthe hotel and the Moulin Rouge is just 500 metres away.

The hotel is just a few steps from the flea market and a 10-minute walk from Garibaldi Metro Station.

A buffet breakfast can be found every morning and vending machines are at your disposal in the lobby

Notre Dame Cathedral is 5.7 km from hotelF1 Paris Porte de Châtillon, while the Eiffel Tower is 6.2 km away

name: Le Nest by Sweet Inn

District of Paris, Le Nest by Sweet Inn is situated 1.1 km from Gare Saint-Lazare, 1.1 km from Pigalle Metro Station and 1.2 km from La Cigale Concert Hall

The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 19 km from Le Nest by Sweet Inn.

Guests can relax in the common lounge area.

Rouen Rive Droite Train Station is a 20-minute walk from the hotel

Le Vieux Carré’s restaurant provides daily continental breakfast and lunch

Each room at Le Vieux Carré is equipped with a TV and a telephone
The private bathrooms all feature a bathtub

Le Vieux Carré is 400 metres from Notre-Dame Cathedral and 450 metres from Rouen’s Museum of Fine Arts

Notre Dame Cathedral of Rouen is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the Musée des Beaux Arts de Rouen is 800 metres away.

At the hotel all rooms come with a wardrobe, a TV and a private bathroom.

Hôtel Les Inities is just 150 metres from the Gros-Horloge and a 5-minute walk from the Notre-Dame Cathedrale

Please note our establishment is not suitable for people with reduced mobility.

we do not accept minors unaccompanied by their legal guardian"

name: B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Droite
description:
Located a 20-minute walk from the centre and the cathedral, B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Droite offers a French restaurant, a bar and air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen, cable TV
Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

All of the rooms at B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Droite have a private bathroom with a hairdryer
A telephone and a radio are also provided.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away
Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Droite is a 16-minute walk from the Museum of Fine Arts and a 13-minute walk from Rouen Opera.

The hotel is situated 1 km from the train station and 6 km from the A28 motorway
There is a private car park on site, available at a surcharge.

name: Hôtel De La Cathédrale
description:
Set just 50 metres from the Rouen Cathedral, in the heart of the city's historic centre, this hotel has a timber-framed façade dating from the 17th century and is located 4 km from the Kindarena Stadium
Guests are invited to enjoy afternoon tea in a room leading onto the patio
Secure and paid public parking is available nearby.

All of the individually decorated rooms feature flat-screen TVs and cable channels, and some include a lounge area
The en suite bathrooms at Hotel De La Cathédrale are equipped with hairdryers.

A buffet-style breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the hotel's breakfast room, decorated in a traditional Norman style.

The Rouen-Rive-Droite Train Station is located just 1.6 km from the hotel and the Church of St
Ouen is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hotel cardinal
description:
Set in the Rouen City Centre district in Rouen, Hotel cardinal offers 3-star rooms with free WiFi
The property is around 2.3 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen, 1.3 km from Gare de Rouen Rive Droite and 3.2 km from Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall
The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 200 metres from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen.

At the hotel, all rooms include a desk
Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Hotel cardinal also have a city view
All guest rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen is 4.4 km from Hotel cardinal, while 14-juillet Tramway Station, Rouen is 5.1 km from the property
The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 84 km from the hotel.

name: B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Gauche
description:
The B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Gauche is in the St Sever district, 1 km from the Place Jeanne d'Arc and Rouen Cathedral
Its bar is open 24 hours and free Wi-Fi access is provided throughout the hotel.

These modern rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV with BeIN SPORTS
Each has a private bathroom that includes a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away
Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

You can enjoy snacks in the on-site bar, Rendez-Vous.

Rouen Rive Droite Train Station is 1 km from the hotel and private parking is possible in the secure, indoor car park.

name: Hôtel 1er Consul Rouen
description:
The Hôtel 1er Consul Rouen is located in the city centre of Rouen, the capital of Normandy, just in front of the city hall and 3 km from Kindarena Stadium
Its rooms are serviced by a lift and offer satellite TV and free WiFi internet access.

A buffet breakfast with pastries, cold meats and eggs is served daily in the dining area and drinks can be enjoyed in the bar and lounge area.

Hôtel 1er Consul Rouen is a 12-minute walk from Rouen Train Station and 650 metres from the Cathedral
Saint-Maclou Church is 240 metres away.

name: Hôtel d'Angleterre Rouen Centre Gare
description:
Well set in Rouen, Hôtel d'Angleterre Rouen Centre Gare provides a buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property
This 3-star hotel offers room service
Some rooms at the property include a balcony with a river view.

At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe
With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, certain rooms at Hôtel d'Angleterre Rouen Centre Gare also provide guests with a terrace
At the accommodation every room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV.

Popular points of interest near Hôtel d'Angleterre Rouen Centre Gare include Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen, Gare de Rouen Rive Droite and Musee des Beaux-Arts de Rouen
The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 85 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Vert
description:
Hotel Vert offers pastel-coloured rooms with a private bathroom, TV and free Wi-Fi access
It is located 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel tidal island on the Normandy Coast.

Guests can enjoy regional cuisine at the Vert’s restaurant, La salicorne
The hotel’s bar, L’Equinoxe, opens onto a private terrace.

The Vert Hotel provides a 24-hour reception and private parking
There is also an on site supermarket and souvenir shop.

name: Les Terrasses Poulard
description:
Composed of 2 different buildings, Les Terrasses Poulard is a historical property in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel and offers views of the bay, the village and the street.

Accessed by stairs, each room has a modern décor
Some rooms include large windows with bay views
They are equipped with TV and a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served at La Confiance restaurant, a 2-minute walk away, and the restaurant specialises in French and regional cuisine and is also open for lunch and dinner
Alternatively, guests can enjoy a meal at the onsite La Confiance restaurant and offers meals, drinks and snacks.

Guests can enjoy a drink in the Les Terrasses Poulard’s bar
It offers a 24-hour front desk service and guests can leave their luggage at the reception.

Activities in the area include cycling, fishing and hiking and explore the island.

name: Le Relais Saint Michel
description:
Le Relais Saint Michel is an hotel facing the bay of Mont Saint-Michel
All guest rooms ( except Twin Room Saint-Michel with interior view) offer a private terrace and some have panoramic views of Mont Saint-Michel.

The soundproofed rooms are comfortable and spacious
They are fully equipped with modern comforts including a minibar and free Wi-Fi access
Each room has en suite facilities.

The hotel’s restaurant offers traditional cuisine
Guests can enjoy a drink or a meal on the terrace, which offers views of the Mont St Michel.

A free shuttle service that stops in front of the hotel will take you to the famous landmark Mont St Michel in just 10 minutes
Safety jackets are provided for guests wishing to take a walk at night
For guests arriving by car, secured parking is available with an extra cost.

name: Ibis Styles Rouen Centre Rive Gauche
description:
Set in Rouen, 1.9 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen, Ibis Styles Rouen Centre Rive Gauche offers accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a terrace and a bar
The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi
The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.7 km from Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen.

At the hotel, every room has a wardrobe
The units in Ibis Styles Rouen Centre Rive Gauche are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

You can play billiards at Ibis Styles Rouen Centre Rive Gauche.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and French, and guests are invited to request information on the area when needed.

14-juillet Tramway Station, Rouen is 3 km from the hotel, while Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen is 3.9 km away
The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 82 km from Ibis Styles Rouen Centre Rive Gauche.

name: La Mère Poulard
description:
Housed in a historical building, this hotel is ideally located in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel
The classic-style rooms overlook the bay, the abbey or the medieval city.

All rooms at the La Mère Poulard are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access
The private bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub.

Guests are invited to sample La Mère Poulard’s recipes, including the worldwide-famous omelette, in the prestigious restaurant
A drink can be enjoyed in the piano bar, overlooking the Bay of the Mont Saint Michel.

The hotel has a shop selling regional gourmet products
The front desk is open 24 hours a day.

Activities include cycling and hiking and visiting the Mont Saint-Michel
Avranches is a 23-minute drive away
Saint-Malo is 45 minutes from La Mère Poulard.

name: Le Relais Du Roy
description:
Le Relais Du Roy is a 3-star hotel situated next to the River Couesnon, just 1.5 km from the Mont Saint-Michel and 50 metres from the free shuttle bus.

Featuring flat-screen TVs with satellite channels, a telephone and a welcome tray, each guest room at Le Relais Du Roy is decorated in a classic style
They also have a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer
Some of the rooms feature a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel.

A grocery store can be found within a 3-minute walk from the hotel
The town of Pontorson is 7 km away
Private parking is available with an extra cost.

name: Le Mouton Blanc
description:
At the foot of the abbey, the Mouton Blanc Hotel, welcomes you in its historic 14th century location
Le Mouton Blanc provides comfortable rooms with a simple yet cosy decoration.

The rooms are divided in 3 buildings: one of them offers views of the Mont Saint-Michel, and the other one features medieval-style rooms.

The Mouton Blanc restaurant offers local traditional cuisine, served in the dining room or the terrace
Breakfast is served daily.

Personalised services for visits, recreation and other activities are available upon request.

Please note that the reception of the hotel Le Mouton blanc is currently closed
Please note that arrival arrangements are made at the reception of the hotel Les Terrasses Poulard.

name: Mercure Mont Saint Michel
description:
This Mercure is situated in parkland just 2 km from the abbey of Mont Saint Michel
It offers spacious en suite rooms, a restaurant and bar and plenty of free on-site parking.

The air-conditioned rooms at Mercure Mont Saint Michel are equipped with facilities for making hot drinks
A flat-screen TV with satellite and cable channels is also provided.

The restaurant, Le Pré Salé, is famous in the area and serves delicious seafood and regional specialities
The bar, Le Normandy, offers a relaxed setting for a drink amongst friends.

Mercure Mont Saint Michel is 6.5 km from Pontorson and 52 km from Saint-Malo.

name: La Vieille Auberge
description:
La Vieille Auberge is located in the medieval village of Le Mont Saint Michel, just a short walk from the famous Mont Saint-Michel Abbey
It offers free WiFi access, a restaurant and a terrace with views of the Mont Saint-Michel Bay.

Rooms are located in 2 annex buildings with many stairs to climb
One building offers standard rooms on the main street and the other building, located at the top of the village, offers rooms with a sea view
They feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

There is also a bar at the hotel, and the restaurant serves traditional French cuisine.

This property is 24 km from Avranches and 49 km from Cancale
Dol-de-Bretagne is 30 km away.

name: Le Saint Aubert
description:
Set amid lush greenery, just 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel, the hotel welcomes you in a warm and friendly atmosphere.

Hôtel Saint-Aubert features comfortable and very quiet rooms, surrounded by gardens full of flowers.

After a day spent exploring the Mont Saint-Michel, enjoy a delicious regional cuisine in the picturesque setting of a former farmhouse.

The helpful staff will be happy to provide you with information about the visits and the many attractions in the surrounding area.

name: Auberge Saint Pierre
description:
Auberge Saint Pierre is a 14th-century half-timbered house located on Mont St Michel tidal island
It combines the period charm of exposed beams with modern comforts including TV and free Wi-Fi access.

The guest rooms at Auberge Saint Pierre have a private bathroom with a bath or shower
Some rooms have views of the sea.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast daily
Traditional Normandy cuisine and fish dishes are served in the authentic restaurant and guests may choose to dine on site.

Ideally situated for visiting Mont St Michel, this hotel is set on the main street that leads to the Mont Saint Michel abbey
Certain rooms are located in 2 separate buildings which are accessible by many stairs.

name: Hotel Gabriel
description:
Hotel Gabriel is located 1.6 Km from Mont Saint-Michel
It offers free Wi-Fi access and en suite rooms just a 25-minute walk from the walls of the old city.

Accessed by stairs, the hotel's spacious rooms include satellite TV
Each room has its own bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning.

Hotel Gabriel is a 6-minute drive from the E401 motorway
Pontorson TGV Train Station has connections to Paris and is 7.3 km away.

La Salicorne offers you authentic, vegetable, colorful, festive and eco responsible world cuisine
Le Pré Salé offers you Pré Salé lamb and semi gastronomic french cuisine and L'Hippocampe offers you vegetarian and local cuisine.

name: Hôtel la Croix Blanche
description:
Situated in the heart of Mont Saint Michel medieval Village, Hôtel La Croix Blanche offers a terrace and a bar.

The rooms at Hôtel La Croix Blanche have a flat-screen, satellite TV and a minibar
Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

In addition to the visit of Mont-Saint-Michel and its abbey, guests can go to Saint-Malo, 50 km from the hotel
Dol-de-Bretagne Train Station is 30 km away.

name: Auberge de la Baie
description:
This hotel is situated in the countryside of Normandy and offers free Wi-Fi

Flat-screen TVs with satellite channels are provided in all of the modern guest rooms at Auberge de la Baie
They are all equipped with en suite bathrooms and hairdryers.

A buffet-style breakfast is served every morning.

Free parking is available on site and the city of Avranches is 23 km away
The hotel is a 45-minute drive from the beaches of Saint-Malo and Rennes is reached by car in 1 hour.

name: Hotel Rose
description:
Composed of thoughtfully designed independent bungalows and guestrooms in the annex house of a 19th-century building, Hotel Rose offers comfortable accommodation and a peaceful atmosphere.

The residence is set in a verdant park full of trees and flowers
Some of the accommodation opens out onto the river that leads to the famous Mont Saint Michel and offer a tranquil, relaxing living space
All of the bungalows are independently ecological and can accommodate 4 people (or 5 on request).

Enjoy a tasty breakfast, a casual drink or a relaxing moment on the manor's veranda or under the shade of the trees.

Hotel Rose also features a shared living area with a piano, free Wi-Fi access, games and plenty of reading material
Nearby you can take quiet walks or bike rides and enjoy traditional and regional cuisine in one of the local restaurants.

name: Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel
description:
Situated in Beauvoir, 5.4 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey, Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace
This 5-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi
The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower
Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel provides some rooms that have a balcony, and all rooms are equipped with a kettle
At the accommodation rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options
At Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel you will find a restaurant serving French, Seafood and local cuisine
Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Beauvoir, like cycling.

Mont Saint-Michel is 5.4 km from Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel, while Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel is 24 km from the property
The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 88 km from the accommodation.

name: Manoir de la Roche Torin, The Originals Relais (Relais du Silence)
description:
Located in Courtils, Manoir de la Roche Torin, The Originals Relais is 10 km from the Mont-Saint-Michel
It offers free WiFi access, a garden and views of the Mont-Saint-Michel Abbey
The hotel’s restaurant is set in a conservatory.

All rooms feature a TV, a wardrobe and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower
Some offer views of the Mont-Saint-Michel and are suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

Breakfast is served every morning in the dining room and you can choose to order room service for breakfast
French cuisine can be enjoyed in the hotel’s restaurant.

This property is 14 km from the centre of Pontorson and 17 km from Avranches
The sea is 800 metres away and free private parking is available on site
Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

name: Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie
description:
Set in Roz-sur-Couesnon, within 11 km of Mont Saint Michel Abbey and 11 km of Mont Saint-Michel, Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie offers accommodation with a garden and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive
The property is around 28 km from Port of Houle, 31 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel and 33 km from The Pointe du Grouin
The hotel has a sun terrace and an indoor pool.

The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV
At Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie all rooms come with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie offers a children's playground
Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Roz-sur-Couesnon, like hiking.

Palais du Grand Large is 43 km from Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie, while Casino Barrière Saint-Malo is 43 km away
The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 88 km from the accommodation.

name: ibis Pontorson Baie Du Mont Saint Michel
description:
Situated in Saint-Georges-de-Gréhaigne, 10 km from Mont Saint Michel, ibis Pontorson Baie Du Mont Saint Michel features a terrace, bar, and restaurant
This property also provides guests with free WiFi.

At the hotel, all rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a wardrobe
The rooms come with a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer.

Guests at ibis Pontorson can enjoy a continental buffet breakfast, including sweet and savoury products
Gluten-free items are also available.

Cycling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near the accommodation.

Cancale is 39 km from ibis Pontorson Baie Du Mont Saint Michel, while the beaches of Saint-Malo are a 35-minute drive away
The nearest airport is Dinard Brittany Airport, 48 km from the hotel.

The hotel also has a free, secure car park, equipped with charging points for electric vehicles and Tesla superchargers.

name: Vacancéole - Le Domaine du Mont - Mont St Michel
description:
Located just 18 km from Mont Saint Michel in Roz-Sur-Couesnon, Vacancéole Le Domaine du Mont offers a shaded outdoor terrace
Some of the rooms are air conditioned.

A flat-screen TV and free wired internet access are provided in all accommodations
Each room has its own bathroom with bath or shower.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and a bakery delivery service is available
Drinks can be bought at the reception and you can have lunch or dinner in the nearby restaurants.

Vacancéole Le Domaine du Mont also has a children’s playground for younger guests
A heated indoor pool and a sauna are also featured at the residence.

Saint-Malo is 40 km from Vacancéole Le Domaine du Mont
Free WiFi access is available in the reception, while wired internet is provided in the rooms
Rennes Airport is 75 km from the property, while Pontorson Train Station is 8.6 km away.

name: Hôtel Le Lithana
description:
Located in the town centre of Pontorson, this hotel is just 10 km south of the famous Mont St-Michel
It offers a restaurant with a terrace and an interior courtyard
A private parking is at guests' disposal.

Guest rooms in this traditional Norman building have a simple décor and feature a balcony
Each heated guest room is equipped with a TV
Some rooms have access to a shared bathroom and some rooms have a private bathroom.

The restaurant at Le Lithana is open from Monday to Friday, and also features a bar
Breakfast including artisanal bread and pastries, is served every morning in the restaurant.

The hotel Le Lithana is 500 metres from Pontorson Train Station, shops and tourist office
It is accessible via the N176 motorway.

name: Best Western Hôtel Montgomery
description:
A 5 minutes' drive from Mont-Saint-Michel, the hotel is a 16th century old manor located in Pontorson
The Best Western Hôtel Montgomery features a garden as well as a private parking for an extra fee
Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Rooms are decorated in a classic style and feature a bathroom with a bath or shower, and an LCD TV.

Guests can enjoy a breakfast served every morning at an extra cost
An array of restaurants can be found nearby the hotel, as well as a free public parking.

Cancale is 38 km away while Saint Malo train station is 44 km away from Best Western Hôtel Montgomery.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Quatre Salines, Le Mont Saint-Michel Sud (Inter-Hotel)
description:
The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Quatre Salines, Le Mont Saint-Michel Sud is located just a 10-minute drive from Le Mont Saint Michel and a 35-minute drive from Saint Malo.

Each guest room at The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Quatre Salines, Le Mont Saint-Michel Sud is soundproofed and has satellite TV and a private bathroom.

The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Quatre Salines, Le Mont Saint-Michel Sud has a restaurant, which serves regional and traditional cuisine and seafood specialities, using fresh local produce.

The hotel provides a shuttle service between the hotel and Dol de Bretagne TGV station, Saint Malo TGV station, Dinard and Rennes Saint Jacques Airport
Free on-site parking is also available.

name: Hôtel Ariane & SPA
description:
This charming hotel sits at the border of Brittany and Normandy, just a 5-minute drive from the Mont-Saint-Michel
Set in a garden, it has an outdoor terrace and spacious rooms.

Each bedroom has a contemporary design, a TV and a telephone
The private bathrooms feature a bathtub and a hairdryer
Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire Hotel Ariane.

The hotel has a wellness area for a fee
The sessions can be privatized.

A full buffet breakfast is provided every morning in the cosy dining room with plants and stone walls.

Shuttles between Pontorson and Saint Malo are available for a small charge and leave from in front of the hotel
Hotel Ariane is 80 km from Rennes and 47 km from Saint Malo
Private parking is possible on site, at a surcharge.

name: L'Etape du Mont, Family Hostel
description:
L'Etape du Mont, Family Hostel features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in Pontorson
Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property
The property is non-smoking and is located 10 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey.

A continental breakfast is available daily at the hotel.

You can play billiards and darts at L'Etape du Mont, Family Hostel, and the area is popular for cycling.

Mont Saint-Michel is 10 km from the accommodation, while Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel is 24 km away
The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 84 km from L'Etape du Mont, Family Hostel.

name: Hôtel Victor Hugo
description:
Located in Pontorson, 10 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey, Hôtel Victor Hugo provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar
Located around 23 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel, the hotel with free WiFi is also 39 km away from Port of Houle
The property is non-smoking and is set 10 km from Mont Saint-Michel.

Every room is fitted with a safety deposit box, while some rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with city views.

The Pointe du Grouin is 43 km from the hotel, while Solidor Tower is 45 km away
The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 83 km from Hôtel Victor Hugo.

name: Colmar Hotel
description:
Colmar Hotel is located in Colmar, 1 km from House of the Heads
Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 1.2 km away
It features free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a bar and a free private parking in front of the hotel.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle and a private bathroom
Free toiletries and a hair dryer are available in all of the rooms.

Free parking and paid secured parking are available on site
Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 1.1 km from Colmar Hotel, while Colmar Expo is 3.5 km away
The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the property.

name: Hôtel des Ducs
description:
This hotel is located in historic centre of Dijon, listed as a World Heritage site by Unesco, 50 metres from The Palace of the Dukes
The Hotel Des Ducs have the main buiding (Hotel des Ducs) and 2 annexes (Maison des Ducs 150 m from the Hotel and Residence des Ducs 300 m from the hotel).

It offers a bar and free Wi-Fi
Hotel Des Ducs serves a buffet breakfast each morning and guests can relax with a drink on the terrace.

Rooms at Hotel Des Ducs are equipped with a telephone, flat-screen TV and private bathroom with bath or shower
The rooms are accessible by lift and some are air-conditioned.

Hotel Des Ducs is less than 50 metres from the Museum of Fine Arts, the city's opera house and the city's shopping area
The Burgundy Wine Route begins just a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel des Halles
description:
Located in Dijon historical city center, 50 metres from the pedestrian area, Hôtel des Halles features a free WiFi access
The Halles centrales Covered Market is located 300m walk away
The road of vintage wines of Bourgogne starts a 10-minute drive from the property.

All rooms provide air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a walk-in shower
Rooms are accessible by lift.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at Hôtel des Halles.

Godrans Tramway Stop is 30 metres away and provides direct access to Dijon Zenith and Dijon University
Paid public parking is located 250 metres away.

name: Hôtel République
description:
This 18th-century coaching hotel is located in a peaceful street in the historical centre of Dijon
It offers a modern and elegant setting and free Wi-Fi access.

Hotel République features rooms decorated with warm colours to offer a cosy atmosphere
The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

Guests can relax on the terrace at the République Hotel
A buffet breakfast is served daily.

Dijon-Ville Train Station is less than a 15-minute walk away, or a 5-minute tram ride from République Tram Stop
Hotel République is 900 metres from Musee de Beaux-Arts de Dijon and an 8-minute walk from Dijon Cathedral.

name: Hotel Victor Hugo
description:
Located within a walking distance from the historic centre of Dijon and 650 metres from the train station, Hotel Victor Hugo offers a garden and rooms with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom
Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

Some of the heated rooms at Hotel Victor Hugo have a view of the garden
The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is available every morning
It can be served in the dining room which features wooden furniture or in the comfort of your room.

The hotel is 500 metres from Darcy Square and 800 metres from the cathedral
There is a private car park on site, available at an additional cost.

name: Maison Philippe Le Bon
description:
Set in the heart of the historic centre of Dijon, Maison Philippe Le Bon is 300 metres from Palais des Ducs de Bourgogne
Free WiFi in all rooms and all public areas of the hotel.

The air-conditioned rooms at Maison Philippe Le Bon have a private bathroom and flat screen TV
Rooms offer views over the city of Dijon, the interior garden or Gothic courtyard or over rue Sainte Anne.

Restaurant La Closerie serves inventive, seasonal gourmet cuisine, complemented by an excellent wine list featuring many local wines
La Closerie offers elegant dining in a setting dating back to the 17th century, with original floortiles, exposed beams and rustic stonework, yet infused with contemporary touches.

In the summertime, lunch and dinner can be served in the hotel's private garden
A full buffet breakfast is served daily.

Guests at Maison Philippe Le Bon can explore the historical centre, its quaint streets and squares, while visiting Les Halles market, a wide variety of museums and original boutiques and shops.

Gare de Dijon-Ville train station is a 5-minute drive or a 15-minute walk away from Maison Philippe Le Bon.

name: Holiday Inn Express Dijon, an IHG Hotel
description:
Offering an outdoor pool, Holiday Inn Express Dijon is located in Saint-Apollinaire
The air-conditioned hotel offers 24-hour reception, a sun terrace and a bar
Luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access are available.

Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and cable channels
Featuring a walk-in shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

There is also an electric kettle in every room
A buffet breakfast is available daily and vending machines with snacks are provided on site.

The hotel is situated 3 km from Dijon centre and 4.6 km from the train station
The property offers free, secured parking.

name: Oceania Le Jura Dijon
description:
The Hôtel Le Jura is located in the city centre, 200 metres from the train station and a 10-minute tram ride from the Palais de Congrès
The hotel offers rooms with a garden view and free WiFi internet access.

Most of the spacious guest rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable and are soundproofed.

The Hôtel Le Jura serves a buffet breakfast, which can be taken in the guest rooms
You can also enjoy a drink from the bar and there are vending machines available.

Guests can enjoy an indoor heated swimming pool, a hammam and a fitness room.

name: Kyriad Hotel Dijon Gare
description:
The Kyriad Hotel Dijon Gare is 120 metres from Dijon Train Station and offers an indoor swimming pool and soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi access.

Each air-conditioned bedroom has a tea and coffee maker and satellite TV
All the rooms have a private bathroom.

Extras include a fitness centre and a sauna upon reservation.

The hotel reception is open 24 hours, 7 days a week
There are 2 TV lounges on the ground floor and a computer with internet access is available for guests' use.

The hotel has a bar and large groups can be catered for on request, 24 hours a day
A hot buffet breakfast is available daily.

The hotel is 7 km from Dijon Bourgogne Airport
A close garage parking is available at an additional cost
The Palais des Congrès is a 7-minute tram ride away and both the university campus and the Toison d'Or shopping centre are less than 20 minutes from the property.

name: Hôtel le Thurot
description:
Featuring free WiFi, The Hotel Thurot is conveniently located 300 metres from Dijon city centre and the train station.

This 2-star hotel offers comfortable air-conditioned rooms fully equipped with a private bathroom, a telephone and a flat-screen TV.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and a bar invites guests to relax with a drink at the end of the day
During summer, the staff can organise visits to a nearby wine cellar, where you will enjoy a wine-tasting session at an extra cost.

Hotel Thurot is close to shops and restaurants, and is just a short walk from Dijon Musée des Beux Arts and the city hall
Secure parking is available onsite, subject to availability as there are limited spaces.

name: Hotel Le Jacquemart
description:
In the centre of Dijon, capital of Burgundy, close to the Palais des Ducs de Bourgogne, Hotel Le Jacquemart enjoys a privileged location in the district of the Antique shops.

Whether on a holiday or on a business trip, enjoy the comfort of 31 elegant rooms ranging from economic to premium
The hotel's welcoming staff will be more than happy to help you make the most of your stay.

While in Dijon, make sure you spare some time to visit the art museum and the Notre-Dame church with its famous owl-shaped carving.

name: Hôtel Wilson - Teritoria
description:
Hôtel Wilson - Teritoriais located in the Burgundy region a 10-minute walk from the centre of Dijon
It is housed in a 17th-century post house
Free Wi-Fi is available.

Guest rooms overlook Place Wilson or the hotel’s interior courtyard
All rooms are equipped with en suite bathrooms, telephones, satellite TV and are accessible by lift.

Hôtel Wilson - Teritoria has a bar
Parking in the courtyard is available, subject to availability with extra fees
The Musée des Beaux-Arts de Dijon and Palace of the Dukes and Estates of Burgundy are a 6-minute drive away.

name: Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located in Dijon, 5.2 km from Chenove Centre Tramway Station, Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden
Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom
Guests can enjoy French dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar.

At the hotel, each room has a desk
Guest rooms at Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel are equipped with a TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box.

A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property.

The accommodation offers a sauna.

Staff speak English, Spanish, French and Italian at the reception.

Dijon - Bourgogne Airport Tramway Station is 5.4 km from Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel, while Universite Tramway Station is 6.8 km away
The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 51 km from the hotel.

name: ibis Styles Dijon Central
description:
Set in a pedestrian district in the heart of Dijon’s historic area, ibis Styles Dijon Central is just 1 km from Dijon Train Station
It offers 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

The ibis Styles Dijon Central boasts air-conditioned and soundproofed guest rooms, as well as a conference room enjoying the support of a professional staff and a reliable organization.

The success of the ibis Styles Dijon Central is closely linked to its gastronomic restaurant, Le Central and its brasserie-style restaurant
After a tasty meal, you can discover the city of Dijon and its countless landmarks.

The Palace of the Dukes of Burgundy is 400 metres from the hotel.

name: ibis Dijon Gare
description:
Located opposite Dijon Train Station, the ibis Dijon Gare Hotel is just a 10-minute walk from the historic city centre
It offers air-conditioned rooms equipped with a radio and free WiFi.

The ibis Dijon Gare's restaurant, Le Klub, serves regional cuisine and a large wine selection
During the summer, guests can enjoy their meal on the floral terrace.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away
Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

name: B&B HOTEL Dijon Centre
description:
Located in Dijon, 2 km from Dijon Congrexpo, B&B HOTEL Dijon Centre offers rooms with air conditioning
Each accommodation at the 2-star hotel has city views and free WiFi
The property is 5 km from Zénith de Dijon.

Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels
All rooms come with a private bathroom and a shower, while selected rooms here will provide you with a balcony
All units have a desk.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the property.

Languages spoken at the reception include German, English and Spanish.

Arquebuse Botanic Gardens is a 13-minute walk from B&B HOTEL Dijon Centre
Dole - Jura Airport is 50 km away.

name: Mercure Dijon Centre Clemenceau
description:
Mercure Dijon Centre Clémenceau is a 4-star non-smoking hotel in the city centre of Dijon, opposite the Auditorium and the Convention Centre.

Guestrooms are spacious and practical and equipped with modern en suite facilities, air-conditioning and satellite TV.

Mercure Dijon Centre Clémenceau offers a restaurant, Le Château Bourgogne, serving traditional and regional gourmet cuisine for lunch and dinner
In the summer months, guests can dine on the peaceful poolside terrace.

The hotel offers secure parking on site.

name: Campanile Dijon Congrès Clemenceau
description:
Located in Dijon, Campanile Dijon Congrès Clémenceau offers air-conditioned guest rooms and free Wi-Fi access throughout
You can relax with a drink from the 24-hour lounge bar and the Palais des Congrès of Dijon is 200 metres away.

All of the contemporary rooms at Campanile Dijon Congrès Clémenceau have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, heating, and a private bathroom with hairdryer and shower.

A private, secured parking is available upon prior reservation and with an additional cost
Dijon city centre is located 1 km from the property and Poincarré tram stop can be found in front of the hotel.

name: hotelF1 Dijon Nord
description:
hotelf1 Dijon Nord is located in Dijon, 1 km from Zénith de Dijon.

Guests can purchase microfibre towels at the hotel at an extra cost of EUR 3 each.

Dijon Congrexpo is 2.8 km from Hotelf1 Dijon Nord, while Saint-Philibert Church is 4.2 km from the property.

name: Logis Hotel Darcy Dijon Centre
description:
Located a 5-minute walk from the Dijon train station, the Logis Hotel Darcy Dijon Centre is across from the Place Darcy underground public parking lot, which is monitored 24 hours a day and is accessible via Rue du Dr Chaussier.

Regional specialties are served at the onsite gourmet restaurant
Wine tasting and a bistro-style cuisine are proposed at the hotel’s wine bar.

name: Holiday Inn Dijon Toison D'or, an IHG Hotel
description:
Offering a spa with sauna, hammam and fitness centre, the Holiday Inn is located just outside Dijon’s historic city centre, in the heart of the Toison d’Or Technological Park
It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi access.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided in each spacious room
The rooms have a contemporary décor with colour accents
Private bathrooms feature Starck bathroom fixtures.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and the restaurant, Gallery 412, serves traditional and modern French cuisine
The on-site bar, Light Bar, serves a large selection of wines.

Holiday Inn Dijon is a 15-minute tramway ride from the Dijon Train Station and a 5-minute walk from Zenith de Dijon
Free parking is available on site and the hotel is a 2-minute drive from the highway
With 180 shops, The Centre La Toison d'Or shopping centre is a 1-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Kyriad Direct DIJON NORD - Zenith - Toison d'Or
description:
Located a 12-minute drive from Dijon city centre, Hôtel Hôtel Restaurant Kyriad Direct DIJON NORD - Zenith - Toison d'Or has features air-conditioned room with free WiFi, meeting rooms and a restaurant
Free private parking is available on site.

With a simple decor, the soundproofed rooms at Hôtel Hôtel Restaurant Kyriad Direct DIJON NORD - Zenith - Toison d'Or include a private bathroom and an LCD TV with Canal+
Provided with free WiFi, rooms are all accessible by lift and some are suitable for families or groups of friends.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room
Guests can have a drink at the hotel’s bar and eat at the restaurant, which proposes à la carte menus including Burgundian specialties, grills, salads and pizzas.

Dijon’s Train Station is 6 km away and Dijon-Bourgogne Airport is 20 minutes by car
The Palais des Sports is a 9-minute drive and the Musée des Beaux-Arts is 5 km away.

name: Hôtel Montchapet Dijon Centre
description:
The Hôtel Montchapet is located in the heart of Dijon, just a 10-minute walk to Gare de Dijon-Ville
It offers soundproofed accommodation and free Wi-Fi.

Each guest room at the Montchapet Hotel has a modern decor and a private bathroom.

Guests at the Montchapet can relax with a drink in the bar after a day of sightseeing
The hotel is less than a 10-minute walk from the Dijon Cathedral.

name: Novotel Dijon Sud
description:
The Novotel Dijon Sud is situated on the Burgundy wine route, 10 minutes from Dijon and in the area of the Marsannay-La-Côte vineyards
It features an outdoor swimming pool and free parking is available.

Rooms at the the Novotel Dijon Sud are spacious, air-conditioned and feature a Satellite TV and a mini bar.

Guests can enjoy a drink and sample traditional French cuisine in the Novotel Restaurant
In the summertime, meals are also served on the outdoor terrace
A children’s menu is available upon request.

name: La Bonbonniere - Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western
description:
Situated in an enchanting setting, on the hills of a 13th century village, the hotel overlooks Lake Kir and the town of Dijon.

Surrounded by a delightful park planted with flowers and trees, Hôtel La Bonbonnière features 20 fully-equipped and quiet rooms accessible by lift.

Unwind in a comfortable and extremely peaceful environment only a few minutes away from Dijon’s city centre
Free private parking is possible on site, subject to availability.

name: Gasthof - Hotel Kopf
description:
Set 18 km from Europa-Park Main Entrance, Gasthof - Hotel Kopf offers 2-star accommodation in Riegel and features a terrace, a restaurant and a bar
The property is situated 19 km from Freiburg’s Exhibition and Conference Centre, 23 km from Freiburg Cathedral and 25 km from Freiburg (Breisgau) Central Station
The hotel has a sauna, an ATM and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels
The units feature a wardrobe.

Colmar Expo is 37 km from Gasthof - Hotel Kopf, while Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 39 km away
The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 66 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel De La Couronne
description:
Hotel De La Courronne is located in Riquewihr town centre, 14km north of Colmar
This family-run hotel offers spacious accommodation with en-suite facilities and free Wi-Fi internet access.

Accessible by stairs, all rooms feature original oak beams and medieval furnishings
Each room has a TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served daily at the hotel's breakfast room at an extra cost
Guests can also relax in the café bar and on the terrace.

A large private carpark is available on site and Hotel De La Couronne provides an express check-in service and a multilingual staff
The picturesque town of Ribeauvillé is just 5km away
Two recharge stations for electric cars are available for a fee.

name: Hotel ibis Dijon Centre Clemenceau
description:
This hotel has a 24-hour reception and offers air-conditioned guest rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access
It is located just a 15-minute walk from the centre of Dijon.

The soundproofed guest rooms include a telephone and a work desk
Each room has a private bathroom
All of the rooms are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage
Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00
Light snacks are served in the contemporary bar.

Gare Porte Neuve Train Station is just 1 km from Hotel ibis Dijon Centre Clemenceau
The Exhibition Centre is 350 metres away and public parking is available on site.

name: Hotel am Park
description:
This hotel is located directly opposite the entrance of Europa-Park in Rust
There are snacks and drinks available in the hotel shop
On-site parking is free.

The bright and spacious rooms at Hotel am Park feature wooden interiors
All rooms include a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

A traditional German breakfast is available each morning.

Tickets for Europa-Park can be reserved at the Hotel am Park in Rust
All children are welcome at the Hotel.

Hotel am Park is 4 km from the A5 motorway
It is a 30-minute drive from both Freiburg and Strasbourg.

name: B&B Hotel Rust-Ettenheim
description:
Situated in Ettenheim, 9.3 km from Europa-Park Main Entrance, B&B Hotel Rust-Ettenheim features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking
The property is set 34 km from Freiburg’s Exhibition and Conference Centre, 37 km from Freiburg Cathedral and 38 km from Rohrschollen Nature Reserve
The property is non-smoking and is located 33 km from Würth Museum.

At the hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

B&B Hotel Rust-Ettenheim offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Freiburg (Breisgau) Central Station is 39 km from the accommodation, while Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg is 49 km from the property
The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 49 km from B&B Hotel Rust-Ettenheim.

name: Holiday Inn Express - Ringsheim, an IHG Hotel
description:
Holiday Inn Express - Ringsheim in Ringsheim provides accommodation with a shared lounge
The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk and a business centre.

All rooms boast a seating area, kettle, a flat-screen cable TV and a private bathroom.

The daily breakfast consists of a continental breakfast buffet .

Strasbourg is 37 km from the accommodation, while Colmar is 36 km away
Baden Airpark Airport is 63 km from the property.

name: Moxy Rust
description:
Located in Rust, 1.8 km from Europa-Park Main Entrance, Moxy Rust provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace
Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom
The property is non-smoking and is situated 33 km from Freiburg’s Exhibition and Conference Centre.

Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV
At Moxy Rust each room comes with bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and gluten-free options.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Rust, like cycling.

A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at Moxy Rust
Speaking Bulgarian, German, Greek and English at the reception, staff are always on hand to help.

Freiburg Cathedral is 36 km from the hotel, while Freiburg (Breisgau) Central Station is 38 km away
The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 57 km from Moxy Rust.

name: Highway Hotel
description:
The Highway Hotel is easily accessible off highway A 5, halfway between the city of Offenburg and Freiburg.

Whether you would like to relax or plan business meetings, our hotel offers the suitable ambiance for each occasion.

name: Oneloft Hotel
description:
Set in Obernai, 15 km from Würth Museum, Oneloft Hotel offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace
The 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi
The property is non-smoking and is located 29 km from Strasbourg History Museum.

At the hotel, every room comes with a wardrobe
At Oneloft Hotel all rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Staff speak German, English and French at the 24-hour front desk.

Zénith de Strasbourg is 29 km from Oneloft Hotel, while St
Paul's Church is 30 km from the property
The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Babylon am Europa-Park
description:
Opened in May 2017, Hotel Babylon offer accommodation in Ringsheim, 5 km from Rust
The Europa-Park amusement park is only a 5-minute drive away
Free private parking is available on site.

A flat-screen TV is featured
Free WiFi is available throughout the property

Strasbourg is 37 km from Hotel Babylon, while Colmar is 36 km from the property
The nearest airport is Baden Airpark Airport, 63 km from Hotel Babylon.

name: Hôtel-Restaurant Mont Sainte-Odile
description:
Situated in Ottrott, 26 km from Würth Museum, Hôtel-Restaurant Mont Sainte-Odile features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant
This 2-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and free WiFi
Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

At the hotel, rooms come with a desk
The rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

Guests at Hôtel-Restaurant Mont Sainte-Odile will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ottrott, like hiking, skiing and cycling.

Strasbourg History Museum is 40 km from the accommodation, while Zénith de Strasbourg is 41 km from the property
The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 28 km from Hôtel-Restaurant Mont Sainte-Odile.

name: Logis Hotel Le Parc & Spa
description:
Logis Hotel Le Parc is located in the historic, Alsatian village of Saint-Hippolyte
The hotel has a covered swimming pool and you will also have access to the sauna, hammam and fitness centre.

A minibar, TV and facilities for making tea and coffee are provided in the elegant guest rooms
The en suite bathrooms include a hairdryer.

The restaurant serves regionally inspired dishes and a wide selection of local wines
In the evening guests can relax with a drink and enjoy live music in the hotel bar.

The Parc is situated 6.5 km from Château du Haut-Kœnigsbourg
Guests can enjoy hiking and cycling in the surrounding Vosges Mountains.

name: Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica
description:
Situated in Ringsheim, 6 km from Europa-Park Main Entrance, Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a terrace
The property is set 34 km from Freiburg Cathedral, 36 km from Freiburg (Breisgau) Central Station and 36 km from Würth Museum
The property is allergy-free and is located 31 km from Freiburg’s Exhibition and Conference Centre.

At the hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower
Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms include a balcony
At Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica all rooms include bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Guests at Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ringsheim, like hiking and cycling.

Rohrschollen Nature Reserve is 42 km from the hotel, while Colmar Expo is 50 km from the property
The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 52 km from Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica.

name: Best Western Hotel & SPA Le Schoenenbourg
description:
Surrounded by vineyards, the Best Western Hotel Le Schoenenbourg is opposite the ramparts of the medieval village of Riquewihr
This eco-friendly hotel features a complimentary spa area with an indoor pool, saunas and hammam as well as a seasonal outdoor pool
Riquewihr Christmas Market is 170 meters away.

Each room is decorated in neutral colours
The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee making facilities
Please note that the restaurant is open.

Additional facilities at the Best Western include a bar
Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast in the dining area or on the outdoor terrace overlooking the garden.

Hotel Le Schoenenbourg is 13 km from Colmar, 28 km from the border of Germany and 53 minutes from Strasbourg
Guests can go hiking in the Réserve Naturelle du Massif du Ventron.

name: Hotel Le Mandelberg
description:
The Hotel Le Mandelberg is located at the foot of a hill in the village of Mittelwihr, in the heart of the Alsace region
It offers a sauna and a solarium, and massage treatments are available upon request.

Each room at the Mandelberg is individually decorated with a private bathroom, a minibar and a flat-screen TV
All rooms are serviced by a lift.

The Mandelberg serves a daily buffet breakfast, and guests are invited to relax with a drink in the bar or on the terrace.

The hotel is in close proximity to many vineyards and free on-site parking is available.

name: FourSide Hotel Ringsheim
description:
Situated in Ringsheim, 5.7 km from Europa-Park Main Entrance, FourSide Hotel Ringsheim features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a bar
Located around 34 km from Freiburg Cathedral, the hotel with free WiFi is also 36 km away from Freiburg (Breisgau) Central Station
The property is non-smoking and is set 30 km from Freiburg’s Exhibition and Conference Centre.

At the hotel, the rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels
Some rooms are fitted with a kitchenette with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave
All rooms have a safety deposit box.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at FourSide Hotel Ringsheim.

The accommodation offers a children's playground.

Speaking German, English, French and Italian, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the 24-hour front desk.

Würth Museum is 36 km from FourSide Hotel Ringsheim, while Rohrschollen Nature Reserve is 42 km from the property
The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 52 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel De La Tour
description:
Hotel De La Tour is in a former winery in Ribeauvillé’s medieval centre
Guests have free access to the sauna, hammam, hot tub
Free WiFi and bike rental are also available.

Rooms at Hotel De La Tour are individually decorated and equipped with a telephone, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower or a bath
Some rooms feature details of the original Alsatian building.

De La Tour Hotel is near several restaurants that serve traditional Alsatian dishes including sauerkraut, baeckaoffa and tartes flambées
The hotel has a bar and lounge where guests can relax with an aperitif.

There is also a tennis court and guests receive preferential rates at the nearby Ammerschwihr and Alsace Golf Clubs
The Tour des Bouchers is opposite this hotel
Ribeauvillé Train Station is a 4.3 km from the hotel and Colmar is 16 km away.

name: Euro-Hotel
description:
The Euro-Hotel in Kappel-Grafenhausen is just off the A5 motorway and a 10-minute drive from Europa Park Rust
It offers rooms with satellite TV.

The rooms at the Euro-Hotel were renovated in March 2010 and have new carpets
All rooms have Wi-Fi access and a hairdryer
Rooms are located either in the main building or in the guest house next door.

A breakfast buffet is available each morning at the Euro-Hotel
Many restaurants can be found within walking distance.

Freiburg is just a 20-minute drive away
The hotel is also a good base for day trips to Strasbourg and the Black Forest.
