name: ibis Budget Colmar Centre Gare
description:
Ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville is set in the Colmar Centre Ville district in Colmar, 300 metres from House of the Heads and 600 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The rooms have a TV with satellite channels.

Colmar Expo is 2.5 km from ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville, while Theater Colmar is 200 metres from the property
The nearest airport is Basel Airport, 55 km from the property.

name: L'Abbaye d'Alspach
description:
Located in the heart of the medieval town of Kientzheim, the original architecture at this former convent has been successfully preserved to create a cosy hotel.

The smart rooms at the L'Abbaye d'Alspach have been carefully designed by the owner to ensure a calm and comfortable night's sleep
They include modern amenities such as free Wi-Fi internet access.

To guarantee your wellbeing L'Abbaye d'Alspach has a shady garden, a sauna and a fitness room.

The team provide excellent advice concerning tourist highlights
Free private parking is provided, making it easy to explore the Alsace region by car
The hotel is an ideal base for discovering this wine-producing area, famous for the Tokay d'Alsace.

name: Hotel Elisabeth
description:
Hotel Elisabeth is located in La Vancelle, just 3 km from Château de Frankenbourg and 14 km from the Volerie des Aigles and the Montagne des Singes
It offers free Wi-Fi access, a garden and a terrace.

The guest rooms at Hotel Elisabeth are simply decorated and include a flat-screen TV
They each have a private bathroom with a shower.

Breakfast is prepared every morning at Hotel Elisabeth, and traditional French cuisine can be enjoyed in the on-site restaurant.

Free private parking is available on site and Sélestat Train Station is 12 km away
The property is 13 km from Château du Haut-Koenigsbourg, 24 km from Ribeauvillé and 28 km from Riquewhir.

name: B&B HOTEL Sélestat Centre-Alsace
description:
Set within 19 km of Colmar Expo and 22 km of House of the Heads, B&B HOTEL Sélestat Centre-Alsace provides rooms in Sélestat
Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom
The property is non-smoking and is located 12 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV
At B&B HOTEL Sélestat Centre-Alsace each room comes with bed linen and towels.

Speaking English and French, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 22 km from the accommodation, while Colmar Train Station is 23 km away
The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 41 km from B&B HOTEL Sélestat Centre-Alsace.

name: La Cour du Bailli Suites & Spa
description:
Located an hour's drive south of Strasbourg, La Cour du Bailli offers a spa centre with an indoor pool and hot tub
It features a medieval decor and a terraced courtyard.

Each studio and apartment at the Cour du Bailli is equipped with a kitchenette and TV
They have a private bathroom.

The Restaurant La Cave du Bailli serves regional cuisine and a variety of wines
During the summer, guests can enjoy meals on the terrace.

Guests have access to the hotel's free internet terminal and can book and massage treatment, at a surcharge.

name: Ibis Budget Sélestat
description:
Set on the Alsace Wine Route, the Ibis Budget Sélestat is located in Sélestat
Free WiFi access is available
You can relax on the furnished terrace.

The air-conditioned rooms are provided with a flat-screen TV, a desk and a private bathroom with free toiletries.

Breakfast is served each morning in the communal lounge with an additional cost.

Other facilities offered at the property include a vending machine
The property offers free private parking on site and Colmar is 17 km away
The hotel is just 17 km from the German border and the A35 Highway Exit is 1.9 km away.

We offer a small restaurant at the reception.

Reception is open 24/7.

name: Hôtel Berceau Du Vigneron
description:
The Berceau Du Vigneron is located in the heart of the Alsace vineyard 7 kilometres west of Colmar
Guests can relax in the hotel’s bar with a free newspaper
Free WiFi access is available throughout the hotel.

All rooms at the property are decorated with wooden furniture and feature a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

From May to October, guests can participate in nighttime tours of the city.

The Berceau du Vigneron is located near several vineyards on the Alsatian Wine Route, where guests can sample the regional produce
The hotel is just 15 minutes from Colmar town centre and Colmar-Houssen Airport.

name: ibis Styles Besançon
description:
Conveniently located in a park, ibis Styles Besançon is a 15-minute walk from the TGV Train Station and the centre of Besançon
It features an outdoor swimming pool with a sun terrace and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms are spacious and contemporary in style
They include an LCD TV and free Wi-Fi access.

A buffet breakfast is offered every morning at this hotel
Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or have dinner at the hotel's restaurant
A children's playground and meeting rooms are also available on site.

Providing free private parking, the property has a 24-hour reception
The hotel is a 10-minute drive from the Parc des Expositions Micropolis and just 3.7 km away from Citadel of Besançonet, which is one of the UNESCO World Heritage Sites.

name: ibis Besançon Centre la City
description:
Located on the banks of the Doubs River within the business complex known as La City, this ibis hotel is a 10-minute walk from Besançon city centre and its museums and a 35-minute walk from Citadelle.

The ibis Besançon La City offers air-conditioned rooms, 4 of which are equipped for people with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
The Bistro Régent restaurant offers a bistro menu based on fresh produce.

With a 24-hour front desk, this hotel offers secure underground parking at an extra fee.

name: All Suites Besançon
description:
Situated in Besançon, 3.3 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, All Suites Besançon features accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace
This 3-star hotel offers room service and luggage storage space
The property is non-smoking and is set 4.4 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station.

Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also boast free WiFi
At All Suites Besançon rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV.

Micropolis is 5.7 km from the accommodation, while Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 10 km from the property
The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 61 km from All Suites Besançon.

name: Hôtel de Paris
description:
Located in the centre of Besançon, Hôtel de Paris offers contemporary décor, a 24-hour reception and terrace
The Besançon Citadelle is just a 15-minute walk away
Vesoul is 48 km from the property.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk, wardrobe and telephone
The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Hôtel de Paris
A traditional restaurants can be found within walking distance.

The fine arts museum is just a 5-minute walk away and Besançon Franche-Comté TGV Train Station is 12 km from the hotel
Additional features include luggage storage, daily newspapers and free wired internet.

name: ibis Besançon Centre Ville
description:
Located in the old town of Besançon, ibis Besançon Centre Ville is 500 metres from Viotte Train Station and both the Vauban Citadel and the Museum of Fine Arts can be found within a 20-minute walk
It offers free Wi-Fi access, a 24-hour front desk and a 24-hour snack bar.

All the air-conditioned rooms at ibis Besançon Centre Ville feature wooden floors, a flat-screen TV and a telephone
The private bathroom includes a shower and heated towel rail.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away
Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

This property is 18 km from the A36 motorway and private parking is available on site, at an extra cost and subject to availability.

name: Hôtel AKENA BESANCON
description:
Situated in Besançon, 10 km from Micropolis, Hôtel AKENA BESANCON features accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar
With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk
The property is non-smoking and is set 16 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station.

At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels
All rooms at Hôtel AKENA BESANCON have air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Besançon-Mouillère train station is 17 km from the accommodation, while Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 17 km from the property
The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 48 km from Hôtel AKENA BESANCON.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage
description:
Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage, formerly the Clarisses Monestary, is located in the historic district of Besançon, 500 metres from the citadel's ancient walls
It offers views of the tree-lined park, the medieval walls, the city and the Doubs Valley.

All of the rooms feature parquet flooring and a private bathroom with a bath or shower
They also have a flat-screen TV, telephone and a desk
Some rooms offer a view on the garden and on the city.

Breakfast is served every morning in the dining area, on the terrace or can be brought to your guest room upon request
You can also relax on the west-facing terrace with a drink from the bar
Guest can access the spa upon reservation and for an additional fee.

Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage is a 10-minute walk from the Musée du Temps and just 2 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station
Shops and restaurants can be found within a 10-minute walk
Private parking is available at a surcharge and free WiFi internet access is provided.

name: Hotel Du Nord
description:
This hotel is set in the heart of Besançon, just 700 metres from the banks of the Doubs River
Guests have free Wi-Fi internet access and are invited to relax in the hotel's lounge bar.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided in each of the simply decorated guest rooms
The rooms are serviced by a lift and include en suite bathrooms.

Every morning a buffet-style breakfast, including fresh orange juice and regional specialities, can be enjoyed in Hotel du Nord's breakfast area.

The Church of Sainte-Madeleine is a 10-minute walk away and the Besançon-Viotte Train Station is 1.5 km from the hotel
The Besançon Museum of Fine Arts and Archeology is just 450 metres away.

A bike box is available on site, free of charge for bikes, charges may apply for motorbikes.

name: Hôtel Siatel Besançon Chateaufarine
description:
This hotel is located 7.5 km from the centre of Besançon in the Franche-Comté region and offers free Wi-Fi
Guests are invited to relax on the terrace or use the billiards table in the on-site bar
Air conditioning is provided in public areas.

Each soundproofed room includes a flat-screen TV and a telephone
All rooms at Hôtel Siatel Besançon Chateaufarine include work desks and en suite bathrooms with hairdryers
Some rooms have high-speed WiFi and air conditioning.

Free private parking is provided on site and Besançon-Viotte Train Station 7.7 km away
The hotel is 8.2 km from the Museum of Fine Arts and Archeology and 6.5 km from the A36 motorway.

name: Logis Hôtel Victor Hugo & Spa
description:
Logis Hôtel Victor Hugo & Spa offers accommodation 50 metres from Viotte train station and just 15 minutes' walking distance from the historic city centre of Besançon
Many rooms open onto an inner garden.

All the rooms come with ensuite facilities, satellite TV, a telephone and free WiFi access.

To get off to a good start you can enjoy your breakfast before heading out to experience the capital of the Franche-Comté region.

Several adjustable equipped meeting rooms are available onsite and can accommodate groups of up to 45 people.

Other onsite services available to guests aged 12 and above include a fitness room, a heated outdoor pool, a sauna, 2 hot tubs, a hammam, a sensorial shower and a relaxation room
Massages using Equatoria products.

Secure private parking is featured onsite.

name: Hotel Régina
description:
Hotel Régina is situated conveniently in Besançon, and features a garden, free WiFi and a terrace
The property is set 4.8 km from Micropolis, 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station and 500 metres from Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon
Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels
Every room is equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have garden views
The units feature a wardrobe.

The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and car hire is available at Hotel Régina.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Besancon Viotte Train Station and Time museum of Besançon
The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 60 km from Hotel Régina.

name: ibis budget Besançon Centre Gare
description:
Located in Besançon, just 100 metres from Gare de la Viotte Train Station, ibis budget Besançon Centre Gare offers simple rooms with free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour access.

Each room is air-conditioned and includes a flat-screen TV
The private bathroom is fitted with a shower
A buffet breakfast is available daily.

The palace Granvelle is 2 km from the hotel, and the UNESCO World Heritage Site, the Citadel Vaubon is 2.5 km away
Besançon town centre is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Restaurant Vesontio
description:
Located 5 km from the centre of Besançon and the Musée des Beaux-Arts, Hotel restaurant Vesontio offers an air-conditioned restaurant and a meeting room
Free WiFi is available throughout
Besançon Tennis Club is 3.1 km away from the property.

Decorated in bright colours, rooms are equipped with satellite TV, a desk and a wardrobe
Each room has a private bathroom complete with hairdryer,

A buffet breakfast made with local produce is served every morning at this hotel, which you can also enjoy on the terrace
For lunch and dinner, homemade dishes are served.

Free private parking is possible on site and a garage is also available upon request
Easily accessible via the RN57 road and the A36 motorway, the hotel is 3 km from the Viotte Train Station and 10 minutes from the Besançon Franche-Comté Train Station.

name: Brit Hotel Besancon l'Horloge
description:
Set in Besançon, 3.2 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, Brit Hotel Besancon l'Horloge offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking, a terrace and a bar
With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service
The property is non-smoking and is situated 3.6 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station.

All guest rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk
At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Brit Hotel Besancon l'Horloge.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Besançon, like hiking.

Micropolis is 7.9 km from Brit Hotel Besancon l'Horloge, while Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 13 km from the property
The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from the hotel.

name: Premiere Classe Besancon Ecole Valentin
description:
Close to Alsace and Jura, this hotel is easily accessible from the A36 motorway
It is situated in the village of Ecole-Valentin, a 5 minute drive from Besançon
Free WiFi is provided.

The Premiere Classe Besancon Ecole Valentin offers air-conditioned guest rooms
Each is equipped with a TV with satellite, Canal + and beIN Sports channels
The private bathroom includes a shower and towels.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning in the stylish breakfast room
Free private parking for cars and buses is provided on site.

The Première Classe Besançon is located in the Franche-Comté region
In the surrounding area guests can visit Besançon’s miroctechnics pole.

name: B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin
description:
Set in Besançon, 6.5 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a bar
Located around 7.7 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station, the hotel with free WiFi is also 10 km away from Micropolis
The property is non-smoking and is situated 6.6 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the hotel.

Besançon Vesoul University is 6.3 km from B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin, while Time museum of Besançon is 8.1 km from the property
The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 59 km from the accommodation.

name: B&B HOTEL Besançon Chateaufarine
description:
Featuring free WiFi, B&B HOTEL Besançon Chateaufarine offers pet-friendly accommodation 2 km from the centre of Besançon, 10 km from Besançon Citadelle
Free private parking is available on site.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV
Cable channels are also provided
All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.

Micropolis is 2.3 km from B&B HOTEL Besançon Chateaufarine, while Besançon Hospital is 2 km away
The nearest airport is Dole - Jura Airport, 53 km from the property.

name: Doubs Hotel - Besançon Ecole Valentin
description:
Doubs Hotel - Besançon Ecole Valentin is a 3-star hotel with a terrace located in Besançon
The hotel features a shared lounge and free WiFi
Ecole-Valentin train station is 400 metres from the property.

The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels
The rooms include a private bathroom and a bath
All rooms have a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.

Besançon Viotte train station is 4.3 km away and Franche-Comté TGV train station is 8.7 km away
Micropolis is 8 km from Doubs Hotel - Besançon Ecole Valentin
The nearest airport is Dole - Jura Airport, 61 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville
description:
Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville is set in Besançon, 6.6 km from Micropolis and 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station
Featuring a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom
Private parking is available on site.

All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Besancon Viotte Train Station and Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon
The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville.

name: Hotel Vauban
description:
Located in Besançon, Hotel Vauban a 2-minute walk from the Museum of Fine Arts and an 18-minute walk from the Citadel of Besançon
It offers free internet access, a 24-hour front desk and a terrace.

Serviced by a lift, all the soundproofed rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a telephone
The bathroom is complete with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower.

Both a continental and a buffet breakfast are served every morning at Hotel Vauban
The property has 2 restaurants: an Italian and traditional meals are served.

Some rooms are suitable for guests with reduced mobility
The hotel is a 5-minute drive from Besançon Train Station and a 15-minute walk from the Madeleine Church.

name: ibis budget Besançon Ecole Valentin
description:
The ibis budget Besançon Ecole Valentin is located just off the A36 motorway and 6 km from the centre of Besançon
It is 1 km from École-Valentin Train Station
The hotel offers free WiFi access throughout the property, free parking and newspapers in its lobby.

The rooms at ibis budget Besançon Ecole Valentin are decorated in a contemporary style and feature a flat-screen TV
Each one also has an en suite bathroom, which is complete with a shower.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning in the breakfast room
After breakfast you may choose to drive along the A36 motorway to Dijon or Montbéliard, both less than 50 minutes away.

Several restaurants and supermarkets can be found nearby and a wellness sports club is less than a 10-minutes' walk away from the hotel.

name: Best Western Citadelle
description:
The Best Western Citadelle is located in the historic city center of Besançon, a 5-minute walk from the Doubs River and the Citadelle
Free Wi-Fi is available in the rooms.

The air-conditioned rooms feature a television with Canal+ channels
The private bathroom is equipped with solar-heated water
Additionally, the establishment offers rooms adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

The hotel serves breakfast every morning for an additional fee
You can enjoy it in your room or as a buffet in the dining room
Room service is also available.

The small parking area, which includes 10 spaces, is only accessible by reservation for a supplementary fee of 15 EUR per space
An electric charging station is available on request and subject to availability at a rate of €25.

Please note that our parking area is only suitable for standard-sized vehicles (a small courtyard in the city center).

The establishment is 5 km from the Micropolis convention center
Public parking is available on-site for an extra charge
Please contact the establishment directly if you wish to reserve a parking space.

If you are traveling with pets, please contact the establishment directly to inquire about the pet policies
It is essential to contact the establishment.

You will be accommodated in one of our 41 rooms situated across various buildings as follows:

• The Main Building with elevator access, where we have 21 rooms.
• The Annex, also in the main building, without elevator access.
• The Hotel Pavilion, where we have 9 rooms, without an elevator.
• The Workshop, with 2 spacious rooms specially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

If you have a preference, feel free to let us know during your reservation
While we cannot guarantee, we promise to always do our best to accommodate the various requests of our guests.

name: Campanile Besançon-Ouest Châteaufarine
description:
Part of the Campanile group, this hotel is situated 7 km west of the centre of Besancon
It offers a bar and a terrace
The hotel offers secure on-site parking, free high-speed WiFi access and a 24-hour reception.

The rooms feature satellite TV, free newspapers and a private bathroom
There is also a welcome tray in each room.

You will be able to dine in the on-site restaurant, which is open every day
A breakfast buffet including fresh fruit and pastries is served each morning and regional cuisine with a starter and dessert buffet is available for lunch and dinner.

Vesoul is 52 km from the property
The nearest airport is Dole - Jura Airport, 53 km from the property.

name: Hotel Campanile Besançon Nord Ecole Valentin
description:
The Campanile Besançon Valentin is located near the A36 motorway (exit Saint Claude) and 5.8 km from Besançon and Besançon Viotte TGV Station
It offers guestrooms with free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Campanile are equipped with flat-screen TVs with Canal+ channels and tea and coffee making facilities
Each includes a private bathroom, and family rooms are also available.

Guests can enjoy traditional French cuisine in the on-site restaurant, followed by a drink in the private bar
The hotel also provides a night porter.

Besançon, a hilly town with twisting streets dominated by a citadel, is known for its delightful setting and fine parks
The hotel is located between the new TGV station and the town centre.

name: Mercure Besancon Parc Micaud - Hotel & Bar
description:
This Hotel Mercure is situated in the city centre of Besancon in the casino garden on the Doubs River and opposite the Micaud Park.

There are 91 air-conditioned guestrooms, 78 which are non-smoking, equipped with clean, private bathrooms and flat screen satellite TV.

The hotel restaurant, Le Vesontio, serves traditional cuisine and offers a splendid view of the casino gardens
L’Instant, the hotel bar, is open until 23:00.

There is a casino, a fitness centre and a karaoke bar within 3 km from the hotel.

name: Colmar Hotel
description:
Colmar Hotel is located in Colmar, 1 km from House of the Heads
Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 1.2 km away
It features free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a bar and a free private parking in front of the hotel.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle and a private bathroom
Free toiletries and a hair dryer are available in all of the rooms.

Free parking and paid secured parking are available on site
Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 1.1 km from Colmar Hotel, while Colmar Expo is 3.5 km away
The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the property.

name: Hotel Arc-En-Ciel Colmar Contact Hotel
description:
Hotel Arc-En-Ciel Colmar Contact Hotel is situated in a verdant setting just 1 km from the city centre of Colmar and its historical sites and attractions.

All of the standard guest rooms feature modern en suite facilities, TV and free optic fibre WiFi internet access
There are also connecting rooms.

This hotel is a great starting point for discovering La Route des Vins, the local picturesque villages and leisure parks
Not to mention the regional cuisine and local wine.

The hotel also offers a free private car park, a garage for bicycles, an outdoor terrace, and veranda where guests can enjoy breakfast or a moment of quiet.

name: Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar
description:
Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar is 4 km from the centre of Colmar and 2 km from the A35 motorway
This hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a free private parking and a bar
(2 charging station for electric vehicles)

Serviced by a lift, all rooms are air-conditioned and feature a desk, a flat-screen TV, free wifi and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower.

Breakfast is served every morning at Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar
There is also a bar with terrace on site where guests can enjoy snacks.

Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar is a 10-minute drive from the Wine Route of Alsace and right at the opposite of Colmar Expo Exhibition Centre.

name: Hôtel Turenne
description:
Hotel Turenne is located at the entrance to Colmar’s old quarter, 750 metres from the Saint Martin Church
It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access.

Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom
All rooms are accessible by a lift.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast every morning, and there are many typical Alsatian restaurants in the surrounding area
Guests can also enjoy a drink in the hotel bar.

The Hotel Turenne’s reception is open 24 hours a day
Private parking for cars, bicycles and motorbikes is also available at an extra cost and is subject to availability (reservation is needed).

The hotel is close to the famous Unterlinden and Bartholdi museums and the town’s pedestrian and commercial districts
Gare de Colmar Train station is 1.3 km away, the German border is 20 km from the Hotel Turenne.

name: Hotel L'Europe
description:
Welcome to the Hotel & Restaurant l'Europe, located just 3 km from the pretty town of Colmar and its Petite Venise district, the Hotel Europe is your dream pied-à-terre
Each room is unique and will seduce you, according to your tastes
Everything is designed to allow you to choose according to your wishes or events.

L'Europe Hotel & Restaurant enjoys a quiet location, with ample free parking
The Hotel L'Europe Colmar will appeal to all your business and leisure travel needs
Its recently renovated Privilège rooms, restaurant and bar will add to the appeal of your next stay.

Its 1,600 m² of modular lounges with free Wi-Fi are a must in the region for seminars, receptions, banquets, weddings, etc.

The "Le Comptoir d'Henri" restaurant offers traditional French and Alsatian cuisine prepared with fresh market produce
The restaurant serves seasonal and traditional dishes.
Open Tuesday to Thursday from 6:45pm to 9pm, and until 9:30pm on Friday and Saturday.

You can visit Alsace's vineyards and wine cellars
The region is also popular with cyclists and hikers.

name: ibis Colmar Est - Hotel Restaurant en Alsace
description:
The ibis Colmar East is located 5 km from the Alsace Wine Trail and 10 km from Kaysersberg, Riquewihr and Eguisheim
Wi-Fi is free of charge in the entire property.

The 86 rooms are comfortable and all have en suite facilities with a bath tub
The hotel also features an Alsatian brasserie, WinStub, a terrace, a free car park and secure car spaces.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away
The property is a boutique hotel.

Ironing facilities and hairdryers are available upon request.

The property is a 5 minute drive from the old city centre of Colmar, wander through the Petite Venise area, visit the toy museum or admire the Isenheim Altarpiece at the Unterlinden Museum.

name: PAUL & PIA - Welcome Home Hotel
description:
This hotel is located 500 metres from Colmar Train Station and the Old Town
Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 700 meters away.

All rooms have a satellite flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and a private bathroom.

There is also a bar and a 24-hour reception.

Guests can easily explore the medieval villages in the Alsace wine region and the Musée d'Unterlinden is 750 meters away
The Colmar-Houssen Airport is just 5 km from the Hotel Kyriad.

name: Grand Hôtel Bristol
description:
Grand Hôtel Bristol is located in Colmar, facing the historical TGV train station
It offers a fitness and spa centre with sauna, hammam and massage treatments
The property is 1.1 km from Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains.

The air-conditioned rooms with traditional or contemporary decor are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, free WiFi, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom
All rooms are accessible by a lift.

L'Auberge Brasserie serves traditional Alsace dishes with regional wines
A buffet breakfast is prepared daily
Guests have a choice of a buffet breakfast served in the lounge or a continental breakfast served in their room

Grand Hôtel Bristol has a limited private underground parking at an extra cost and subject to reservation
Other public parking lots can be found at a few minutes' walk.

name: James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre
description:
James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre offers accommodation in Colmar, on the Alsation Wine Route
This Boutique Hotel offers a contemporary and modern decoration style
Guests can enjoy the on-site bar
Private parking is available on site.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV
You will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the room
Each room is equipped with a private bathroom
James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre features free WiFi throughout the property.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

The James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre is located within a 5-minute walk of Colmar's Christmas markets
Strasbourg Airport is a 1-hour drive from the hotel.

name: Greet Hotel Colmar
description:
Greet Hotel Colmar is located at the entrance of Colmar, just 1.3 km from to the historic quarter known as Little Venice
It offers free WiFi access.

Each room at the Greet Hotel Colmar is equipped with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with cable channels
Also available are rooms suitable for guests who have limited mobility.

In the evening, dine in the hotel’s air-conditioned restaurant or on the terrace where guests can experience a meal with the various flavours and traditional Alsace cuisine
Everything served is made with the finest local and regional products.

Colmar Train Station is 2.3 km from the property
Bicycle storage and a free private parking are available on site.
Please not that this property doesn't accept roup reservations

name: Hotel Restaurant Le Maréchal - Les Collectionneurs
description:
Constructed in 1565 on the city’s original fortified walls, this 4-star hotel is located in the picturesque quarter of Colmar known as Little Venice
Hostellerie Le Maréchal is set on the canal and is 700 meters from Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains.

Guestrooms and suites are air-conditioned and decorated with brocades and antique furniture
Most rooms overlook the canal, and all are en suite with free WiFi internet access.

The restaurant, A l’Echevin, serves traditional and regional gourmet cuisine using regional produce
In the summer months, guests are invited to eat on the terrace by the river.

The reception desk at Hostellerie Le Maréchal is open 24 hours a day and free newspapers are available in the lobby area.

The hotel is located 1.4 km from Colmar Train Station and public parking can be found in the surrounding area.

name: Kyriad Colmar Centre Unterlinden
description:
Situated 650 metres from the centre of Colmar in the heart of Alsace, this hotel offers free WiFi access and a lounge area
The Exhibition Park is just 1 km away.

With flat-screen TVs, satellite channels, all spacious rooms at Kyriad Colmar Centre Unterlinden feature a modern decor and a welcome tray
All en suite bathrooms are equipped with hairdryers.

Every morning a buffet-style breakfast is served and meal trays can be requested.

On-site parking is free of charge subject to availability and the Colmar Train Station is 2 km away
Strasbourg is a 1-hour drive away and the Colmar Airport is 3 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Saint-Martin
description:
Located in the heart of Colmar’s Old Town, close to the Petite Venise district and the famous Rue des Marchands, Saint-Martin offers rooms decorated in traditional Alsatian style.

All rooms have a flat-screen TV and a safe
They also include a private bathroom with a hairdryer, a bath or a shower.

You can enjoy relaxing in the hotel’s lounge and reading room
There is also a tourist information and free WiFi access.

Colmar Train Station is 1.2 km away
The nearest airport is Colmar Airport, 5 km from Saint-Martin.

name: Hôtel Quatorze
description:
Hotel Quatorze is in a design hotel in the centre of Colmar
It offers free WiFi access and guests will have free and private spa access for 1 hour to the sauna and hammam.

Some rooms have a spa bath.

Bar Quatorze offers a large selection of regional wines and champagnes
Guests are invited to participate in wine tastings.

Quatorze is 650 metres from Unterlinden Museum, which is housed in a 13th century Dominican convent and home to the Isenheim Altarpiece by Matthias Grünewald.

name: B&B HOTEL Colmar Lumière
description:
This hotel is located in the North of Colmar, 5 km from the city centre
It offers air conditioning, free WiFi access and an all-you-can-eat buffet breakfast.

Each soundproofed room at the B&B HOTEL Colmar Lumière offers modern facilities including cable on a flat-screen TV
It also has private bathroom.

Soleil Colmar features a garden that guests can enjoy.

Free parking is provided at the Hôtel Roi Soleil, making it easy to explore Colmar and the surrounding Alsatian vineyards by car.

name: Campanile Colmar - Parc des Expositions
description:
Located in front of the airport, this Campanile Colmar offers rooms with free WiFi and a restaurant
Colmar city centre is 4 km away.

With a garden view, each room at Campanile Colmar has a private bathroom with hairdryer, tea and coffee making facilities and an LCD TV
Guests can enjoy Canal+ and beIN SPORTS channels, both in the room and in the hotel lounge.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and can also be taken on the hotel's terrace
A regional cuisine is proposed at the restaurant, which also features children's menus; breakfast price for children from 5 years old to 12 years is EUR 5.95 and Children from 13 years old to 17 years old is EUR 10.90.

With a 24-hour reception, Campanile Colmar also offers an equipped meeting room
For your convenience, free private parking is available on site.

name: The Originals City, Hôtel Colmar Gare
description:
The Originals Access, Hôtel Colmar Gare is situated between the town centre of Colmar and the railway station in the beautiful Alsace region of France.

All guest rooms are comfortable, soundproofed and equipped with standard amenities including telephone and a TV with satellite channels
Swiss and German TV channels are also available.

The Originals Access, Hôtel Colmar Gare also has a pleasant dining area where a delicious breakfast is served
Also, there is a 24-hour reception hosted by a multilingual staff (French, English and German).

In the surrounding area guests can enjoy the many alpine ski trails and the beauty of Vosges that are located less than an hour from the hotel.

name: Relais & Châteaux La Maison Des Têtes
description:
La Maison Des Têtes is located in the historic Alsatian town of Colmar
It has spacious air-conditioned rooms, each with a TV, private bathroom and free WiFi.

This classic 17th century Colmar building has a restaurant serving traditional cuisine and regional specialties.

Guests of the Maison Des Têtes can relax on the hotel’s shaded patio and enjoy a drink in the lounge.

Unterlinden Musuem is 400 metres from the property, while Colmar Christmas Market - Place Jeanne d'Arc is 550 metres away.

name: Mercure Colmar Centre Unterlinden
description:
This Mercure offers air-conditioned, soundproofed guest rooms and suites with satellite TV and free WiFi, in central Colmar, a 2-minute walk from the Unterlinden and a 13-minute walk from Petite Venise.

The Mercure Colmar Centre Unterlinden serves a full buffet breakfast every morning, that can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room
The bar, Les Cepages offers a large selection of Alsatian wines and snacks.

You can relax on the outdoor terrace, and read the daily newspapers provided by the hotel Mercure Colmar
The reception is open 24-hour, and laundry facilities are available.

A fitness centre, a sauna and a sensory shower are available at Mercure Colmar Centre Unterlinden.

Colmar TGV train station is situated 2km from the hotel
The Alsace wineries and picturesque villages are in the surrounding areas from the Mercure
A private covered parking accessible by an elevator.

name: ibis Budget Colmar Centre Gare
description:
Ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville is set in the Colmar Centre Ville district in Colmar, 300 metres from House of the Heads and 600 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The rooms have a TV with satellite channels.

Colmar Expo is 2.5 km from ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville, while Theater Colmar is 200 metres from the property
The nearest airport is Basel Airport, 55 km from the property.

name: ibis Colmar Centre
description:
Located in Colmar, ibis Colmar Centre is 550 metres from Colmar Tourism Office and is 1.7 km from Colmar Train Station
This hotel offers free WiFi access.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a desk, a flat-screen TV and a fan
The bathroom is fitted with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away
Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00
An on-site restaurant is also available.

This property is 500 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and 600 metres from House of the Heads
The reception is open 24 hours a day
Colmar Christmas Market is 350 meters away.

name: Logis Hôtel Beauséjour Colmar
description:
Just a short walk from the historic centre of Colmar sits the charming family-run Hotel Logis Hôtel Beauséjour Colmar
It features personalised guestrooms and a restaurant with a view of the summer garden.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and they are serviced by a lift
The Charm Rooms offer Provençal furniture and the Privilege Rooms are decorated with blue and red furniture
Each room has a private bathroom.

Enjoy traditional and regional cuisine in the candlelit dining room or in the garden during the warmer months
The hotel also serves a daily breakfast.

The Keller-family spirit has ensured quality accommodation since 1913
From this privileged location, you can be in the town centre in just 8 minutes by foot to discover the areas rich cultural history.

Also, near the Hotel Logis Hôtel Beauséjour Colmar are the areas famous Christmas markets where you can discover the tastes and spirit of this famous region.

name: Ibis Styles Colmar Centre
description:
The Ibis Styles Colmar Centre hotel is set an 18th-century brewery in the historic centre, just 200 metres from the Gothic St Martin's Church
It has a 24-hour reception.

The guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access, and are decorated in a modern style
Each room has a private bathroom that is fitted with a shower.

Breakfast is prepared every morning, and the hotel also has a bar on site.

The hotel is situated just 600 metres from the Unterlinden museum, a 10-minute walk from the train station and 4 km from the Exhibition Centre
You can also travel to the surrounding vineyards of the Alsace region.

name: B&B HOTEL Colmar Expo
description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, B&B HOTEL Colmar Expo offers accommodation in Colmar, 10 km from Kaysersberg
Free private parking is available on site.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels
The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Colmar Expo is opposite the B&B HOTEL Colmar Expo, while House of the Heads is 3 km away
EuroAirport Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg is 61 km from the property
Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

name: Hotel Primo Colmar Centre
description:
Hotel Primo Colmar Centre is located at the centre of Colmar, just 300 metres from the Unterlinden Museum and the Christmas market, and 5 minutes' drive from Colmar Expo and the Bartholdi's Statue of Liberty
It offers free WiFi access.

The contemporary rooms feature a private bathroom and a TV.

A breakfast buffet is served daily at the Hotel Primo Colmar Centre
The hotel also provides a 24-hour reception.

Public parking is available in front of the Hotel Primo Colmar Centre at an extra cost
It is just 1.7 km from Colmar Train Station
You can also travel the 15-minute drive to the famous vineyards on the Alsace Wine Route.

name: Le Pélican
description:
Situated in Annecy, 37 km from Rochexpo, Le Pélican features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant
With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk
Guests can make use of a bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower
All rooms have a wardrobe.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and gluten-free options.

Bourget Lake is 38 km from Le Pélican, while Stade de Genève is 43 km from the property
The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 43 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre
description:
Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre is located in the heart of Grenoble and is the oldest hotel in the city
It is set in a 17th-century building
Free WiFi is provided.

All rooms are air-conditioned and soundproofed
They come with a flat-screen TV with Bein Sports, Canal+ and Eurosport satellite channels
Some rooms also feature a balcony with views of the city.

Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre offers a daily continental breakfast, which can also be served in the guest room upon request.

Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre is 350 metres from the cable car that goes up to the Bastille
Grenoble train station is 1 km away, or a 5-minute journey by tram
Public parking is available nearby.

name: Ace Hotel Annecy
description:
Offering a 24-hour front desk, Ace Hotel Annecy is located in Seynod
Free WiFi access is available in public areas and the rooms
The property is within 5 km from Lake Annecy and Annecy’s city centre.

Each room here will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and satellite channels
Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries
Extras include a desk and a wardrobe.

At Ace Hotel Annecy you will find vending machines and a dining room where a breakfast is served each morning
The hotel is in a shopping area and a variety of restaurants can be found within 300 metres.

Facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge
An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including skiing, golfing and cycling
Lac d’Annecy Golf Course is a 25-minute drive from the hotel.

Free parking is available on site
Annecy Train Station is 3.4 km away
Public transit to the city centre of Annecy is just 100 metres away, and operates Mon-Sat.

name: Impérial Palace
description:
Located in the heart of the French Alps, Impérial Palace is a 4-star hotel is on the edge of Lake Annecy, 1.6 km from Annecy's centre
It offers air-conditioned accommodation, a spa and a casino
Free WiFi is provided.

Each guest room at L'Imperial Palace has a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
Most rooms also have a balcony with a view of the lake and surrounding mountains or park
A courtesy tray with tea is available in each room.

The hotel’s gastronomic restaurant, La Voile, provides traditional French cuisine
Meals are served on a shaded terrace overlooking the lake
L'Impérial Palace also has a a more casual restaurant called La Brasserie, a bar, and a lounge where guests can enjoy homemade pastries, snacks and a full buffet breakfast.

The onsite 600 m² spa includes a swimming pool, an experience shower, a sauna, a hammam, an ice fountain, a spa bath and private treatment rooms
Impérial Palace offers also offers a business centre.

Free parking is available on site
Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property
Geneva International Airport is 40 km away and Annecy Train Station is 1.5 km from the hotel
Annecy Château is 2 km away.

name: Best Western Hôtel International
description:
Featuring a fitness centre, Best Western Hôtel International is situated at the entrance of Annecy, 2 km from Annecy Lake and city centre
It offers a 24-hour front desk service, an onsite restaurant and a bar
It is 500 metres from the train station and a 4-minute drive to motorway A41.

Each soundproofed room at the Best Western Hôtel International is air-conditioned
They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, tea and coffee making facilities, free WiFi access and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is available in the hotel dining room.

Guests can explore the town, which is only a few minutes' walk from the Old Town, Annecy Cathedral and Château d'Annecy.

Featuring a fitness centre and a wellness area with sauna and steam room,

GChevêne car park is available 200 metres from the hotel and indoor car park of 9 places is available upon reservation.

name: Icône Hôtel - Annecy
description:
Located in Annecy city centre, Icône Hôtel- Annecy offers a shared lounge, luggage storage and free WiFi
It is a 10-minunte walk from Lake Annecy and La Clusaz Ski Station is 33 km away.

The rooms feature a city view, a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a bath or shower
They also offer a desk, a wardrobe and free toiletries
Breakfast in room is available at an extra cost.

Restaurants and shops can be found within 1 km
Annecy train station is 650 metres away
Geneva International Airport is a 40-minute drive from the property.

name: Hôtel Les Muses
description:
Located in Annecy Le Vieux in the French Alps, Hôtel Les Muses is composed of 2 buildings with rooms that overlook Lake Annecy or Mont Veyrier.

Each room at Hôtel Les Muses is equipped with free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom
Some rooms feature a terrace and air conditioning.

A breakfast buffet is served daily
Activities in the surroundings include hiking and water-skiing
The Lake of Annecy is 50 metres away, and the lake's beach is 250 metres from the property.

Free private parking is available on site
Hôtel Les Muses's multilingual staff can provide local tourist information.

name: Hôtel des Alpes
description:
The Hôtel des Alpes offers 2-star accommodation a 10-minute walk from Lake Annecy and 100 meters away from the train station
The old city, shops and restaurants are within walking distance.

All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a desk
The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries
The hotel has no lift but hotel staff is happy to help guests with their luggage if needed.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel des Alpes
Guests can enjoy the onsite bar.

The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 48 km from the property
Public parking is available nearby
It is free from 19:00 to 08:00 and at extra charge during the rest of the day.

name: Allobroges Park Hôtel
description:
Set in Annecy City Centre, this 3-star hotel is located a 10-minute walk from Annecy Chateau
It has a 24-hour reception and offers free WiFi access.

All guest room are soundproofed and air-conditioned
They offer work desk and an LCD TV
Some rooms feature exposed beams
The private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The onsite bar is open 24/7 and there is a terrace open during summer.

Lake Annecy is a 10-minute walk from Allobroges Hotel
Private Parking is available upon prior reservation only and subject to availability
Annecy Train Station is 260 metres away.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Carlton Annecy
description:
Best Western Carlton Annecy is located in central Annecy at the medieval town's gates
Lake Annecy is a 10-minute walk away.

All guest rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and a coffee machine
Every room has a private bathroom while some rooms offer a mountain view.

Guests can relax with a drink in the hotel bar during the evenings
The hotel’s buffet breakfast can be served in the comfort of your room or in the dining room.

A private garage is available upon prior reservation and for an additional fee
The Best Western Carlton Annecy is situated 200 metres from the train station, bus stop and taxi rank.

name: Ibis Annecy - Cran-Gevrier
description:
Ibis Annecy - Cran-Gevrier is a 5-minute drive to the centre of Annecy and its lake
It offers comfortable and affordable rooms perfect for a short stay or stopover in the area.

Guestrooms are modern and equipped with en suite facilities
Wi-Fi internet access is available in the entire hotel and is free of charge.

At Ibis Annecy - Cran-Gevrier you are welcome 24 hours a day
All public and private spaces are non-smoking and parking is available onsite for an additional charge.

name: Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy
description:
Featuring 4-star accommodation, Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy is set in Annecy, 2.1 km from Palais de l Ile and 2.2 km from Chateau d'Annecy
The property is close to several noted attractions, around 1.7 km from Bridge of Love and around 1.8 km from Bonlieu Performing Arts Centre
The property is close to popular attractions like Annecy School of Art, Annecy Town Hall and Annecy Court House.

All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV
The rooms come with air conditioning, and selected rooms also offer a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property
The hotel features a restaurant open for lunch and diner with a terrace facing the Lake of Annecy.

The property boasts an indoor swimming pool, with sauna, hammam, hot tub and fitness room with free access
Spa massages and yoga session are available at an extra cost.

Guests can find 2 private parking on site (indoor and outdoor) available at an extra cost.

Non-stop information is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French.

Annecy Court House is 2 km from Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy, while Church of St
Francis is 2.1 km from the property
Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 37 km away.

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Annecy
description:
Sure Hotel by Best Western Annecy is located just 3.5 km from Annecy Lake and a 4-minute drive from Annecy city centre
It offers rooms with free WiFi access.

Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and has a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

A buffet breakfast is served daily
The restaurant serves traditional French dishes and offers a terrace.

There is also a bar and lounge area with a pool table, a pinball machine and table football, and a playground for children
Ironing facilities and a selection of board games are available at the reception upon request.

Guests can enjoy private access for 1 or 2 people to the sensory relaxation area upon reservation and at an additional cost
The space includes a balneo hot tub with massage jets and light therapy, a sauna, a video wall and a starry sky.

The region has many activities to offer, such as paragliding and rock-climbing
Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hôtel du Château
description:
Hotel du Chateau is a hotel situated at the foot of Annecy Castle
It has views over the old town
The reception offers free WiFi.

Guest rooms at the Hotel du Chateau are simply decorated
They are equipped with a private bathroom, a telephone and a TV.

Continental breakfast is served every morning
Guests can enjoy a drink or a packed lunch on the hotel’s panoramic terrace, where a microwave and kitchenware are made available.

Hotel du Chateau is just a 5-minute walk from Lake Annecy
The train station is only a 10-minute walk away.

name: Novotel Annecy Centre Atria
description:
Novotel Annecy Centre Atria is located in central Annecy, a 5-minute walk from the old town, the lake and the Château d'Annecy
It offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.

All guest rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned
They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels including beIN Sports and Canal +
They offer a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities
They feature a seating area and the private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Novotel Annecy Centre Atria offers a buffet breakfast
Various dining options including European and French dishes are available at The Craic, the in-house restaurant
Guests can also enjoy a drink and light snacks in the hotel bar.

Novotel Annecy Centre Atria also has an indoor play area and a library for children
Bike rental is available.

Annecy TGV Train Station is just 50 metres from the hotel and Lake Annecy is 1 km away
A private garage is available on site for an extra charge.

name: Hôtel du Nord
description:
Hotel du Nord, is located in the centre of Annecy and offers 2-star accommodation a few minutes from the lake, shops, bars, restaurants and train station
It offers 24/7 reception and free WiFi.

Guest rooms at the Hotel du Nord are all non-smoking and air-conditioned
They come with en suite facilities.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel du Nord.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception.

There is free overnight parking nearby
The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 35 km from the property.

name: greet hôtel Annecy Cran-Gevrier
description:
Hotel greet hôtel Annecy Cran-Gevrieris located in Cran-Gevrier, just 5 km form the centre of Annecy and from Lac d’Annecy
The hotel proposes free Wi-Fi internet access, a terrace and a garden.

The air-conditioned guest rooms at greet hôtel Annecy Cran-Gevrier feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
They include a wardrobe and a private bathroom with a shower
Some rooms have reduced mobility access.

A buffet-style breakfast is served every morning at igreet hôtel Annecy Cran-Gevrier and the hotel also has a 24-hour reception.

Free private parking is possible on site and exit 16 of the A41 motorway is a 5-minute drive away
The property is 5.6 km from Château d’Annecy, 40 km from Genève and 32 km from Aix-les-Bains.

name: Atipik Hôtel
description:
Situated 200 metres from the shores of Lake Annecy, Atipik Hôtel is at the entrance of the medieval old town and pedestrian shopping streets
It offers en suite rooms with free WiFi.

A flat-screen TV with international and TNT channels is provided in all rooms
Each has a private bathroom with a shower.

Enjoy a breakfast buffet as a way to start your day before heading out to visit the surrounding area.

Annecy TGV Train Station is 250 metres from Atipik Hôte.

name: Campanile Annecy - Cran Gevrier
description:
Campanile Annecy - Cran Gevrier is 3 km from the city center and the lake and Annecy train station and 5 km from Annecy-Methet airport.

It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi, a courtesy tray with an electric kettle and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer
Some rooms can accommodate people with reduced mobility
Free private parking is available.

Along the way in our beautiful region, come and discover the wonders of Haute Savoie:
Lake Annecy, Gorges du Fier, Le Château de Montrottier
Here, it's an ideal stopover before going up to the beautiful resorts of the Alps: La Clusaz, Le Grand Bornand, Chamonix
and 30 minutes away, escape to Geneva, the city of Calvin.

The on-site restaurant is open Monday to Thursday evening for dinner and Monday to Friday noon for lunch
It is closed from Friday evening to Sunday evening
It serves traditional and family cuisine.

Other facilities at Campanile Annecy include air conditioning, a terrace.
The pet supplement is 10 euros per pet per night.

name: Hôtel Le Pré Carré
description:
Le Pré Carré is a hotel located in the heart of Annecy, just 250 metres from Lake Annecy.

Guest rooms at Le Pré Carré are soundproofed and equipped with flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access
All rooms are serviced by a lift.

The hotel offers a buffet breakfast, which can be served in your room
Le Pré Carré also provides a business centre, a 24-hour reception and on-site parking.

name: Hôtel du Palais de l'Isle
description:
This hotel is located in the heart of Annency, a few steps from the castle
It offers individually-decorated rooms with views of the canals, the medieval castle or the town.

Each air-conditioned guest-room in the 18th-century building has satellite TV, WiFi internet access and a private bathroom.

The Palais de l’Isle serves a daily buffet breakfast and guests are invited to relax with a drink in the bar
Guests are also able to purchase snack jars.

The Hôtel du Palais de l'Isle is just a few minutes’ walk from Lake Annecy and the cathedral
The property offers discount in the 3 nearby public car parks.

name: Hôtel de Bonlieu
description:
Located 500 metres away from Lake Annecy, and a 12-minute walk from Annecy castle, Hôtel de Bonlieu offers accommodation with free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.

All rooms air air-conditioned and soundproofed
They are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
The private bathroom is equipped with a bath or shower.

Hôtel de Bonlieu provides a continental breakfast buffet daily
Guests can also choose to have breakfast served directly to your room.

Public parking is available nearby
The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the train station and a 35-minute drive from Chambéry-Savoie airport.

name: Hôtel Catalpa
description:
Set just off the banks of Lake Annecy, this hotel is 1.5 km from the centre of town.

The rooms at Hôtel Catalpa include an LCD TV with satellite channels
They also provide free toiletries in the en-suite bathroom.

You can enjoy the continental breakfast in your guest room or in the hotel’s dining room.

You can also park your car in the hotel’s private parking with an extra cost and upon prior reservation.

Annecy Casino is 300 meters away, and a public beach is 300 metres away from the property.

A traditional restaurant is available for lunch and dinner on Wednesdays, Thursdays, Fridays, Saturday and Sundays for lunch only

name: Hotel des Marquisats
description:
Just 200 metres from Lake Annecy, Hotel des Marquisats features spectacular views of the lake and the Alps
It is a 20-minute walk from the centre of Annecy and offers a continental breakfast
Free parking is available and free WiFi access is provided in the entire property.

Each room at the Hotel des Marquisats is individually decorated
They are equipped with satellite channels on a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom
All rooms are accessible by lift.

Guests can relax with a drink in the hotel’s lounge bar, which features a wall carved into the natural rock face and large bay windows facing the lake
There is also a sauna and hammam, available at an extra cost.

The property is 2 km from Annecy Train Station and a 45-minute drive to Geneva International Airport.

name: Centre Jean XXIII
description:
Offering a sun terrace, Centre Jean XXIII is situated in Annecy, 3 km from the old town and 1.8 km from Lake Annecy
Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Certain units feature views of the lake or city
Every room comes with a private bathroom
The rooms are not air-conditioned.

There is a shared lounge at the property.

Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including skiing and windsurfing
Water sports facilities are offered on the lake
Chateau d'Annecy is 3.1 km from Centre Jean XXIII, while UBISOFT is 2.3 km away
The nearest airport is Geneva International Airport, 46 km from Centre Jean XXIII.

name: Hébé Hotel
description:
New hotel - Opening May 2021.

Hébé Hotel is located in the centre of Annecy, a 10-minute walk from the lake.

The hotel rooms each include a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with complimentary toiletries.

A continental breakfast is available each day
Annecy offers an array of bars and restaurants
The closest can be found just 300 metres from the hotel.

The property is located just 250 metres from the train station and bus station
Local sites of interest may include the town hall, St Maurice Church, and Saint-Pierre Cathedral.

name: RockyPop Grenoble Hotel
description:
Situated in Grenoble, 1.6 km from Grenoble Train Station, RockyPop Grenoble Hotel features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a terrace
Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna
The property is 1.9 km from WTC Grenoble, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower
The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

You can play table tennis at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire is available.

Speaking English and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the 24-hour front desk.

AlpExpo is 4.8 km from RockyPop Grenoble Hotel, while Alps Stadium is less than 1 km from the property
The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 48 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel d’Angleterre Grenoble Hyper-Centre
description:
Hôtel d’Angleterre Grenoble Hyper-Centre is set in the heart of Grenoble, opposite the gardens of Place Victor Hugo
It is just a 1-minute walk to the Victor Hugo tram stop and offers free WiFi and an onsite bar .

All the rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned
They feature a desk, a LCD satellite TV and a DVD player
The private bathrooms come with free toiletries
Some rooms also have a hydro-massage bathtub and a private balcony with views over the Vercors mountain range.

A buffet breakfast is available every day and includes hot, cold, sweet and savoury options
An other continental breakfast option consisting of a hot drink, a juice, a pasty, bread, butter and jam is also available.

An underground car park is available nearby at an extra charge
The nearest airport is Grenoble - Isère Airport, 45 km from the accommodation.

name: Le Grand Hôtel Grenoble, BW Premier Collection by Best Western
description:
In the heart of the historic city centre of the Capital of the Alps, the Grand Hôtel de Grenoble **** BW Premier Collection is waiting to welcome you to an unforgettable experience.

Whether you are on a business trip or a sporting getaway, our attentive and dedicated team is here to offer you a quality of service that lives up to your expectations and up-to-date facilities.

Relax in our newly refurbished rooms and suites
Enjoy a breakfast of fresh, local and seasonal produce
Bring your best projects to life in our coworking space.
At the Grand Hôtel de Grenoble **** BW Premier Collection, every detail is carefully orchestrated to make your stay an unforgettable experience
We look forward to welcoming you and offering you an exceptional stay in Grenoble.

Our hotel is located in the heart of a pedestrianised street, and can be reached by public transport or by car by parking in the Saint-Claire Les Halles private car park, formerly the Lafayette car park (preferential rate).

name: Hôtel Victoria
description:
Ideally set in the centre of Grenoble, Hôtel Victoria offers free WiFi throughout the property and free private parking for guests who drive
The property is situated 1.2 km from WTC Grenoble, 5.2 km from AlpExpo and 1.8 km from Alps Stadium
The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Grenoble Train Station.

At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe
The private bathroom is fitted with a shower and free toiletries
At Hôtel Victoria the rooms come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels.

The Bastille Grenoble is 4.7 km from the accommodation, while Summum is 5.4 km from the property
The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 46 km from Hôtel Victoria.

name: 1924 Hôtel
description:
Located in the heart of Grenoble on a quiet street, only 450 metres from the SNCF train station and offers free WiFi, service clean, comfortable rooms with modern facilities and a friendly, relaxed atmosphere.

All the cosy guest rooms are equipped with all modern amneties, en suite facilities, soundproofing and satellite TV
All rooms are served by a small lift
Some allow you to see the mountain Vercors.

The helpful staff at this delightful hotel will help you to make the most of your visit
Local and Bio breakfast is served every morning
Guests can find restaurants nearby.

Explore Grenoble on foot, with our bikes available, or using the excellent public transport links
Guests will appreciate the tramwa stop just a stone's throw from the hotel, providing easy access to the city's business districts and famous sites

name: Hotel Europole
description:
Hotel Europole is located in the centre of Grenoble, less than 100 metres from the SNCF Train Station and a 3-minute walk from the Palais de Justice.

The modern guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and WiFi internet access
They also have lift access.

In addition to a 24-hour reception from Monday to Friday, the hotel offers a laundry and dry cleaning service.

Hotel Europole is 45 km from Grenoble-Saint-Geoirs Airport
On-site public parking is available for guests arriving by car.

name: Maison Barbillon Grenoble
description:
Maison Barbillon Grenoble is located in Grenoble, just 100 metres from the train station
It offers comfortable guest rooms with satellite TV and free WiFi Internet access.

Guest rooms at the Maison Barbillon Grenoble have an authentic and elegant décor and feature a private bathroom including a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room
There are many restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.

Maison Barbillon is accessible via the A480 motorway
The hotel is located beside Grenoble World Trade Centre and Saint-André Cathedral is just a 13-minute walk away.

name: Okko Hotels Grenoble Jardin Hoche
description:
Featuring a sauna and a fitness centre, Okko Hotels Grenoble Jardin Hoche is located in Grenoble, right next to the Hoche Gardens
This design hotel offers a terrace with views over Hoche Park, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi access.

Each room is air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV, a desk and a coffee machine
The private bathroom has a shower and comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning
Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge, and in the evening guests are offered a small plate of antipasti, delicious dips and seasonal products.

Okko Hotels Grenoble Jardin Hoche features the Le Club lounge and a library
The hotel is 500 metres from Paul Mistral Park, 50 metres from La Caserne de Bonne shopping mall and 1.5 km from Grenoble Train Station.

name: Hôtel Terminus
description:
Located in Grenoble, the Hôtel Terminus is opposite the bus and SNCF train stations
It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access.

The Hôtel Terminus Hotel provides a 24-hour reception and a currency exchange service.

The Terminus is 5 minutes from the World Trade Centre and 1 kilometre from the A48 motorway, which provides easy access to Lyon and Geneva.

Guests can use the hotel’s bicycle and car rental services to explore Grenoble and the Rhone-Alpes region.

name: Hotel Mercure Grenoble Centre Président
description:
Hôtel Mercure Grenoble Président is located 10 minutes from Grenoble’s city centre and accessible by tram and other public transport services
The hotel offers free access to its fitness centre, swimming pool, sauna and hot tub.

The air-conditioned guest rooms have a contemporary style and feature a flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and a coffee maker
All rooms feature a private bathroom.

The President restaurant serves traditional French cuisine with regional dishes
Meals can be complemented by the extensive Grands Vins Mercure wine list from Monday to Friday evening.

Guests of the hotel can enjoy a glass of wine or a cocktail in the hotel’s bar, Le Sirius
This bar has an African décor and features musical entertainment, themed nights and a terrace
Guests are also offered a free massage on Tuesdays.

Private parking is available on site for an extra charge.

name: Brit Hotel Suisse et Bordeaux - Centre Gare
description:
Brit Hotel Suisse et Bordeaux - Centre Gare is located near a pedestrian and commercial street in Grenoble city centre
It features en suite rooms with free WiFi and meeting rooms equipped with paperboard and projector
The Train Station is 100 metres away.

With double glazing, each room at Suisse et Bordeaux includes an LCD TV with SMART TV and international channels and a private bathroom
A hairdryer is available at the reception, which is open 24 hours per day.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the air-conditioned breakfast room
Guests are invited to visit the Musée de Grenoble, which is 1.6 km away, and the Cathedral, which is a 20-minute walk from the hotel.

The Grenoble-Bastille cable car is 1 km away and the Palais des Sports is 2.5 km away
The Tramway stop is 40 metres away and Grenoble Airport is a 35-minute away
A private garage is available on site.

name: Mercure Grenoble Centre Alpotel
description:
The Mercure Grenoble Centre Alpotel is located in the centre of Grenoble, just 2 kilometres from Minatec
The hotel offers a restaurant which serves contemporary regional cuisine.

The comfortable guestrooms at this 4-star hotel are air-conditioned and soundproofed, and have Wi-Fi internet access.

A daily buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property
Every evening, guests will be able to sample regional meals in Café Pourpre, the hotel’s restaurant.

The Mercure Grenoble Centre Alpotel is in close proximity to the TGV station and the Alpexpo and WTC convention centres are easily accessible by tramway.

name: Novotel Grenoble Centre
description:
The Novotel is set at the heart of Grenoble's business district, only a few steps from the TGV train station
A tram stop is conveniently situated just outside the hotel
Many large companies are located close to the Novotel Grenoble Centre, and the historical centre is only a 10-minute drive away.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a desk, a safety deposit box and a minibar
Some rooms feature a Nespresso coffee machine
Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

Guests at the Novotel benefit from access to the hotel fitness centre
The hotel also features a restaurant, a bar, conference rooms, facilities for the disabled, and private parking at an additional cost
Up to 2 children (16 years and under) stay free when sharing with parents.

This hotel is also just a few kilometres from the Belledonne Massif and the Vercors Mountains.

name: Hotel Lux
description:
Centrally located in Grenoble, only 50 metres from restaurants and bars, Hotel Lux Grenoble offers rooms with free WiFi
Grenoble Train Station is only a 3-minute walk away
A 24-hour front desk is available.

A flat-screen TV and a desk are included in all rooms at the Hotel Lux
The private bathroom has a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Trams can be reached within 300 metres
The hotel is 1 km from Minatec
Ski lifts are within 15 km.

Guests have access to a kettle and ironing facilities upon request
Public parking is available nearby at an extra cost.

name: Hôtel Gloria
description:
The Hôtel Gloria is located in central Grenoble, 200 metres from the A48 motorway and 300 metres from Grenoble's School of Management.

Each air-conditioned guest room has a private bathroom, satellite TV and free WiFi access.

Guests of the Gloria can enjoy a continental breakfast in the hotel dining room.

The hotel is just 200 metres from the nearest tramway stop offering connections throughout the city, 1 km from Grenoble cathedral and 800 metres from the Musée Dauphinois
Grenoble SNCF Train Station is just 200 metres away.

name: Park Hôtel Grenoble - MGallery
description:
Park Hôtel Grenoble - MGallery is located in central Grenoble, on the edge of Paul Mistral Park and 2 minutes' walk from a tram stop
It offers contemporary accommodation with free WiFi access
Guest can enjoy a wellness room consisting of a steam bath, experience shower and fitness machines.

Accessed by a lift, the spacious air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with satellite TV and a free minibar
Each room has a private bathroom stocked with free Clarins toiletries.

The hotel offers meals in its lounge bar or in the comfort of guest rooms, at certain times of the day.

Park Hôtel Grenoble - MGallery is a 5-minute walk from the Palais des Sports and a 10-minute tram ride from the Grenoble World Trade Centre.

A one-night parking space with discount rate is available just 150 metres away
Ski slopes and mountain hiking trails are just a 30-minute drive away.

name: Kyriad Grenoble Centre
description:
Located 200 metres from Stade Lesdiguières, Kyriad Grenoble Centre offers 3-star accommodation with 24-hour front desk and free WiFi
Alpexpo convention centre is 3 km away from the property
A private car park under video surveillance is available for guests and is free of charge.

All rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, including Canal+
The private bathrooms come with a bath and free toiletries
Tea and coffee making facilities are provided.

Room service and bar access are available 24/7 and the hotel serves a buffet breakfast every day.

La Bastille Grenoble cable-car is 4 km from the accommodation, while Grenoble train station is 3 km away and accessible in 10 minutes with the tramway
Grenoble - Isère Airport is 46 km away.

name: ibis Grenoble Centre Bastille
description:
Located in the centre of Grenoble, ibis Grenoble Centre offers a 24-hour reception bar and free Wi-Fi access throughout
Victor Hugo Tramway is situated outside the hotel and the Bastille Cable Car is 500 metres away.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a wardrobe, a desk and a telephone
The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away
Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Additional features include luggage storage, daily newspapers and an elevator
Victor Hugo Square is 100 metres away and private parking is possible on site.

name: ibis Styles Grenoble Centre Gare
description:
This ibis Styles Grenoble Centre Gare is ideally located, just 300 metres from Grenoble Station and 400 metres from the historic city centre
It offers contemporary accommodation with air conditioning and flat-screen TV.

In the morning, ibis Styles Grenoble Centre Gare serves a full buffet breakfast
Guests can have a drink at the design bar, open every day
Newspapers are provided.

Guests of the hotel ibis Styles Grenoble Centre Gare can choose from rooms and suites
They all feature duvets and anti stress pillows
The private bathrooms are equipped with a large shower and a hairdryer.

Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire ibis Styles Grenoble Centre Gare and front desk is open 24 hours.

name: B&B HOTEL Grenoble Centre Alpexpo
description:
This B&B hotel is located in Grenoble, just 800 metres from Alpexpo
With a 24-hour reception, it offers a free Wi-Fi connection and soundproofed accommodation
It is 200 metres from Grand Place Tram Station.

All of the rooms at B&B Grenoble Centre Alpexpo are serviced by a lift and are decorated in a contemporary style
Each room features a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the communal lounge.

Luggage storage is provided at B&B Grenoble Centre Alpexpo
There are limited parking places available free of charge, and the Bastille is 7 km away
There is access to A480 motorway, 5 km away.

name: greet hotel Grenoble Centre Gare
description:
Located in Grenoble, Hôtel des Alpes is 220 metres from the Grenoble Train Station and 120 metres from Gares Tramway Stop
The hotel offers free WiFi access, a 24-hour front desk and a reception with vending machines for drinks.

All rooms are serviced by a lift and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite and cable channels
