The private bathroom has a bath or shower and a hairdryer is available upon request.

A continental breakfast can be served every morning in the dining room or in the comfort of the guests’ rooms
Breakfast includes hot drinks, juices, bread, pastries, butter and jam.

Hôtel des Alpes is an 11-minute walk from the Grenoble-Bastille cable car
Free parking is available for bicycles
Cars can be parked at an extra cost.

name: ibis Grenoble Gare
description:
Set just 200 metres from Grenoble Train Station, ibis Grenoble Gare offers air-conditioned rooms with mountain views and free Wi-Fi
It has a 24-hour reception and you can enjoy a drink from the bar
It is a 5-minute walk from the city centre.

Decorated in a modern style, the guest rooms all include an LCD TV with satellite channels
Each is soundproofed and has a telephone, desk and a private bathroom complete with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away
Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00
Snacks and drinks can be ordered at any time from the 24-hour reception.

Private parking is available on site, at an extra cost
Grenoble Museum is only 1 km away and the Fort de la Bastille is 2 km from the hotel
Traditional French restaurants can be found within 400 metres.The property is 1.5 km from A480 highway.

name: Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim
description:
This hotel is located 200 metres from the city centre of Eguisheim, a 10-minute drive from Colmar
It offers free Wi-Fi internet access and free private parking.

The rooms at the Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim are also equipped with TVs and some have private balconies.

Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast.

The Alsace wine route and the Vosges Mountains are easily accessible from Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim.

name: The Originals Résidence, Grenoble Université
description:
The Originals Résidence, Grenoble Université is located in Saint-Martin-d’Hères, a 5-minute drive from the Museum of Grenoble and a 15-minute drive from the Fort de la Bastille
Free WiFi is provided.

Each suite features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
There is a kitchenette with a microwave and a refrigerator
Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries
You can enjoy mountain views from the rooms.

At The Originals Résidence, Grenoble Université you will find a front desk and a business corner
Other services offered at the property include luggage storage.

The hotel is 48 km from Grenoble–Isère Airport, and 93 km from Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport
It is a 15-minute walk from Parc Paul Mistral and the Palais des Sports
Parking is available on site for an extra charge.

name: James Vignoble Hôtel, Eguisheim
description:
James Vignoble Hôtel Eguisheim is located among the vineyards of Eguisheim
It offers a spectacular view of the Black Forest.

The establishment is equipped with two pools, one outdoor heated to 29°C (Closed in winter, open according to weather conditions and seasons)
Our relaxing area is open and has one indoor swimming pool which is heated to 29°C, it also has a Jacuzzi and a panoramic sauna at an extra cost
Bath robes, towels and flip flops are proposed to our guests at the Front Desk, with a supplementary price.

There are 31 furnished rooms with a private bathroom
Each room at the James Vignoble Hôtel Eguisheim is equipped with a TV, telephone, air-conditioning and minibar.

A breakfast buffet with sweet and savoury options is available daily
Breakfast must be reserved upon arrival
Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Parking is in extra at 8€ per day on site
You will find a choice of restaurants within a 5-minute walk from the hotel
Eguisheim Christmas Market is 500 meters away.

The wellness area is open from 8:00 a.m
to 8:00 p.m
This private space has an additional cost of €11 for ages 13 and over and €4 for ages 7 to 12
To make this moment relaxing, we provide you with bathrobes, towels and flip-flops.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim
description:
The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim is located at the gate of a charming village, in the heart of vineyards and a gourmet region
The hotel is situated 8 km from Colmar.

Rooms at the The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim feature traditional decor and are equipped with modern amenities such as free WiFi access.

The The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim offers a shaded terrace where you can savour local specialities accompanied with wines from the region.

The hotel features a lift, free private parking and facilities for the disabled
The golf course and the tennis courts are 5 km from the hotel and the town swimming pool is 6 km away.

name: B&B HOTEL Grenoble Centre Verlaine
description:
B&B Grenoble Centre Verlaine is just 3 km from the centre of Grenoble and the SAEM Alpexpo Events Centre
A buffet breakfast is prepared daily and free WiFi is provided in the air-conditioned rooms.

A flat-screen TV is provided in the soundproofed guest rooms, which have a modern décor
The suite also offers a terrace, a DVD player and a bath.

Meal trays can be served for dinner, from 18:00 to 20:30.

This hotel also has luggage storage and private parking on site
The Modern Art Gallery is just 3 km away and the hotel is accessible via the A480 motorway, 1.3 km away
Free public parking is available nearby and paid secured parking is available at the hotel.

name: Hotel SPA Husseren Collections - Proche Colmar - Eguisheim
description:
The hotel, with terraces southerly oriented, is located between vineyards and forest, at the foothills of the ruins of the three castles in the heart of Alsace, on the wine-road, 6 km from Colmar, 70 km from Strasbourg.

The establishment boasts a bistronomic restaurant, "Bain de Forêt", with a terrace featuring forest views
Guests can also enjoy an indoor swimming pool, a sauna, and bright seminar rooms with professional material and Wi-Fi access.

Staff at the Hotel Restaurant & Spa Husseren Collections speak English, German, Danish and Italian
Nine charging stations (including 3 tesla) for electric cars are available at this property.

Parking is available and for free.

name: L'Hostellerie du Château
description:
Set at the heart of the medieval village of Eguisheim, the Hostellerie du Château is located on the Alsace wine route
It offers individually decorated guest rooms with free fibre-optic WiFi access.

Each guest room is equipped with satellite TV and a minibar
The tiled private bathrooms feature a bathtub.

At L'Hostellerie du Château, a continental buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room.

L'Hostellerie du Château is located 6 km from Colmar City Centre and Strasbourg Airport is 87 km away
Guests can visit the 3 castles in the village, just a short walk away.

name: Hôtel L'Auberge Alsacienne
description:
Located in the village of Eguisheim in the Alsace region, this hotel features modern rooms with private bathroom and a traditional restaurant
Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel.

The soundproofed rooms at Hôtel L'Auberge Alsacienne include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
Hairdryer and free bathroom toiletries are also provided.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room
The hotel’s restaurant offers typical Alsatian food with à la carte menus.

Eguisheim centre is only 300 metres away and Colmar SNCF Train Station is 6 km from the property
German frontier is very close and Freiburg is 1 hour’s drive.

name: Auberge des Trois Châteaux
description:
Auberge des Trois Châteaux is in the heart of Eguisheim, surrounded by vineyards of Alsace along the Alsatian wine route
Its traditional Winstub serves local, traditional specialties and local wines.

En suite with bath or shower and a hairdryer, the rooms offer flat-screen TV with satellite channels, telephone and an alarm clock
Free Wi-Fi is provided in the entire property.

This 17th-century house, typical of the region is just 8 km from Colmar and 5 km from the Colmar Train Station
The 3 castles in the region – le Wahlenbourg, le Weckmund and Hohlandsbourg castle are all within 12 km of Auberge des Trois Châteaux.

name: Auberge du Rempart
description:
Offering views of the city, Auberge du Rempart is a family-run inn situated in the historic centre of Eguisheim in the Alsace Region.The property is 100 metres from Eguisheim Christmas Market.

Each room comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer and a shower or a bath.

A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at an extra cost
Guests can also enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant or on the terrace during nice weather.

Basel Airport is 52 km from the property.

name: Grand Hôtel Bristol
description:
Grand Hôtel Bristol is located in Colmar, facing the historical TGV train station
It offers a fitness and spa centre with sauna, hammam and massage treatments
The property is 1.1 km from Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains.

The air-conditioned rooms with traditional or contemporary decor are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, free WiFi, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom
All rooms are accessible by a lift.

L'Auberge Brasserie serves traditional Alsace dishes with regional wines
A buffet breakfast is prepared daily
Guests have a choice of a buffet breakfast served in the lounge or a continental breakfast served in their room

Grand Hôtel Bristol has a limited private underground parking at an extra cost and subject to reservation
Other public parking lots can be found at a few minutes' walk.

name: Colmar Hotel
description:
Colmar Hotel is located in Colmar, 1 km from House of the Heads
Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 1.2 km away
It features free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a bar and a free private parking in front of the hotel.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle and a private bathroom
Free toiletries and a hair dryer are available in all of the rooms.

Free parking and paid secured parking are available on site
Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 1.1 km from Colmar Hotel, while Colmar Expo is 3.5 km away
The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the property.

name: Hotel Restaurant Cristal
description:
Set in the middle of the Alsatian vineyards, Hotel Restaurant Cristal offers accommodation in Wintzenheim, 5 km from Colmar
Guests can enjoy the on-site, traditional-style restaurant and relax using free Wi-Fi access.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV
Every room has a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

There is room service at the property.Free private parking is available on site.

Freiburg im Breisgau is 43 km from Hotel Restaurant Cristal, while Gérardmer is 30 km away
The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 56 km from the property.

name: Les Portes de la Vallee
description:
Located along the Alsace Wine Route, a 10-minute walk from the centre of Turckheim, this hotel offers free Wi-Fi and an on-site restaurant and bar.

The guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a work desk
Each room offers an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer and complimentary toiletries.

Breakfast is served each morning at the hotel and can be taken in guests’ rooms upon request
The restaurant offers traditional Alsatian cuisine and wines.

With free private parking on site the hotel is located 1.4 km from Wintzenheim and 3.2 km from Ingersheim
Colmar is a 15-minute drive from the hotel.

name: B&B HOTEL Colmar Vignobles Ouest
description:
Featuring free, high-speed WiFi throughout the property, B&B Hôtel Colmar offers pet-friendly accommodation in Wintzenheim, 5 minutes' drive from Colmar
Free private parking is available on site.

Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite and beIN sport channels
Rooms are fitted with a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

A continental breakfast with fresh bread with Nutella or jam is served every morning at a surcharge
Guests can also sample eggs and bacon on site.

Freiburg im Breisgau is 41 km from B&B Hôtel Colmar, while Gérardmer is 32 km away
Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport is 56 km from the property.

name: Greet Hotel Colmar
description:
Greet Hotel Colmar is located at the entrance of Colmar, just 1.3 km from to the historic quarter known as Little Venice
It offers free WiFi access.

Each room at the Greet Hotel Colmar is equipped with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with cable channels
Also available are rooms suitable for guests who have limited mobility.

In the evening, dine in the hotel’s air-conditioned restaurant or on the terrace where guests can experience a meal with the various flavours and traditional Alsace cuisine
Everything served is made with the finest local and regional products.

Colmar Train Station is 2.3 km from the property
Bicycle storage and a free private parking are available on site.
Please not that this property doesn't accept roup reservations

name: Relais Du Vignoble
description:
The Relais Du Vignoble is situated on an Alsation wine estate, outside the village of Gueberschwihr
It offers spacious en-suite guest rooms with TVs and free wired internet.

Guests of the Relais Du Vignoble can sample local and estate wines, at the free wine tasting sessions in the 13th century cellar
The hotel restaurant serves regional, traditional cuisine and a full buffet breakfast.

The Relais du Vignoble offers a panoramic view onto the Vosges Mountains, Alsace Plain and the Black Forest
Guests can enjoy hiking and cycling in the surrounding countryside.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Logis La Palette
description:
This hotel is located in Alsace region a 10-minute drive from Colmar and from the centre of Eguisheim
It offers a goumet-style restaurant that serves seasonal dishes and en suite rooms with a telephone and TV
Free Wi-Fi is available.

La Palette’s restaurant serves traditional French food that guests can enjoy on the terrace during nice weather
There is also a bar that serves a variety of drinks.

Additional facilities and services include a children’s game room located in the restaurant, as well as an on site gift shop and bicycle rental.

It is 30 km from Haut-Kœnigsbourg Castle and an 11-minute drive from the Unterlinden Museum
Free private parking is available.

name: Le Domaine de Rouffach
description:
This 16th-century post office has been transformed into a charming hotel
Located along the Alsace wine-trail,Le Domaine de Rouffach (ex Ville de Lyon) features a heated indoor pool close to all rooms, an infrared cabin, a hot tub, a gourmet restaurant by Philippe Bohrer and a brasserie by Julien.

Each room at the Domaine de Rouffach is elegantly decorated and equipped with a TV with Canal + and beIN Sport channels, a hairdryer and a telephone
A full buffet breakfast is served daily and can be enjoyed in the guest rooms.

Colmar, the wine capital of Alsace, isn’t far from the hotel and makes the perfect daytrip
After an enjoyable day wine-tasting, chef Philippe Bohrer welcomes you to try some refined cuisine in the gourmet restaurant
Guests may also enjoy a dinner in the property's brasserie, chez Julien.

The hotel’s bar, Le coin d'Antan, is a cosy place to relax and have a drink
Guests can also enjoy the outdoor terrace and the wellness area.

Le Domaine de Rouffach also provides free on-site parking and bicycle rental .

name: Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar
description:
Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar is 4 km from the centre of Colmar and 2 km from the A35 motorway
This hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a free private parking and a bar
(2 charging station for electric vehicles)

Serviced by a lift, all rooms are air-conditioned and feature a desk, a flat-screen TV, free wifi and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower.

Breakfast is served every morning at Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar
There is also a bar with terrace on site where guests can enjoy snacks.

Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar is a 10-minute drive from the Wine Route of Alsace and right at the opposite of Colmar Expo Exhibition Centre.

name: ibis Budget Colmar Centre Gare
description:
Ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville is set in the Colmar Centre Ville district in Colmar, 300 metres from House of the Heads and 600 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The rooms have a TV with satellite channels.

Colmar Expo is 2.5 km from ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville, while Theater Colmar is 200 metres from the property
The nearest airport is Basel Airport, 55 km from the property.

name: Hotel Arc-En-Ciel Colmar Contact Hotel
description:
Hotel Arc-En-Ciel Colmar Contact Hotel is situated in a verdant setting just 1 km from the city centre of Colmar and its historical sites and attractions.

All of the standard guest rooms feature modern en suite facilities, TV and free optic fibre WiFi internet access
There are also connecting rooms.

This hotel is a great starting point for discovering La Route des Vins, the local picturesque villages and leisure parks
Not to mention the regional cuisine and local wine.

The hotel also offers a free private car park, a garage for bicycles, an outdoor terrace, and veranda where guests can enjoy breakfast or a moment of quiet.

name: Hotel L'Europe
description:
Welcome to the Hotel & Restaurant l'Europe, located just 3 km from the pretty town of Colmar and its Petite Venise district, the Hotel Europe is your dream pied-à-terre
Each room is unique and will seduce you, according to your tastes
Everything is designed to allow you to choose according to your wishes or events.

L'Europe Hotel & Restaurant enjoys a quiet location, with ample free parking
The Hotel L'Europe Colmar will appeal to all your business and leisure travel needs
Its recently renovated Privilège rooms, restaurant and bar will add to the appeal of your next stay.

Its 1,600 m² of modular lounges with free Wi-Fi are a must in the region for seminars, receptions, banquets, weddings, etc.

The "Le Comptoir d'Henri" restaurant offers traditional French and Alsatian cuisine prepared with fresh market produce
The restaurant serves seasonal and traditional dishes.
Open Tuesday to Thursday from 6:45pm to 9pm, and until 9:30pm on Friday and Saturday.

You can visit Alsace's vineyards and wine cellars
The region is also popular with cyclists and hikers.

name: Hôtel Turenne
description:
Hotel Turenne is located at the entrance to Colmar’s old quarter, 750 metres from the Saint Martin Church
It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access.

Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom
All rooms are accessible by a lift.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast every morning, and there are many typical Alsatian restaurants in the surrounding area
Guests can also enjoy a drink in the hotel bar.

The Hotel Turenne’s reception is open 24 hours a day
Private parking for cars, bicycles and motorbikes is also available at an extra cost and is subject to availability (reservation is needed).

The hotel is close to the famous Unterlinden and Bartholdi museums and the town’s pedestrian and commercial districts
Gare de Colmar Train station is 1.3 km away, the German border is 20 km from the Hotel Turenne.

name: PAUL & PIA - Welcome Home Hotel
description:
This hotel is located 500 metres from Colmar Train Station and the Old Town
Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 700 meters away.

All rooms have a satellite flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and a private bathroom.

There is also a bar and a 24-hour reception.

Guests can easily explore the medieval villages in the Alsace wine region and the Musée d'Unterlinden is 750 meters away
The Colmar-Houssen Airport is just 5 km from the Hotel Kyriad.

name: Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte & Restaurant Louisiane
description:
Set near the River Ill, Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte Restaurant Louisiane is 2 km from the historic district
It features a restaurant with a summer terrace and a garden.

The soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee making facilities
Private bathrooms include a hairdryer
Free Wi-Fi is available throughout Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte Restaurant Louisiane.

Regional specialities are served in restaurant La Louisiane and guests can enjoy a drink in the bar while reading the newspapers provided
A buffet breakfast is served every morning from 06:30 until 11:00 at Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte Restaurant Louisiane.

This Hotel offers a free private parking lot on site.
Strasbourg Golf Club is 15 km from the hotel
Strasbourg International Airport is only 19 km away.

Please note that pets cannot be left alone in the rooms.

Please note that hotel rules are applicable for all reservations
Any stay involve the acceptation of the hotel rules, this guide of rules is available on request at the reception.

name: Hôtel le Grillon
description:
This hotel is located in central Strasbourg, a 5-minute walk from the TGV train station and from Petite-France
It offers a wooden deck terrace and soundproofed accommodation with free Wi-Fi.

Guest rooms at the Grillon Hotel are individually decorated
They each have a TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a shower.

A breakfast buffet is served daily in the Grillon's dining room
The terrace also provides tables and chairs
In the evening you can enjoy a drink at the hotel bar.

The hotel also provides a 24-hour reception
A bicycle rental service is available on request
Place Kleber as well as the Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art are 700 metres away.

name: Le Grand Hotel
description:
Located opposite Strasbourg train station, the Grand Hotel is located a 10-minute walk from the city centre and Place Kléber
It offers a bar, terrace and free Wi-Fi access.

All of the rooms are set in modern decor and feature en suite facilities
Each features a flat-screen satellite TV, a telephone and free WiFi access
The rooms are serviced by a lift.

The buffet breakfast is served daily and is composed of sweet and savoury dishes
It can be sampled on the terrace when the weather is fine
Guests can order room service 24 hours a day
The lounge bar is ideal for relaxing after a day of sightseeing or business.

Located 15 km from the airport and 8 km from Germany’s borders, Le Grand Hotel is ideally located to visit the surrounding area
Guests may choose to visit the famous department store, Galeries Lafayette or Strasbourg Cathedral.

name: James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre
description:
James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre offers accommodation in Colmar, on the Alsation Wine Route
This Boutique Hotel offers a contemporary and modern decoration style
Guests can enjoy the on-site bar
Private parking is available on site.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV
You will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the room
Each room is equipped with a private bathroom
James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre features free WiFi throughout the property.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

The James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre is located within a 5-minute walk of Colmar's Christmas markets
Strasbourg Airport is a 1-hour drive from the hotel.

name: ibis Colmar Est - Hotel Restaurant en Alsace
description:
The ibis Colmar East is located 5 km from the Alsace Wine Trail and 10 km from Kaysersberg, Riquewihr and Eguisheim
Wi-Fi is free of charge in the entire property.

The 86 rooms are comfortable and all have en suite facilities with a bath tub
The hotel also features an Alsatian brasserie, WinStub, a terrace, a free car park and secure car spaces.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away
The property is a boutique hotel.

Ironing facilities and hairdryers are available upon request.

The property is a 5 minute drive from the old city centre of Colmar, wander through the Petite Venise area, visit the toy museum or admire the Isenheim Altarpiece at the Unterlinden Museum.

name: Hotel Le 21ème
description:
The Hotel Le 21Ème is located in central Strasbourg, a short walk from the Petite-France area and Place Kléber
All accommodation has lift access, a private bathroom, TV and free Wi-Fi.

The Hotel Le 21Ème is situated on Strasbourg’s Grande Île and guests can visit the Cathedral and the Musée des Beaux-Arts, a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel Patricia - Strasbourg Hyper Centre
description:
Hôtel Patricia - Strasbourg Hyper Centre is located in the heart of Strasbourg’s picturesque centre, a short walk from the Cathedral, in the Petite France district
It offers affordable accommodation in an historic building.

Guest rooms at the Patricia are functional
Double, twin, triple and Quadruple rooms are available depending on your needs
Some have their own en suite bathroom
There is also a cheaper, budget option with shared facilities.

Guests can enjoy breakfast in the nearby Café, located 100 metres from the property.

The Hotel Patricia is in quiet surroundings, and is 100% non-smoking
It also offers Wi-Fi and a daily continental breakfast.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Athena Spa
description:
Hôtel Restaurant Athena Spa is located less than 3 km from the centre of Strasbourg and features a fitness centre that is open 24 hours a day
This design hotel has an à la carte restaurant, a bar and 24-hour reception
There is an sensory pool, open everyday available free of charge.

With free WiFi, the design and colorful rooms here provide a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, air conditioning and facilities for making tea and coffee
Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning and the bar is open every day from midday to midnight.

Guests can access the wellness area and the hotel's spa which has an sensory pool with hydromassage jets, a hammam, a Finnish sauna, a tropical sauna, a relaxation area and a multi-sensory shower.

A limited number of free outdoor, secure private parking spaces are available at this hotel and there is also an underground car park requiring an additional fee
Two charging stations for electric vehicles are available for an extra charge
It is 2.5 km from The 'Petite France' and 3 km from Strasbourg Cathedral
Strasbourg International Airport is 8 km away.

name: Hotel Rohan, Centre Cathédrale
description:
Hôtel De Rohan is set in the historic centre of Strasbourg, just 150 metres from the Strasbourg Cathedral and the Rohan Palace
The hotel offers 2 furnished terraces and elegantly decorated, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access.

The rooms are furnished in an elegant style, each with their own individual style
They come with satellite TV and modern en suite facilities.

Breakfast can be enjoyed on one of the two terraces on sunny mornings.

The Strasbourg Historical Museum is 90 metres from the hotel and the Sainte-Madeleine Church is a 7-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Suisse
description:
The Hotel Suisse has a central location just behind Strasbourg Cathedral
It offers family-run accommodation with free WiFi access and a summer terrace
The historic Petite France district is just a 10-minute walk away

Guest rooms at the Hotel Suisse are equipped with en suite facilities, a TV, telephone.
As our hotel is a 14th century building, our rooms do not dispose of air-conditioning, but we provide fans in every room.

The traditionally decorated rooms have a view of the cathedral’s steeple
All rooms are accessible by lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning
Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar.

The property has a 24-hour front desk.

The Hotel Suisse is ideally situated for visiting the city on foot
It is near the River Ill and next to the famous Palais des Rohan Museum
"Bateliers parking is available at 300 meters from the property at 20€/24h

Please note that only some of our rooms can host pets.

name: HANNONG Hotel & Wine Bar
description:
The Hannong Hotel is located in the heart of Strasbourg, just a 5-minute walk from the TGV train station, Petite France district and the Cathedral
It offers free Wi-Fi access.

Guest rooms at the Hannong are air conditioned and soundproofed
They are equipped with hardwood floors, European designed furniture, satellite TV and each have a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

A breakfast buffet is served every morning in the Hannong’s breakfast room
It includes hot drinks, handmade bread and French pastries, local products, jams and juices
Guests can enjoy a drink at the wine bar in the glass ceiling salon or on the large terrace.

Hotel Hannong is just 100 metres from the Tramway Central Station, Place de l'Homme de Fer
Strasbourg Train Station is a 9-minute walk from the property.

name: Hôtel Vendôme
description:
Located in front of Strasbourg Train Station, this 3-star hotel features a 24-hour lounge bar and offers guest rooms with free Wi-Fi
The Petite-France district is a 10-minute walk away.

A flat-screen TV with Canal+ is provided in the air-conditioned guest rooms
Each modern room has wooden furnishings and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Hôtel Vendôme, and you can take breakfast in your room.

The Strasbourg Cathedral is 1.2 km from the hotel and the famous department store, Galeries Lafayette, is 750 metres away
Preferential rates are available for a nearby public car park.

name: ClapClap Hôtel, Food & Bar
description:
ClapClap Hotel is a hotel located 400 metres from Strasbourg TGV Train station and Tram Station
It is 600 metres from the city centre and offers a terrace and rooms with free WiFi access.

Rooms are comfortable, soundproofed and fully equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
The en suite includes a shower and a hairdryer
Rooms are serviced by an elevator.

Breakfast is served as a buffet every morning
You can also read the morning newspapers at ClapClap Hotel.

ClapClap Hotel is a 5-minute walk to the Petite France district with its tourist sites, pedestrian streets, shops and restaurants
The Strasbourg Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art is 6 minutes’ walk away.

We would like to limit the number of reservations for groups
Indeed, a different cancellation policy applies for more than 5 rooms booked.

name: Hotel Kaijoo by HappyCulture
description:
Located in the Petite France district, Hotel Kaijoo by HappyCulture is 600 metres from Strasbourg SNCF Train Station
It offers guest rooms with satellite TV and an eclectic décor.

Each spacious guest room has a flat-screen TV
Some of the soundproofed guest rooms feature a balcony with views over the city
The private bathrooms include a hairdryer.
A Breakfast buffet is served every morning at the Kaijoo Hotel by HappyCulture
Guests can also enjoy drinks and snacks at the Kaijoo Kafé.

The 24-hour hotel includes a tour desk where you can get advice from the local staff
Guests can use the free Wi-Fi access in public areas of the Kaijoo Hotel by HappyCulture.

Guests staying at this hotel have access to the lounge area in all HappyCulture Collection hotels throughout the city where they can drop off their shopping bags, borrow an umbrella or charge their mobile phone
Public parking can be found 300 metres from the property
The Alt Winmarik tram stop is 180 metres away, providing direct access to the Botanic Gardens.

Please note that our parking is available only by reservation, each request will be processed by the reception and a confirmation email will be sent to you.

name: Hotel Roses
description:
This hotel features 34 rooms decorated on specific-rose theme
They all include soundproofing and bright and spacious spaces.

Start the day with a generous and tasty Alsatian buffet breakfast before setting off for a day sightseeing.
Cheese and cured meat plates can also be ordered.

The Hotel Roses boasts a privileged location near the Ill River, Strasbourg Cathedral and Rohan Palace
Paid public parking is available nearby.

name: Hôtel Tandem - Boutique Hôtel
description:
Located opposite Strasbourg TGV Train Station, this eco-friendly Boutique Hotel is just 1.7 km from the city centre and a 5-minute walk from the picturesque Petite France district
The European Parliament is a 10-minute tram ride away and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hôtel Tandem - Boutique Hôtel offer a TV, a desk and a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast with home-made products only is served every morning at Hôtel Tandem - Boutique Hôtel and includes local organic produce with a selection hot and cold options
Guests can enjoy a drink from the bar or relax on the patio, which is an inside terrace.

Our wine selection is entirely bio-dynamic

Several working areas are available for business guests and there is also a lounge and library area.

Bike and tandem rental is available onsite and secure bike storage space is also available
Public parking is available nearby for a supplement.

name: Best Western Plus Monopole Métropole
description:
Best Western Monopole Métropole is located just 400 metres from Strasbourg Train Station, next to La Petite France district
It offers contemporary accommodation with a minibar and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Monopole Métropole are contemporary in style and decorated in neutral tones
Each is air-conditioned and offers an electric kettle and some rooms have a seating area.

A buffet breakfast with scrambled eggs and bacon is served every morning in the elegant, Alsatian-style breakfast room
The hotel also has a modern bar with paintings by local artists, where guests can relax in one of the armchairs.

The hotel is just a 10-minute walk from Place Kléber and Strasbourg Cathedral
The Métropole can be accessed from the A35, just a 4-minute drive away, and private underground parking is available on site.

name: Hotel des Vosges BW Premier Collection
description:
Hotel des Vosges is located in Stasbourg near the train station and the city centre
It offers comfortable and affordable accommodation.

The hotel has a selection of well equipped and furnished guestrooms all serviced by a lift
Family rooms are available that can accommodate up to 3 people.

Breakfast is available daily and can be served to your room or enjoyed in the breakfast room.

name: Hotel des Arts - Centre Cathédrale
description:
Hôtel Des Arts is located in the heart of the pedestrian area in the centre of historical Strasbourg
It offers comfortable accommodation with air conditioning and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms are equipped with TV, work desk and en suite facilities
Breakfast is served daily.

Hôtel Des Arts is housed in a charming building and is just behind the historical museum, directly on the small square of Marché aux Cochons de Lait.

name: K Hotel
description:
Set in Strasbourg, K Hotel features a fitness centre and views of the city
The property is located 3.9 km from St
Paul's Church, 4 km from The 'Petite France' and 4.3 km from Exposition Park, Strasbourg
All rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

All units in the hotel are fitted with a kettle
With a private shower room, rooms at K HOTEL also boast free WiFi
The units at the accommodation have air conditioning and a desk.

K Hotel offers a terrace.

Speaking German and English, staff are always on hand to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Strasbourg Cathedral is 4.4 km from the hotel
Strasbourg International Airport is 11 km from the property
Espace Européen de l’Entreprise is less than a 10-minute drive.

name: Hôtel ORIGAMI
description:
Located in Strasbourg, in a building dating from 2018, Hôtel ORIGAMI offers a bar and guestrooms with free WiFi
The property is within a 30-minute walk of The 'Petite France' and 1.7 km of Strasbourg Christmas Market
Strasbourg Cathedral is 1.8 km away.

All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
Each room is complete with a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some rooms at Hôtel ORIGAMI also offer a balcony
Rooms provide guests with a desk and a kettle.

The hotel offers a buffet or American breakfast.

Strasburg History Museum is 1.9 km from Hôtel ORIGAMI
Strasbourg International Airport is 9 km away.

name: Hotel Esplanade
description:
The Hotel Esplanade is located in the university area of Strasbourg
It offers on-site bicycle rental and comfortable and contemporary rooms in a warm atmosphere.

All of the rooms are non-smoking and they include an LCD TV and free WiFi access
Each room has a private bathroom with free toiletries, and hairdryers can be borrowed at the reception
A breakfast buffet is available every morning from 06:30 to 10:00 in the hotel’s breakfast lounge.

The Strasbourg tramway station just in front of the Hotel Esplanade will take you directly to the new high-speed train station, the European Parliament and the international Entzheim-Strasbourg Airport (tramway + shuttle service).

The Strasbourg Cathedral is a 20-minute walk away
Free public parking is available nearby the hotel from 19:00 to 09:00.

name: Hôtel Couvent du Franciscain Centre ville
description:
A 10-minute walk from Strasbourg Cathedral and the historic city centre, this hotel offers bicycle rental and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi
It features a vaulted dining room with André Wenger’s fresco The Franciscans.

Each room at Hôtel Couvent du Franciscain Centre ville includes flat-screen TV with satellite channels
The rooms all have an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer.

Breakfast is served in the form of a buffet in a spacious and bright vaulted room
The hotel also has a bar, where you can relax and a seminar room that can accommodate up to 18 people.

The hotel is 1.3 km from both Strasbourg TGV Train Station and the A35 motorway
Buses and tramways, as well as 2 public car parks are available within 5 minutes’ walking distance.

name: Hotel des Tonneliers
description:
The Hotel des Tonneliers - Restaurant La Cruche is in a very central location, 450 metres from Strasbourg Cathedral and 2 km from Strasbourg Train Station
It offers free WiFi throughout the property
In summer there is an outdoor terrace.

The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a toilet and a bath or a shower
They also include a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso coffee machine.

La Cruche D’or is just a short walk from the picturesque Petite France district
It is also close to the famous Palais des Rohan museum.

name: Hotel Victoria
description:
The hotel welcomes you in a warm atmosphere
Enjoy a privileged location in the city centre, close the banks of the Ill river, a few minutes away from the railway station.

Hotel Victoria is well served by public transport (tramway, bus and shuttles to Francfort and Basel/Mulhouse)


The hotel boasts a tremendous location to discover the Petite France, the Cathedral as well as the museums.

name: ibis budget Strasbourg Centre Republique
description:
Boasting a shared lounge, ibis budget Strasbourg Centre Republique is set in Strasbourg in the Alsace region, 700 metres from St
Paul's Church and 1.4 km from Strasbourg Cathedral
With a garden, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom
The property is non-smoking and is located 1.3 km from Strasbourg Exhibition Centre.

All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available every morning at ibis budget Strasbourg Centre Republique.

Non-stop assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak German, English, Spanish and French.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg, European Parliament and Strasbourg History Museum
The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 12 km from ibis budget Strasbourg Centre Republique.

name: La Bastide du Calalou; BW Signature Collection
description:
Bastide Du Calalou is located a 30-minute drive from the Gorges du Verdon and a 20-minute drive from the Sainte-Croix Lake
It features a heated, outdoor swimming pool, a tennis court and elegant guestrooms that overlook the Aups Valley.

Rooms at Bastide Du Calalou are equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
Some rooms also have a DVD and video player.

A full breakfast buffet is served daily and Bastide’s restaurant serves regional cuisine, prepared with local produce
Guests can enjoy lunch and dinner in the restaurant or on the terrace.

Bastide Du Calalou is close to the village of Tourtour and the black truffle market, which is the third largest in France and open from December to April.

name: Lou Paradou
description:
The Lou Paradou hotel is located in Greoux-les-Bains, by the Verdon River, next to the lavender fields in the heart of the Provence
It is set within a large park and offers a heated, seasonal and heated outdoor pool.

The Lou Paradou offers air-conditioned studios equipped with a kitchenette, free Wi-Fi access in the rooms and a private balcony or terrace
Some studios have a view of the park and air conditioning.

A breakfast serving jams and fruit syrups both homemade is offered
The hotel is just 400 metres from Greoux village pedestrian centre and there is free on-site parking.

Guests can visit the Verdon Gorge, the largest canyon in Europe, the Luberon villages and Haute-Provence hilltop villages
Local leisure activities around Gréoux include hiking, mountain-bike, white-water sports, gliding and rock climbing.

Marseille Provence Airport is situated 80 km from the Hotel and Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station is 70 km away.

name: Château de Pourtalès
description:
Château de Pourtalès is located in the north area of Strasbourg
It has witnessed years of European history, welcoming some of the most important musicians, philosophers and poets
It provides a spa area with Finnish sauna and relaxing facilities and which has direct access to the garden.

Château de Pourtalès offers rooms set in one of the property's 3 buildings, each with a different ambiance
The rooms in the Château and the Château Annexe are decorated in a traditional style and have authentic features
The rooms in the Park building are more modern and feature decor inspired by the environment.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning.

Guests can enjoy walking and relaxing in the gardens around the Château.

Free private parking is available onsite.

name: Les Canyons du Verdon
description:
Located in Verdon Regional Park, Les Canyons du Verdon features an outdoor swimming pool with sunbeds, a garden and pétanque facilities
Castillon Lake is just 4.5 km away
Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Decorated in fresh colours, all rooms feature a private entrance, while some include a balcony, pool views or garden view and a TV
They are complete with an en suite bathroom.

A breakfast buffet is offered at the hotel
Castellane village is conveniently located 250 metres away, allowing easy access to restaurants, bars and shops.

A conference room is available on request
It can accommodate up to 20 people.

Notre-Dame du Roc Chapel is only a 15-minute walk away and Saint-André-les-Alpes is a 20-minute drive from the hotel
Free Wi-Fi access is available in reception and free private parking is possible on site
Free storage for motorbikes is available on site.

name: Gabrielle hôtel
description:
Located in the heart of Verdon National Park, Gabrielle hôtel is situated in the village of Aiguines
It overlooks Sainte Croix Lake, where you can go canoeing or rent pedal boats.

All rooms have an en-suite bathroom with a hairdryer, TV and electric blinds.

A continental breakfast is served every morning.

Gabrielle hôtel is surrounded by many hiking trails and guests can enjoy cycling, windsurfing or visit the vineyards of Provence.

name: Auberge des Salles
description:
Situated in Les Salles-sur-Verdon, Auberge des Salles features a terrace with panoramic views of Lake de Sainte-Croix and the surrounding Verdon Natural Park
Hiking, fishing, and swimming are within 10 minutes' walk of the property.

Rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels and private bathrooms with either a bath or shower and a toilet
Some rooms have balconies with lake views and other rooms overlook the village and surrounding hills
A kettle is available upon request subject to availability.

The restaurant has a panoramic terrace on the lake of Sainte-Croix serving dinner everyday.

A buffet breakfast with hot drinks, orange juice, croissants, fresh bread with jams, honey and butter is served daily for a supplement
There is a bar on site.

The entrance to the Verdon Gorge is 6 km away and the village of Moustiers-Sainte-Marie is a 20-minute drive away
Les Arcs-Draguignan Train Station is 55 km away and the Hyeres Airport is 115 km away
Free private parking and free WiFi are available at the property.

name: La Ferme Rose-Hôtel de Charme
description:
Located 1 km from Moustiers-Sainte-Marie, this hotel has a large collection of objects from the 1950's and paintings by Maurice Vagh-Weinmann
It also offers a seasonal outdoor pool and a furnished terrace.

Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room is individually decorated and has free Wi-Fi access, a TV and a private bathroom
Some rooms have a balcony and views over the valley or the garden.

A continental breakfast is served daily
Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar or on 1 of the 2 terraces with views of the garden.

Activities in the nearby area include cycling, hiking and paragliding
Nautical activities and fishing is possible by Lac de Sainte-Croix, 5 km from the hotel
Les Gorges du Verdon is also 5 km away.

name: Le Vieux Château
description:
Situated in an 18th-century building, Le Vieux Château features rooms with an LCD TV and free Wi-Fi, a bar and a terrace
Set in the centre of Aiguines, it opens on a Provençal-style square with bars and shops.

With views of the village, all of the rooms include a private bathroom with hairdryer, shower and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is served every morning
You can also enjoy an ice cream at the bar or try one of the Provençal specialties proposed at the hotel’s restaurant.

You can go sailing on the Sainte Croix Lake, which is 8 km away, or visit the Museum of Prehistory in Quinson, a 40-minute drive away
Le Vieux Château is accessible via the A51 motorway.

name: Villa Borghese, The Originals Relais
description:
Located in Gréoux-les-Bains, between the Gorges du Verdon and the Luberon, the Villa Borghese is situated in a park surrounded by 100-year old oak trees
It features a heated outdoor swimming pool with a terrace and a wellness centre.

The intimate rooms feature garden views, air conditioning and a TV with satellite channels
The en suite bathroom is equipped with a bath tub and free toiletries
Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

The on-site gastronomic restaurant, La Table de Pauline, serves breakfast each morning as well as Provençal cuisine which has been recommended in travel and restaurant guide books
For a relaxed midday meal guests can eat at the Côté Jardin.

A tennis court and sauna are also available on site
Villa Borghese is 14 km from the A51 motorway and 16 km from Manosque
The Aix-en-Provence TGV station is 70 km away
Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hôtel Le Colombier
description:
Located 1 km from Moustiers-Sainte-Marie village centre, Le Colombier is just 5 km from Sainte-Croix Lake
This Provencal house features a swim spa, 2 hot tubs and tennis court
Free WiFi is provided.

Le Colombier offers air-conditioned rooms with panoramic views of the valley or Moustiers rocks
Decorated with Provencal-style furniture, they each have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The Colombier provides free private parking and a garage for cars, bicycles and motorcycles
Local leisure activities nearby include rafting, paragliding and canyoning.

name: Hotel Les Restanques De Moustiers
description:
This Provencal-style hotel has a floral terrace and is only 500 metres from the village of Moustiers Sainte Marie
Surrounded by nature, Hotel Les Restanques De Moustiers offers panoramic views.

Guest rooms are decorated in warm colours with floor-to-ceiling windows allowing plenty of natural light
They are equipped with a flat-screen TV and feature a private bathroom.

Hotel Les Restanques De Moustiers serves a daily buffet breakfast which can be enjoyed on the terrace
In the evenings guests can relax with a drink at the bar.

The hotel is only 5 km from the Sainte-Croix Lake, where there are opportunities for canoeing, sailing and swimming
The Gorges du Verdon are 5 km away and free private parking is available on site.

name: Château et Golf De Taulane
description:
The Château de Taulane is a 4-star hotel located 20 km from the Verdon Gorge in stunning surroundings with a 18-hole golf course
It offers elegant rooms and excellent facilities and Grasse is 40 km away.

The rooms are located inside this 18th century château and also in the manor house
They are tastefully decorated in traditional Provençal style
Bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries are provided for guests' comfort.

The on-site restaurant offers quality cuisine prepared by a top chef
There is also a bar and a range of premium hotel services available for guests.

Guests have free access to the swimming pool, sauna, spa and hot tub.

Castellane is a 20-minute drive away and Draguignan is 50 km away
Free parking is available.

name: Hôtel La Bonne Auberge
description:
Set in the Verdon Regional Park, this hotel features a swimming pool and a shaded terrace in the garden
Regional dishes are served in the hotel’s restaurant.

The soundproofed guest rooms have a flat-screen TV and they offer a view
Each room is individually decorated and the private bathrooms include free toiletries
A hairdryer is available upon request.

A buffet breakfast is prepared daily at the Hôtel La Bonne Auberge.

The Gorges du Verdon is located 5 km away and private parking is available in the on-site garage.

name: Ma Petite Auberge
description:
Set in the Verdon Regional Nature Park, a 1-minute walk from the Verdon River and 5 km from Castillon Lake, Ma petite Auberge offers a traditional restaurant, a garden and a terrace
A public swimming pool is located 100 metres from the property.

The heated rooms offer a flat-screen TV
The en suite bathroom is fitted with a bath or a shower and includes free toiletries
Some offer a view of the terrace and the village’s place.

A continental breakfast is available every morning, and you can enjoy lunch and dinner in the park beside the 100-year-old Tilia Tree
Grocers can be found within 1 km.

It is 40 km from Dignes Train Station
Grasse is located 65 km from Ma Petite Auberge, while Cannes is 82 km away
A free, private car park is available on site.

name: Clos des Iris
description:
Clos des Iris is set in a 19th-century house, just 400 metres from the centre of Moustiers-Sainte-Marie in the Gorges Du Verdon region
It offers traditional-style rooms featuring a private terrace and views of the flowered garden.

Free WiFi access and a desk are provided in the rooms at Clos des Iris
There is also an en suite bathroom in each one, which is complete with a hairdryer and a shower
The rooms do not have a TV.

Breakfast is served every morning either in the dining room or on the shared terrace
After breakfast, you can relax on the sun loungers in the garden while reading a newspaper.

Other local attractions include Sainte-Croix Lake, which is just 4 km from this 2-star hotel, and guests can enjoy water sports such as pedalo boats and canoeing
Plateau de Valensole, known for its lavender fields, is 28 km away
The area is also popular for hiking and paragliding
Free private parking is available on site and luggage storage is provided at reception.

name: Hôtel le Panoramic - Votre Hôtel au cœur des Gorges du Verdon
description:
Set in a 4-hectare estate in the heart of Verdon Regional Natural Park, Hôtel le Panoramic - Votre Hôtel au cœur des Gorges du Verdon offers guestrooms 700 metres from Palud sur Verdon
The hotel features a heated outdoor pool, several terraces, a children's playground and a lounge with billiards, table tennis and table football
Free WiFi is available.

The rooms come with a flat screen TV, a private bathroom with a bath or shower, a toilet and free toiletries
Some rooms offer garden views and pool, while others have mountain views.

The children's playground features football goals, volleyball court and badminton set
Guests can have a drink at the on-site bar

In the surroundings you can explore the Verdon Gorge on a pedalo, electric boat or kayak, as well as the Lake Sainte-Croix, which is 15 km away
Hiking, climbing, bungee jumping, tree climbing, rafting and canyoning can be enjoyed in the area.

Free parking is available on site
The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 124 km from Hôtel le Panoramic - Votre Hôtel au cœur des Gorges du Verdon.

name: Château de Trigance
description:
This medieval castle is set in the Provencal village of Trigance
Guests can enjoy a drink or a simple meal of regional produce in the onsite wine bar, which is situated in one of the oldest weapon rooms in the castle
Free WiFi access is available in all rooms.

The rooms and suites at Château de Trigance feature a four-poster bed, antique furniture and wall tapestries
An LCD TV, views of the village and an en suite bathroom are also provided in each one.

You can enjoy the continental breakfast on the hotel’s panoramic terrace
There is also the possibility to have an afternoon tea or an aperitif while admiring the views.

Free private parking is possible on site and the Verdon Caves are a 20-minute drive away
Other local activities include walking in the countryside or bungee jumping off Artuby Bridge, 12 km away.

name: Nouvel Hôtel du Commerce
description:
The Nouvel Hôtel du Commerce is located in Castellane, in the Verdon region
It offers a heated swimming pool from mid-May to September, comfortable rooms in 2 buildings and free, closed private parking.

Some rooms offer views of the pool, of the mountain or of the city
They are all complete with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and there is also access to a bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer.

Every morning, a breakfast buffet featuring a range of local and homemade products is served
It can be enjoyed by the pool or in the common dining room.

For your comfort, the hotel provides free Wi-Fi in all the rooms
The area offers many activities such museums and excursions.

The hotel provides a free storage for bikes.

name: La Bastide du Paradou
description:
Housed in a 16th-century building, La Bastide du Paradou is a hotel located a 5-minute walk from the centre of Moustiers-Sainte-Marie
Enjoy access to gardens and private tennis courts.

The elegant rooms at La Bastide du Paradou have been individually decorated with care.

Breakfast is available for guests and is served individually
Further restaurants are closeby in Moustiers-Sainte-Marie.

Nearby attractions include the Verdon Gorges and the Lake Sainte Croix
Free private parking is provided at La Bastide du Paradou.

name: Hotel du Levant
description:
Located in Castellane, in the Verdon Regional Nature Park, Hotel du Levant features a restaurant and terrasse and free WiFi access in public areas
A secured garage is also available for guest at an extra cost.

All rooms at Hotel du Levant features a flat-screen TV, a desk and a wardrobe and a private bathroom with a bath or shower
Daily cleaning is made at the property and towels and toiletries are provided for free.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the restaurant
The hotel’s restaurant serves French cuisine.

Hotel du Levant is 6.2 km from Lac de Castillon, 65 km from Grasse and 82 km from Cannes.

name: Hotel le Belvédère
description:
Hotel le Belvédère is located near Musée de la Fayence, in the heart of Moustiers-Sainte-Marie, known for its pottery and famous hanging star
It offers air-conditioned rooms with mountain or village views.

Each room also has a TV and a private bathroom with a shower
Continental breakfast is served daily and you can enjoy regional dishes at the hotel’s restaurant, which has a terrace that looks out onto the mountains.

Hotel le Belvédère provides free private parking
It is a 15-minute drive from the beaches of the Lake of Sainte-Croix
Hiking, mountain biking and kayaking are popular activities in the region.

name: Hôtel du Roc
description:
Located in the centre of the Castellane Village, this hotel is 100 meters from the Verdon River and Gorges
Canoeing, rafting and hiking are some of the activities that can be done in the surrounding area.

With a village or mountains view, each room at Hôtel du Roc is equipped with an LCD TV and a bathroom with shower, toilet and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is served daily and a traditional restaurant is also at your disposal on site.

Saint Andrée les Alpes Train Station is 25 km away and Moustiers Sainte Marie is 45 km away.

name: Logis Grand Hotel Bain
description:
Logis Grand Hotel Bain is a family-run hotel since 1737 and is located in Comps-sur-Artuby, near the Gorges of Verdon
It offers en suite rooms with free WiFi and a TV.

The hotel provides a daily buffet breakfast and the restaurant offers a range of set menus serving local Provençal food
Guests can sample regional wines in the hotel bar, or relax in the garden.

In the surroundings, guests can practice outdoor activities including hiking, kayaking and rafting
For bungee jumping, guests can go to Artuby bridge, a 20-minute drive away.

Logis Grand Hotel Bain is 30 km from Draguignan and Castellane
Free on-site private parking is available for guests exploring the Provence region by car.

name: Hôtel Les Deux Lions
description:
Situated in Riez, 8 km from Lake of Sainte-Croix, Hôtel Les Deux Lions offers rooms overlooking the village or the hill
Free WiFi is provided.

Each room features floor to ceiling sliding doors, a balcony and a TV with satellite channels
The private bathroom has a bathtub and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is available every morning if reserved the night before
It is served on the terrace or in the lounge.

The area is popular for water sports such as canoeing but also climbing, hiking or biking
A centre for hot air balloon flights is located 10 km away and lavender fields 3 km from the property.

Moustiers-Sainte-Marie and Les Gorges du Verdon are both located 15 km from Hôtel Les Deux Lions.​ Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hôtel de la Plage - HDLP
description:
Set in Bormes-les-Mimosas, 500 metres from Faviere, Hôtel de la Plage - HDLP offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace
Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom
Guests can make use of a bar.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box
Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

Hôtel de la Plage - HDLP offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and the area is popular for hiking and snorkelling.

Popular points of interest near Hôtel de la Plage - HDLP include Pointe de Gouron Beach, Plage de l'Anglade and La Favière
The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Paradis
description:
Hôtel Paradis is set in a building built in 1920 and has a luxuriant garden and offers a panoramic view over the sea and the old village of Bormes.

Several rooms have a balcony with a view over the sea, others overlook the village
They also have free Wi-Fi internet access and TV.

Also, a continental breakfast is served daily and can be served buffet-style according to the number of guests
Parking is available for bikes, motorcycles and cars.

Bormes les Mimosas is located between St
Tropez and Hyeres and has stunning views over the Island Port Cros and Porquerolles.

name: Hotel Les Cavalets
description:
Offering an outdoor pool and panoramic views of Sainte-Croix Lake, Les Cavalets is located in Bauduen
Free WiFi access is available in public areas.

Some rooms have a balcony or a terrace and offer lake views
The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower.

At Les Cavalets you will find a garden and a bar
Guests can enjoy traditional Provençal meals from the hotel’s restaurant
Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities and a shared lounge.

An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and canoeing
The property offers free parking.

The hotel is 2 km from Sainte Croix Lake
Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 126 km away.

name: Hostellerie du Cigalou - Teritoria
description:
Set in the medieval village of Bornes-les-Mimosas, this 3-star hotel is just a 25-minute drive from Toulon
It offers an outdoor swimming pool surrounded by mimosas and individually decorated guest rooms.

The rooms and suites at Hostellerie du Cigalou also include an LCD TV and an en suite bathroom
Each one is air-conditioned and a minibar can be added to the accommodation upon request.

The buffet breakfast can be served in the dining room or on the communal terrace
The hotel also has an on-site bar and restaurant, which offer Provencal specialities and cocktails.

Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas and free public parking is possible near the hotel
Other local attractions include the towns of Hyères and Saint-Tropez, both less than 30 km away.

name: Villa Castellane
description:
Located in Gréoux-les-Bains, 22 km from Golf du Luberon, Villa Castellane provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden
Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property
Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower
Each room has a kettle, while selected rooms are fitted with a kitchenette with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven
At Villa Castellane every room has bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Villa Castellane offers a terrace
Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Gréoux-les-Bains, like hiking and cycling.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 90 km from Villa Castellane.

name: Hotel La Voile
description:
Hotel La Voile is ideally situated just 400 metres from the beaches and Bormes harbour in a quiet, peaceful environment near the village of La Favière
There is an outdoor heated pool and a lounge bar.

Some of the guestrooms offer a view of the sea or garden
Choose from single or double rooms, some of which can accommodate up to 4 people.

A buffet breakfast is available in the dining area every morning for an extra charge
The hotel can also recommend a range of restaurants in the local area.

Hotel La Voile is located near the charming medieval village of Bormes Les Mimosas and less than 100 metres from the local shops and restaurants
The surrounding area offers a variety of nautical and outdoor activities
Private parking is available upon request with a supplement.

name: Le Mirage
description:
The Mirage hotel is nestled in the heart of a restful place, a perfect balance between sea and nature, to offer you an unforgettable experience throughout your stay.
For a night or a stay, whether you are with family or friends, take full advantage of our hotel, a cosy nest nestled in Bormes-les-Mimosas, to relax and enjoy an ideal wellness experience.

Spend your days strolling through the village, discovering its history, or heading to the beach to bask in the sun
You can also choose to stay by our outdoor swimming pool, to make room for serenity, to enjoy our cocktails on our terrace with its unbeatable view.

After a delicious healthy meal in our restaurant, enjoy your evening and relax in the calm of your room with its panoramic view of the sea and the village of Bormes-les-Mimosas.

name: Eden Rose Grand Hotel BW Premier Collection
description:
Set in Bormes-les-Mimosas, 29 km from Chateau de Grimaud, Eden Rose Grand Hotel BW Premier Collection offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant
With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi
The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

The units will provide guests with a minibar.

With staff speaking German, English, Spanish and French, information is available at the reception.

Le Pont des Fées is 29 km from the hotel, while Toulon Train Station is 40 km away
The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 22 km from Eden Rose Grand Hotel BW Premier Collection.

name: Hotel Les Jardins de Bormes
description:
Located 4 km from Bormes-les-Mimosas and 3 km from L’Estagnol Beaches, this design-style hotel with a terrace offers an outdoor swimming pool and a hot tub
Guests are invited to the poolside beds and the sun loungers
Free onsite private parking is available.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Les Jardins de Bormes have a flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast with homemade jams is provided every morning.

The property is located 35 km from the city of Saint-Tropez and 16 km from Hyères
There is a free, private car park on site.

- Infrared sauna upon reservation
- Massages by reservation

name: Hotel Restaurant Bellevue
description:
Located in downtown Bormes-les-Mimosas, Hotel Restaurant Bellevue features a restaurant serving fresh and local products, a bar and a sitting area in front of the property
Rooms for disabled guests are available.

All rooms are non-smoking, air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and free Wi-Fi access
The private bathroom is complete with shower, toilet and hairdryer.

A breakfast buffet, including traditional pastries, fruits, eggs and juices, is served every morning at an additional cost
Guests can also enjoy the on-site restaurant and bar.

Hotel Restaurant Bellevue is 200 metres from Dom Forest, 4 km from the beach and 35 km from Saint-Tropez
Toulon Airport and Hyères Train Station are 22 km away.

name: Hôtel Les Mimosas
description:
Hôtel Les Mimosas is surrounded by green fields and just 5 km from the village of Bormes-les-Mimosas
The hotel offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool.

The guest rooms have reverse-cycle air conditioning and a flat-screen TV
All rooms are en suite with a bathtub or shower and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available daily and children can enjoy it at a reduced rate
A small breakfast can also be served in the comfort of your room at a reduced rate.
Cycling and hiking trails run past the hotel.

The seaside town of Le Lavandou is a 10-minute drive from the hotel
One parking space is available per room, studio or apartment.

name: Village Club L'Oustal Del Mar
description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and green spaces, Village Vacances Oustal Del Mar is located in Le Lavandou
It has a bar and buffet restaurant
The beach of Saint-Clair is 1.9 km away
Private parking is available on site for EUR 8 per night per car.

Private bathrooms are equipped with a shower
The towels are also provided.

The Oustal Del Mar also has a children's club for a fee.

The nearest airport, Toulon-Hyères, is 18 km away.

name: Hôtel Les Palmiers
description:
Located in the heart of a well-preserved nature area, in an old fishing village facing the island of Porquerolles, the Hotel Les Palmiers is just 300 metres from the sea
The property features an outdoor pool and free WiFi.

It features comfortable guest rooms fitted with a private bathroom and satellite TV
Some rooms have a terrace with views of the swimming pool and others look onto the garden.

You will find at the Hotel Les Palmiers all the charm of the Provence area with the cicadas and the scent of pine trees, while discovering white sand beaches, wild rocky beaches and unique sunsets.

Lavandou's Port is 8 km away, where ferry diversions can be taken to the Ile de Porquerolles, and Hyères-Toulon Airport is 20 km away.

name: Hôtel La Petite Bohème
description:
Just 200 metres from the beach, La Petite Bohème is situated on the Mediterranean coast, in the village of Le Lavandou
It offers air-conditioned rooms, some with sea views.

The bright guest rooms at the La Petite Bohème are equipped with free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV
Each has a private bathroom with bath or shower.

The breakfast is served all year round at the property.

La Petite Bohème is set in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region, between Saint-Tropez and Toulon
Toulon-Hyères Airport is 18.6 km away.

name: Anglade Hotel
description:
The Hotel Anglade is located in the heart of the village of Le Lavandou, on the Mediterranean coast in Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur, just 50 meters from the beach.

The Hôtel Anglade has 24 air-conditioned rooms: 16 sea-facing rooms with partial sea views and balconies equipped with table and chairs, and 8 village-facing rooms.
Each room is equipped with en-suite bathroom and toilet, flat-screen TV with connectivity, minibar, safety deposit box, double-glazed windows and WiFi.
A full sweet and savory buffet breakfast is served in the dining room or on the hotel's outdoor terrace.
Private parking spaces can be reserved nearby.

Located in the center of the village, the hotel is close to shops, restaurants, a pharmacy and the port (200 m), from which boats depart for the Golden Isles (Porquerolles, Port Cros and Le Levant).

A mini-train from the port serves all the beaches of Le Lavandou
A protected bike path leads from the hotel to Hyères or Le Rayol-Canadel.

Toulon-Hyères airport is a 25-minute drive away, and Saint-Tropez 40 minutes
The bus station, 200 meters from the hotel, serves Toulon train station and all coastal towns as far as Saint-Tropez.

name: Hôtel California
description:
Situated in the village of Le Lavandou, Hôtel California offers air-conditioned accommodation, 400 metres from the beach
Some rooms have a balcony or terrace with sea views, and some rooms overlook the hills
Free on-site private parking is provided without reservation.

All of the rooms are decorated in a retro style, include free WiFi access, and have a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Guests of the Hôtel California can enjoy a continental breakfast in the dining room or on the terrace.

The hotel is just 100 metres from a pedestrian street with lots of restaurants and bars
It is also a 5-minute walk from the ferry terminal
Guests can enjoy water skiing and diving at the Lavandou Beach.

name: Hôtel Beau Rivage
description:
Hôtel Beau Rivage is set in the centre of Le Lavandou, just 15 metres from the beach and the Mediterranean Sea
The hotel offers free Wi-Fi internet access, a garden and a terrace with sunbeds
Outdoor showers are available for use after being on the beach.

The air-conditioned guest rooms at Hôtel Beau Rivage include a TV and a private bathroom with a shower or bath
Some rooms have a private terrace or a balcony with a view of the sea or the garden.

Breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the guest room or in the breakfast room, which offers views of the sea
Drinks are served in the on-site bar
Guests can also have picnics in the garden and borrow cutlery from reception.

Nearby activities include jet skiing, sailing and kayaking, and restaurants are found in the surrounding area
The property is 23 km from Toulon-Hyeres Airport and 40 km from Saint-Tropez.

name: Le Rabelais
description:
Situated in the heart of Le Lavandou, opposite the port and just 250 metres from the beach, Le Rabelais is a 3-star hotel offering cosy accommodation and views of the port and of the Golden Islands.

The rooms are elegant, decorated in ochre or sky blue colours
All rooms are en suite and some offer spectacular views of the sea.

In the summertime, you can enjoy breakfast on the lovely terrace whilst admiring the sea.

You might be interested to explore the Domaniale Des Maures Forest, situated close by, or catch a ferry from the port (200 metres away) to go to the Porquerolles Islands, Port Cros or Le Levant.

St Tropez is 40 km away, and Hyères-Toulon Airport is 25 km away.

name: Les Alcyons
description:
Located beside the sandy beach of Layet, this hotel is 4 km from Le Lavandou City Centre
It offers stylish guest rooms with a furnished terrace, some overlooking the sea
There is a swimming pool on a roof top, the property has a lift.

The air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a minibar
All rooms have a private bathroom.

Les Alcyons features a restaurant called Beau Soleil, which serves local specialities
There is also a lounge bar where guests can use the free Wi-Fi access
A continental breakfast is served every morning, and can be delivered to the guest room.

With free private parking on site, the Alcyons hotel is located 30 km from Hyères Airport.

Guests can also enjoy free Wi-Fi in the lounge bar.

name: Villa TerraMera Hôtel
description:
Located in the city centre, 200 metres from the sandy beach, Villa TerraMera Hôtel offers a patio and rooms with LCD TV
Free Wi-Fi access is provided throughout the hotel.

The rooms at Villa TerraMera Hôtel have a private bathroom with free toiletries
Some have a spa bath
Air conditioning is available in all rooms, free of charge.

Restaurants and bars can be found within a walking distance.

The hotel is situated 100 metres from the nearest bus station, 20 km from the city of Hyères and 40 km from Toulon Train Station
Free public parking is available nearby.

name: Roc Hotel - Hôtel 4 étoiles les pieds dans l'eau
description:
Offering a private beach area, with direct access onto the rocks and the beach, Roc Hotel - Hôtel 4 étoiles les pieds dans l'eau is located in Le Lavandou
Free WiFi access is available.

Each room here will provide you with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, air conditioning, a refrigerator and a terrace
Private bathrooms come with a bath or shower and a hairdryer.

At Roc Hotel - Hôtel 4 étoiles les pieds dans l'eau you will find a bar and a sun terrace.

The hotel is 1.4 km from La Fossette and 1.8 km from Aiguebelle
Côte d'Azur Airport is 88 km away and Saint Tropez is 30 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Baptistin
description:
Hotel Baptistin is set facing the Golden Islands, in the Provençal fishing town of Le Lavandou
The guest rooms offer a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The modern guest rooms include free Wi-Fi internet access, a private bathroom and air conditioning
Some of the rooms have a sea view and a private terrace with garden furniture.

Hotel Baptistin serves a daily continental breakfast, which can also be enjoyed on the terrace overlooking the sea
There is also a bar where guests can enjoy a pre-dinner drink.

The Baptistin is within easy access of 12 fine sandy beaches, bars and restaurants and the ferry port for Port Cros and Porquerolles
Private parking is available nearby.

name: Hotel L'Escapade
description:
Set in the heart of Le Lavandou, Hotel L'Escapade is a 3-minute walk from the beach and the port
Boat excursions for the Îles d’Hyères depart just 300 metres away.

L’Escapade features air-conditioned and soundproofed guest rooms which were renovated in 2019
All rooms have satellite TVs and WiFi access.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning and is served on the terrace with a view of the hills
Guests can relax and enjoy a drink in the flowered garden.

Many shops and restaurants can be found nearby in the pedestrianised town centre.

The hotel is 23 km from Toulon-Hyères Airport
Saint-Tropez is a 40-minute drive away.

name: Hotel L'Orangeraie
description:
Hotel L'Orangeraie is located just 200 metres from the beaches of Saint-Clair
It offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden and free public parking
Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

Rooms at Hotel L'Orangeraie are equipped with a telephone, TV and private bathroom
Some rooms also have a private balcony, some with views of the Mediterranean Sea.

L'Orangeraie serves a continental breakfast that guests can have in the breakfast room or in the comfort of their room.

Hotel L'Orangeraie is a 40-minute drive from Toulon and a 45-minute drive from Saint-Tropez.

name: Hotel Les Flots Bleus
description:
Situated on the seafront beside Saint Clair sandy beach, this hotel is 1.5 km from Lavandou harbour and the town centre
It offers a restaurant and terrace with a sea view.

The air-conditioned guest rooms have a typical provençal décor and feature a private bathroom
Each room is equipped with a TV, minibar and free Wi-Fi access.

Les Flots Bleus hotel features a bar and restaurant on site
A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room.

The hotel features a hair salon, available upon reservation
A washing machine and microwave are available at the reception for guests’ use.

With free private parking on site, Les Flots Bleus is 25 km from Toulon Airport.

name: Hôtel Astria
description:
Hôtel Astria is situated in Le Lavandou, 40 metres from Saint-Clair Beach
Guests can enjoy the on-site bar
Free private parking is available on site.

All rooms have a flat-screen TV
Every room has a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower
For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer
Hôtel Astria features free WiFi throughout the property.

There is a shared lounge at the property
The hotel also offers bike hire.

Hôtel Astria is 500 metres from the harbour and city centre, while Aiguebelle is 2.2 km from the property
The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 20 km from Hôtel Astria.

name: Château de la Gaude
description:
Set in Aix-en-Provence, 38 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, Château de la Gaude offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden
With a terrace, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom
The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests.

The units in the hotel are equipped with a kettle
Château de la Gaude provides certain units with garden views, and rooms are equipped with a coffee machine
At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels.

At Château de la Gaude you will find a restaurant serving French, Japanese and Mediterranean cuisine
Dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested.

The hotel offers a sauna.

Joliette Metro Station is 38 km from Château de la Gaude, while Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 39 km away
The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 34 km from the accommodation.

name: Aquabella Hôtel & Spa
description:
