Surrounded by a beautiful garden, Aquabella offers Provencal-style rooms and guests have free access to the spa
It is located in central Aix-en-Provence, a short walk from the old town.

The guest rooms at the Aquabella are all air-conditioned and equipped with free Wi-Fi access and mini-bars
Bathrobes are also provided.

Guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine in the hotel restaurant, L’Orangerie
During the summertime La Terrasse de la Tour is the hotel’s outdoor grill, serving grilled dishes and salads by the outdoor swimming pool.

Guests can relax at the Aquabella’s Sensoriel Spa
Guests have access to the sauna, hammam, and hot bath
There is also a Kneipp shower and ice fountain.

Guests will find public parking just 50 metres away from the property, available at an extra cost.

name: Hotel Le Grand Pavois
description:
Located 20 metres from a private beach in Le Lavandou, Hotel Le Grand Pavois offers a terrace, garden and air-conditioning throughout
Saint-Tropez is a 40-minute drive away
Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

All rooms feature a minibar, a flat-screen TV and safety deposit box
The en suite bathroom include free toiletries and a hairdryer is available at reception
Some rooms also offer a terrace and sea views.

Guests can have breakfast in their room at no extra cost and French restaurants can be found in the village, a 5-minute drive away
The hotel also boasts a bar on site.

Hiking and cycling trails are available outside the hotel and Toulon is 44 km away
Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel
description:
Located within a 10-minute walk of the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel boasts free access to a spa with a heated indoor pool, steam room, fitness room, and 2 treatment cabins are also available
It offers a 24-hour front desk, free WiFi and newspapers.

The spacious guest rooms all feature garden or city views
They come with a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

Various breakfast options such as American, continental and a breakfast buffet are available for guests
The hotel also offers a bistro and a bar.

Guests can go golfing 3 km away, bowling 1 km away or horse riding 1.9 km away
The Grand Theatre is 200 metres away
Marseille-Marignane Airport is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel Le Mozart
description:
Located 500 metres from the Granet Museum, Hôtel Le Mozart offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi
It is easily accessed from Motorway A8, a 3-minute drive away.

Additional facilities in the rooms include an LCD TV with satellite channels
The rooms also provide a telephone and an en suite bathroom, which is complete with a bath or shower.

You can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the dining room or on the terrace.

Free private parking is available onsite
Alternatively, guests can keep their vehicle in the secure garage for a supplementary cost and upon reservation
Newspapers are also available at the 24-hour reception.

name: Hôtel Cézanne Boutique-Hôtel
description:
This boutique design hotel is located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence and offers 55 rooms
If features a terrace and a lounge.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Cézanne have free WiFi access
All rooms include satellite TV with more than 50 channels and some have views over the town.

At Hôtel Cézanne there is a terrace with an outdoor bar, where guests can enjoy an aperitif
There is also a meeting room.

Breakfast can be taken until 10:30 and offers fresh juice bar, home-made savoury dishers, pastries, pancakes, brioche, artisanal charcuterie boards, jam from Hautes-Alpes and a gluten-free selection
It can be enjoyed in the outdoor bar in fine weather.

The property is 200 metres from the Cours Mirabeau and 300 metres from a bus station, with connections to the airport and the TGV train station
Aix-en-Provence TGV train station is 12 km from the hotel.

The rooms at the Boutique Hotel Cézanne have free WiFi access and air-conditioned during hot season
All rooms include satellite TV with more than 50 channels and some have views over the town.

Private secured parking is available on site for an additional fee.

name: Campanile Aix-en-Provence Sud - Pont de l'Arc
description:
Located in Aix-en-Provence, 3 km from the historical centre and Cours Mirabeau, Campanile Aix-en-Provence Sud - Pont de l'Arc offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

Each of the guest rooms is equipped with a flat-screen TV
Tea and coffee making facilities are available in each room.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel
The hotel's restaurant serves contemporary French cuisine that can be enjoyed on the terrace during the summer months
Campanile Aix-en-Provence also offers hot and cold buffet.

The hotel is serviced by a lift and free private parking is available on site
A bus stop can be found opposite the hotel, where direct bus access is available to the city centre.

The property is 13 km from Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station and 8 km away from Aix en Provence Arena stadium and concert hall
Marseille Provence Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

Nearby facilties and locations : Sismic ( Concert and Entertenaiment), L'Arena ( Concert and Entertenaiment), Grand Theatre de Provence, Private Hospital

Attractions : Pavillon Vendome, Provencal Market (3km)

name: Odalys City Aix en Provence Les Floridianes
description:
Odalys City Aix en Provence Les Floridianes is situated a 5-minute walk from the cafes and fountains that line the Cours Mirabeau
It offers guest rooms and self-catering accommodation with 24-hour reception and an outdoor swimming pool during summer.

Free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, including BeIN Sport, are provided in the accommodation, which also has seating area
All of the air-conditioned rooms and suites at Odalys City Aix en Provence Les Floridianes have a private bathroom.

The fully equipped kitchenette in the apartment includes a dishwasher, microwave and a small dining area
Les Floridianes also serves a buffet breakfast in the dining room which opens onto the terrace surrounding the pool.

Gare d’Aix-en-Provence Train Station and Jourdan Park are both 500 metres from the residence
The A8 Motorway is 1.6 km away
Undercover parking is available on site with a supplement.

name: Hôtel Paul
description:
Centrally located in Aix-en-Provence, Hotel Paul is only 150 metres from the Spa, the Palais des Festivals and the historical part of the city
It features a garden with a terrace area
Free WiFi is available in all the rooms.

Accessed via stairs, the guestrooms at Hotel Paul feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and a fan
Each room has a private bathroom with a shower.

During the summer months, guests can relax in Paul Hotel's garden, which features tables and chairs with sun shades
There is also a TV room.

Every morning a continental breakfast is served for an extra charge
For lunch and dinner, guests can choose from a range of cafes and restaurants found within 400 metres of the property.

Aix-en-Provence train station is 1.5 km from the hotel and Marseille Marignane airport is 30 km away
Marseille is 35.5 km away
Public parking is available nearby.

name: Hôtel Escaletto
description:
This 3-star hotel is located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence, a 1-minute walk from Thermes Sextius thermal baths and 550 metres from Cours Mirabeau
Free WiFi is available.

Rooms are contemporary and offer a terrace with a panoramic view over the city and the Mont Sainte-Victoire Mountain.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning, and free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hotel.

With a 24-hour reception, the Hotel escaletto offers easy access to all the main tourist attractions of
Aix-en-Provence.

name: Hôtel Birdy by Happyculture
description:
Hôtel Birdy by Happyculture is located a 10-minute drive from Aix-en-Provence, next to an 18-hole golf course
It offers an outdoor swimming pool and has free WiFi throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV
Each room has a private bathroom
Some rooms have a balcony or private terrace.

The hotel restaurant is open from Sunday evening to Friday midday
Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar from 10am to 10pm
Buffet Breakfast is available.

There are 3 meeting rooms available to organise meetings, workshops or cocktails
Guests have access to the garden and terrace.

Hôtel Birdy by Happyculture is just 17.4 km from Marseille Provence Airport and 6.7 km away from Marseille TGV Train Station
Free parking is available on site.

name: Le Concorde
description:
Le Concorde is ideally located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence, only a 5-minute walk from the famous Cour Mirabeau and near the Granet Museum
It offers a flowered garden.

The guest rooms all feature a TV, air-conditioning and Wi-Fi access.

You can start the day with a generous breakfast in the breakfast room or in the courtyard.

For guests arriving by car, the hotel has a large private garage in the basement available for an additional charge, allowing you to explore the city without any parking worries.

name: B&B HOTEL Aix-en-Provence Le Tholonet
description:
Featuring free WiFi, B&B Hotel Aix en Provence Le Tholonet is a hotel in Les Artauds, 25 km from Marseille
Free private parking is available on site.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV
There is a private bathroom equipped with a shower.

Aix-en-Provence is 3.7 km from B&B Hotel Le Tholonet, while Cassis is 33 km from the property
The nearest airport is Provence Airport, 23 km from B&B Hotel Aix en Provence Le Tholonet.

name: Hotel Cardinal
description:
Situated in Aix-en-Provence, within 800 metres of Cours Mirabeau and Saint-Sauveur Cathedral, Hotel Cardinal features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom
Attractions in the area include Aix-en-Provence Congress Centre, a 3-minute walk away.

The individually decorated rooms and suites in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine and desk
Some rooms here will provide you with a kitchenette with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and French.

Marseille Provence Airport is 21 km from the property.

name: Golden Tulip Aix en Provence
description:
Golden Tulip Aix en Provence is situated on the exit of the A8 and A51 motorways, just 10 minutes' drive from the centre of Aix-en-Provence and Paul Cézanne’s house
It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi
The hotel was completely renovated in April 2019.

All the rooms at Golden Tulip Aix en Provence come with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with Canal+ and satellite channels
They are decorated in a contemporary style.

The "Tulipe" restaurant is open daily and offers traditional, gourmet and local cuisine.

Guests can relax on the terrace with deckchairs and a barbecue
There is also a fitness room and an air-conditioned relaxation area with a dry sauna and shower which can be privatized.

There are theatres, a golf course and a cinema all within close proximity of the hotel
Situated on the western outskirts of town, the hotel is 2 km from Cours Mirabeau
An underground garage is available for parking for an extra charge.

name: Les Quatre Dauphins
description:
Les Quatre Dauphins is a hotel set in a former private mansion in the heart of Aix-en-Provence, just 50 metres away from Quatre Dauphins Square and 350 metres from Cours Mirabeau
The property is a 5-minute drive from Aix-en-Provence Train Station
Free WiFi is included.

An elegant stairwell leads to the guest rooms in this 3-storey hotel
Decorated in a Provençal style, each room comes with private bathroom and satellite TV
The rooms of the top floor have exposed wooden beams.

The central location of the Quatre Dauphins hotel allows you to visit the old part of Aix-en-Provence
Paid public parking is available 300 metres from the property.

name: Hôtel Vendôme
description:
Located just a few steps from Aix-en-Provence historic centre and the beautiful Pavillon Vendôme, this hotel offers soundproofed rooms opening onto a courtyard, with air-conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV.

All of the guest rooms at the Vendôme are equipped with en suite facilities and bathrobes are provided
They feature a desk, a telephone, and free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire Hotel Vendôme.

A continental breakfast is served every morning, and can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room
Front desk is open 24-hour, and daily newspapers are at your disposal.

The Hotel Vendôme is just 800 metres from the shuttle service, leading to Aix-en-Provence TGV Railway Station.

name: Hôtel Rotonde
description:
Hôtel Rotonde is located in central Aix-en-Provence, 5 minutes' walk from the SNCF train station
Free WiFi is provided, together with free on-site parking subject to availability.

It offers soundproofed rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar
Each has a bathroom with hairdryer.

Hôtel Rotonde serves a continental buffet breakfast
Guests can also enjoy a drink at the bar or on the shaded terrace.

The hotel is 300 metres from Cours Mirabeau and 30 km from Marseille Provence Airport.

name: Negrecoste Hôtel & Spa
description:
Negrecoste Hôtel & Spa is an 18th century hotel with a sun terrace, set in the heart of the Cours Mirabeau, a 10-minute walk from Aix-en-Provence SNCF Train and Bus Station
Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The air-conditioned guest rooms feature an LCD TV and a paid minibar
The private bathrooms are equipped with a bath or shower, free Nuxe toiletries and a hairdryer
Some of the rooms also offer a view of the Cours Mirabeau.

Meeting facilities are available and there is a 24-hour reception
Upon reservation and for an extra charge, guests can relax in the onsite spa with a hot tub, sauna and hammam and guests benefit from reduced rates for a 1-hour spa pass and for the onsite treatments.

Bars, shops and restaurants can be found within 100 metres of the hotel
Other local attractions include the city's cathedral, a 5-minute walk away
The nearest airport is Marseille Marignane, 25 km from the hotel
Paid private parking is available on site upon reservation.

name: Domaine Gaogaia
description:
Located 2 km from the village of Les Milles and 8 km from the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Domaine Gaogaia offers hotel accommodation with an outdoor pool, a garden and a terrace
Guests also have access to free WiFi and free on-site parking.

All rooms are air conditioned and feature a desk and a flat-screen TV
The private bathroom comes with a shower and a hairdryer
Deluxe rooms have a bath, a shower and a separate toilet
Additional facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, a shared lounge and ironing services.

Guests can enjoy a meal made with fresh and seasonal ingredients in the on-site restaurant opened from Monday to Saturday and Sundays for lunch only
Beforehand reservations for the restaurant are strongly advised.

Activities in the local area include golf and hiking
Les Milles, Domaine Gaogaia is a 10-minute drive from Aix-en-Provence city centre where a number of shops, bars, restaurants and cafes can be found
The nearest beaches are a 35-minute drive from the hotel.

Marseille Provence Airport is 20 km away and Aix-en-Provence Train Station is situated 10 km from the property.

name: Grand Hôtel Roi René Aix en Provence Centre - MGallery
description:
Located just a 5-minute walk from Cours Mirabeau and the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Grand Hôtel Roi René Aix en Provence Centre - MGallery is a 4-star hotel featuring a heated seasonal outdoor pool open from April to the end of september
It also boasts a terrace, a fitness centre and free WiFi access.
Each air-conditioned guest room has been decorated in a contemporary style and includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a safe
The private bathroom comes with either a bath or shower, bathrobes, a hairdryer, slippers and free Occitane toiletries
All rooms have a Nespresso coffee machine.
Traditional French cuisine is served in the hotel's restaurant, La Table du Roi
Guests can enjoy a drink in L'intemporel bar.
Grand Hôtel Roi René - MGallery Collection is 400 metres from the train station
Private parking is available upon request and for an additional fee.

name: Le Pigonnet - Esprit de France
description:
Le Pigonnet is an elegant Provençal style house which combines 18th-century refinement with contemporary style
Set in a beautiful 2-acre garden with flowers and chestnut trees, it offers a swimming pool, a fitness room and a hammam.

Each room offers 5-star service, a satellite TV, free WiFi access, bathrobes and slippers
Some overlook the garden and Sainte Victoire Mountain from a balcony or terrace.

Le Pigonnet features a bistronomic restaurant, La Table du Pigonnet, that serves regional cuisine
During the summer months, guests can have breakfast, lunch and dinner on the open terrace.

The hotel is situated only 800 metres from the centre of Aix-en-Provence
Free private parking and charging stations for electric cars are available onsite.

name: Hôtel de France
description:
Located in the heart of Aix-en-Provence, Hôtel de France is situated in a street parallel to Cours Mirabeau only 50 metres from the famous Fontaine de la Rotonde, and offers air conditioned rooms with free WiFi access.

Decorated with white and beige shades, all rooms at Hôtel de France feature a TV with satellite channels, a desk and a minibar
The private bathroom comes with a bathtub or a shower and Nuxe products.

Breakfast is served daily and can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the guest room
The property is located near numerous restaurants, bars and markets.

Other facilities available at Hôtel de France include a 24 hour front desk and a shared lounge
The property's location makes it an excellent base to discover Aix-en-Provence, which train station is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

name: HOTEL RESTAURANT OLYMPE
description:
Located in Aix-en-Provence, 27 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, HOTEL RESTAURANT OLYMPE provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace
With a restaurant, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom
The property is non-smoking and is situated 27 km from Joliette Metro Station.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk
Each room is equipped with a kettle, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while some rooms are equipped with a patio and some have garden views
At HOTEL RESTAURANT OLYMPE rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception.

Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 28 km from the accommodation, while Vieux Port Metro station is 29 km away
The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 25 km from HOTEL RESTAURANT OLYMPE.

name: Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire Hotel & Spa
description:
Set in 5-hectare park with vineyards and Olive trees, Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire is a hotel decorated in an elegant style
The property was built in the 18th property and includes spa facilities as well as 2 swimming pools.

The rooms and suites at Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire have a minibar, an LCD TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer
A kettle is available in the rooms.

A gourmet-style restaurant is available on site and offers meals made with seasonal and local products
A homemade buffet breakfast is also available daily and you can enjoy a drink at the bar
Children under the age of 8 benefit from free breakfast.

Other facilities are available such as a sun terrace, luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access, available throughout
The spa facilities include a steam bath, a sauna and a fitness centre.

The hotel is situated 10 km from Sainte-Victoire Mountain and 6 km from the centre of Aix-en-Provence
There is free, private car park on site which does not require reservation
A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: The Originals Résidence Aix Schuman
description:
Situated in Aix-en-Provence, 30 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, The Originals Résidence Aix Schuman features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant
This 3-star hotel offers a bar
The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower
At The Originals Résidence Aix Schuman rooms come with bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, vegetarian or gluten-free options.

Joliette Metro Station is 30 km from the accommodation, while Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 31 km from the property
The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 26 km from The Originals Résidence Aix Schuman.

name: Hôtel Vaubecour
description:
Hôtel Vaubecour is located in Lyon, on the 2nd floor of a building
Lyon’s Museum of Fine Arts is 1.6 km away and Lyon Perrache Train Station is 500 metres from the hotel
Free WiFi access is available.

Accessed via a lift, the non-smoking guest rooms feature a desk and a TV with satellite channels
The private bathrooms have a shower
Hôtel Vaubecour offers a free daily cleaning service for your convenience.

Please note that the property does not have air conditioning.

Breakfast is available, which can be enjoyed in the breakfast room
A library and board games are at guests' disposal.

The hotel is 2.4 km from La Part-Dieu Business District
Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 20 km away.

Please note that the elevator is not accessible to people with reduced mobility.

name: Logis Hotel Restaurant la Ferme
description:
The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and 22 air-conditioned and fully equipped rooms on Barthelasse Island
Based 4 km from the centre of Avignon, it is located a 15-minute drive from Avignon Wall and the Palais des Papes.

A TV and free WiFi access are provided in the guest rooms, which are decorated in a Provencal style
The en suite bathrooms include free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The restaurant opens onto a shaded terrace planted with 100 year-old trees and an impressive wisteria.

Free secure parking is available on site and you can rent bikes from the hotel
Villeneuve-lès-Avignon is 5 km away and Pont du Gard is 30 km from the hotel
Avignon Train Station is ideally located a 10-minute drive away and the exhibition centre is 16 km away.

name: Lyo Hôtel - Centre Lyon Perrache
description:
Lyo Hôtel - Centre Lyon Perrache is set in Lyon’s Perrache district, 900 metres from Place Bellecour and 500 metres from Ampère – Victor Hugo Metro Station
Guests are invited to use the free WiFi or relax in the lounge area.

The guest rooms at Lyo Hôtel - Centre Lyon Perrache include a flat-screen TV and a work desk
They each feature a private bathroom and a wardrobe and some rooms have a spa bath.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms
Shops, cafés and restaurants are found in the surrounding area.

The Basilica of Saint-Martin d’Ainay is 650 metres from the hotel and Perrache Metro Station and Tram Stop is 400 metres away
The property is 450 metres from the A6 motorway and 19 km from Lyon-Bron Airport
The nearest public car park is available for an extra charge, 250 metres away.

name: Hôtel Chromatics & Restaurant Hill Club
description:
Hôtel Chromatics & Restaurant Hill Club is located on Lyon’s Presqu’île, a 6-minute walk from Perrache train and metro station
It has an on-site restaurant, as well as a shaded terrace and garden
Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All the guest rooms at the Hôtel Chromatics & Restaurant Hill Club Perrache are air conditioned and have a private bathroom, and flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

A Buffet Breakfast is available daily
Guests can relax with a drink during the evenings in the hotel bar or on the terrace.

Set in the heart of the city, the hotel is 800 metres from Place Carnot and the E15/A6 motorway
The old town and Saint Jean Cathedral are 2.5 km away
The tramway stop Suchet is 200 metres from the property
The property offers a preferential rate at the public parking, available a 4-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture
description:
Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture is located in central Lyon, a 5-minute walk from the Lyon Perrache TGV and Metro stations
It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi internet access.

Each room at the Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture is equipped with satellite TV and en suite facilities
Some rooms also have a private balcony.

Breakfast buffet is available daily and the Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture’s restaurant, La Bibliothèque, serves regional cuisine
Guests can enjoy a drink at the Le Mélèze bar, which features an outdoor floral terrace.

Place Bellecour is a 20-minute walk from the hotel, and the Notre Dame de Fourvière Basilica is 2 km away
The Suchet tram stop is just 120 metres from the hotel.

name: B&B HOTEL LYON Centre Perrache Berthelot
description:
Opened in December 2017, B&B HOTEL LYON Centre Perrache Berthelot is situated a 9-minute walk from the nearest public transport station and offers accommodation with free WiFi
Trams, buses and metros make it easy for guests to access Lyon city centre and the Part Dieu station and district
Private covered parking is available onsite for an extra charge.

At the hotel, all the air-conditioned rooms include a desk, a wardrobe, a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property.

Speaking English and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Confluence Museum is a 5-stop tram ride away, while Place Bellecour is within a 20-minute walk
Halle Tony Garnier conference and concert hall is 2.2 km away
The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 30 km from the property.

name: Campanile Lyon Centre - Berges du Rhône
description:
Campanile Lyon Centre - Berges du Rhône offers free WiFi access
It is just a 2-minute walk from the Guillotière Metro Station and an 8-minute drive from the Part-Dieu Train Station.

Set over 8 floors, rooms at Campanile are decorated in a simple style and feature air conditioning
Please note that only the TV in the bar broadcasts satellite channels and Canal+
The private bathrooms are complete with a bath or shower and a hairdryer
Four of the guest rooms are adapted for wheelchair access.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel
Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception, 2 meeting rooms and an express check-in service
Free newspapers are available.

The hotel is a 15-minute walk from Place Bellecour and Rue de la République, Lyon’s main shopping street
The A6 and A7 are a 5-minute drive away.

name: Résidence Villemanzy
description:
Offering views of the Alps and the River Rhône, Résidence Villemanzy is a former convent located Lyon
The Place des Terreaux, Lyon National Opera and the Rhône embankment are all within 650 metres of the property
Free WiFi access is available.

Each room at the Villemanzy has a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, microwave and a dining area
There is a cable TV in the rooms.

A breakfast buffet consisting of French pastries, hot drinks, dairy products, cereal, fruit salad and deli meats is available at an additional cost
There is also a garden and a terrace at the property.

Croix Paquet Metro Station is 200 metres away, while Tête d’Or Park is a 20-minute walk from Résidence Villemanzy
Lyon-Perrache Train Station is a 17-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel du Parc
description:
Hotel Du Parc is located in central Lyon, 450 metres from Massena Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station
It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen cable TV and a private bathroom.

Hotel Du Parc offers a daily buffet breakfast served in the hotel's breakfast room.

In addition to a 24-hour front desk, Parc hotel also provides a laundry and dry cleaning service.

Hotel Du Parc is within easy access of the new and old towns
The Parc de la Tete d’Or is 800 metres from the hotel and the Espace Tete d’Or Exhibition Centre is 400 metres away.

name: Hôtel Boutique Richelieu, Lyon Gare Part-Dieu
description:
Hôtel Boutique Richelieu, Lyon Gare Part-Dieu is located in Lyon's business district, an 8-minute walk from Lyon-Part-Dieu Train Station
Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Accessible via a lift, all rooms are air-conditioned and offer a flat-screen TV with cable channels
The private bathroom is fitted with a shower.

The hotel serves a continental breakfast every morning in the hotel dining room
Guests can relax with a drink in the bar and chose from a variety of room service snacks 24 hours a day.

Hôtel Boutique Richelieu, Lyon Gare Part-Dieu is a 14-minute walk from the Tête d'Or Park, while Cité Internationale and Lyon Convention Centre are a 10-minute drive away
Brotteaux Metro Station is 280 metres from the hotel.

name: TRIBE Lyon Croix Rousse
description:
Located in Lyon, 1.9 km from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon, TRIBE Lyon Croix Rousse provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant
This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and free WiFi
Guests can make use of a bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower
All units include a wardrobe.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available daily at TRIBE Lyon Croix Rousse.

Part-Dieu Train Station is 3.8 km from the accommodation, while Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 4.5 km away
The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 34 km from TRIBE Lyon Croix Rousse.

name: La Résidence
description:
La Résidence is a 3-star hotel located on a pedestrian street on Lyon presqu’ile, a 3-minute walk from Place Bellecour and 800 metres away from Perrache Train Station
It offers 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free WiFi access.

Each soundproofed room is equipped with a minibar and a courtesy tray
Individual bathrooms have a hairdryer and bathtub or shower.

A continental breakfast is served daily and can be delivered directly to guests’ rooms
A Nespresso machine can be found in the shared lounge at an extra cost.

Staff are available at all times to provide assistance with excursions and to give restaurant recommendations
A computer with free internet access is provided in the lobby area.

Part Dieu Train Station is 3 km away, while Hotel Dieu is a 5-minute walk away
A paid public parking is available nearby upon reservation.

name: Hôtel du Helder
description:
Set in central Lyon, Hôtel du Helder offers 2-star accommodation, a 15-minute walk away from Place Bellecour
It has a 24-hour reception and provide free WiFi
Parking is available onsite at an extra charge, upon reservation.

All of the rooms include a telephone, a TV and have a simple décor
Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Breakfast is served every morning and newspapers are provided
Breakfast items include pancakes with maple syrup, pastries, Nutella, jams, cereals, cold meat and cheese.

Guillotière Metro and Tram Station and the Rhone banks are less than a 5-minute walk away from the hotel
The nearest airport is Lyon Airport, 26 km away.

name: Hotel Elysée
description:
Hotel Elysée is located in the heart of Lyon city centre, just a few steps from the Place Bellecour
It offers soundproofed accommodation with free WiFi internet access.

This 19th century residence provides en suite guest rooms, equipped with air-conditioning and satellite TV
All rooms are accessible by lift, which begins at the first floor.

A daily breakfast is served in the hotel’s former vaulted cellar
Guests can also enjoy a drink from the bar.

Hotel Elyseé is within easy reach of the city’s many shops, cinemas, museums and gastronomic restaurants.

Bellecour Metro is 100 metres from the Hotel Elysée, offering connections throughout Lyon
Lyon Part Dieu Train Station is 2 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel De Verdun 1882, BW Signature Collection
description:
Hotel De Verdun 1882, BW Signature Collection is located in central Lyon on the Presqu’Ile, 450 metres from the Lyon Perrache TGV Train Station
It offers en suite rooms with satellite TV and high-speed WiFi.

Set within a former private mansion dating from 1882, Hotel De Verdun 1882 provides a daily buffet breakfast.

Hotel De Verdun 1882 has a 24-hour front desk and security guard.

Guests have easy access to the city’s many shops and restaurants
Place Bellecour is a 10 minute walk away and Vieux Lyon is 1.5 km from the hotel.

name: Pullman Lyon
description:
Situated in Lyon and with Part-Dieu Train Station reachable within 200 metres, Pullman Lyon features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant
This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk
Guests can make use of a bar.

At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels
Every room comes with a safety deposit box, while some rooms include a balcony
The rooms have a wardrobe.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast is available each morning at the property.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 3.8 km from Pullman Lyon, while Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 4.3 km from the property
The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 32 km from the accommodation.

name: Centre Jean Bosco
description:
Centre Jean Bosco is located in Lyon
This hotel is part of Jean Bosco Catholic Institute
Free WiFi access is available
It is a 10-minute walk from Vieux Lyon Metro Station.

Each room has a wardrobe, desk and heating
Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with free toiletries.

At Centre Jean Bosco you will find a garden
Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, a shared lounge and luggage storage.

The hotel is 2.4 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station and 1.6 km from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon
Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 30 km away.

name: Greet Hotel Lyon Confluence
description:
Featuring a terrace, a restaurant and a bar, Greet Hotel Lyon Confluence offers accommodation with free WiFi on Lyon Presqu’île district, an 18-minute walk from Place Bellecour
It has a 24-hour reception, a paid public parking and library.

All rooms have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
A welcome tray is provided
The private bathroom has a shower and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at the property
The buffet is composed of homemade (cakes, jam and compote) and local products (bread, brioche, honey and spread).

The Basilica of Notre Dame de Fourvière and Lyon’s Museum of Fine Arts are both available within an 11-minute drive
The hotel is 24 minutes from Eurexpo by car
Lyon-Perrache Train Station is 230 metres from the property, while Lyon-Saint Exupéry Airport is 31 km away.

name: Hotelo Lyon Charité
description:
Located in the historic centre of Lyon, in a building dating from 19th century next to Place Carnot, Hotelo Lyon Charité hotel offers accommodation with free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.

All rooms are air conditioned and include a desk, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels including Canal +, and a private bathroom.

Guests of the Hotelo Lyon Charité can enjoy a buffet breakfast which includes pastries, bread, yoghurts, fruit juice and hot beverages
There are numerous restaurants within walking distance.

Perrache train and metro station is a 3-minute walk away
The E15 and A6 motorways can be accessed by car in a few minutes.

name: Hotel des Savoies Lyon Perrache
description:
Situated in Lyon’s Presqu’île district, a 7-minute walk from Lyon-Perrache Train Station, Hotel des Savoies Lyon Perrache provides accommodation with free WiFi throughout.

All rooms have air conditioning, an electric kettle and a flat-screen TV
There is a private bathroom
Hairdryers are available upon request.

Breakfast is available daily at a supplement as a takeaway or in the guest's room
It includes hot drinks, juice, pastries, bread, cheese and cold meats
Reception is open 24 hours a day.

Lyon’s Museum of Fine Arts is a 13-minute drive from the property, while Vieux Lyon is a 17-minute walk away
Lyon-Saint Exupéry Airport is 31 km from Hotel des Savoies Lyon Perrache.

name: Hotel du Théatre
description:
Hotel du Théatre offers en suite accommodation in the centre of Lyon between the Rhone and Saone Rivers, 1 km from Lyon's Opera House and the Musée des Beaux-Arts de Lyon
Some rooms overlook the Place des Célestins
Free WiFi access is available.

Located on upper floors and accessed via a staircase.The hotel does not have a lift ,each room in the 19th-century building has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with shower or bath.

Rue de la République, Lyon’s main shopping street, is a 4-minute walk from the hotel
The Bellecour Metro (lines A and D) is only 350 metres away.

Guests have access to a public bike hire station in front of the hotel
The property is 2 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station and 3 km from Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station.

Please note that the hotel does not have an elevator or air conditioning.

name: Hotel Lyon-ouest
description:
Located on the banks of the Saône, 6 km from Place Bellecour, Hôtel Lyon-ouest offers 102 rooms, a restaurant, Arteloge Coffee Corner and a gym
The property has a 24-hour reception
Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

All rooms have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV with Canal + and beIN Sports channels
The 2 private bathrooms are equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Every morning you can enjoy a buffet breakfast at the property
The hotel offers a dine-in and take-away option.

You specify a 15-minute drive from the old town of Lyon and 2 km from Lyon-Vaise train station
Lyon-Saint-Exupéry airport is located half an hour by car.

name: Hotelo Lyon Ainay
description:
Hotelo Lyon Ainay offers affordable accommodation near the city centre and old town
It is a 5-minute walk from the Lyon Perrache railway station and free WiFi is available.

Rooms at the Hotelo Lyon Ainay are spacious and soundproofed
They are all equipped with en suite facilities and satellite TV
Some of the rooms are air-conditioned.

Hotelo Lyon Ainay is conveniently located near public transport and shops, making it an ideal base for exploring Lyon
Paid underground public parking is available in front of the property.

Please note that for reservations of 5 rooms or more different cancellation conditions apply.

name: Republik Hotel
description:
Located in the heart of Lyon, on the Presqu’île District, Republik Hotel offers accommodation with a 24-hour reception and free WiFi
Place Bellecour and Bellecour Metro Station are both 230 metres from the property.

Each air-conditioned room comes with a kettle, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
The private bathroom has a hairdryer and is fitted with a bath or a shower
A baby cot can be added to the room upon request and subject to prior approval from the hotel.

A breakfast buffet is served every morning, including bread, pastries, cereal, cold meat, cheese, jam, hot drinks and fruit juice
A range of amenities including shops, bars and restaurants are available within 200 metres of the property.

Saint-Jean-Baptiste Cathedral and Lyon’s Museum of Fine Arts are both available within a 15-minute walk from Republik Hotel, while the Cordliers district is 600 metres away
Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station is 2.2 km away
Public parking is available a 2-minute walk away.

name: MEININGER Hotel Lyon Centre Berthelot
description:
Situated in Lyon, 200 metres from Musée de la Resistance, MEININGER Hotel Lyon Centre Berthelot features accommodation with a bar, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace
Fourvière is 3.1 km away.

All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom.

The hotel offers a continental or buffet breakfast.

There is a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and a ticket service for guests.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 2.9 km from MEININGER Hotel Lyon Centre Berthelot, while Musée des Confluences is 2.4km from the property
Perrache Train Station is 1.3 km away
The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel Le Bristol
description:
Ideally located inside the ramparts in the centre of Avignon, Hôtel Le Bristol offers air-conditioned rooms, a bar, free WiFi and a shared lounge
There is also a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service.

Just a 15-minute walk to the Palais des Papes, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Guests at Hôtel Le Bristol can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 9 km from Hôtel Le Bristol.

name: Hotel Victoria Lyon Perrache Confluence
description:
Hôtel Victoria Lyon Perrache Confluence is located in the Presqu'île, in the heart of Lyon, just 300 metres from the Parrache TGV and Metro Station
It is also just a 10-minute walk from Place Bellecour and Confluence.

Decorated in a modern style, Hôtel Victoria’s rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and private bathroom with a shower and toilet
The rooms are accessible by lift.

There are many restaurants and brasseries within walking distance including the famous Brasserie Georges.

name: Régina Boutique Hotel
description:
Régina is a hotel located on the main street in Avignon and just a 5-minute walk from the Palais des Papes.

The rooms are decorated in warm tones and also come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels including Canal+, and a telephone
Free WiFi access is available and some rooms have a balcony
The private bathroom features a bath or shower.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning in the dining room.

Guests can also buy local produce on site, including jams, olive oil and biscuits.

Additional facilities at this hotel include a 24-hour reception and a lift, which serves most of the rooms
The property is a 10-minute walk from Avignon Train Station.

name: Best Western Plus Le Lavarin
description:
Best Western Hôtel du Lavarin is situated in Avignon and is 2.5 km from the ramparts, the Palais des Papes and the Pont d’Avignon
A fitness room, and an indoor pool are also available on site.

The Best Western Hôtel du Lavarin offers comfortable and air conditioned rooms with free WiFi access.

Breakfast and other meals are served with the taste of Provence, in the restaurant, patio or garden
The restaurant is open from Monday to Friday evening
Please also note that there is no catering possible outside the opening days and times of the restaurant.

The hotel’s garden has olive and plane trees, and a private outdoor swimming pool
There is secure, closed parking on site with 2 Tesla charging points.

The hotel is a 5-minute bus ride from the TGV Train Station (bus n°30) and a 15-minute bus ride from the city centre of Avignon
The bus stop is opposite the hotel
Gardon gorges, the Pont du Gard and Le Mont Ventoux are all a 30-minute drive away
Friendly staff can also arrange a local tour operator for you.

name: Le Magnan
description:
Located in a verdant setting within the ancient city walls, Le Magnan offers free WiFi
It is a 10-minute walk from the Papal Palace.

Most of the comfortable guestrooms have a view of the garden and all rooms have an ensuite bathroom with bath or shower, direct-dial telephone, satellite TV and free WiFi internet access.

Le Magnan serves breakfast and in the summer months it can be enjoyed on the garden patio
A light breakfast including a hot drink, a French pastry and fruit juice can also be enjoyed at a reduced rate.

Just 5 minutes from the hotel, guests will find restaurants that feature traditional and regional French cuisine
They are able to accommodate groups and large parties.

The property is 700 metres from Avignon Centre Train Station, and 1 km from Avignon University.

name: Avignon Grand Hotel
description:
Avignon Grand Hotel is ideally located just outside the city’s Middle Age walls, just 70 metres from Avignon Central Station
It is a 15-minute walk from Palais des Papes and offers a small rooftop pool
Free WiFi is available throughout.

The non-smoking rooms and suites come with a seating area, a safe, a flat-screen TV and tea and coffee making facilities
The bathroom facilities include a bath, a shower and free toiletries
Some suites feature a balcony or a terrace and offer views of the property building, the Mediterranean garden or the fortified city of Avignon.

Breakfast is available on a morning, which can be enjoyed on the private garden patio, weather permitting, or in the breakfast room which features large windows
It can also be served in the guest room for an additional charge
In the evening, In the evening, guests can dine in Le Saint Louis restaurant, which is 300 metres away.

Additional facilities at Avignon Grand Hotel include a 24-hour front desk and a bar.

Pont d'Avignon is 1.4 km away
A public underground car park is available for an additional charge and can be accessed directly from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Central
description:
Located in the heart of the Old Town of Avignon, Hôtel Central offers comfortable guest rooms with free WiFi internet access
A garden and a bar are available on site.

All of the guest rooms are air-conditioned and have a TV and a private bathroom with bath or shower.

A continental breakfast with fresh fruit, French pastries and hot or cold beverages is available
It can be enjoyed on the flowered terrace in the summer months.

The Central Hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Palais des Papes and the Pont d'Avignon
Avignon Central Station is 500 metres from the property.

name: Hôtel Cloitre Saint Louis Avignon
description:
Set in central Avignon, a 15-minute walk from Palais des Papes and Pont d'Avignon, this 16th-century hotel offers an outdoor rooftop pool with a large sun terrace
Some of the stylish rooms are located in the historic building featuring archways and vaulted ceilings
Free WiFi is available.

Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
All rooms are non-smoking and have a contemporary bathroom with a hairdryer
Some rooms feature a balcony with views of the courtyard.

Restaurant Le Saint Louis serves traditional French cuisine at Hôtel Cloitre Saint Louis
Guests can dine on the terrace in summer and enjoy drinks in the lounge bar
A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning
An in-room breakfast can be enjoyed at extra cost.

Calvet Museum and Avignon Train Station are a 5-minute walk from the hotel and Avignon Airport is a 20-minute drive away
Private parking is available.

name: ibis Avignon Sud
description:
The 3-star ibis Avignon Sud is ideally located 3 km from the city centre, a few minutes from the Pont d’Avignon and Avignon Convention Centre
It features an outdoor swimming pool with a sun terrace and a garden.

The 93 air-conditioned rooms include free WiFi access and satellite TV and Canal + Channel
The modern rooms all have a private bathroom fitted with a bathtub or shower.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away
Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Meals and snacks are available from the hotel’s restaurant, and the bar with its terrace is open 24/7.

The hotel is situated in the heart of Provence and the Châteauneuf du Pape vineyards
Avignon Centre Train Station is 5 km away
Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Hôtel Les Corps Saints
description:
Hôtel Les Corps Saints boasts a location facing Agricol Perdiguier Square in Avignon's historic city centre, 5 minutes' walk from the train station
The rooms include free WiFi
Corps Saints Square is 80 metres from the hotel.

Only accessible by stairs, the rooms come with a TV and have a private bathroom with a shower.

For an additional fee, guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast with cheese, pastries, cold meat, jams, yogurt, boiled and hard boiled eggs
Another breakfast option called 'Bistrot' is available and includes fruit juices, unlimited hot drinks, croissants, fresh bread, jams and homemade butter
Restaurants can be found less than 100 metres away.

Papal Palace is a 10 minutes' walk away
Public parking is available nearby for an additional charge
Avignon TGV train station is 15 km away.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Danieli, Avignon
description:
The Danieli Hotel is situated at the heart of Avignon Old Town, 400 metres from the Palais des Papes and a 10-minute walk from the Pont d'Avignon bridge
The paintings seen throughout this hotel are by Yvan Osscini.

The hotel offers air-conditioned guest rooms featuring a flat-screen TV, desk and wardrobe
The private bathroom includes a bath or shower and a hairdryer.

Breakfast is offered at this property and a vending machine is available for other snacks
Groceries and restaurants can be found within 150 metres of the hotel.

Avignon Central Train Station is 10 minutes walk away.

We do not have a parking and we recommend the public parking at the Palais des Papes, a 5-minute walk from the hotel, at a price of €17 for 24 hours
The entrance is located outside next to the Avignon bridge.

name: Hôtel de l'Horloge
description:
This hotel is set in a 19th-century building overlooking the picturesque Place de L'Horloge, in the centre of Avignon
It offers stylish rooms with free WiFi access
The hotel is a 2-minute walk from the Papal Palace.

The Hôtel de l'Horloge's rooms are decorated with antique furnishings
They are soundproofed and feature air conditioning, and some also come with private terraces
Three rooms are suitable for guests with reduced mobility
Some of the hotel's rooms feature panoramic views of the Palais des Papes.

The Luberon Regional Natural Park is a 30-minute drive away and the Alpilles mountains are a 55-minute drive away
Avignon - Caumont Airport is 10 km away.

name: Campanile Avignon Sud - Montfavet la Cristole
description:
Ideally located in Montfavet, 4 km from Avignon's Old Town, the Montfavet la Cristole offers cosy accommodation, free WiFi and a warm welcome.

Famous for its lovingly preserved natural surroundings, splendid sunny climate and history-laden stones, the Vaucluse department is the true heart of the Provence region.

Guestrooms at the Campanile Avignon Sud - Montfavet la Cristole are directly accessible from the outside
They are contemporary in style and provide you with a comfortable living space
They are all equipped with modern en suite facilities, air conditioning and a TV.

The Cristole boasts an ideal location to discover this fascinating city and take in the unique atmosphere of the region
The hotel's managers and staff are dedicated to making your stay both enjoyable and memorable.

name: Hôtel Le Médiéval Palais des Papes
description:
Le Médiéval is set in a former cardinal's palace in Avignon historic centre
This 17th-century building is a 5-minute walk from the Popes Palace and offers a floral patio with a fountain.

Accessed via a staircase, each air-conditioned room has a satellite TV and some feature a bathtub
They are also equipped with a direct dial phone, a work desk and free WiFi is available in the entire hotel Le Medieval.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and the hotel is close to many shops and restaurants.

The hotel includes a TV room and a library.

Le Medieval is 5 km from Avignon TGV train Station and 10 km from Avignon Airport
Public parking is available nearby at a discounted rate.

name: Hotel Boquier
description:
Hotel Boquier is set in the Avignon City Centre district in Avignon, 800 metres from Papal Palace.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV
All rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a shower
Hotel Boquier features free WiFi throughout the property.

There is luggage storage space at the property.

Pont d'Avignon is 1 km from Hotel Boquier
The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 9 km from Hotel Boquier.

name: Garlande Hôtel Avignon Centre
description:
Featuring free WiFi, Garlande Hôtel Avignon Centre offers accommodation set on a pedestrian street in Avignon, 500 metres from Papal Palace and 900 metres from Pont d'Avignon.

Each room is fitted with a flat-screen TV and a bath or shower
Certain rooms feature a seating area where you can relax.

Breakfast is available at the property for an additional charge
Evening meals can be served from Monday to Thursday if you reserve 24 hours in advance.

The property is a 10-minute walk from Avignon Central Station and Avignon - Caumont Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hotel d'Angleterre
description:
Situated in Avignon’s city centre, Hotel d'Angleterre features free WiFi access
There is a 24-hour reception
Avignon Centre Train Station is 10 minutes' walk away.

The air-conditioned guestrooms at d'Angleterre come with a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom
They are decorated in a contemporary style.

A continental breakfast is served daily in the lounge area
Newspapers and refreshments are also provided throughout the day.

Pont d'Avignon is 1.2 km from Hotel d'Angleterre
The nearest airport is Avignon Caumont Airport, 10 km from Hotel d'Angleterre.

name: Au Saint Roch - Hôtel et Jardin
description:
Offering a sun terrace and a courtyard garden with a fountain, Au Saint Roch - Hôtel et Jardin is located in Avignon in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Region, a 15-minute walk from the Papal Palace and a 10-minute walk from the train station
Private parking is available onsite, upon request and for an extra charge, and free public parking can also be found nearby.

All rooms are air-conditioned and come with a flat-screen satellite TV and a fan
Each room features a terrace and garden views
The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom equipped with a bath, free toiletries and a hairdryer
Saint Roch Hotel Jardin features free WiFi throughout the property.

A buffet breakfast is available for an extra charge.

Pont d'Avignon is 3.3 km from Au Saint Roch - Hôtel et Jardin
The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 10 km from Au Saint Roch - Hôtel et Jardin.

name: Hotel d'Europe
description:
Hotel d’Europe is set in a 16th-century building in the heart of Avignon, just a 5-minute walk from both the Palais des Papes and Avignon Bridge
It provides elegant guest rooms with free Wi-Fi access and an on-site gastronomic restaurant.

Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries
The hotel offers a valet service, beauty treatments and massages at an extra charge.

Both a continental and English breakfast is served daily in the form of a hot and cold buffet
The on-site Michelin 1-star restaurant, La Vieille Fontaine, is open from Tuesday to Saturday and serves contemporary regional cuisine.

name: hotelF1 Avignon Centre Courtine gare TGV
description:
hotelf1 Avignon Centre Courtine Gare Tgv is located in Avignon, 2.9 km from Papal Palace and 3 km from Pont d'Avignon.

Each room includes a flat-screen TV
The rooms come with a shared bathroom.Guests can purchase microfibre towels at the hotel at an extra cost of EUR 3 each.

Courtine Parc d'Activités Business Park Avignon is 800 metres from Hotelf1 Avignon Centre Courtine, while Avignon ESAA Superior Art School is 1.5 km away
The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 9 km from hotelf1 Avignon Centre Courtine Gare Tgv.

name: Mercure Avignon Centre Palais des Papes
description:
In the heart of Avignon, on the main square "Place de l'Horloge", 50 meters away from the Popes Palace and 500 metres from the Pont d'Avignon, Mercure Avignon Centre Palais des Papes features free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned rooms with a safe.

The guest rooms all feature a courtesy tray, a refrigerator and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
The en suite bathroom is complete with a bathtub or shower and hairdryer.

Every morning guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast served at the hotel
Guests can enjoy a meal in the hotel's restaurant "Racine" which is just 2min walk away.

The Rhône river banks are just an 8-minutes walk away and the hotel is a good starting point to go and explore the Provence region
There are public parking facilities just 250 metres away and Avignon Train Station is just 1 km away.

name: Kyriad Avignon - Palais des Papes
description:
Set at the Place de l'Horloge, Kyriad Avignon-Palais des Papes is located in the pedestrian zone of the historical centre of Avignon
It offers air-conditioned rooms equipped with a TV with Canal+, courtesy tray and free Wi-Fi access.

Kyriad Avignon-Palais des Papes is opposite the Avignon Opera and is 75 metres from The Palais des Papes
Other nearby attractions include Musée du Petit Palais and Pont d'Avignon.

In the heart of Provence, Kyriad Avignon-Palais des Papes is 20 km from Saint-Rémy-de-Provence and 40 km from Arles
Public parking is available nearby.

name: ibis budget Avignon Centre
description:
ibis budget Avignon Centre is located in Avignon, a 30-minute drive from Orange and Pont du Gard
Free WiFi access is available
The Papal Palace is 1.3 km away.

Each air-conditioned room features a TV with cable and satellite channels
Offering a bath or shower, the private bathroom also comes with free toiletries
You can enjoy a city view and garden view from the room.

At ibis budget Avignon Centre you will find a 24-hour front desk, a terrace and a bar
Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and a vending machine.

The hotel is 600 metres from Avignon Central Station and 4 km from Avignon TGV Train Station
Marseille Provence Airport is 83 km away
A paid public parking is available 100 metres away while a free public parking is located 200 metres from the hotel

name: Premiere Classe Avignon Courtine Gare TGV
description:
Set 1 km from Avignon Train Station, this hotel is 6 km from the city centre
It offers contemporary en suite rooms featuring an LCD TV with satellite channels.

Premiere Classe Avignon Courtine Gare TGV - Courtine Gare serves a buffet breakfast in the colourful breakfast room
Additional facilities at this hotel include free Wi-Fi access and free private parking.

The hotel is a 20-minute drive from both exit 24 on the A7 motorway and Avignon-Caumont Airport
Just 50 metres from the property, you will also find a bus stop with direct links to the city centre.

name: Hotel Le Golfe
description:
Situated on the fishing port of Cassis, Hotel Le Golfe is just 400 metres from the sandy beach
It features an ice-cream parlour and a shaded terrace overlooking the harbour.

A flat-screen TV is provided in each air-conditioned guest room
Some rooms feature a balcony with sea views
All of the rooms have a simple décor and a private bathroom with amenities.

Provencal cuisine, including seafood and salads, is served in the restaurant at Le Golfe hotel
A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning.

There is a Provencal market in the village every Wednesday and Friday morning
Cassis Train Station is 3 km from the hotel and Marseille is 28 km away.

name: Altera Roma Hôtel
description:
Set in an 18th-century building, next to Avignon Train Station, this 3-star family hotel is a 20-minute walk from Avignon Papal Palace and Pont d'Avignon
Altera Roma Hôtel provides free WiFi and paid private parking.

Altera Roma Hôtel features guest rooms overlooking a garden, as well as apartments and studios in an annex building for longer stays.

Free buffet breakfast is offered to all guests.

Altera Roma Hôtel boasts also a private taxi service, offering you all the essentials to discover fully the city of Avignon
Avignon-Provence Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Best Western Plus Hôtel la Rade
description:
Best Western Plus Hôtel la Rade is located 14 metres from the Cassis fishing port and the Bestouan beach
It has an all year round heated swimming pool, a hot tub and terrace that overlooks the Mediterranean Sea.

All rooms at the Hôtel La Rade are soundproofed and equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
Each room has air conditioning and free Wi-Fi
The suites have a private bathroom with a view of the Cap Canaille.

Breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room with panoramic sea views
The Best Western Plus Hôtel la Rade also provides a bar and a 24-hour reception.

Nearby leisure activities include water sports at the beach, tennis and hiking expeditions through the Calanques rock valley
Cassis town centre is just a 5-minute walk away.

Circuit Paul Ricard is 40 minutes' drive away.

name: Best Western Hotel & SPA Coeur De Cassis
description:
Located in the center of Cassis, Best Western Hotel & SPA Coeur de Cassis welcomes you 200 meters from the port and 300 meters from the beach
It offers accommodation with a view of the garden, the town and its castle, and the mythical Cap Canaille
After a great day of visiting the Calanques National Park, enjoy the calm of our hotel and relax in our SPA consisting of a hammam, sauna, experience shower and a herbal tea room with its salt wall
You can also relax on our rooftop!
With an elevator, the hotel is fully equipped to accommodate people with reduced mobility
All rooms at the Best Western Hotel & SPA Coeur De Cassis are air-conditioned and have free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a minibar
They have a private bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer
The suites and superior rooms have a Nespresso coffee machine
The buffet breakfast is served every morning in our breakfast room or on its terrace.
Our reception staff will be happy to provide you with all the useful information during your stay to make it as pleasant as possible

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Cassitel, Cassis
description:
The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Cassitel, Cassis is located opposite the Cassis fishing harbour, just a 2-minute walk from the beach and 40 minutes' drive from Circuit Paul Ricard
This hotel offers free WiFi access.

All rooms are air-conditioned and come with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

A breakfast buffet is served daily at the The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Cassitel, Cassis and there is also a lounge area
The reception is open 24-hours a day and guests can ask for information regarding their stay in Cassis.

It is a 10-minute drive from the A50 motorway and 25 km from Marseille city centre.

name: HPC Suites
description:
Offering a shared outdoor pool with a terrace and views of the sea, HPC Suites is situated in a 4000 metres² park in the centre of Cassis
Marseille is 16 km away and the nearest beach is a 10-minute walk away
Free private parking is available on site.

The property was entirely renovated in 2019
Featuring a terrace, all units include a dining area and a seating area with a flat-screen TV
There is also a kitchen, fitted with an oven and microwave
A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine
HPC Suites features free WiFi throughout the property
Towels and bed linen are offered.

Free private secure parking is available.

The port is an 8-minute walk away and many restaurants and a traditional Provençal market can be found in the neighbourhood.

You can play table tennis at the property, and the area is popular for diving and cycling
Aix-en-Provence is 35 km from HPC Suites
The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 36 km from the property.

name: Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany
description:
With views of the highest cliff in Europe and over the Mediterranean Sea, Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany is set on the beachfront in Cassis
located 30 metres away
Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.

The contemporary air-conditioned rooms at Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany are equipped a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box
Each room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer
Some rooms have a private terrace with a sea view.

During the high season, Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany has a restaurant open in summer time for dinner only and serving tapas and traditional meals
There is a lounge bar and a sun deck facing the sea
A continental breakfast is available for an extra charge and includes pastries, fruit, meat, cheese.

Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany is just a 5-minute walk from the Port of Cassis and Marseille is 24 km away
The nearest airport is Marseille Marignane, 54.5 km away
Circuit Paul Ricard is 40 minutes' drive away and Train station Gare St Charles is 32 km from the hotel
A private car park is available at a surcharge and upon availability.

name: HOTEL DES CALANQUES
description:
HOTEL DES CALANQUES is located in Cassis
No elevators available.

At the hotel, each room is equipped with a balcony
At HOTEL DES CALANQUES all rooms are fitted with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the property.

Marseille is 16 km from the accommodation, while Aix-en-Provence is 36 km from the property
The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 36 km from HOTEL DES CALANQUES.

The Private parking is located at 600m away from the property.

name: Hôtel Eden Cassis
description:
This hotel is situated in Cassis in the heart of Provence, just 450 metres from the harbour and the Mediterranean Sea
It offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi internet access.

A flat-screen TV is provided in each of the guest rooms at Hôtel Eden Cassis
They all have a private bathroom and a telephone, and some rooms include a minibar and a terrace.

breakfast is continental buffet.

Private parking is available with extra charge and guided boat rides for the Cassis calanques depart 700 metres away
The hotel is 32 km from central Marseille and Marseille-Saint-Charles Train Station.

name: Royal Cottage
description:
Located 5 minutes from the beach and Cassis port, Royal Cottage is surrounded by a tropical garden with an outdoor pool
Its rooms feature a furnished terrace.

Each air-conditioned rooms has modern décor and is equipped with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private bathroom
The duplex rooms have a sea view.

The front desk is open 24 hours a day and free private parking is available on site.

Casino Barrière de Cassis is only 300 metres from the hotel
Marseille is a 22-minute drive away.

name: Les Jardins de Cassis
description:
Set in a Mediterranean-style garden with an outdoor heated swimming pool, and featuring a relaxation area with a hot tub and sauna, this hotel is a 10-minute walk from the centre of Cassis and La Grande Mer Beach
It is located 30 minutes from Marseille and offers free WiFi and 2 free secure car parks.

The air-conditioned guest rooms at Les Jardins de Cassis are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
All rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer and some feature a balcony or a terrace.

A continental buffet breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room or on the terrace by the pool
Les Jardins de Cassis also features a 24-hour bar, which is situated by the pool and offers a terrace.

During their stay, guests are invited to play sports on the multipurpose sports field.

Cassis Train Station is located 1.9 km from the hotel
Circuit Paul Ricard is 35 minutes' drive away.

name: HôTEL LES VOLETS ROUGES - CASSIS
description:
Offering a sun terrace and views of the garden, HôTEL LES VOLETS ROUGES - CASSIS is an eco-friendly hotel set in Cassis
Free WiFi is provided and free private parking is available on site.

The guest rooms feature a garden view, a wardrobe and a shower.

Cassis centre is 3 km from HôTEL LES VOLETS ROUGES - CASSIS, while Marseille is 13 km and Vélodrome Stadium is 15 km away
Aix-en-Provence is 33 km away and Marseille Provence Airport is 33 km from the property.

name: Hostellerie de la Crémaillère
description:
Situated in a renovated 18th-century Provençal country house, this hotel is 7 km from the sea and features a bar, a restaurant and a shaded terrace where you can enjoy the breakfast during warmer months.

Provided with an LCD TV and free toiletries, each room at Hostellerie de la Crémaillère includes a telephone, a wardrobe and a desk.

Fresh fruit, cereal, pastries, hot drinks and orange juices are served for breakfast
Traditional dishes prepared with seasonal products are proposed for lunch and dinners, and sometimes jazz music nights are organised.

Several restaurants and supermarkets are 500 metres away and many shops and museums can be found in Aubagne, which is a 10-minute drive away
The Bus Station is 200 metres away and Cassis is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Moxy La Ciotat
description:
Moxy La Ciotat has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, bar, a shared lounge and terrace in La Ciotat
Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the hotel.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Hebrew, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Marseille is 21 km from Moxy La Ciotat, while Cassis is 5 km from the property
The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 41 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel Les Roches Blanches Cassis
description:
Providing free WiFi, Hôtel Les Roches Blanches Cassis is situated 1 km from the centre of Cassis
This 5-star hotel offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a restaurant
Cap Canaille is 6 km away.

The rooms and suites feature a coffee machine and kettle, while some also have a terrace
The private bathroom has a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel Les Roches Blanches Cassis.

With staff speaking English and French, advice is available at the reception
Marseille Provence Airport is 48 km away.

name: Le Jardin d'Emile
description:
This typical Provence-style house is a 5-minute walk from Cassis's port
It offers en suite accommodations with either views of the Bestouan beach or the garden with old pine trees
Free WiFi is included.

Le Jardin d’Emile offers individually decorated rooms, each with a different colour and atmosphere
They are all air conditioned and feature a private bathroom and a TV
Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire hotel.

Every morning, a continental breakfast is served
At lunchtime, the bar Pastis welcomes you on its outdoor terrace overlooking Cape Canaille.

Le Jardin d’Emile hotel also provides luggage storage, daily newspapers and 24-hour reception.

You can follow the hiking tracks, right next to the hotel, and discover Cassis amazing landscapes
Le Jardin d’Emile is just a 30-minute drive from Marseille and 44 km from Toulon
Free private parking is available on site.

name: La Calanque de Figuerolles
description:
Located in La Ciotat, La Calanque de Figuerolles features a garden and bar
The property has a restaurant.

At the hotel, each room has a wardrobe
Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower and private toilet except the economy double room, all rooms at La Calanque de Figuerolles also feature a terrace.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

You can play table tennis at the accommodation.

Public parking is available 100 metres from the property, accessible via stairs
Marseille is 23 km from La Calanque de Figuerolles, while Aix-en-Provence is 42 km from the property
The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 43 km from the property.

name: Hotel Restaurant Miramar L'orchidée
description:
This family-run hotel is ideally located on the sea side and faces the main sandy beach of La Ciotat
It offers a terrace
Some rooms at the Hotel Miramar offer sea views.

Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a private bathroom and a TV
Free WiFi access is available.

The Orchidée restaurant serves fine fish specialties and other traditional dishes with regional wine
The meal can be enjoyed in the dining room with panoramic view of the Baie de la Ciotat
Guests then can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar.

Free private parking is provided
It is a 30-minute drive to Marseille and a 1-hour drive from its airport
It also has a close access to Corniche des Crêtes.

name: Hôtel La Croix de Malte
description:
Set in a quiet location in Ciotat town centre, this 2-star hotel is opposite the port and 300 metres from the beach
Guests can relax on the shaded terrace, which leads onto the garden.

Free Wi-Fi access and an LCD TV are featured in the rooms at Hôtel La Croix de Malte
Some rooms have a balcony, views of the sea or garden, or air conditioning.

The buffet breakfast can be enjoyed in the restaurant or on the shaded terrace
Guests can also have an aperitif in the bar before sampling La Croix de Malte‘s French cuisine in the restaurant.

Private parking is available upon prior reservation for an additional charge and Marseille Airport is 60 km from the hotel
Ciotat’s main shopping street is 50 metres away and guests can also get information from the tourist office, 300 metres away.

name: Best Western Premier Hôtel du Vieux-Port
description:
Best Western Premier Vieux-Port is located on the old fishing port of La Ciotat
It offers a rooftop swimming pool overlooking the bay and a hot tub.

Decorated in a contemporary style, each of the 5 floors at this hotel has an individual colour scheme
All rooms are equipped with an LCD TV, a minibar and a modern bathroom.

Breakfast is served every day at Best Western Premier Vieux-Port
In the evening, guests can relax with a cocktail in the bar.

Opening directly onto the bay, the hotel is ideally located for exploring the area
Additional facilities include a sauna and Turkish bath
Private parking is available on site and free Wi-Fi access is provided
Circuit Paul Ricard is 35 minutes' drive away.

name: Best Western Gemenos en Provence
description:
This modern hotel is located between the heathland and the Mediterranean, just 5 minutes from Aubagne.

Full of light and decorated in a Provençal style, the hotel is new and fully air conditioned.

Here, you are only a quarter of an hour away from the sea and the vibrant city of Marseille, the Castellet circuit and Cassis, with its mesmerising rocky inlets
Close to the hotel you can play tennis and go riding, fishing, climbing and even diving.

name: Hotel SPA Plage St Jean
description:
Hotel Plage St Jean is located in the heart of Saint Jean, 50 metres from the beach
The rooms were fully renovated in January 2019 and have a private shower room, air-conditioning, satellite TV and free WiFi.

Plage St Jean serves drinks in its cosy bar
For afternoon and evening meals, it is located near a variety of restaurants.

The property features a covered and heated relaxation area that includes a swimming pool, sauna and hot tub.

Guests of the Hotel Plage St Jean can enjoy water sports and tennis nearby.

name: Kyriad Direct Marseille Est La Valentine
description:
Kyriad Direct Marseille Est La Valentine is located in La Penne-sur-Huveaune, between Marseille and Aubagne
It is easily accessible by the A50 motorway
It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi access.

Guest rooms at Kyriad Direct Marseille Est La Valentine are equipped with a private bathroom and cable TV.

A full breakfast buffet of pastries and cold meat is served daily
You can also try the contemporary French cuisine of the starter and dessert buffet in the restaurant.

The Kyriad Direct Marseille Est La Valentine provides free private parking
Marseille city centre is just a 15-minute drive away while Circuit Paul Ricard is a 40-minute drive from the property.

name: Appart' Hotel La Girafe Marseille Est - Porte d'Aubagne
description:
Apparthotel La Girafe Marseille Est is set in La Penne-sur-Huveaune, 11 km from Marseille and 15 km from the Calanques National Park
The hotel has a sun terrace and views of the garden, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar
Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and free secure private parking is available on site.

Each room at this hotel is individually decorated and features air conditioning and a flat-screen TV
Certain rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day
A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms
All rooms include a private bathroom.

You will find a laundry room at the property.

Cassis is 8 km from Apparthotel La Girafe Marseille Est, while Toulon is 38 km away
Marseille Sallette Golf club is a 3 km drive away
The Villasospa Spa is located 350m away
Marseille Provence Airport is 29 km from the property.

name: B&B HOTEL Aubagne Gémenos
description:
B&B HOTEL Aubagne Gémenos is located 4 km from Aubagne and 12 km from the Castellet racing circuit
Its rooms are air-conditioned and soundproofed with free WiFi internet access.

All of the rooms also have a private shower and a TV with TNT channels
They are decorated in a traditional style.

The reception is open 24 hours a day and you will also find a cold drinks machine in the lobby.

Cassis is a 25-minute drive away and the A50 motorway is just 2.5 km away
Free parking is available on site.

name: Hôtel Hermès
description:
Hôtel Hermès is just 35 metres from the Vieux Port in central Marseilles
It offers a roof-top terrace with panoramic views of the harbour and the city, and free Wi-Fi.

Each guest room at the Hermès has a partial view of the Vieux Port
They are soundproofed and feature flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and private bathrooms.

The hotel staff are available to assist you 24 hours a day
Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning, served in the dining room.

The Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro Station is just a 3-minute walk from the Hermès hotel
The Saint Charles SNCF Train Station is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel Life Marseille VP - Vieux Port
description:
Hôtel Life Marseille VP - Vieux Port is set in an 18th-century stone building opposite the Vieux Port in Marseille's city centre
Recently renovated It offers panoramic harbour views and rooms with free WiFi
The property features a lift that runs from the first floor and staircase access to reception and the first floor.

Each guest room at Life is soundproofed, air conditioned and has a view of the harbour or the courtyard
There is a flat-screen satellite TV
The modern bathrooms are equipped with a bath or a shower and eco-friendly toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast, served in the lobby
The staff at Life are available to assist you 24 hours a day.

The lobby is also a place where you can meet other guests staying at the hotel.

Life Hotel is 100 metres from the Vieux-Port Metro Station and Marseille's main road, La Canebière
The Saint Charles SNCF Station is a 15-minute walk away.

name: ibis La Ciotat
description:
ibis La Ciotat hotel is located 3 km from the centre of La Ciotat and 30 minutes' drive from Circuit Paul Ricard
The hotel features a view of the Mediterranean and free WiFi internet access.

All the comfortable guestrooms feature air-conditioning and a TV.
