A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away
Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

The ibis La Ciotat hotel also has a swimming pool, restaurant, bar and outdoor terrace.

name: Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles
description:
Set in Marseille, just a 5-minute walk from Marseille Saint Charles Train Station, Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles features a garden and free WiFi
The hotel is easily accessible from A7 highway
Secured parking is provided but parking spots are limited and cannot be booked in advance.

The air-conditioned guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV, desk and a private bathroom with a bath.

Speaking English and French, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Marseille's Old Port is 1.1 km from the accommodation and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 20 minutes' walk away
The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 20 km from Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles.

name: ibis Styles Marseille Gare Saint-Charles
description:
Hôtel ibis Styles Marseille Gare Saint-Charles is located opposite St-Charles SNCF Train Station and is an 8-minute walk from the Old Port
Palais des Congrès, Marseille Exhibition Centre and the Vélodrome Stadium are an 8-minute metro ride away and the hotel offers free WiFi access.

Rooms at Hôtel ibis Styles Marseille Gare Saint-Charles are decorated in a contemporary style and feature an LCD TV with satellite channels
Each one is accessed by a lift, air-conditioned and has an en suite bathroom with a shower
Some rooms are available for guests with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast of fresh croissants and fruit juice is offered every morning at Hôtel ibis Styles Marseille Gare Saint-Charles and is served in the dining room or on the terrace
The hotel also has a bar where guests can enjoy an aperitif before dining in the nearby restaurants.

Additional hotel facilities include luggage storage at reception
There is a paid car park at the St-Charles SNCF Train Station
Notre Dame de la Garde is 2.5 km away.

name: Hôtel Carré Vieux Port
description:
Hôtel Carré Vieux Port is located in central Marseille, 30 metres from the Vieux Port where boats leave for the Frioul Archipelago and the Château d'If
It offers guest rooms with air conditioning, a smart TV with satellite channels and free WiFi access.

Each of the Carré Vieux Port’s guest rooms is also soundproofed and features tea and coffee making facilities
They all feature a bathroom with bathtub or shower.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room or in the comfort of your room
It includes homemade pastries and homemade bread and it is free for children aged 10 years old or younger.

The hotel's reception and bar are open 24 hours.

The Carré Vieux Port is 25 metres from La Canebière and 200 metres from Marseille’s Opera
The Pharo Palace is 700 metres away
The Tourist Information Office is within walking distance and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is just 1.5 km away
Public parking is possible nearby, at an extra cost.

name: Résidence Kley
description:
Résidence Kley has a shared lounge, terrace, water sports facilities and tennis court in Marseille
Located around 1.1 km from Joliette Metro Station, the hotel with free WiFi is also 1.3 km away from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre
The accommodation offers evening entertainment and a shared kitchen.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk
At Résidence Kley all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and the area is popular for hiking and windsurfing.

Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 1.2 km from Résidence Kley, while Vieux Port Metro station is 1.9 km from the property
The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles, an IHG Hotel
description:
Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles is opposite the train station and a 10-minute walk from the Vieux Port in Marseille’s city centre
It offers en suite rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles are soundproofed and feature a modern décor
Each is air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

A complimentary breakfast is offered and Le Mistral bar serves light meals
Guests can relax on the outdoor terrace
Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception desk and a laundry service for an additional charge.

Saint-Charles Metro (lines 1 and 2), provide direct access to Parc Chanot and the city centre
Accessible from the A7, the hotel also offers private parking for an additional fee.

name: New Hotel Le Quai - Vieux Port
description:
New Hotel Le Quai - Vieux Port is located in central Marseille, overlooking the Old Port and La Canebière shopping street
This hotel offers soundproofed rooms with air-conditioning and satellite TV
Free WiFi access is available.

Entirely renovated in 2018 and 2019, the New Hotel is decorated in a colonial style and the rooms have a desk and a private bathroom
They also have a a courtesy tray with a kettle
A bottle of water is offered upon arrival.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining room or in guest rooms
The multilingual staff can also provide information on the local area at the 24-hour reception.

Famous landmarks close to the hotel include Notre Dame de la Garde, the Vieille Charité cultural centre, MUCEM museum, Pharo Palace and Saint Victor's Abbey.

New Hotel Le Quai - Vieux Port is situated opposite the Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro Station and 300 metres from the Belsunce Alcazar Tramway
Chanot Exhibition Centre can be reached in 10 minutes on the metro
The Panier district is just a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel Maison Montgrand - Vieux Port
description:
Ideally located in the centre of Marseille, Hôtel Maison Montgrand - Vieux Port offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace
The property has a bar, as well as a restaurant serving French cuisine
The accommodation provides room service, and luggage storage for guests.

All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV
With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, some units at Hôtel Maison Montgrand - Vieux Port also have a city view
At the accommodation all rooms include bed linen and towels.

A continental, American or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Non-stop assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak Arabic, English, Spanish and French.

Popular points of interest near Hôtel Maison Montgrand - Vieux Port include Saint-Ferreol Street, Vieux Port Metro station and Castellane Metro Station
The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

name: Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port
description:
Well located in the centre of Marseille, Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port provides air-conditioned rooms, free bikes, free WiFi and a shared lounge
Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar
The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe
At the hotel, each room comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Guests at Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Staff speak English, Spanish and French at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Vieux Port Metro station, Saint-Ferreol Street and Castellane Metro Station
The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port.

name: Hotel Terminus Saint-Charles
description:
The Hotel Terminus is located opposite the Saint-Charles Train Station in central Marseille
Just a 10-minute walk from the Vieux Port, it offers en-suite accommodation with free WiFi.

Each room at the Hotel Terminus Saint-Charles is equipped with a flat-screen TV, satellite channels and air conditioning.

A continental breakfast buffet is served daily
Local newspapers are at guests's disposal
Staff can offer are local tourist information at the 24-hour reception
Luggage storage is available.

The Hotel Terminus is a 5-minute walk from the World Trade Centre and the Canebiere Garibaldi Tram stop
It is easily accessible by the A7 motorway and an airport shuttle service is available at the train station.

name: Les Appartements de Babel République
description:
Situated conveniently in the centre of Marseille, Les Appartements de Babel République offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant
Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around less than 1 km from Vieux Port Metro station, a 8-minute walk from Joliette Metro Station and less than 1 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre
The accommodation features evening entertainment and a concierge service.

The units come with a fridge, dishwasher, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe
Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at the hotel also have a city view
At Les Appartements de Babel République all rooms come with a seating area.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, Saint-Ferreol Street and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station
The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from Les Appartements de Babel République.

name: Hôtel Marsiho by HappyCulture - ex Best Western Marseille
description:
Located in the centre of Marseille, Hôtel Marsiho by HappyCulture - ex Best Western Marseille offers 51 rooms with modern décor and free WiFi
With a 24-hour reception, it is just a 5-minute walk from the Old Port of Marseille.

All the soundproofed rooms feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV
Each also includes a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

Each morning, the property offers a buffet breakfast to be enjoyed on site.

Guests can enjoy a mobile charging station and a Nespresso coffee machine in the public area.

La Canebière is just 350 metres from the hotel and Saint-Charles Train Station is 800 metres away.

name: Saint Ferréol
description:
Saint Ferréol is located on a pedestrian street in the centre of Marseille, a 5-minute walk from the Old Port
free WiFi access.

The soundproofed rooms at Hotel Saint Ferréol are equipped with a telephone, cable TV and private bathroom
Most have a bath and some have a walk-in shower
The reception is accessed via a staircase and from the first floor the rooms are lift accessible.

An express breakfast is available, which includes fresh orange juice, a hot drink and a croissant
Fresh drinks are available throughout the day on request.

The multilingual staff at Saint Ferréol Hotel is available to recommend nearby restaurants
Additional services and facilities at Saint Ferréol include a 24-hour reception desk, business centre with PC and free newspapers.

Saint Ferréol is 500 metres from Vieux-Port Hôtel de Ville Metro (line 1) and Notre Dame du Mont Cours Julien Metro (line 2)
Saint-Charles Train Station is 1.5 km away
Charles de Gaulle car park is 4 minutes' walk away.

name: Hôtel Le Mistral
description:
Located just 50 metres from Point Rouge Beach, this hotel is a 10-minute drive from the Stade Vélodrome football stadium
It offers free newspapers and free Wi-Fi, just 20-minutes from the city centre.

An LCD TV and a work desk feature in the individually-decorated rooms at Hôtel Le Mistral
All rooms are air-conditioned and some have a private bathroom with complementary toiletries.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the colourful breakfast room or in the comfort of guest rooms
Le Mistral also has a bar where guests can relax after a day of sightseeing.

Free public parking is available near the hotel and Vieille Chapelle Bus Stop is directly opposite the property
Guests can also use the taxi rank next to Mistral to access Marseille’s facilities and sights.

name: Hotel Le M
description:
Well set in the Castellane et Préfecture district of Marseille, Hotel Le M is located 2.7 km from Plage des Catalans, 600 metres from Castellane Metro Station and 500 metres from Saint-Ferreol Street
Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi
The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests.

The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle
Every room is equipped with a safety deposit box and selected rooms include city views
All units in Hotel Le M are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Le M include Vieux Port Metro station, Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station
The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Belle-Vue Vieux-Port
description:
Located on Marseille Vieux Port, Hotel Belle-Vue Vieux-Port is an eco-friendly hotel offering views of the Notre-Dame de la Garde, Saint Jean Fort and Pharo Garden
Set in a typical Marseillaise building, it has a cocktail bar and an wrought-iron central staircase dating from 1900
Free WiFi access is available.

Each room at the Hotel Belle-Vue is also equipped with air-conditioning and a flat-screen satellite TV, and most have large windows with views of the port
The private bathrooms have a hairdryer and either a shower or a bathtub
Ironing facilities are available.

A continental breakfast is provided daily and can be enjoyed in the guest rooms
The hotel’s restaurant serves traditional cuisine from the south of France
La Caravelle cocktail bar has a balcony where guests can enjoy a drink.

The 24-hour reception offers local tourist information and newspapers are available every morning.

Hotel Belle-Vue Vieux-Port is just 250 metres from the Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro station, which provides direct access to the Saint Charles Train Station.

name: Villages Clubs du Soleil - MARSEILLE
description:
Offering a seasonal outdoor pool, a restaurant and a children's playground, Villages Clubs du Soleil - MARSEILLE is located in Marseille, 1.8 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station
Free WiFi is provided
Free private parking is available on site.

The guest rooms feature a desk and a private bathroom with a shower.

There is a free shuttle service at the property to Palais Longchamps
Guests can play table tennis and darts on site.

Palais du Pharo is 4.7 km from Villages Clubs du Soleil - MARSEILLE, while Velodrome Stadium is 6 km away
The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 30 minutes' drive away.

name: Kyriad Marseille Palais Des Congrès – Vélodrome
description:
Located in 1 km from the Orange Velodrome in South Marseille, the Kyriad Marseille Palais Des Congrès – Vélodrome has air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi, Canal+ and satellite TV.

The restaurant on site serves a buffet breakfast and traditional French cuisine for lunch and dinner
Guests can relax in the evenings in the hotel’s spacious bar.

The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and meeting facilities.

Kyriad Marseille Palais Des Congrès – Vélodrome is 3 km from Marsaille's Vieux Port and 2km from the nearest beach
A car park is available at the hotel.

name: ibis Styles Marseille Vieux Port
description:
Ibis Styles Marseille Vieux Port is a hotel set in central Marseille, 90 metres from La Canebière and 5-minutes’ walk from the Vieux-Port where ferry rides can be enjoyed around the calanques and the Frioul Islands
Free Wi-Fi is provided.

Each air-conditioned room features a table, flat-screen TV and private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is available in the mornings.

The hotel is situated 400 metres from Noailles metro station and a 5-minute walk from Vieux-Port metro station
Parc Chanot and Orange Vélodrome Stadium can be accessed within 15 minutes on public transport
Paid public parking is also a 5-minute walk away.

name: NH Collection Marseille
description:
Featuring a cocktail bar, garden and a fitness centre on the 6th floor, NH Collection Marseille is located in the new business and leisure district of Marseille, La Joliette
Located between the port and the city centre, the building was inaugurated by Napoleon III in 1864 and preserves its original style.

Rooms at NH Collection Marseille feature elegant décor and offer an electric kettle, coffee machine and private bathroom.

Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, which serves local and international dishes with a variety of local cheeses and wines.Guests can also find a cocktail bar located close to the hotel reception, as well as a garden in the centre of the hotel.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property as well as 4 meeting rooms.

Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 900 metres from NH Collection Marseille, while Palais du Pharo is 1.4 km away
The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 19 km from NH Collection Marseille.

name: B&B HOTEL Marseille Centre Vieux Port
description:
Just 500 metres from the Old Port, B&B HOTEL Marseille Centre Vieux Port offers modern accommodation in the heart of Marseille
It features a 24-hour reception, a shared lounge with Canal+ on the TV, and free WiFi available throughout.

The hotel’s rooms are all equipped with a flat-screen TV .They have a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer.

Breakfast is served Monday to Friday from 6:30 am
to 10 am, and weekends from 7:30 a.m
to 10:30 a.m.

After a day of sightseeing, guests can relax at the hotel’s bar
Books and board games are provided on site
A public transportation tickets can be purchased at the reception upon request.

Notre-Dame de la Garde Sight is just 2.2 km away and the Palais du Faro Exhibition Centre is 2 km away
Marseille Saint-Charles is a 15-minute walk away while Marseille-Marignane Airport is 25 km away.

name: Hôtel Saint Louis - Vieux Port
description:
Hôtel Saint Louis - Vieux Port was fully renovated in 2019 and is located in central Marseille, 400 metres from the Old Port
Set in a semi-pedestrian street in the district of Noailles, the Hôtel Saint Louis - Vieux Port has a 24-hour reception and free WiFi access.

It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed guest rooms with a flat-screen TV, work desk and telephone
Every room has a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries
The front rooms feature a balcony overlooking the Cours Saint-Louis and the ones located in the back of the hotel offer views of courtyards and roof tops.

Guests can enjoy a daily continental breakfast in the hotel restaurant "Le Petit Saint Louis", which is also open for lunches and dinners
There is also a bar.

Guests can visit Opéra de Marseille and La Canebière, located within 500 metres of the property.

name: Le Rhul
description:
Directly overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, Le Rhul is located on the Corniche in Marseilles
It features a panoramic terrace and spacious air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms.

Each of the guest rooms at the hotel Le Rhul is equipped with a flat-screen TV
Most rooms also have sea views.

At the hotel restaurant, guests can enjoy local specialities for lunch and dinner
Breakfast is served in the breakfast room.

Free WiFi access is available in the hotel’s public areas and hotel staff are available to assist you 24 hours a day.

The Vieux Port (old port) and the Pharo are just a 20-minute walk from Le Rhul hotel, and the beaches are a short walk away
Public parking is available nearby.

name: Alex Hotel & Spa
description:
Alex Hotel & Spa is located in Marseille
Featuring a terrace, this boutique hotel is a 15-minute walk from Marseille’s old port and 200 metres from Saint-Charles Metro Station
Free WiFi access is available throughout.

Each room here will provide you with a TV, an electric kettle and air conditioning
Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries
You can enjoy city views from the rooms
Extras include an iPod dock and a desk.

At Alex Hotel & Spa you will find a 24-hour front desk and a patio
Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, a shared lounge and luggage storage
For an additional fee guests can also relax in the on site spa.

The hotel is 2 km from the MUCEM Museum and 500 metres from La Canebière
Marseille Provence Airport is 25 km away, and Saint-Charles Train Station is 280 metres from the hotel.

name: Boutique Hôtel Entraigues
description:
Set in Uzès in the Languedoc-Roussillon Region, 32 km from Avignon, Boutique Hôtel Entraigues features an outdoor pool
The hotel has a sun terrace and views of the city
Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site for an extra charge, subject to availability.

The rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and tea and coffee making facilities
Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day, a terrace or a patio.

A variety of other restaurants are available within a 2-minute walk.

An array of activities are offered in the area, such as golfing and cycling
Nîmes is 20 km from Hôtel Entraigues, while Arles is 41 km away
Avignon-Provence Airport is 40 km from the property.

name: La Maison d'Uzès Relais & Châteaux
description:
Located in the centre of Uzès’ Old Town, La Maison d'Uzès Relais & Châteaux is set in a listed building
The hotel features a hammam and Roman bath facilities free for 30 minutes when booking a treatment
Spa treatments from L'Occitane en Provence are also available at an additional cost.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and an iPad
The private bathrooms offer a bath or shower and free toiletries.

The hotel’s on-site restaurant serves modern French cuisine and local specialties
Additional restaurants and bars can be found within 200 metres.

La Maison d'Uzès Relais & Châteaux is situated 25 km from Nîmes Train Station
Avignon Airport can be reached in 1 hour by car.

name: La Taverne
description:
La Taverne is located in Uzès, on a pedestrian street just a 2-minute walk from the Duché Castle
The tourist office is 100 metres from the property and Haribo Museum is 3 km away.

The rooms at La Taverne are decorated in a contemporary style and include free WiFi access
Each one also features an LCD TV, air conditioning and an en suite bathroom with free toiletries.

Breakfast is available every morning in the breakfast room
Additional facilities at the hotel include luggage storage and newspapers at reception.

Other local activities include driving the 14 km to Pond du Gard or visiting Nimes, which is a 30-minute drive away
The hotel is situated next to Uzès Tourist Office and the Town Hall.

The bedrooms are either located on an upper floor and accessible by stairs or on the ground floor in the annex.

The reception opens from 4 p.m
to 7 p.m
each day
The hotel haven't the night receptionist.

name: Hotel Restaurant Le Clos De Pradines
description:
The Clos de Pradines is located in Saint Quentin la Poterie, close to Nîmes, Alès and Avignon
The property offers a terrace with a panoramic view of the Uzès Valley and the outdoor swimming pool
Free WiFi is available in public areas.

The air-conditioned guest rooms come with a marble en-suite bathroom and a TV
Some rooms have a terrace or balcony and a view.

The Clos de Pradines also features a restaurant 'La Table du Clos'
This restaurant has been featured in the Michelin Guide and serves regional gastronomic cuisine.

A hot tub and a sauna are available at an extra charge and upon reservation.

name: Logis Hotel Restaurant Uzès Pont du Gard
description:
Logis Hotel Restaurant Uzès Pont du Gard offers comfortable and well-equipped rooms, just a 10-minute walk from the centre
Enjoy access to an outdoor swimming pool, 2 tennis courts and an excellent restaurant.

All rooms at the Logis Hotel Restaurant Uzès Pont du Gard feature satellite TV and en suite bathroom facilities
Stay in touch using the free, unlimited Wi-Fi.

The hotel restaurant serves traditional French cuisine and offers a view over the swimming pool
In the summertime you can dine on the shady outdoor terrace.

Logis Hotel Restaurant Uzès Pont du Gard is ideally placed for sightseeing in Uzès
The Place aux Herbes and the Tour Fenestrelle are both nearby.

name: Château d'Arpaillargues - TERITORIA
description:
With an outdoor swimming pool and a hot tub, this 18th-century château is located 4 km from the medieval city of Uzes and a 25-minute drive from the Pont de Gard
The château is surrounded by gardens and a tennis court is available on site
Free WiFi is available.

The elegant, air-conditioned guestrooms offer a view of the gardens and are equipped with a flat-screen TV and minibar
Each room has an en suite bathroom with a bathrobe and complimentary toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning and can be enjoyed on the terrace during the summer months
For evening meals, guests are invited to sample regional cuisine in the hotel’s historical dining room.

Relaxation activities available at the hotel include table tennis and an area for playing boules
Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hostellerie Provençale
description:
Situated in the centre of Uzès, you will enjoy the charms of this typical Provence region style hotel
The Hostellerie Provençale and its staff are pleased to welcome you.

The Hostellerie Provençale is an 300 year old house with both the charms of an old house and the modernism of the 21st century.

From the terrace where you can enjoy your breakfast, you can see Uzès and its surroundings
The restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes and dishes made with fresh ingredients from the market.

A regional market takes place at the Place aux Herbes, beside the hotel
You can visit the Pont du Gard, the Maison Carrée in Nîmes and the Palais des Papes in Avignon.

A public car park is located a 5-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Le Saint-Geniès
description:
This family-run hotel sits in a garden, in a quiet residential area, 1.5 km from Uzès historical centre
It has an outdoor pool and offers nice views over the countryside.

Hotel Le Saint-Geniès provides cosy soundproofed rooms with air conditioning and flat-screen cable TV
The private bathrooms feature hairdryers and showers.

A full buffet breakfast is available to order every morning and can be enjoyed on the terrace
Guests can also relax on the sun terrace by the pool.

The Saint-Geniès provides free Wi-Fi access in its guest rooms
It is 30 km from Nîmes, 16 km from the Pont du Gard and a 30-minute drive from Avignon
Free public parking is available on site.

name: Château de Collias
description:
Situated in Collias, 23 km from Parc Expo Nîmes, Château de Collias features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace
Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property
Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer
Château de Collias provides some rooms with city views, and rooms are equipped with a coffee machine
At the accommodation all rooms include bed linen and towels.

An American, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast is available each morning at the property.

You can play billiards at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling.

Avignon Central Station is 32 km from Château de Collias, while Papal Palace is 33 km from the property
The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 27 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Restaurant Le Gardon - Pont du Gard
description:
Situated in Collias, close to the Duchy of Uzès and the magnificent Pont du Gard, Hotel Restaurant Le Gardon offers modern and comfortable bedrooms, an outdoor swimming pool with sun lounges, a paddling pool and a terrace
Free WiFi and free private parking are provided on site.

Serviced by a lift, all of the air-conditioned rooms feature an LCD TV with satellite channels, tea and coffee making facilities, and a private bathroom with hairdryer
Some of them are also suitable for guests with reduced mobility
Family rooms/suites and adjoined rooms are available.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining room or on the terrace which opens onto the garden
The onsite restaurant is open from Monday to Saturday evening (reservation required in mid-season: October until May) and offers local cuisine.

Hotel Restaurant Le Gardon is accessible via the A9 motorway or Nimes Airport.
guests with dogs +15 kg have to book a suite or a big room .
sanitary pass or test -72h is mendatory ( pass sanitaire ou test -72h obligatoire )

name: Le Castellas Hôtel & Spa - Teritoria
description:
Hostellerie Le Castellas Les Collectionneurs is a 17th-century residence located in the heart of Collias
Its enclosed courtyard is full of trees and flowers and has an outdoor heated swimming pool with a counter-current swimming option.

Guest rooms are individually decorated in a Baroque, modern or a chic style
Free WiFi access and a flat-screen TV are both provided.

On the terrace, you can enjoy lunch under the wisteria in the garden
You can also savour regional cuisine for dinner or enjoy wine-tasting on site.

Hostellerie le Castellas has an outdoor hot tub, a Wellness Center and a hammam
The full list of treatments offered can be seen on the hotel's website.

The hotel is located between Nimes and Avignon in the Gorges du Gardon, and between Le Pont du Gard and Uzes, near the river.

name: L'Enclos des Lauriers Roses
description:
Situated in Cabrières, 15 km from Parc Expo Nîmes, L'Enclos des Lauriers Roses features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant
The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi
The property is non-smoking and is located 32 km from Avignon Central Station.

At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV
At L'Enclos des Lauriers Roses the rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Cabrières, like hiking, fishing and cycling.

Papal Palace is 33 km from L'Enclos des Lauriers Roses, while Avignon TGV Train Station is 34 km from the property
The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: Le Vieux Castillon
description:
Le Vieux Castillon is located in the heart the small medieval village of Castillon-du-Gard, a 35-minute drive from Nîmes and Avignon
The famous Pont du Gard is 3.5 km away
The hotel offers an heated outdoor pool with a view of the nearby area and a spa.

This property has 34 rooms, split across 2 buildings
The rooms were renovated between 2015 and 2017
All the rooms are fitted with all the modern comfort including air conditioning, satellite television a coffee machine
A minibar with alcohol and soft drinks is available for an extra charge.

The restaurant is decorated with imposing wooden beams and offers refined cuisine with regional accents.

There are many patios and terraces for guests to enjoy.

The property is a 50-minute drive from Avignon-Provence Airport and a 35-minute drive from both Avignon TGV Train Station and Nîmes Train Station.

name: Domaine de Privadière
description:
Set in Garrigues-et-Sainte-Eulalie, 34 km from Parc Expo Nîmes, Domaine de Privadière offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace
With a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom
The accommodation provides room service and luggage storage space for guests.

The units at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box
At Domaine de Privadière every room includes bed linen and towels.

Speaking English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Avignon Central Station is 48 km from the accommodation, while Papal Palace is 50 km away
The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes, 33 km from Domaine de Privadière, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Soko Hotels-Pont du Gard
description:
Located in Remoulins, 23 km from Avignon Central Station, Soko Hotels-Pont du Gard provides accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a garden
Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a terrace and a bar
The accommodation features a shared kitchen and a concierge service for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower
Free WiFi is available to all guests, while selected rooms include a balcony.

At Soko Hotels-Pont du Gard you will find a restaurant serving French cuisine
Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Remoulins, like cycling.

Papal Palace is 25 km from Soko Hotels-Pont du Gard, while Avignon TGV Train Station is 26 km away
The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 28 km from the hotel.

name: La Bégude Saint-Pierre
description:
Located in Vers-Pont-du-Gard, La Bégude Saint-Pierre sits in a 17th-century building with a 14-hectare domain with olive trees
It features an outdoor swimming pool, a lounge bar and a restaurant.

The air-conditioned guest rooms offer a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar
Some rooms have a private terrace with views of the pool
The bathroom features a bathtub or shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries from Durance.

A range of pastries and hot drinks is served for breakfast as a buffet or to be enjoyed in the comfort of guest rooms
Guests can enjoy the inventive cuisine served at the restaurant offering views of the pool and the garden.

Pont du Gard is 2 km away, Uzès is 10 km away and Nîmes is 22 km from the property.Avignon Train Station is a 30-minute drive away
There is access to A9 Motorway, just a 5-minute drive away.

name: Domaine de Panery
description:
Set in Pouzilhac, 27 km from Avignon Central Station, Domaine de Panery offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden
Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared lounge and room service, along with free WiFi
The hotel has a terrace and a hammam.

Certain rooms also offer a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at the hotel.

The area is popular for hiking, and bike hire is available at Domaine de Panery.

Papal Palace is 29 km from the accommodation, while Avignon TGV Train Station is 29 km from the property
The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 36 km from Domaine de Panery.

name: Les Glycines
description:
Set in Remoulins, Les Glycines has a terrace, bar and free WiFi
The property is situated 3.7 km from Pont du Gard
Guests can enjoy a selection of French cuisine in the in-house restaurant
Free bicycle storage is available.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a wardrobe
Each room has a private bathroom
At Les Glycines, rooms include air conditioning and a TV.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the property.

Cycling and hiking are among the activities that guests of the accommodation can find nearby.

The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 31 km from Les Glycines.

Please note that sheets and towels are not provided for the appartment
Guests can bring their own or rent them from the property for the following additional fees:

Bed linen: 15€/bed/stay

Towels: 10€/person/stay

Cleaning (excluding dishes): 50€/end of stay

name: Royal Hôtel
description:
Set in the heart of Nîmes, Royal Hôtel features an on-site restaurant, La Bodéguita, which opens onto Assas Square
The hotel is within 3 minutes' walk of the Maison Carrée Temple and Carré d'Art Modern Art Gallery
Free WiFi access is available.

The property accepts dogs less than 10 kg .

Accessed via a staircase, every room includes air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a view over the internal patio or Assas Square
Some units feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day
Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served daily, made with a selection of fresh organic produce
You can sample Spanish cuisine and fish à la plancha in the restaurant
Tapas can be enjoyed on the bar’s outdoor terrace.

Tango evenings are organised on Assas Square during July and August
There are also regular art viewings and exhibitions held on the square.

Parc Expo Nîmes is 2.7 km from Royal Hôtel
Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport is 53 km from the property.

name: Domaine Des Escaunes
description:
The "Domaine des Escaunes" is located in the middle of the triangle Avignon-Nîmes- Uzes
This ancient Post relay is situated at the exit of the village "Sernhac" surrounded by 7 hectares of vineyards and olive trees.

The traditionally decorated rooms have a private bathroom with bath or shower and private toilet
Some of the rooms offer air conditioning and views of vineyards or the Provençal countryside.

A beautiful, elegant ancient post relay tastefully renovated
3 differents wings between the 16th and the 19th century, surface of 2000 m²
The property boasts a walled garden, swimming pool (8mX18m), pool house, terraces and secured parking with a code.

name: Best Western Marquis de la Baume
description:
Located in the centre of the historic town of Nîmes, Hôtel Marquis de la Baume is a 17th-century town house just 3.7 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 650 metres from Nîmes Arena
Free WiFi is provided.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a satellite flat-screen TV, a minibar and an electric kettle
There is a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served everyday in the comfort of guest rooms or in the interior patio, weather permitting.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

The hotel is just a 10-minute walk from the Colosseum and the Magne Tower
Public parking is available nearby.

name: Central Hotel
description:
Central Hotel is set in a renovated, 18th-century building, in the historical centre of Nimes, right behind the ancient roman site, the Porte d’Auguste
It offers soundproofed rooms with private bathrooms.

The guest rooms’ doors are decorated by a local artist
Each room is equipped with a TV and a shower.
Some rooms feature views of Nimes’ rooftops and the Magna Tower.

The Central Hotel has a private bar, and a traditional French breakfast is served every morning
Room service is also available.

Free WiFi access is provided in the Central’s common areas, and guests also have access to a luggage room
There is also 1 room suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

Central Hotel is 100 metres from a shuttle stop for Nimes Airport, and less than a 10-minute walk from the Gare de Nimes TGV Train Station
The Notre-Dame-et-Saint-Castor Cathedral is just 280 metres away.

name: greet hôtel Pont du Gard - Route d'Avignon
description:
Situated in Estézargues, 16 km from Avignon Central Station, greet hôtel Pont du Gard - Route d'Avignon features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace
Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom
The accommodation provides evening entertainment and luggage storage space.

At the hotel, rooms come with a desk
The rooms in greet hôtel Pont du Gard - Route d'Avignon are fitted with a TV and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.

Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Papal Palace is 17 km from greet hôtel Pont du Gard - Route d'Avignon, while Avignon TGV Train Station is 18 km from the property
The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 25 km from the hotel.

name: ibis budget Nimes Marguerittes - A9
description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, Ibis budget Nimes Marguerittes is located in Marguerittes, at a 10-minute drive from Nîmes’ city centre
The Pont du Gard (Ancient Roman bridge) is easy accessible via the A9 Motorway 1 km away.

The air-conditioned rooms will provide you with a flat-screen TV, a desk
The private bathrooms come with a shower.

At Ibis budget Nimes Marguerittes, you can enjoy a buffet breakfast each morning for an extra cost.

The property offers free parking
Nîmes-Alès-Camargue-Cévennes Airport is 20 km away, and Nîmes Train Station is 6.5 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Majestic
description:
Renovated in 2019, Hotel Majestic is located in Nîmes, just 320 metres from the Arenas of Nîmes and the town centre
The property is 600 metres from La Romanité Museum, 1 km from Maison Carrée and 30 km from Pont du Gard
Free WiFi is offered throughout.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels
The private bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Guests can enjoy hot or cold drinks on the hotel's patio all year round
Breakfast is served daily
The staff will be happy to offer advice on visiting the area.

The hotel is just 300 metres from the Nîme TGV train station
Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport is 52 km from the property.

name: Royal Hôtel
description:
Set in the heart of Nîmes, Royal Hôtel features an on-site restaurant, La Bodéguita, which opens onto Assas Square
The hotel is within 3 minutes' walk of the Maison Carrée Temple and Carré d'Art Modern Art Gallery
Free WiFi access is available.

The property accepts dogs less than 10 kg .

Accessed via a staircase, every room includes air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a view over the internal patio or Assas Square
Some units feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day
Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served daily, made with a selection of fresh organic produce
You can sample Spanish cuisine and fish à la plancha in the restaurant
Tapas can be enjoyed on the bar’s outdoor terrace.

Tango evenings are organised on Assas Square during July and August
There are also regular art viewings and exhibitions held on the square.

Parc Expo Nîmes is 2.7 km from Royal Hôtel
Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport is 53 km from the property.

name: SQUARE HOTEL
description:
Situated in Nîmes and with Parc Expo Nîmes reachable within 13 km, SQUARE HOTEL features a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace
This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space
Some rooms at the property have a balcony with a city view.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower
The rooms feature a wardrobe.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at SQUARE HOTEL.

Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish and French.

Arles Amphitheatre is 34 km from the accommodation, while Avignon Central Station is 43 km from the property
The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 9 km from SQUARE HOTEL.

name: Best Western Marquis de la Baume
description:
Located in the centre of the historic town of Nîmes, Hôtel Marquis de la Baume is a 17th-century town house just 3.7 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 650 metres from Nîmes Arena
Free WiFi is provided.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a satellite flat-screen TV, a minibar and an electric kettle
There is a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served everyday in the comfort of guest rooms or in the interior patio, weather permitting.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

The hotel is just a 10-minute walk from the Colosseum and the Magne Tower
Public parking is available nearby.

name: Hôtel De L'Amphithéâtre
description:
Located in the pedestrian area of Nîmes historical city centre, Hôtel De L'Amphithéâtre consists of 2 mansions dating from the 17th and 18th centuries
It is just steps from the Roman Amphitheatre and the temple Maison Carrée.

The rooms are individually and elegantly decorated and all offer a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV
Some rooms offer a view of the Place du Marché, with a fountain representing the town's symbols of a palm-tree and a crocodile.

Guests can find restaurants, cafés and shops within walking distance of the hotel
Nîmes Train Station is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Logis NIMOTEL Hôtel Cosy
description:
Nimotel is located 1 km from the A9 motorway and a 10-minute drive from central Nimes
It has 24-hour reception, a secure outdoor pool and free WiFi access.

The air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
Some rooms also feature coffee and tea making facilities.

Nimotel’s restaurant, Partage, serves a range of traditional dishes and Provencal specialities
There is also a bar and a poolside terrace where guests can relax
A buffet breakfast is available daily.

Free on-site parking is available for guests exploring the Languedoc-Roussillon region by car.

name: Hotel Cote Patio
description:
Located 900 metres from Nîmes city centre, Hotel Cote Patio is a 5-minute walk from the Arena of Nîmes and a 10-minute walk from the train station
It offers free WiFi access and a patio with outdoor furniture.

Set all around the patio, the heated rooms provide a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with satellite and cable channels
They are all decorated following different styles with warm southern colours, Art Deco or classical atmospheres.

In the summertime, a Continental breakfast including homemade jam and a variety of other breakfast foods is served on the patio
The hotel staff are happy to be of assistance to help you book a table in one of the numerous restaurants in the area.

Hôtel Cote Patio is a 5-minute walk from the airport shuttle and a 23 km from Uzès
The Cévennes National Park is just 43.5 km away
The A9 motorway is a 9-minute drive away
Arles is 33 km away.

name: Kyriad Nîmes Ouest A9
description:
Located a 10-minute drive from the centre of Nîmes, this 3-star hotel is ideally located 2 km from the exit 25 of the A9 motorway
You can browse the free 20 mbps WiFi or relax in the outdoor living areas.

Each room at Kyriad Nîmes Ouest A9 has tea and coffee-making facilities and a flat-screen TV with international channels, including Canal
Decorated in Mediterranean tones, the rooms also have an en suite bathroom with free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room or in the garden
You can also relax in the lounge bar with an aperitif before dining in the nearby restaurants.

Free private parking is available on site and Nîmes Airport is a 15-minute drive away
You may also choose to play golf at Vacquerolles or Golf Nîmes Campagne, both a 20-minute drive from the hotel
This Kyriad hotel also has a 24-hour reception.

name: SQUARE HOTEL
description:
Situated in Nîmes and with Parc Expo Nîmes reachable within 13 km, SQUARE HOTEL features a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace
This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space
Some rooms at the property have a balcony with a city view.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower
The rooms feature a wardrobe.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at SQUARE HOTEL.

Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish and French.

Arles Amphitheatre is 34 km from the accommodation, while Avignon Central Station is 43 km from the property
The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 9 km from SQUARE HOTEL.

name: Central Hotel
description:
Central Hotel is set in a renovated, 18th-century building, in the historical centre of Nimes, right behind the ancient roman site, the Porte d’Auguste
It offers soundproofed rooms with private bathrooms.

The guest rooms’ doors are decorated by a local artist
Each room is equipped with a TV and a shower.
Some rooms feature views of Nimes’ rooftops and the Magna Tower.

The Central Hotel has a private bar, and a traditional French breakfast is served every morning
Room service is also available.

Free WiFi access is provided in the Central’s common areas, and guests also have access to a luggage room
There is also 1 room suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

Central Hotel is 100 metres from a shuttle stop for Nimes Airport, and less than a 10-minute walk from the Gare de Nimes TGV Train Station
The Notre-Dame-et-Saint-Castor Cathedral is just 280 metres away.

name: ibis budget Nimes Centre Gare
description:
Located just 50 metres from Nîmes Train Station, ibis budget Nimes Centre Gare offers a 24-hour reception, luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access in the entire hotel
The city centre is a 5-minute walk away.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk and soundproofing
They are complete with an en suite bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is offered daily at the hotel
Quick drinks and snacks are also available from the on-site vending machines.

Montpellier and Le Grau-du-Roi are a 45-minute drive away
Nîmes-Alès-Carmague Airport is ideally located a 10-minute drive away and private parking is possible nearby.

name: Hotel Des Tuileries
description:
The Hotel des Tuileries is close to the center of Nîmes, near the famous Nîmes Arena and a 5-minute walk from the Court of First Instance
It offers comfortable 3-star accommodation with free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

The air-conditioned rooms are spacious and nicely decorated
They all feature cable TV, a refrigerator and storage space
Each private bathroom includes a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is prepared each morning and can be enjoyed in the breakfast room or delivered to your room.

The Old Nîmes Museum and the cathedral are a 10-minute walk from this hotel
The Musée de la Romanité is 550 meters from the hotel, and the Nîmes train station is only 350 meters away
Private parking is available nearby.

name: Novotel Atria Nimes Centre
description:
Located in Nîmes city centre, this hotel is just minutes from the train station, the Arènes Roman amphitheatre, and the town’s main square.

It features 119 air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, a bar, and 9 conference rooms.

A buffet breakfast is served daily, and French cuisine is proposed by the hotel’s restaurant
Guests are invited to relax at the bar, which offers drinks and snacks.

name: ibis Styles Nimes Gare Centre
description:
Located opposite the train station in Nimes, this hotel offers low-cost rooms with free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV
A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning and reception is open 24 hours a day.

Decorated in a contemporary style, the air-conditioned guest rooms have a flat-screen TV and radio
Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

You can enjoy a drink from the bar, which is open all day, at the ibis Styles Nimes Centre Gare
Additional facilities include newspapers and luggage storage.

The Arena of Nîmes, its historical centre and Nimes Cathedral are situated a 10-minute walk away.

name: Maison Albar Hotels L’Imperator
description:
Maison Albar Hotels L’Imperator is a luxury hotel located in the city of Nimes
Bordering the Jardin de la Fontaine, L'Imperator is less than five minutes’ walk from the Maison Carrée Roman temple and the Carrée d'Art museum
Past guests of this historic hotel include Ava Gardner, Ernest Hemingway, and Torero El Cordobes.

Rooms are in a Mediterranean style with natural stone, marble and wood
Equipped with a walk-in shower, each room also has a Smart TV with ChromeCast so you can view and share your personal content
Some rooms overlook the hotel gardens.

L'Imperator boasts a 24/7 reception desk, and has baby equipment and services for children
The Spa by CODAGE offers an indoor and outdoor pool, a Jacuzzi, a sensory shower and a hammam, as well as a full range of massages.

L’Imperator is the home of Pierre Gagnaire, an award-winning chef elected best chef in the world by his peers, and the two onsite restaurants offer guests 2 different gastronomic experiences
The Duende gourmet restaurant is the place to experience extraordinary flavours
L'Impé brasserie, situated on the Imperator’s inner patio in the shade of a Gingko Biloba tree, serves a generous and refined cuisine highlighting local produce.

The Hemingway Bar offers cocktails in a relaxed setting
A continental breakfast is served daily, or you can enjoy breakfast in your room.

A private, on-site car park is available upon reservation
Nimes TGV Train Station is less than 2 km from L'Imperator.

name: hotelF1 Nîmes Ouest
description:
Hotelf1 Nîmes Ouest is situated in Nîmes, 44 km from Montpellier and 40 km from Avignon.

Every room has a shared bathroom.Guests can purchase microfibre towels at the hotel at an extra cost of EUR 3 each.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Nîmes is 2.8 km from Hotelf1 Nîmes Ouest, while Arles is 28 km from the property
The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 41 km from the property.

name: Best Western L'Orangerie
description:
Hôtel Best Western l’Orangerie situé à Nîmes vous propose un cadre de détente et de découverte avec une localisation à 1km du centre historique de Nîmes.

L’établissement possède une piscine extérieure et certaines chambres possèdent des espaces extérieurs privatifs.
Toutes les chambres ont une salle de bain avec douche, un bureau, une armoire, une télévision écran LCD, un accès Wifi gratuit et un plateau de courtoisie en guise de bienvenue.

Un parking privé est mis à disposition gracieusement.

Vous pourrez également profiter du petit déjeuner sous forme de buffet.

À proximité de l'hôtel, vous pourrez découvrir les arènes, la maison carrée et le musée de la Romanité
Vous pourrez visiter le Pont du Gard à 24 km, Uzès à 27 km et la Camargue (à 40 km) avec les belles plages de notre région (Le Grau du Roi et les Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer).

Notre établissement accepte également votre animal de compagnie !
Pour une réservation avec un animal nous vous prions de nous contacter au 04.66.84.50.57 pour vérifier la disponibilité de nos chambres adaptées.

name: HÔTEL C SUITES chambres spacieuses
description:
Offering an outdoor pool, C Suites is a urban resort located in Nîmes just 3 km from the Arenas
This fully renovated hotel is set in a 1-hectare tree-filled park, a tennis court, and a boules court.

C Suites rooms all offer free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV with international channels as well as a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

Guests can enjoy the C Unik wine and tapas bar, situated close to the swimming pool
A large selection of wines and cigars are available.

At C Suites you will find a 24-hour front desk and free parking
Conveniently located 1.5 km from the Motorway exit, the hotel is 1.5 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 5.7 km from Nimes Vacquerolles Golf Course
Within 40 km, guests can also visit, Pont du Gard, Avignon, Arles and Aigues-Mortes.

name: Hotel Concorde
description:
Located on a pedestrian street in the centre of Nîmes, Hotel Concorde offers simple guest rooms equipped with free Wi-Fi access
The ancient Roman Arena of Nîmes is 200 metres away.

Only accessed via a steep staircase, guest rooms at Hotel Concorde include a TV and a wardrobe
Some rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and toilet
Guests can borrow from a selection of books and comics from the hotel during their stay.

Restaurants, bars and grocery shops are located 50 metres from the property
Nîmes Contemporary Art Museum is 650 metres away and the Jardins de la Fontaine, a classic 17th century garden, is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Concorde.

Guests can also visit Pont Du Gard which is 30 km from the hotel
Nîmes Train Station is an 8-minute walk away and Montpellier Airport is 53 km away
Public parking is located nearby.

name: Hôtel Le Pré Galoffre
description:
Le Pré Galoffre enjoys a quiet, rural setting, a 10-minute drive from central Nimes
It has an outdoor pool and sun terrace and offers free WiFi.

The guest rooms are located in a traditional Provençal stone building
Each features air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

Hotel Galoffre provides a wide range of breakfast options daily and guests can dine by the pool in fine weather.

Le Pré Galoffre can provide a bicycle or car rental service as well as packed lunches
Hiking and horse riding are both available nearby.

Free parking is available on site for guests arriving by car
The A9 and A54 motorways are both 4 km away
Nîmes–Alès–Camargue–Cévennes Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

When booking more than 4 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

name: ibis Nîmes Ouest - A9
description:
Located right next to the exit 25 of the A9 motorway, ibis Nîmes Ouest is located 4 km from the centre of Nîmes and 12 km from Nîmes Airport
The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi.

Rooms at ibis Nîmes Ouest are air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV, radio and desk
The private bathroom has a shower or bath and all rooms can be accessed by an elevator.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away.

Please note that our restaurant is open from Monday to Friday under request
On Saturdays and Sundays, our restaurant is closed but different restaurants can welcome you around the hotel.
Snacks are available Saturdays and Sundays, there is also a bar with a terrace.

There is a 24-hour reception and daily newspapers are at the disposal of guests.

Vacquerolles Golf Course is 7 km from the hotel
The Pont du Gard Roman bridge is 25 km away and the historic town of Uzès is a 40-minute drive from the hotel
Free, secured parking is available on site.

name: Margaret - Hôtel Chouleur
description:
Conveniently set in Nîmes, Margaret - Hôtel Chouleur provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre
Among the various facilities are a garden, a terrace, as well as a bar
The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

At the hotel, each room includes a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels
Margaret - Hôtel Chouleur features certain rooms with city views, and all rooms come with a coffee machine
All units include a safety deposit box.

At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving French cuisine
Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are always at hand to help.

Parc Expo Nîmes is 14 km from Margaret - Hôtel Chouleur, while Arles Amphitheatre is 33 km away
The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes, 9 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Empire Hôtel
description:
Empire Hôtel is located in the heart of Nimes, opposite Nimes Cathedral and 800 metres from the Roman Arènes de Nîmes
Free WiFi access is available.

Each guest room at Empire Hôtel also has a TV, a desk and a private bathroom.

Nimes TGV Train Station is just 1km from the Empire
Carré d'Art Museum is 800 metres away.

name: Kyriad Nimes Centre
description:
Kyriad Nîmes Centre hotel is in the heart of Nîmes, integrated in the oldest district of the city close to the Roman arena, the Maison Carrée, museums and shopping streets
Free Wi-Fi is provided.

Air conditioning and double glazing feature in all rooms equipped with private bathroom with hairdryer
They also have a flat-screen TV and a welcome tray with tea and coffee making facilities and biscuits.

Breakfast is served each morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room
The front desk is open 24 hours a day and on-site, secure parking is available, upon reservation and subject to availability.

name: Hotel Mas De Galoffre
description:
Located a 5-minute drive from the centre of Nîmes and Camargues, Hotel Mas de Galoffre, set in a Provençal estate, is an ideal starting point to discover the region and many activities
Free on-site parking is available.

The hotel offers standard and superior rooms with bathrooms and a flat screen TV
Free Wi-Fi access is provided throughout the hotel.

For your comfort, Hotel Mas de Galoffre provides a swimming pool, tennis courts, horseback-riding and a golf course nearby.

The restaurant of the hotel proposes regional cooking that can be served on the terrace facing the garden or the swimming-pool.

name: B&B HOTEL Nîmes Centre Arènes
description:
Hôtel B&B Nimes Centre Arènes is located in Nîmes
Free WiFi access is available
It is 950 metres from the Arena of Nîmes.

Each room here will provide you with a flat-screen TV and air conditioning
Private bathroom has a shower
You can enjoy city view from the room
Extras include bed linen and ironing facilities.

Other facilities offered at the property include a vending machine.

The property is just a 2-minute walk from the Dhuoda Tram Stop which will take you to the Arena and the historical city centre.

The hotel is 50 km from Montpellier Méditerranée Airport
Limited private parking is available.

name: GOOD KNIGHT
description:
Located 5 metres rfom the Carcassonne Castle, 2.4 km from Carcassonne Cathedral, GOOD KNIGHT provides accommodation with a garden, private parking and a terrace.

Around 5 km from Pont Rouge Commercial Zone, the property is also 5 km away from Perpignan IUT University - Carcassonne Campus and offers free WiFi
Local points of interest like Cavayere Lake and Grain d’Arts Media Library are reachable within 8 km and 1.8 km, respectively.

Popular points of interest near GOOD KNIGHT include Chipie International, Grain d’Sel Media Library and Tribunal d'Instance - Magistrates Court
The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Espace Cite
description:
Hotel Espace Cite is just 200 metres from the medieval city centre of Carcassonne, and 500 metres from the Midi canal, both listed sites of UNESCO's world patrimony
This hotel offers free WiFi access.

Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and has a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the hotel's breakfast room or on the terrace weather permitting, which has views of the medieval city
Please note that Breakfast room is on the 1st floor, no lift available.

According to availability, the hotel provides private parking in an underground garage at an extra cost.

Carcassonne Train Station is 2.5 km away.

We accept your pets, with an additional charge of €12.00 per day

name: Hôtel l'Aragon
description:
Situated just 50 metres from the historic centre of Carcassone in the Aude region, Hôtel l'Aragon features free WiFi throughout the property
Free private parking is available on site, and you will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Guest rooms at Aragon are equipped with air conditioning, satellite flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Buffet breakfast is served every morning at Hôtel l'Aragon
Guests can relax in the lounge or on the terrace, weather permitting.

Basilique Saint-Nazaire is 9 minutes' walk from the hotel, and Château Comtal is 5 minutes' walk away.

name: Hotel Astoria
description:
Hotel Astoria is located in the centre of Carcassonne, 150 metres from the train station and a 20-minute walk from the medieval city
It offers free Wi-Fi internet access.

The guest rooms are located in two buildings, one with 2 floors and one located entirely on the ground floor
They are all equipped with a TV and telephone and each room has a private bathroom.

Astoria Hotel provides private parking and a garage, available with an extra cost and upon reservation
Parking in the garage is free for motorbikes and bicycles.

The courthouse is a 5-minute walk away and the Canal du Midi is 50 metres away.

name: Hotel Du Pont Vieux
description:
Ideally located at the foot of the fortified town at Carcassonne, in an 18th-century building, this hotel offers rooms overlooking the castle towers or the hotel’s garden
Free WiFi is provided
Carcassonne city centre is 600 metres away.

Each bedroom features air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries.

On sunny days you can enjoy your continental buffet breakfast amongst the flowers on the outdoor terrace.

A range of convenient services are offered at the Hotel Du Pont Vieux
These include packed lunches, as well as bicycle and car rental
The staff at the Pont Vieux are available 24-hours a day to help you organise your stay in Carcassonne.

Garage parking is available upon prior request and subject to availability
Carcassonne Train Station is 3 km away.

name: ibis Carcassonne Centre - La Cité
description:
ibis Carcassonne Centre is ideally located 1 km from Carcassonne's Train Station and only 800 metres from the medieval heart of the city
It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned guest rooms with free WiFi.

A flat-screen satellite TV and a desk are provided in each guest room
The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and toiletries.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day
Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away
Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00
A snack bar provides food throughout the day.

Part of the 17th-century Canal du Midi is 500 metres from the hotel and Jean Alary Theatre, the Fine Arts Museum and Comtal Castle are all within a 10-minute walk
Pont-Rouge Industrial Zone is 10 minutes' drive away and Carcassonne Airport is 13 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Montmorency & Spa
description:
Hotel Montmorency is located 30 metres from the entrance to the medieval city of Carcassonne
It offers free WiFi access, an outdoor pool and a hot tub
A Spa with an indoor pool and hammam is also available at an extra cost.

Rooms at Hotel Montmorency are equipped with a telephone, LCD TV and private bathroom with a bath
Some rooms are air-conditioned.

Guests can relax with a drink in Montmorency’s bar and enjoy the view from its panoramic terrace
Snacking options are available.

Montmorency Hotel is 60 km from Narbonne and 70 km from Castres
Private parking is available for a supplement
Carcassonne Train Station is a 10-minute drive away.

name: SOWELL HOTELS Les Chevaliers
description:
Set a 2-minute walk from the Aude river and featuring views of the Pont Vieux bridge, SOWELL HOTELS Les Chevaliers offers accommodation with free WiFi in Carcassonne
The medieval city is just a 10-minute walk away.

Some units at the property feature a terrace with a garden view or a view of the medieval city.

A buffet breakfast is served in the morning
The restaurant offers traditional cuisine and local specialities
Guests can also enjoy a drink on the terrace, which offers views of the medieval city.

Speaking Spanish and English at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area.

The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Hôtel du Château & Spa - Teritoria
description:
Hôtel Du Chateau - Les Collectionneurs is 30 metres from the entrance of the medieval Cité de Carcassonne
It features free access to an outdoor pool, and a spa with an indoor pool, hot tub and hammam available for an additional charge
Free WiFi access is available.

The guest rooms at Hôtel Du Chateau are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV
Each room or suite has a private bathroom.

You can enjoy a drink in the panoramic bar, which offers view of the city
Snacking options are available and guests can take cooking classes upon request.

The hotel also has a 24-hour reception and private parking.

The Hôtel Du Chateau is within 300 metres of the N113 motorway exit and the Basilica of Saint Nazaire is 7 minutes' walk away
Saint Celse is just a 5-minute walk from Hôtel Du Chateau - Les Collectionneurs
Carcassonne Train Station is an 8-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel De L'octroi
description:
Hôtel De L'octroi is located 150 metres from the entrance to the medieval city of Carcassonne
It offers modern rooms with free WiFi.

Each guest room at the Hôtel de l’Octroi is soundproofed and air conditioned
They are all equipped with a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a private bathroom.

Facilities at the Hôtel de l’Octroi include a bar and an outdoor terrace
There is also an outdoor swimming pool which is open from Easter until the end of October until 20:30 each evening
The Gemology SPA is 150 metres away and offers a hammam, hot tub and massages, at a surcharge.

Snacking options are available.

L’Octroi is a 10-minute walk from the Basilica of Saint Nazaire and Saint Celse and Carcassonne Cathedral is a 20-minute walk away
Private parking is available with an extra cost
Carcassonne Train Station is an 8-minute drive away.

name: Hotel De La Bastide
description:
Hotel De La Bastide is a family-run hotel located in the centre of Carcassonne, a 5-minute walk from the train station and a 25-minute walk from the medieval city
Free public parking is possible 50 metres away.

The hotel rooms are serviced by a lift and have air-conditioning, LCD-TV and free WiFi access.

All of the rooms and common areas in the hotel are non-smoking.

The airport shuttle stops just 150 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel de la Cité & Spa MGallery
description:
Set in Carcassonne's circular walls, Hotel de la Cite Carcassonne - MGallery Collection is set in a Medieval-style chateau
The hotel features gardens and an outdoor pool with views of Saint Nazaire Basilica
Free WiFi and wired internet access is available.

Classic or Provencal-style decoration and an iPod docking station feature in all of the guest rooms at Hotel de la Cite
Some rooms have a balcony with views of the city.

Homemade pastries are served at breakfast and regional dishes are offered in the brasserie and summer restaurant
Guests can also dine at the Michelin-starred Barbacane restaurant or enjoy a cocktail in the bar.

Guests can go wine tasting in the on-site cellar or organise a river cruise at the 24-hour reception
The hotel has a shuttle service and a valet service available for guests using the private car park.

Carcassonne Train Station is 2.4 km from the property
Narbonne is 61 km away
Parking is available on site for an additional charge.

- no ipod docking station in rooms
- no brasserie and summer restaurant but an bar in the garden during summer where we can eat tapas with a view on the remparts
- no wine tasting in the on-site cellar

name: Adonis Carcassonne
description:
Adonis Carcassonne offers accommodation at the foot of the historic centre, just 350 metres from the medieval town of Carcassonne
It is a 10-minute drive from Carcassonne Airport
Free WiFi access is available.

An LCD TV with satellite channels and a private safe feature in all of the apartments and studios at Adonis Carcassonne
Each is air-conditioned and also has a kitchenette with hot plates.

Guests can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the breakfast room or on the terrace.

Private parking is available on site and guests can also rent bicycles to visit the Cathar Castles
Saint-Nazaire Basilica is a 5-minute drive from the residence.

name: Hôtel Le Parc - La Table de Franck Putelat
description:
Located 500 metres away from the medieval city of Carcassonne, Hôtel Le Parc - La Table de Franck Putelat offers free WiFi, rooms serviced by a lift and a 2-Michelin star restaurant with a terrace
Guests can enjoy a swimming pool located 850 metres away in the second hotel of the group, Hotel Pont Levis.

The air-conditioned rooms and suites feature a modern-style décor, a balcony or terrace and a flat-screen TV
The private bathroom, separate by a discrete curtain, is complete with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the restaurant or in the comfort of the guests’ rooms, with a various of products that you can choose to compose your personalized breakfast.
Gastronomic cuisine can be enjoyed in the hotel’s restaurant, which offers a modern-style décor.

Hôtel Le Parc - La Table de Franck Putelat is 8 km from Carcassonne Airport and 3 km from the main train station
The Canal du Midi is 2 km away and free private parking is available on site.

A selection of services can be suggested by our team as massages, wine tasting, romantic welcoming, rental car, ...

name: Tribe Carcassonne
description:
In the heart of the historic Bastide Saint-Louis district, at the foot of the Pont Vieux, the TRIBE CARCASSONNE hotel enjoys a privileged location to shine in the lower town and invites you to (re)discover all the secrets of the Medieval City, in a unique and elegant urban universe.
At TRIBE, nothing is left to chance, from the absolute comfort of our rooms to the sophisticated design of our living and coworking spaces.
Push the door of our coffee-shop, let yourself be tempted by one of our signature dishes or by a rooftop cocktail with a breathtaking view of the Medieval City.
Choose for a room with balcony for a fantastic view of the Medieval City, relax in our heated indoor swimming pool…
always with view of course!

name: Audotel
description:
Audotel is located in Carcassonne, within 4 km from Carcassonne's Medieval City and The Canal du Midi
Free WiFi is available throughout.

The rooms will provide you with a flat-screen TV and a desk
There is a private bathroom with a shower and a toilet
Rooms with disabled access are available.

Each morning, guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast served in the hotel's dining room
with extra fees.

The closest exit to the hotel is exit 24 off of the A61 motorway, which is just a 3-minute drive from the property outside of rush hour
The property offers free parking.

name: Hotel du Roi & Spa by SOWELL COLLECTION
description:
Hotel du Roi & Spa by SOWELL COLLECTION has a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Carcassonne
This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi
The hotel features an indoor pool and a concierge service.

The units in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine
Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer
All rooms at Hotel du Roi & Spa by SOWELL COLLECTION are fitted with a TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and American options.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Memorial House (Maison des Memoires), Carcassonne Cathedral and Comtal Castle
The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 4 km from Hotel du Roi & Spa by SOWELL COLLECTION.

name: Hôtel Le Donjon - Cœur de La Cité Médiévale
description:
Located in the heart of the medieval city of Carcassonne, Hôtel Le Donjon - Cœur de La Cité Médiévale is surrounded by the city’s ancient ramparts
The hotel features a restaurant and bar
It is divided into 2 buildings
Free WiFi is provided throughout.

With views of street or the garden, the rooms are individually decorated and include a flat-screen TV
They overlook either the citadel or the hotel’s garden.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel
Le Donjon’s restaurant serves traditional French cuisine and there is also a cocktail bar where guests are invited to relax in the evening.

The hotel has a 24-hour reception and room service is available upon request
A dry-cleaning and laundry service is also provided at the hotel.

Le Donjon is located 2.4 km from Carcassonne Train Station
The Basilica of Saint-Nazaire is a 2-minute walk from the hotel and the Château Comtal is less than 100 metres away.

name: Hôtel La Bastide Saint Martin
description:
La Bastide Saint Martin is set 5 km from the centre and the fortified city of Carcassonne and the Canal du Midi and offers free WiFi access and air-conditioned rooms
Guests are free to relax by the seasonal heated outdoor pool or in the surrounding garden.

Views of the garden or swimming pool are offered in all guest rooms at La Bastide Saint Martin
Each en suite room is air-conditioned and features a flat-screen TV, and some rooms provide direct access to the swimming pool.

Breakfast is served at the property every morning.

Free secure parking is available on site and the Carcassonne Train Station is 3 km away
The hotel is 3 km from the Fresquel Aqueduct and 33 km from the city of Limoux.

name: Hotel Pont Levis - Franck Putelat
description:
Just 50 metres from the main entrance of the medieval city of Carcassonne, this modern hotel features a view of the city's ramparts and the surrounding countryside
Guests can enjoy an outdoor swimming pool and a 2-hectare private garden.

Rooms have a combination of classic and contemporary décor and feature a flat screen TV with satellite channels and an iPod docking station
Rooms are equipped with an electric kettle
Each has an en suite bathroom with a bath or shower, a bathrobe, slippers and free toiletries.

A gourmet French buffet breakfast is served daily for a supplement
Several restaurants are located 50 metres away and additional restaurants and grocery shops can be found 2 km away in the centre of Carcassone.

Cathar castles are located as close as 20 km from the property and Toulouse is a 50-minute drive away
Motorway A61 is 5 km away and Carcassonne Train Station is 3 km away
A taxi stand and a bus stop are located in front of the building
Private parking is available.

name: ibis budget Carcassonne La Cité
description:
Ibis budget Carcassonne La Cité is located in Carcassonne, a 15-minute walk from the medieval city and 2 km from the city centre.

It features modern, functional decor and free WiFi
All the rooms are fully equipped with en suite facilities and satellite TV.

A continental breakfast buffet is available
Carcassonne offers an array of restaurants, bars and grocery shops.

Carcassonne Airport is just a 15-minute drive from the hotel and the train station is only 10 minutes away
Free private parking is available onsite.

name: Mercure Carcassonne La Cité
description:
Set just a 4-minute walk from the medieval district of Carcassonne, Mercure Carcassonne La Cité offers an outdoor swimming pool in summer and views of the city walls
Free WiFi is provided.

Mercure Carcassonne Porte De La Cite features air-conditioned rooms with modern en suite facilities
