Rooms are decorated in pastel tones and overlook the garden or the Montagne Noire.

The hotel's restaurant, Le Vicomté, serves Mediterranean specialties for lunch and dinner
A selection of wines are available to accompany your meals
Guests can also relax at the bar, next to the fireplace.

Other services include room service, free private parking, a garden and 3 meeting rooms for up to 90 people
Carcassonne Train Station is 2.5 km away.

name: The Originals City, Hôtel Pont Rouge (ex inter-hôtel), Carcassonne
description:
Offering a 24-hour front desk, The Originals City, Hôtel Pont Rouge, Carcassonne is located a 10-minute drive from Carcassonne Airport and 5 km from the medieval part of town
It offers 50 rooms decorated in a modern style, all serviced by a lift
Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All the rooms offer air conditioning and a flat-screen TV
Each room has a private bathroom with a shower.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast every morning.

Hôtel Pont Rouge is 60 km from Narbonne
Free secured parking is available on site.

name: Brit Hotel Bosquet Carcassonne Cité
description:
Brit Hôtel Bosquet Carcassonne is 1.5 km from the medieval city of Carcassonne, a UNESCO World Heritage site
Free WiFi is provided.

Only accessed by stairs, the air-conditioned guestrooms feature satellite TV with Canal + channel, a bathroom with a hairdryer and a telephone.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel.

Restaurants can be found less than 500 metres away.

In the surroundings, you can discover the Canal du Midi located 3.5 km from the property and La Cavayère's Lake, a 10-minute drive away
Carcassonne Train Station is 5 km away.

name: Hôtel Saint Louis
description:
Set in the historical heart of Aigues-Mortes, 200 yards from the Tour de Constance, Hôtel Saint Louis is an air-conditioned hotel with a wellness center and restaurant
Free WiFi access is available on site and public city parking spots are available for free.

All rooms feature a contemporary décor inspired by the region and are fitted a flat-screen TV, a mini-bar and a telephone
Each room has a private bathroom
In the summer, guests can enjoy a drink on the patio or sun terrace
The onsite restaurant features a baroque-style décor and offers modern Camargue cuisine made with local produce and outdoor seating.

Nîmes is 43 km from Hôtel Saint Louis, while Arles is 49 km from the property
Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 26 km away.

There is a wellness center with a sauna and massages are also available on request.

name: Kyriad Carcassonne - Aéroport
description:
Kyriad Carcassonne - Aéroport is located in Carcassonne within a 10-minute drive from the city centre and the medieval city
Guests can have a drink at the lounge bar or on the terrace and enjoy free WiFi throughout the hotel.

The air-conditioned rooms at Kyriad Carcassonne - Aéroport feature a flat-screen TV with cable and 18 international channels, a telephone and a work desk
The en suite bathroom is equipped with a bath or shower and a hairdryer
In each room, an electric kettle, tea, coffee and biscuits are available in the guestrooms every day
We also have a heated swimming pool

A buffet breakfast is served every morning
A continental breakfast is also available for a lower price
Guests can enjoy regional specialities and traditional cuisine in the on-site restaurant or on the terrace.

This property is 1 km from the A61 Motorway and the Carcassonne Airport
The hotel provides a 24-hour reception desk and a fenced private parking with video surveillance for free.

name: Hotel Canal Aigues Mortes
description:
Hotel Canal Aigues Mortes is a 5-minute walk to the fortified city, on the banks of the canal, visible from its panoramic terrace and swimming pool
It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi
Free parking is available and garage parking is possible for an extra charge, or free of charge for motorbikes.

All of the rooms in the 3-star Hotel Canal Aigues Mortes are soundproofed and have a flat-screen TV with French and foreign channels.

In the warmer months the buffet breakfast can be eaten on the outdoor terrace
In the summer, guests can also enjoy snacks or light meals by the canal.

Bicycle rental is available onsite and there is also a seminar room for meetings.

Hotel Canal Aigues Mortes is a 10-minute drive from Grau-du-Roi beach and a 20-minute drive from Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport
Aigues-Mortes train station is a 4-minute walk away
Montpellier, Arles and Nîmes can all be reached within 45 minutes by car.

name: La Villa Mazarin
description:
Set in a building dating from the 15th century, La Villa Mazarin is located in the fortified city of Aigues-Mortes
It offers a terrace and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar
Free WiFi is available throughout.

The guest rooms have air conditioning, heating, satellite TV, a telephone and a fridge
All rooms are furnished in 17th-century Provençale style.

In the hotel's restaurant, Salon Mazarin, you can enjoy French culinary specialities or choose from a selection of light meals and snacks
The salon opens onto the courtyard and sun terrace.

Montpellier is 26 km from La Villa Mazarin, while Nîmes is 32 km away
The nearest airport is Mediterranee Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: Noemys Aigues-Mortes - Hotel avec piscine
description:
Featuring free WiFi and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, Noemys Aigues-Mortes - ex Mona Lisa Royal Hôtel is located in Aigues-Mortes, a 15-minute drive from the Carmague Natural Regional Park
The nearest beach is a 15-minute drive away
Free parking is available on site.

Certain rooms include views of the pool or garden
Each room comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom
Some rooms also feature a private terrace.

A buffet breakfast is available for an extra charge.

Noemys Aigues-Mortes - ex Mona Lisa Royal Hôtel also provides meeting facilities.

Nîmes is 40 km from Noemys Aigues-Mortes - ex Mona Lisa Royal Hôtel, while Arles is 45 km from the property
The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 26 km from the property.

name: Maison des Croisades
description:
Maison des Croisades in Aigues-Mortes offers bike rental and a garden
The hotel features free WiFi and a terrace
Guests can enjoy Canal & Garden Views
Le Grau-du-Roi beach is a 10-minute drive away.

All rooms in Maison des Croisades are equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Guests at Maison des Croisades can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Montpellier is 33 km from Maison des Croisades, while Nîmes is 44 km from the property
Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 24 km away.

name: Hôtel Le Médiéval
description:
Le Médiéval is located on the banks of the canal in Aigues-Mortes, 30 km from Montpellier
It offers en suite rooms, free parking and an outdoor swimming pool.

Hotel Le Médiéval provides a daily buffet continental-style breakfast that can be taken on the terrace in fine weather
The hotel also provides free Wi-Fi access in public areas.

Free private parking is possible on site and the medieval ramparts are a 2-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hotel Des 4 Vents
description:
Hotel Des 4 vents is located in Aigues-Mortes, on the Mediterranean coast, 40 km from Nimes and 35 km from Montpellier
It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi , defibrillator and an outdoor swimming pool
The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the medieval town
The surrounding lakes can be found less than a 10-minute drive away.

Each room at the 4 Vents is equipped with a TV and a private bathroom
Rooms also have a private balcony.

Breakfast is served daily and the Hotel des 4 Vents has a garden terrace
Guests can relax in the bar.

Free private parking is available on site.

name: Boutique Hôtel des Remparts & Spa
description:
Located in a former military station dating from the 18th-century, inside the medieval ramparts of Aigues-Mortes, this refined hotel offers a bar and a terrace with sun loungers
There is also a spa with an indoor heated pool
This boutique hotel is located opposite the Tower of Constance and The Centre for National Monuments.

The guest rooms with ceiling heights between 3.30 and 4 metres feature stone walls, a minibar, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi
All rooms come with a bathroom with a free standing bathtub, a walk-in shower, bathrobes and slippers
There is no separation between the sleeping area and the bathroom
They all feature views of the ramparts.

A continental breakfast is served each morning and can be enjoyed in the lounges or on the terrace, weather permitting.

Guests are invited to enjoy a drink in the hotel’s lounge bar, which features contemporary furniture and panoramic views of the ramparts.

Aigues-Mortes Train Station is a 5-minute walk from the hotel while Montpellier Méditerranée Airport is a 20-minute drive away
Golf de la Grande Motte is 12 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel-Restaurant "Chez Carrière"
description:
Hôtel-Restaurant "Chez Carrière" is located in Aigues-Mortes
This hotel features free WiFi and a terrace
The property is situated in the Aigues-Mortes Medieval City district.

At the hotel, the air conditioned rooms are fitted with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV
The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast area.

Montpellier is 26 km from Hôtel-Restaurant "Chez Carrière"
The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 19 km from the accommodation
Free public parking card is offered upon arrival.

name: Le Mas Des Sables
description:
Le Mas des Sables welcomes you in a park of 7 hectares of greenery 2km from the ramparts of the medieval city of Aigues-Mortes
Guests are invited to relax in the garden or take a swim in the outdoor pool
Free WiFi and free parking are available
Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer is 28 km away.

Rooms at Le Mas des Sables are air-conditioned and decorated in a Mediterranean style
They are equipped with a telephone, satellite TV and private bathroom
Most of the rooms overlook the garden
Rooms on the ground floor distributed in 4-bedroom pavilions.

The Mas des Sables serves regional specialities in the dining room decorated in Camargue style or on the flowered terrace.

Le Mas des Sables has direct access to the Via Rhôna, a cycling route linking Lake Geneva to the Mediterranean, between stages 20 and 21 of the Avignon to Sète section.

The property is a 20-minute drive from Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport.

name: Hotel Les Templiers
description:
Housed in an 18th-century merchant's house, Hotel Les Templiers is located inside the Aigues-Mortes fortifications, in southern France
It offers air-conditioned accommodation with en-suite facilities and TVs.

Guests of the Hotel Les Templiers can enjoy a continental breakfast every morning
There is also a bar and a garden
Free Wi-Fi access is available in the hotel’s 24-hour reception.

Guests of the Templiers Hotel can visit there nearby ponds of Ville and Merette
La Grande Motte Golf Course is just 7 km away
Paid public parking can be found nearby.

name: Hotel L'Escale
description:
Set in Aigues-Mortes, within 23 km of Montpellier Arena and 23 km of Parc des Expositions de Montpellier, Hotel L'Escale offers accommodation with a restaurant and a bar, and free WiFi throughout the property
Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace
Zenith Sud Montpellier is 27 km from the hotel and Odysseum Shopping Centre is 28 km away.

Montpellier Town Hall is 28 km from the hotel, while The Corum is 32 km from the property
The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 29 km from Hotel L'Escale.

name: Hôtel Les Corallines – Thalasso & Spa
description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, free access to Spa facilities and cardio training equipment, Hotel & Spa Les Corallines is located on the sea front a 1-minute walk from the beach in La Grande Motte
Free private parking and free WiFi are available onsite.

All the rooms at Les Corallines Hotel boast a sophisticated décor and soothing atmosphere
Floor-to-ceiling bay windows fill them with natural light and open onto a private terrace offering views on the swimming-pool and the sea
Each has a coffee machine, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bath or shower
The rooms offer a direct access to the restaurant and the spa, which you can reach wearing a soft bathrobe.

Guests have free access to the spa facilities including a salt-water indoor pool heated at 32 degrees, a multi-purpose wellness pool, a sauna and a hammam
Massages, treatments and fitness classes are available for an extra charge.
The establishment offers two restaurants, to meet your needs in an ideal setting.

Les Corallines :
In the dining room or on the terrace bordering the swimming pool, the restaurant Les Corallines welcomes you in an elegant atmosphere.
Open from Monday to Saturday from 12.00 to 14.00 > from 19.00 to 21.00
Sunday from 19.00 to 21.00
Le Tamaris :
In a natural and cosy setting, the Tamaris welcomes you indoors or on the terrace with a panoramic view of the Grande Bleue.
Open from 12:00 to 15:00 (Monday to Saturday): Tamaris Dish Dessert Formula at 25 €
> Sunday for brunch from 12.00 to 14.30
The onsite restaurant offers balanced menus, inspired by the Mediterranean cuisine.

For the Restaurant Les Corallines:
3-course menu of the day (starter, main course, dessert excluding drinks) at €38, available only for lunch from Monday to Saturday

The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport.

name: GOLF HOTEL
description:
Set in La Grande-Motte, 2 km from Point-Zero Beach, GOLF HOTEL offers accommodation with a fitness centre, a bar and a garden
Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom
The hotel features two hot tubs and a 24-hour front desk.

The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine
The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning from 7:00 a.m
to 11:00 a.m
at the GOLF HOTEL.

The hotel offers a snacking service, which includes pizza, fresh fruits or catering jar dishes.
The hotel can also offer advise on restaurants and takeaways that deliver in the area.

Guests at GOLF HOTEL will be able to enjoy activities in and around La Grande-Motte,like cycling, water sports or golf.

The hotel features two hot tubs at 38° and an heated swimming pool available from April to November

The city's Casino, the Pasino, is less than 2km away from the hotel
is 1.8 km from the hotel
The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 12 km from GOLF HOTEL.

name: Hotel Europe
description:
The hotel is located in the center of La Grande Motte, 10 minutes walk from the beach and 5 minutes walk from the marina
It is also only 150 meters from the Palais des Congrès and the Casino
Montpellier Méditerranée airport is a 20-minute drive from the hotel.

The Hotel Europe was built with the launch of the resort in the 1970's
The preservation of its original architecture makes it charming and attractive.

The 37 rooms are equipped with modern amenities such as flat-screen cable TV, mini-fridge, hospitality tray and air conditioning, as well as a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Some rooms have a terrace or balcony.

The property features free WI-Fi, an outdoor pool and a terrace.

There is a supervised private parking lot, subject to reservation and availability and for an additional fee.

name: Hotel Le Quetzal
description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, Hotel Le Quetzal is located in the heart of La Grande Motte, 300 metres from the Mediterranean Sea and its sandy beaches, and 5 minutes' walk from the city centre and Port.

Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, and a safety deposit box
Free WiFi access is available.

Le Quetzal Hotel features a French boules court
Activities in the area include golf, tennis and horse riding.

Private secured parking is provided for an additional fee, subject to availability
The hotel is situated a 20-minute drive from Montpellier and only a 10-minute drive from Montpellier Airport.

Any guest will have to show a valid credit card upon check-in as per the property's rules

name: Hôtel Restaurant Splendid Camargue
description:
Located on the seafront in the historic town centre of Le Grau-du-Roi, the Splendid Hotel Camargue offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi
The beach is just 5 metres away and some rooms offer balconies with sea views.

Guest rooms at Splendid Hotel have a colourful decor and are soundproofed
They each feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and modern en suite bathrooms with a hairdryer and free toiletries
All rooms are serviced by a lift.

Traditional cuisine made with seasonal produce from the local area is served in the restaurant
A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room or in guests’ rooms upon request.

Additional services offered at the Splendid Hotel Camargue include free newspapers in the lobby area and luggage storage
Public parking is located near the hotel.

The hotel is 800 metres from Le Grau-du-Roi Train Station
There is an aquarium located a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Café Miramar
description:
Hôtel Café Le Miramar faces the sea in Le Grau-du-Roi, just 600 metres from the Seaquarium
From April to the end of summer, guests can enjoy a private beach with sun loungers for an extra charge.

All the rooms offer reversible air conditioning, soundproofing and a private bathroom with shower or bathtub
A flat-screen TV and free WiFi are provided
Some rooms have sea views
One room can accommodate guests with reduced mobility.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the restaurant and you can sample a homemade cocktail throughout the day, while admiring the sea views
The restaurant serves local produce.

Other on-site facilities include newspapers and luggage storage at reception.

The A9 motorway is a 30-minute drive from the property
You may also choose to visit La Grande-Motte or Aigues-Mortes, which are 10 km away.

name: Hôtel boutique Quai d'Azur
description:
In the heart of Le Grau-du-Roi, originally a Mediterranean fishing village that has become a beach resort, this hotel is 65 metres from the canal, and just 300 metres from the beach
It features a shady interior courtyard decorated with plants and vines.

Each room has a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower
Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas.

Guests can enjoy a breakfast served in the patio
You can also make use of the shared kitchen, which is equipped with kitchenware, a refrigerator and a microwave.

Hôtel Quai d’Azur is a 5-minute walk from Le Grau-du-Roi Train Station, and 2.5 km from Port Camargue Marina
Montpellier Méditerranée Airport is a 25-minute drive away
A public parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

name: Hôtel Saint-Clair, côté Plage
description:
The Hôtel Saint-Clair, côté Plage is located in La Grande-Motte
Guests can enjoy a drink in the on-site bar and relax in the garden
Private parking is available on site.

Each air-conditioned room has a private terrace and is equipped with a flat-screen TV
Every room includes a private bathroom
For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer
Hôtel Saint-Clair, côté Plage features free WiFi throughout the property.

A continental breakfast is available every morning and is served in a room with a view of the garden.

Palais des Congrès is 1.2 km away from Hôtel Saint-Clair, côté Plage and the La Grande-Motte Thalasso spa centre is 550 metres away from the property
The nearest airport is Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport, 16 km away.

name: Hôtel Belle Vue d'Angleterre
description:
Offering a terrace and views of the sea, Hôtel Belle Vue d'Angleterre is located in Le Grau-du-Roi in the Languedoc-Roussillon Region, 22 km from Montpellier.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV.

There is luggage storage space at the property.

A free WiFi connection is available on the ground floor of the hotel
Nîmes is 38 km from Hôtel Belle Vue d'Angleterre, while Arles is 43 km from the property
Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 15 km away.

name: Mercure Port La Grande Motte
description:
Located in the seaside resort of La Grande-Motte, this Mercure hotel is next to the marina and a 5-minute walk from the beach
It has a seasonal outdoor pool
Aigues-Mortes is a 20-minute drive away.

The Mercure Port La Grande Motte offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi access and satellite TV
Guest rooms have a private balcony that overlooks the harbour.

In the morning guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast which includes pastries, bread, eggs, bacon, sausages, yoghurts and fresh fruit juice
Regional cuisine is served daily at the Mercure Port’s restaurant and guests are invited to enjoy the bar and terrace.

The Mercure is conveniently placed for accessing various tourist attractions
Local leisure activities include windsurfing and diving.

The hotel is a 17-minute drive from Montpellier Méditerranée Airport.

name: Hôtel La Plage 5 étoiles La Grande Motte
description:
Located on the seafront, Hôtel La Plage 5 étoiles La Grande Motte offers guests accommodations just a 10-minute walk from the centre of La Grande Motte
Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

Guests can enjoy dinner at the panoramic restaurant, located on the first floor.

The rooms feature sea views and a private balcony, while the ground floor rooms offer a 35 m² private garden and a terrace
Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a coffee machine and a minibar
The private bathrooms are stocked with bathrobes and free toiletries.

The property features a wellbeing centre "Le Cocon " proposing different types of massages and other treatments.

Private parking is provided at Hôtel La Plage 5 étoiles La Grande Motte for an additional charge, making it easy to explore the Languedoc-Roussillon region by car.

name: Novotel La Grande Motte Golf
description:
Set in La Grande-Motte, opposite an 18-hole golf course, Novotel La Grande Motte Golf boasts a restaurant and free WiFi throughout the property
Guests can relax on the sun terrace by the seasonal outdoor pool
Montpellier is 26 km away
Private parking is available on site.

Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and certain rooms have a minibar
The private bathrooms have a bath or shower and a hairdryer
Every room has a private balcony or terrace.

The Ô'Balata restaurant is open all year round and serves Mediterranean cuisine and the terrace overlooks the pool and golf course
Guests can enjoy a drink in the Novotel Café.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a children's playground at the property.

Bike hire is available on site
Nîmes is 36 km from Novotel La Grande Motte Golf, while Arles is 57 km away
Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 17 km from the property.

name: Le Prose Hôtel
description:
Offering an outdoor pool and terrace, Le Prose Hôtel is situated in La Grande-Motte in the Languedoc-Roussillon Region
Guests can enjoy the on-site bar
Free WiFi and free private parking are available.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and a restaurant that serves Mediterranean specialities
A brunch with seasonal products is served on Sundays.

Evening entertainment such as DJ sets can be enjoyed on Saturday night until 01:00
Seminar rooms are available at the property
On Saturdays and Sundays in July and August, various activities including brunches, themed evenings and pool parties are hosted onsite.

Montpellier is 25 km from Le Prose Hôtel, while Nîmes is 48 km from the property
The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 15 km from Le Prose Hôtel.

name: Hotel Le Bleu Marine
description:
Bleu Marine is just 150 metres from Mediterranean beaches and 300 metres from the centre of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer village
It features a fenced, outdoor swimming pool with sun loungers and free Wi-Fi.

Several rooms at Hotel Le Bleu Marine have a balcony with pool view
Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

The buffet breakfast is served every morning
Many shops and restaurants are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel
Hot and cold drinks are available upon request.

There is a thalassotherapy centre just 100 metres from the hotel's door.

Hotel Le Bleu Marine is 40 km from Arles and 60 km from Montpellier
Free parking is available on site.

name: Thalacap Camargue
description:
Thalacap Camargue faces the beach in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 5 minutes' walk from the city centre
You will enjoy a seasonal outdoor seawater swimming pool as well as an indoor swimming pool, sauna and hammam all year round at no additional cost

All of the rooms at Thalacap Camargue have a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access and air conditioning.

The restaurant serves Mediterranean-style meals
Weather permitting, meals can be enjoyed on the terrace with a panoramic view of the sea.

In addition to the other relaxation facilities, guests have direct access to a Thalassotherapy centre, which provides a number of health and beauty treatments for an additional charge.

Arles is 37 km away
private parking is available on site for 10€/night.

name: Hôtel Casa Marina
description:
Hôtel Casa Marina is situated on the beachfront in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 400 metres from Arenas Beach and less than 1 km from Crin Blanc Beach
With a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom
The property is non-smoking and is set 90 metres from Amphora Beach.

At the hotel, every room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV
All rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box, while some rooms also offer a terrace and others also have sea views
At Hôtel Casa Marina the rooms include bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Arles Amphitheatre is 39 km from Hôtel Casa Marina
The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 41 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Les Palmiers En Camargue
description:
Situated 100 metres from sandy beaches and 200 metres from Eglise des Stes Maries in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, Hotel Les Palmiers En Camargue features free WiFi access.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided
A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms.

A buffet breakfast with both sweet and savoury options is served at the property.

You can engage in various activities, such as horse riding, windsurfing and cycling.

Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 53 km from the property
Public parking is available 50 metres away at no extra cost while private garage parking is available upon request for an extra charge.

name: Le Dauphin Bleu
description:
Located 50 metres from the beach, Le Dauphin Bleu faces the Mediterranean Sea and is 400 metres from the centre of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer's historic old town
The hotel offers free WiFi in the guest rooms.

All rooms are air-conditioned and have a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and some have sea views.

Situated in the Rhône delta, this hotel is just 700 metres from a fortified church dating from the Middle Ages
The local area also offers water sports such as windsurfing
Le Dauphin Bleu is 56.1km from Montpelier Airport.

name: Abrivado
description:
Set in the Camargue Regional Park, Abrivado is an air-conditioned hotel located beside the harbour in the town of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer
It is 50 metres from the beach and the surrounding shops
Free WiFi access is provided in the guest rooms.

A TV is included in the rooms, which feature a simple décor
12 of the rooms offer a sea view and 6 of them also feature a private furnished terrace
The private bathrooms include a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is offered every morning at the hotel Abrivado for an extra charge.

Low-cost public parking is available nearby, and you can visit Arles, located 40 km away
Montpellier Airport is 52 km from the hotel
Public parking is available nearby.

name: Les Rizières
description:
Set by a pond, Les Rizières is a hotel situated 2.8 km from Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer and 2.4 km from Pont De Gau Ornithological Park with its pink flamingos
All the rooms are situated at ground-level around a patio planted with trees.

Air-conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar feature in the rooms
Free WiFi internet access is available throughout the hotel.

The seasonal outdoor, heated swimming pool is surrounded by a furnished sundeck.

Less than 10 km from Les Rizières is the Camargue National Park and the sea is just 2.8 km away.

name: Mas De Calabrun
description:
Featuring an outdoor pool, boules pitch and table tennis table, Mas de Calabrun is a hotel located on a private estate in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the Camargue Regional Park
The beach is 8 minutes' drive away
It offers free WiFi.

The air-conditioned guest rooms feature traditional Camargue décor, a flat-screen TV and a view of the garden or pool
There is a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer.

The Calabrun can also organise horse riding and jeep tours.

Free private parking is available on site and the hotel is an hour’s drive south of Nimes.

name: Hôtel Le Mirage
description:
Hôtel Le Mirage is 100 metres from the beach and 200 metres from Sainte-Marie-de-la-Mer Marina
It offers a garden with lounge chairs
Free WiFi is available throughout.

The heated non-smoking rooms at Le Mirage feature a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe and a desk
A mosquito net and a private bathroom are also provided.

Guests can have a continental breakfast every morning in the dining room or in the garden at Le Mirage
A range of restaurants and a grocery store can be found within 200 metres of the property.

This hotel is a 30-minute drive from Arles and 4 km from Pont de Gau Ornithological Park
Free public parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Le Méditérranée
description:
Situated in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Region, 100 metres from Eglise des Stes Maries and a 2-minute walk away from the beach and the port, Hotel Le Méditérranée features a sun terrace and views of the garden
Guests can enjoy the on-site bar
Free WiFi is offered.

The rooms have a flat-screen TV
Breakfast is served every morning on the terrace.

You will find luggage storage space at the property.

Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport is 34 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Les Arcades
description:
Just 100 metres from the nearest beach and 400 metres from the church in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, this 3-star hotel offers free WiFi access throughout the property
It is 35-minute drive from Arles and a thalassotherapy centre can be found nearby.

The rooms at Hôtel Les Arcades feature an LCD TV
a work desk and a mosquito net
Some rooms are air-conditioned and all have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room
You can also enjoy one of the bar’s selection of soft drinks on the terrace.

Le Grau-du-Roi is a 45-minute drive from Les Arcades and Nîmes is 45 km away
Guests can explore the coastline and the Camargue Natural Regional Park
Free public parking is available 50 metres from the property and there is a space in front of the hotel where guests can park to unload their car.

name: Hotel Mas des Lys
description:
Hotel Mas des Lys is situated in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the Camargues region, a 30-minute drive from Arles
It offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned guest rooms with a private terrace.

The guest rooms at Hotel Mas des Lys include a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a wardrobe
They each feature a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet-style breakfast is served every morning and drinks can be enjoyed in the hotel bar
Restaurants are found within 2 km of the hotel and free Wi-Fi is provided in public areas.

Free private parking is provided and guests can rent bicycles and go horseback riding on site
The property is a 45-minute drive from Nîmes and a 50-minute drive from Montpellier.

name: Hôtel du Pont Blanc
description:
Set in Saintes-Marie- de-la-Mer, Hôtel du Pont Blanc sits in a flowery garden with terrace and swimming pool, just an 8-minute walk from the beach
Free Wi-Fi and free private parking are provided.

The hotel’s rooms feature a terrace with garden views and a flat-screen TV
They all have an en suite bathroom with free toiletries, hairdryer and bathtub.

Every morning, a continental breakfast is served at the hotel at an extra cost
Throughout the day, you can find your little quiet corner in our garden
A little reading break? A little nap in the shade of our pines? Let yourself be tempted
A range of restaurants are to be found a 5-minute walk away.

Saintes-Marie- de-la-Mer city centre is just a 5-minute walk away
Guests can drive 25 km to Aigues-Mortes or 34 km to Le-Grau-du-Roi
Arles Train Station is 35 km away.

name: Les Bains Gardians
description:
Situated in a quiet natural environment in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, Les Bains Gardians offers comfortable rooms, 1 outdoor swimming pools, and hot tub, a tennis court and an equestrian centre
Guests also have access to free WiFi.

Guest rooms are equipped with a private terrace from which guests can admire the surroundings
They also have a private bathroom, a TV and a minibar
The entire property is non-smoking, and this is strictly enforced.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning, which includes a wide selection of homemade breads and rolls, cake, cheeses, cold meats, eggs, mushrooms, sausages, fruit juices, coffee and tea, yoghurt, salmon and fresh fruits.

Additional facilities include a bar and 1 restaurant, one of which serves traditional Provençal dishes.

At the Les Bains Gardians, it is possible to play tennis or table tennis, go horse riding, mountain biking or enjoy an excursion in a 4x4
There is also a children’s pony club
Free secure parking is available at night.

name: Le Mas de Cocagne
description:
Le Mas de Cocagne features a seasonal heated outdoor swimming pool and a garden
It is located at the entrance of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, just 800 metres from the sandy beaches and the town centre.

Le Mas de Cocagne rooms and suites have a blend of contemporary and traditional Camargue region décor
They feature air conditioning and free WiFi access
Each room has a private bathroom and views over the gardens, the marshes or the swimming pool.

A buffet breakfast is served daily beside the pool
Guests can relax in the seasonal hot tub or enjoy various massages on site, upon reservation only.

Guests can explore the historical village of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, with its fortified church
Also take advantage of the outdoor activities on offer in the countryside surrounding Le Mas de Cocagne
These include horse riding, cycling and boat trips.

name: Clamador
description:
Clamador is a hotel located 2 km from Saintes-Marie-de-la-Mer and just 1 km from the beach
Guests can enjoy mini golf and boles on site.

The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV and telephone.

The hotel is in a quiet natural setting and has an outdoor swimming pool, and you can enjoy a picnic beside the pool or use the barbecue in the garden
There is also a bar.

The hotel is between Rhone and Etangs and is easily accessible from the D38 road
It provides guests with free private parking.

name: Mangio Fango Hotel et Spa
description:
Mangio Fango Hotel et Spa in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer has 4-star accommodation with a garden, a terrace and a bar
Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, this property is located near attractions such as Eglise des Stes Maries
There is a restaurant.

Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle and a private bathroom with a hair dryer
All guest rooms at Mangio Fango Hotel et Spa have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms come with a balcony.

The accommodation offers a buffet breakfast
The restaurant is open every day except on Tuesday and Wednesday.

The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 33 km from Mangio Fango Hotel et Spa.

name: Hotel Lou Marquès
description:
Lou Marquès is located in Les Saintes Maries De La Mer, in Camargue Regional Nature Park
It offers free WiFi and a sunny terrace and it is just 400 metres from the beaches.

All the air-conditioned rooms at Lou Marquès come with an LCD TV and a telephone
They all have a private bathroom with a shower and some of them also include a private terrace.

You may have your breakfast served in the communal lounge or take it on the terrace
You can ask the reception about the nearest restaurants.

Free public parking is available on site and the hotel is a 5-minute drive from Pont de Gau Ornithological Park
Arles is a 30-minute drive away.

name: L'auberge Camarguaise
description:
Offering a seasonal outdoor pool and a sun terrace, L'auberge Camarguaise is situated in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer
The property was renovated in March 2016 and offers free private parking and free WiFi throughout.

Every room includes A double bed a private terrace, flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a bath.

There is a shared lounge and a bar at the property and bicycle hire is available.

The area is popular for horse riding and cycling.

The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 50 km from L'auberge Camarguaise.

name: Vila De La Mar & Spa
description:
Vila De La Mar & Spa is a small hotel featuring modern design located in the centre of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 100 metres from the beach
There is a heated outdoor swimming pool, covered during winter, and a spa with hammam and hot tub.

Each air-conditioned room features a private terrace, a minibar and a large flat-screen TV with cable channels.

Guests can enjoy a restaurant with a terrace overlooking the pool
On some weekends a dinner hosted by Gypsy guitarists and singers can be provided for a surcharge
A continental breakfast is also available and in-room breakfast is possible for a surcharge.

Activities in the area include windsurfing, horse riding and boat excursions
Vila De La Mar & Spa is surrounded by the Camargue Regional Nature Park and faces the Mediterranean Sea
Guests can also enjoy four wheel, bicycle or carriage rides during their stay.

The property is within 60 km from both Nîmes and Garons Airports, and 120 km from Marseille Marignane Airport
Arles Train Station is 36 km away.

name: Lodge Sainte Helene
description:
Located on the peninsula of a lake near Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer (1.5 km), Lodge Sainte Hélène offers panoramic views of the lake and its sumptuous sunsets, as well as free Wi-Fi
You can enjoy an outdoor swimming pool heated during the summer season, a garden and a terrace to relax in a peaceful and very relaxing.

Superior double rooms at Lodge Sainte Hélène feature a balcony with lake views, a minibar, a coffee/tea machine and a flat-screen TV
The private bathroom is equipped with a bath or a large walk-in shower, a hairdryer, a bathrobe, slippers and free toiletries l'Occitane.

To start your day well, we offer a brunch breakfast that you can enjoy in your room or in the common areas by the lake, terrace and buffet
The property also offers ironing and laundry services.

You can practice several activities on site or in the surroundings, such as horse riding, cycling and hiking on the paths of the Camargue National Park, which we will be pleased to reserve for you
Lodge Sainte Hélène also offers free parking in front of your room for your convenience.

name: Mas de la Grenouillère Hôtel et Centre équestre en pleine nature
description:
This hotel and horse riding centre is set in a Provencal farm house in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the Camargue Regional Nature Park
It has a garden and an outdoor pool lined with a sun terrace.

Each air-conditioned room offers free Wi-Fi and opens up to a terrace with views of the garden
All rooms include flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and have facilities for making hot drinks.

Breakfast can be enjoyed every morning on guests’ own private terraces
Mas de la Grenouillère Hôtel et Centre équestre en pleine nature organises horseback riding lessons and tours of the surrounding area.

Free parking for cars and bikes is available on site and the banks of the Petit Rhône River are just 1 km away
The hotel is 36 km from the city of Arles and the Arles Train Station.

name: Les Vagues
description:
Featuring a restaurant, bar and views of sea, Les Vagues is located in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 300 metres from Arenas Beach
The property is around 400 metres from Crin Blanc Beach, 500 metres from Amphora Beach and 39 km from Arles Amphitheatre
Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower and free toiletries, all units at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms will provide you with a terrace
All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

Activities such as hiking, snorkelling, cycling can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront.

The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 41 km from Les Vagues.

name: Auberge de la Fadaise
description:
Auberge de la Fadaise is located in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the heart of the Camargue region, a 5-minute drive from the beach
It boasts an outdoor pool and guests can enjoy horse-riding on-site and around Camargue upon reservation.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV
Some have a view of the pool, and some have a balcony
Each room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

A continental breakfast is available daily for an extra fee
Homemade meals and local specialities can be prepared by the hosts upon reservation
Sandwiches, drinks and ice creams are available for an extra charge throughout the day.

With free private parking on site, the hotel is 5 km from Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer and a 20-minute drive from Aigues-Mortes
The Pont de Gau Ornithological Park is located 200 m from the hotel

name: Le Maset
description:
Located just 400 metres from the sandy beach in Saintes-Maries-de-La-Mer, Le Maset is an air-conditioned hotel offering a swimming pool surrounded by sun loungers
Free WiFi is provided in the guest rooms.

Featuring a classic décor with tiled flooring, each of the rooms features a terrace and an LCD TV
The en suite bathrooms include a walk-in shower.

A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning at Le Maset, and breakfast can also be taken in your room.

Many restaurants and shops can be found within a 10-minute walk.

Leisure activities include horse riding, cycling and hiking in the surrounding area and Arles is located 35 km away
Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hôtel La Casa Pairal
description:
Situated 250 metres from Collioure beach and port, Hôtel La Casa Pairal features an exotic floral garden and a heated outdoor swimming pool
The hotel is located in a 19th century Catalan building in the old quarter of Collioure.

Hôtel La Casa Pairal offers air-conditioned rooms with a traditional décor
They each have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and free WiFi
Some rooms overlook the city or the hotel’s courtyard with a fountain or the village square.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in Hôtel La Casa Pairal’s breakfast room, or in guests’ rooms upon request
Drinks are served in the hotel’s garden area.

The hotel’s reception is open 24 hours a day
Additional services available include free newspapers and a safety deposit box.

Collioure Train Station is 500 metres away
The hotel is located 23 km from the Spanish border.

name: La Frégate
description:
La Frégate features a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Collioure
The property is around 33 km from Stade Gilbert Brutus, 3.2 km from Casino Collioure and 23 km from Saint-Cyprien Golf Course
The property is non-smoking and is located 200 metres from Boramar Beach.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Guests at La Frégate will be able to enjoy activities in and around Collioure, like hiking.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Nord Beach, Port Avall Beach and Collioure Royal Castle
The nearest airport is Perpignan - Rivesaltes Airport, 42 km from La Frégate.

name: Le Mas des Citronniers
description:
Located in the centre of Collioure, just 250 metres from the beach, this hotel offers air-conditioned guestrooms in a traditional Catalan building
Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

Guest rooms at Le Mas des Citronniers are decorated in bright colours
Each features a flat-screen TV, a desk, a small fridge and an en suite bathroom
Some of the rooms offer a patio with a view of the garden.

A breakfast buffet is served each morning in the hotel’s breakfast room or a full breakfast is served in guests’ rooms upon request
Breakfast is provided with a supplement.

The reception desk at Le Mas des Citronniers is open 24 hours a day and additional facilities available include free newspapers.

Collioure Train Station is located 550 metres from the hotel and the Château Royal de Collioure is 300 metres away.

name: Grand Hotel Du Golfe
description:
Set on the Corniche, Grand Hotel Du Golfe is a 4 stars art design hotel dating from the 1970's, just 5 minutes' walk from the creeks and 10 minutes' walk from Racou Beach
Argelès-sur-Mer city centre is 4 km away.

Each air-conditioned rooms are directed towards the sea and most of them feature a balcony
All of the modern guest rooms are soundproofed and include an LCD TV, a telephone, a safe, a hairdryer, free WiFi and a minibar
A room for guests with reduced mobility is available upon prior request.

A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning at the Grand Hotel Du Golfe
Le bistrot à la mer open every evening of the week, the onsite restaurant, proposes creative meals using fresh regional produce
Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel lounge bar or on the terrace, weather permitting.

The beauty institute "Beauty Spa" offers massages and facials from the houses of SOTHYS and INGRID MILLET
We suggest you to book
the treatments in advance
Accessible at an additional cost, the Spa - with its chromatic Hammam & Jacuzzi - offers a panoramic view
the Mediterranean Sea and the vineyards
The establishment puts at your disposal an outdoor swimming pool of 19 meters, heated from April to early November
The establishment, with a Mediterranean garden, can organize wine tasting sessions of Languedoc-Roussillon wines upon request.

The historic town of Collioure is 2.5 km from Grand Hotel Du Golfe
Free private parking is available at the property
The Spanish border is 25 km away.

name: Hôtel Triton
description:
Set on the Boutiquet Beach, this hotel offers air-conditioned rooms either overlooking Collioure Bay or the Pyrennees Mountains
Free WiFi access is available in the original building.

All of the rooms at the Hotel Triton are equipped with a TV and a phone
Some of them have a balcony
The private bathrooms either feature a shower or a bathtub
Rooms are situated in one of the two buildings of the hotel, the original building and a newer annexe.

Guests can enjoy daily buffet breakfast with fresh croissants and bread every morning on the terrace with a sea view.

The Triton hotel also offers beautiful views of the fortified city of Collioure, the castle and the steeple
It is 7 km from Argelès-sur-Mer, 25 km from the Spain border and 30 km from Perpignan
Public parking is available opposite the property for an additional charge.

name: Le Madeloc Hôtel & Spa
description:
Just 500 metres from Collioure town centre and a 10-minute walk from the beach is Le Madeloc Hôtel & Spa
It offers a year-round, heated outdoor swimming pool, a rooftop solarium, a hot tub and a hammam
Beauty treatments and massages are available upon request.
The rooftop swimming pool is heated (from April to 31 st of October) and the Hot tub / Jacuzzi are free access and open from 9:00am until 9:00 pm

Guest rooms at Madeloc are decorated in neutral tones and one bright colour, each also features air conditioning, an LCD TV and a minibar
Some of the rooms also have a terrace or a balcony
Rooms are located on one of the three floors of the hotel and are accessible by stairs only
One room is adapted for guests with reduced mobility on the ground floor.

A buffet breakfast is offered every morning with the option to dine (snacks only) in the comfort of guest rooms
Madeloc also offers free WiFi throughout the property.

A gift shop is also available and offers local produce.

Collioure Train Station is just 200 metres away and the D914 is 5 minutes away
The hotel is 6.5 km from Argelès-sur-Mer and 25.5 km from the Spanish border.
Upon request and upon availability and for an extra cost, private parking is possible on site.

name: Hotel Méditerranée
description:
Featuring a Mediterranean garden and a terrace, Hotel Méditerranée offers accommodation in Collioure, a 5-minute walk from the nearest beach
Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site.

Every air-conditioned room has a balcony and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
The rooms also feature a fridge, a telephone and a safety deposit box
All rooms have a bathroom with a bath or shower.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning and guests can eat breakfast on the terrace in fine weather.

There is luggage storage space at the property.

Argèles-sur-Mer is 7.3 km away and the Spanish border is 26 km away
The nearest airport is Perpignan - Rivesaltes Airport, 38 km from the property.

name: Hôtel la Bona Casa
description:
Hotel Bona Casa is located in the historic centre of Collioure, just 300 metres from the beach and from the Château Royal
The hotel proposes free Wi-Fi internet access and a shaded terrace.

The guest rooms at Hotel Bona Casa have a view of the street or the patio, and some have a private terrace
They each include a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries
The hotel is completely non-smoking.

A continental breakfast is served every morning and shops and restaurants are found within 200 metres from the property
Guests can also relax in the hotel’s tea room from March to October.

Port-Vendres is 3 km from the hotel and Argelès-sur-Mer is 6 km away
The property is a 30-minute drive from central Perpignan and from the Spanish border, which can also be reached by train.

name: Hôtel des Templiers
description:
Featuring 2000 original artworks by 20th-century painters who stayed in the hotel, Hôtel des Templiers is located 200 metres from the Château Royal de Collioure
Catalan cuisine is served in the restaurant.

A view of the castle and the harbour is offered in the guest rooms, which include an LCD TV
Some of the rooms feature Catalan décor with antique furniture
Wi-Fi access is available in each room.

You can enjoy a drink from the bar on the shaded terrace, and breakfast is prepared every morning at this hotel.

Collioure Train Station is only 550 metres away and Mas Larrieu Nature Reserve is a 20-minute drive away
The hotel is located on a pedestrian street and public parking is available 400 metres from the property.

name: Hôtel Princes de Catalogne
description:
Situated on a quiet square in picturesque Collioure, this hotel is located a 400 metres from the beach
The hotel was renovated in early 2021 and features a contemporary style.

All rooms at the Hôtel Princes de Catalogne are air-conditioned and have views of the mountains, Fort Miradou or of a quiet street
They are equipped with TV and free Wi-Fi internet access.

Staff at the Hôtel Princes will be happy to help you organise excursions, guided visits or other activities such as seawater therapy and climbing.

name: Hotel Le Bon Port
description:
Located a few meters from the La Cortina windmill, the establishment elegantly overlooks the sea over the bay of Collioure, its royal castle and its famous Notre Dame des Anges bell tower.

Our rooms thus offer you comfortable accommodation in a Mediterranean and modern setting.

You can admire this splendid view from our rooms as well as our solarium.

All our rooms are equipped with private bathroom, television, reversible air conditioning and a reception service.
We kindly inform you, despite some pictures we can't erase on the internet, the hotel doesn’t have a swimming pool any longer.

name: Le Relais Des Trois Mas
description:
Boasting a swimming pool on a terrace looking out onto the Mediterranean Sea, Le Relais Des Trois Mas features comfortable accommodation and a Provencal setting
All the rooms are only accessible by stairs.

Under the shade of 100-year old pine trees, the personalised rooms offer a superb view of the Bay of Collioure and the church Notre Dame des Anges
They all feature a minibar, air conditioning and facilities for making tea and coffee.

The restaurant, La Balette, is one of the most valued in the area
It boasts unrestricted views of the bay and serves delicious gourmet cuisine complemented by excellent Collioure wines.

name: Chambres Rue de la République
description:
Chambres Rue de la République is located in Collioure, 800 metres from Balette Beach and 200 metres from Collioure Royal Castle
The property is set 33 km from Stade Gilbert Brutus, 3.1 km from Casino Collioure and 23 km from Saint-Cyprien Golf Course
This pet-friendly hotel also has free WiFi.

At the hotel, each room includes a desk
Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath and free toiletries, guest rooms at Chambres Rue de la République have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are equipped with a balcony
At the accommodation each room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Chambres Rue de la République include Boramar Beach, Port Avall Beach and Boutigue Beach
The nearest airport is Perpignan - Rivesaltes Airport, 42 km from the hotel.

name: Les Roches Brunes
description:
Located in Collioure, 70 metres from Balette Beach, Les Roches Brunes provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant
Featuring a bar, this 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom
The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV
Each room comes with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms are equipped with a balcony.

Les Roches Brunes offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Boutigue Beach, Saint Vincent Beach and Collioure Royal Castle
The nearest airport is Perpignan - Rivesaltes Airport, 42 km from Les Roches Brunes.

name: HOTEL AMBEILLE
description:
Located in Collioure, 600 metres from Port Avall Beach, HOTEL AMBEILLE provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace
With a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom
The accommodation features room service, a business centre and luggage storage for guests.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV
At HOTEL AMBEILLE every room comes with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Guests at HOTEL AMBEILLE will be able to enjoy activities in and around Collioure, like hiking.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Boramar Beach, Boutigue Beach and Collioure Royal Castle
The nearest airport is Perpignan - Rivesaltes Airport, 33 km from HOTEL AMBEILLE.

name: Hôtel Le Cottage
description:
Located a 2-minute drive from the centre of Argelès-sur-Mer and a 5-minute drive from the sandy beach, Hôtel Le Cottage features a swimming pool and a view of the Pyrénées Mountains
Free Wi-Fi is provided.

The rooms at Le Cottage are contemporary in style and are decorated in neutral tones
Each has an LCD TV with satellite channels and some have a private balcony with views of the garden and pool
There are also suites and apartments.

A buffet breakfast can be served on the terrace or in the dining room, and the hotel has a bar
Other breakfast options can also be served at an extra cost
In the summer, a snack service is provided at lunchtime at an extra cost.

Additional facilities include private parking, games in the exotic garden and several terraces
The wellness centre, "Garden Spa", offers a hammam, sauna and chromotherapy showers
A balneo pool, relaxation lounge, fitness area, solarium and a variety of body treatments are also provided at an extra cost.

The Spanish border is 28 km from the hotel
You may also choose to drive the 7 km to Collioure
Perpignan-Rivesaltes Airport is a 35-minute drive away.

name: Maison Nova - Boutique Hôtel & Spa
description:
Set in Collioure, 600 metres from Boramar Beach, Maison Nova - Boutique Hôtel & Spa offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace
With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk
Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with a sauna, and hammam, as well as a bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower
Rooms are equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms also offer a balcony and others also have city views
At Maison Nova - Boutique Hôtel & Spa all rooms include bed linen and towels.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Nord Beach, Ouille Beach and Collioure Royal Castle
The nearest airport is Perpignan - Rivesaltes Airport, 41 km from Maison Nova - Boutique Hôtel & Spa.

name: Ibis Styles Collioure Port Vendres
description:
Set in Port-Vendres, 200 metres from the beach, Ibis Styles Collioure Port Vendres boasts a seasonal outdoor pool, a rooftop terrace and views of Collioure's bay
Guests can enjoy the on-site snack bar and can use the small fitness centre
Private parking is available on site.

Every room includes a flat-screen TV
Ibis Styles Collioure Port Vendres features free WiFi throughout the property.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Cadaqués is 50 km from Ibis Styles Collioure Port Vendres, while Perpignan is 33 km away
The nearest airport is Perpignan - Rivesaltes Airport, 40 km from the property.

name: HOTEL LE PESCADOU
description:
Attractively set in the Argeles Plage district of Argelès-sur-Mer, HOTEL LE PESCADOU is situated 100 metres from Centre Beach, 400 metres from Sud Beach and 800 metres from Pins Beach
The property is around 8.1 km from Collioure Royal Castle, 32 km from Stade Gilbert Brutus and 7.1 km from Casino Collioure
Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

At the hotel, rooms come with a wardrobe
Complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, the rooms at HOTEL LE PESCADOU have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are equipped with a terrace.

The nearest airport is Perpignan - Rivesaltes Airport, 33 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel Le Maritime
description:
Le Maritime Hotel is located just 150 meters from the beach
This property features an outdoor pool with sun loungers.

Each of the 34 rooms come with air conditioning, a private bathroom with a shower, a flat-screen TV and a telephone.

A private garage is available upon request.

name: Hôtel - Villa Les Sirènes
description:
Located in Argelès-sur-Mer, the Villa des Sirenes is just 150 metres from the beach on the Mediterranean Sea
It offers comfortable rooms with private bathrooms and TV.

Villa des Sirenes serves a daily continental breakfast, either in the dining room or on the large flower-filled terrace
There is a library and free Wi-Fi in public areas is available with an access code upon request.

Collioure is 10 minutes away, Perpignan is 30 minutes away and the Spanish border is 35 minutes away
Figueres is approximately 53 km away.

name: Hôtel & Spa Les Mouettes
description:
Les Mouettes is an eco-friendly hotel situated at the foot of the Pyrenees, between Argelès-sur Mer and Collioure on a ledge overlooking the Mediterranean Sea
It features a spa centre for an additional charge, a year-round heated pool and a hot tub with a panoramic view of the sea.

Each unit features soundproofing, air conditioning and a modern décor
Some rooms have a balcony with views of the sea or gardens
They are all equipped with free WiFi access, satellite TV and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and includes organic local produce as well as gluten and lactose free ingredients
Breakfast can also be served in the comfort of your room between 08:00 and 10:00
The property also offers a snack bar every day
There is a restaurant 200 metres away which can be accessed through the garden.

Les Mouettes' spa centre includes a hammam, a chromotherapy shower, an indoor hot tub and a selection of body and beauty treatments
Additional facilities include a playground and a private car park.

The hotel is just 2 km from the historic centre of Collioure and Port-Argelès
The Spanish border is just a 30-minute drive away
Perpignan-Rivesaltes Airport is a 35-minute drive away.

name: Les Jardins Du Cèdre
description:
Nestled in the heights of Port-Vendres, the hotel Les Jardins du Cèdre welcomes you to a green paradise, complete with a heated swimming pool operational from April 15 to October 15
From there, you have a breathtaking view of the bay of Port-Vendres and the infinite blue of the Mediterranean
Only ten minutes walk from the city center you can discover the charm of the small streets, the shops and the most authentic port of the Vermeille coast.

Each comfortable accommodation is equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom equipped with courtesy toiletries
Some rooms, privileged, allow you to contemplate splendid views of the sea
You will benefit from a WIFI connection throughout our establishment, as well as a dedicated parking space for each room.

Our on-site restaurant invites you to a memorable dining experience, to be savored indoors or outdoors, under the century-old cedar that gives our hotel its name
The Chef, through his inventive and sincere cuisine, pays a vibrant tribute to local products
To accompany your meal, we offer a selection of mainly organic and Catalan wines
(The number of tables being limited, we invite you to reserve your table as soon as possible).

Breakfast, available in sweet and savory dishes, is a real moment of pleasure
Our buffet offers pastries, homemade jams prepared by our pastry chef, fresh bread from the local artisan bakery, as well as Catalan specialties.

Our establishment also has a massage room
Our practitioner offers a range of massages and treatments (we advise you to book in advance to ensure an appointment at your convenience)
For the more athletic, a fitness room is available.

A fully equipped seminar room is also at your disposal within the Jardins du Cèdre hotel, allowing you to accommodate groups for work meetings and conferences.

Around the hotel, a multitude of activities are available to you: Walks along the coastal path, from Argelès to Cerbère via Collioure, Port-Vendres, and Banyuls, will offer you an enchanting spectacle of vermilion coast
You can discover the practice of water sports such as scuba diving or jet-skiing
The nearest airport of Perpignan-Rivesaltes is 40 km away, while Roses in Spain is 50 km away, and Barcelona around 2h15 by road.

name: Hôtel Beau Rivage
description:
Hotel Beau Rivage is located in the sea-side town of Argelès-sur-Mer and over looks the Mediterranean Sea
It offers direct access to the beach and most of the guest rooms have sea views.

Each air-conditioned room has contemporary furnishings and feature an elegant décor designed by Mario Martinez
They are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at the Hotel Beau Rivage and free WiFi access is available throughout the property
Guests can discover Côte Vermeille coast, and Jardin des Jeux, which is 100 metres away.

Some shops, handcraft market and water sports, can be found a 5-minute walk away from the hotel.

A public parking is located 50 metres from the property.

name: Intense Boutik-Hôtel
description:
Situated in Port-Vendres, 1.4 km from Oli Beach, Intense Boutik-Hôtel features accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a bar
This 3-star hotel offers free WiFi
Some rooms at the property have a balcony with a sea view.

At the hotel rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a terrace with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels
Intense Boutik-Hôtel provides some units with mountain views, and all rooms include a patio.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

Reguers Beach is 1.8 km from Intense Boutik-Hôtel, while Balette Beach is 2.2 km from the property
The nearest airport is Perpignan - Rivesaltes Airport, 44 km from the hotel.

name: Plaza Hotel Capitole Toulouse - Anciennement-formerly CROWNE PLAZA
description:
The 4* Plaza Hotel (formely Crowne Plaza) is ideally located in the heart of the city, 200meters from Capitole underground train network, 10km from Blagnac Airport and 15km from the Exhibition & Convention Center MEETT.
The Capitole Opera House is 200meters from the hotel & Pierre Baudis Convention Center is a 10-minutes walk.

In each of our 162 rooms & suites, a work desk area, TV Plasma screen, a bathroom with bathtub, safe box, Wifi, Tea/Coffe maker, telephones.
Some of our rooms offer a view over the Capitole Square.

The American buffet breakfast is served Monday to Friday from 06h30AM to 10h30AM and Saturday-Sunday till 11h00AM.
The restaurant-Bar “L’Atrium” is open daily for lunch and dinner
The Chef proposes delicious homemade dishes prepared with fresh and local products
The Atrium Bar welcomes you to enjoy a wide range of cocktails and drinks.

Our reception is open 24/7 all year round
And a free WIFI is available throughout the hotel.
The fitness center, reserved only for the hotel’s clients, is open daily from 06h30AM to 10h00PM.

Many tourist attractions are within walking distance from the hotel: Saint Sernin Cathedral, Couvent des Jacobins, Les Augustins Museum, Garonne river.

This is our guests' favorite part of Toulouse, according to independent reviews.

name: B&B HOTEL Toulouse Cité de l'Espace Hurel
description:
Located 6 km from Toulouse city centre and 8 km from Matabiau Train Station, B&B HOTEL Toulouse Cité de l'Espace Hurel has 24-hour front desk, free newspapers, free Wi-Fi and free parking.

In the morning, an all-you-can-eat buffet breakfast is served
Various bars and restaurants can be found in Toulouse.

The rooms all have a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries
They also come with a desk and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

Toulouse Blagnac Airport is 22 km from B&B HOTEL Toulouse Cité de l'Espace Hurel and the A61 highway is 4 km away
Cité de L'Espace discovery park is 1 km from the hotel and Saint Sernin Basilica is 9 km away.

name: Matabi Hotel Toulouse Gare by HappyCulture
description:
Well located in Toulouse, Matabi Hotel Toulouse Gare by HappyCulture provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar
This 3-star hotel offers room service and luggage storage space
The property is non-smoking and is located 5.5 km from Toulouse Stadium.

At the hotel, rooms have a wardrobe
Each room has a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer
At Matabi Hotel Toulouse Gare by HappyCulture all rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak Arabic, English, Spanish and French.

Popular points of interest near Matabi Hotel Toulouse Gare by HappyCulture include Toulouse-Matabiau Station, Jeanne d'Arc Metro Station and Jean-Jaures Metro Station
The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: Le Clocher de Rodez Centre Gare
description:
Hôtel Le Clocher de Rodez is located in the heart of Toulouse, 700 metres from the Toulouse-Matabiau Train Station
It offers soundproofed accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi internet access.

Each guest room at Le Clocher de Rodez hotel is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, as well as tea and coffee making facilities
Rooms are serviced by a lift and have a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Le Clocher de Rodez.

The hotel provides a 24-hour reception, and massages are also available upon request.

Le Clocher de Rodez is close to Jeanne d'Arc Metro Station and 600 metres from the Capitole Square
A public shuttle service to Blagnac Airport runs every 20 minutes
Toulouse Stadium is 4.5 km from the property.

name: The Social Hub Toulouse
description:
Attractively located in Toulouse, The Social Hub Toulouse features air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre
Boasting a shared lounge, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace
Guests can have a drink at the bar.

At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV
Rooms are equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms include a kitchenette fitted with a fridge
At The Social Hub Toulouse every room has bed linen and towels.

You can play billiards and table tennis at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling.

The accommodation provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying
Speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area.

Popular points of interest near The Social Hub Toulouse include Pierre Baudis Japanese Garden, Compans Caffarelli Metro Station and Saint-Cyprien Republique Metro Station
The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

name: Ibis Styles Toulouse Centre Canal du Midi
description:
The ibis Styles Toulouse Center Canal du Midi is located in the center of Toulouse, on the banks of the Canal du Midi and next to the Halle aux Grains concert hall, just 1 km from Place du Capitole and 3.5 km from of the Toulouse stadium
Wi-Fi is available free of charge.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Ibis Styles Toulouse Center Canal du Midi each have a private bathroom
A flat-screen TV is also present in each room
The rooms are accessible by a lift.

A continental buffet breakfast is served every morning
The Ibis Styles Toulouse Center Canal du Midi offers a 24-hour reception and free newspapers
Private parking is available for an additional charge.

The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Toulouse-Matabiau Train Station and 4 km from the Parc des Expositions
Toulouse-Blagnac airport is 15 minutes away by car
François Verdier metro station is a 5-minute walk away
Secure underground parking is available at an additional cost.

name: Hôtel La Chartreuse
description:
Located in Toulouse, Hôtel La Chartreuse is 140 metres from Matabiau Train Station and a 10-minute walk from Place du Capitole
It offers free Wi-Fi access, a terrace and luggage storage.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels
The private bathroom is complete with a shower and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at Hôtel La Chartreuse
Restaurants and cafés can be found within 150 metres of the property.

This hotel is 650 metres from Jean-Jaurès Metro Station and an 8-minute drive from the A61 motorway
The Henri Gaussen Botanical Gardens are a 16-minute walk away
Guests can park their cars in the nearby streets.

name: Hotel Wilson Square
description:
Hotel Wilson Square is located in the heart of Toulouse's historic city centre, just 200 metres from Place du Capitole
Toulouse Stadium is 4 km away
The hotel offers soundproofed accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi internet access.

Each guest room at the Wilson Square has a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
They all are serviced by a lift.

The Wilson Square Hotel is just a few minutes’ walk from Capitole Metro station, which provides access to the city’s main attractions
There is also an airport shuttle stop and a public parking nearby.

name: Quality Hotel Toulouse Centre
description:
Quality Hotel Toulouse Centre is located in Toulouse, 350 metres from Jean Jaures Metro Station and an 8-minute walk from Toulouse Matabiau TGV Train Station
The property provides en suite accommodations with free WiFI access.

The air-conditioned rooms feature a sleeping area, a minibar and a safety deposit box
The rooms also include a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries, a mirror and a hairdryer.

Quality Hotel Toulouse Centre offers daily breakfast.

The hotel provides a 24-hour front desk.

Place Wilson is a 5-minute walk away
Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 10 km away and an airport shuttle stop is located just 50 metres from the hotel.

name: Le Grand Balcon Hotel
description:
Set in central Toulouse, Grand Balcon Hotel is a 4-star hotel featuring a 1930s décor and a 24-hour reception
The property is 4 km from Toulouse Stadium and offers air-conditioned guest rooms with free WiFi access.

A flat-screen TV, a minibar and a Nespresso coffee machine are standard in each soundproofed room
Some rooms have a seating area
All of the contemporary bathrooms.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Le Grand Balcon Hotel
Enjoy a drink in the contemporary bar while reading the newspapers provided.

Place du Capitole is just 100 metres from the hotel and Capitole Metro Station is a 3-minute walk away
Galeries Lafayette is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Mercure Toulouse Centre Saint-Georges
description:
Located in the centre of Toulouse, Mercure Toulouse Saint-Georges is just 50 metres from Place Wilson and 3.5 km from Toulouse Stadium
It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi access, a terrace with a swimming lane.

Rooms at the Toulouse Saint-Georges are equipped with satellite TV and a private bathroom and all are serviced by an elevator.

The accommodation also offers a bar, laundry service, room service, buffet breakfast
There is also a 24-hour front desk.

The Saint-Georges is 300 metres from Toulouse's City Hall set on the Capitole Place and 100 metres from Jean-Jaurès Metro Station, which allows access to all of Toulouse
A public car park is conveniently located beneath the hotel.

name: B&B HOTEL Toulouse Cité de l'Espace Gonord
description:
B&B Toulouse Cité de l'Espace Gonord is located in Toulouse and has 24-hour front desk and a vending machine
It is located 11 km from Toulouse-Blagnac Airport.

At B&B Toulouse Cité de l'Espace Gonord, each bedroom has a private bathroom with a shower, and a desk
None of the rooms have air conditioning.

The hotel is 4.5 km from Toulouse Expo, 6.8 km from Zénith de Toulouse and 8.3 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely.

name: Hotel Mercure Toulouse Centre Compans
description:
This Mercure hotel is located in central Toulouse, a 10 minute walk from Capitole Square and just 200 metres from the Compans Caffarelli Metro
Toulouse Stadium is 4 km away.

The sound-proofed, contemporary guest rooms include air conditioning, Wi-Fi internet access, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee making facilities.

Hotel Mercure Toulouse Compans Caffarelli’s restaurant, is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner serving traditional, healthy French dishes
Guests can dine in the restaurant, on the terrace overlooking the garden or in their guest room.

Hotel Mercure Toulouse Compans Cafferelli is next to Pierre Baudis Convention Centre and Toulouse-Matabiau Train Station.

name: Hotel Ours Blanc - Centre
description:
The Hotel Ours Blanc is located on the Place Victor Hugo, in central Toulouse
The Hotel Ours Blanc is situated 200 metres from Jeanne d’Arc Metro Station
Toulouse Stadium is 4 km from the property
Free WiFi is available in common areas.

Each guest room is soundproofed, air-conditioned and has a TV and high speed WiFi access.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast
You will find numerous restaurants nearby.

Guests can visit the nearby theatres, Gaumont and UCG cinemas
Hotel Ours Blanc – Centre can also visit the nearby Canal du Midi, the Place du Capitole and the Victor Hugo Market.

name: Campanile Toulouse Purpan
description:
This Campanile Hotel is located in next to the A620 and 5 km from Toulouse-Blagnac Airport
It provides soundproofed accommodation with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning.

Each guest room at the Campanile Toulouse Purpan is equipped with a private bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and satellite TV.
Guests can enjoy regional cuisine at the Purpan’s restaurant and there is a bar and a floral terrace
Free newspapers are available at the Campanile Toulouse’s 24-hour reception.

name: Hôtel Innes by HappyCulture
description:
This hotel is located in Toulouse city centre, next to the Jeanne d’Arc Metro stop
Free Wi-Fi access is provided, and guests have a coffee corner at their disposal in the reception hall.

Hôtel Innes by HappyCulture features rooms equipped with air-conditioning
All rooms have a contemporary design, a private bathroom, a TV and a courtesy tray.

There is a 24-hour front desk service.

A Buffet Breakfast is available for guests everyday .

Hôtel Innes by HappyCulture is a 5-minute walk from the Basilique Saint-Sernin and an ideal base for discovering the city of Toulouse and the River Garonne.

name: Hôtel Le Père Léon
description:
Located in the centre of Toulouse, this 3-star hotel is just in front of Esquirol Metro Station and 3 km from Toulouse Stadium
It offers free WiFi access and en suite rooms serviced by an elevator.

All the air-conditioned rooms at Hôtel Le Père Léon are soundproofed and feature a flat-screen TV with Canal+ and BeIn sport channels
They provide a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower
Some are suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Hôtel Le Père Léon
Restaurants and cafés can be found within 350 metres of the property.

This hotel is 180 metres from the Augustins Museum and a 3-minute walk from the Garonne River
Saint-Sernin Basilica is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Novotel Toulouse Centre Compans Caffarelli
description:
Located next to the Compans-Caffarelli Park, this hotel is a 10-minute walk from the centre of Toulouse and 4 km from Toulouse Stadium
It offers an outdoor swimming pool and free Wi-Fi access is provided in the modern rooms.

A minibar and satellite TV feature in the air-conditioned guest rooms
Some of them feature a balcony, and each bathroom is equipped with a bathtub and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served every day and can be taken in your room
Room service is available 24/7 at Novotel Toulouse Centre
You can enjoy a drink, tapas or local cuisine at the The Gourmet Bar or on the terrace.

The restaurant, the Gourmet bar is closed on Saturday noon.

On Sunday noon, we only offer brunch (no à la carte service).
