All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, soundproofing and heating
They are complete with an en suite bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at Adonis Hotel Bayonne
Drinks are also available on request.

Bayonne is 2 km from the hotel and the A63 motorway is ideally located a 2-minute drive away
Additional features include free WiFi access and free private parking on site.

name: Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port
description:
Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is located in La Rochelle on the harbour
It offers free WiFi throughout the entire hotel.

Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is close to many restaurants and is a short walk to the historic district, the beach and the attractions of La Rochelle
From here it is easy to access the island of Ré and Oléron.

It offers comfortable rooms with air-conditioning, en suite facilities and flat-screen TV with Canal+ and Eurosport.

Breakfast is be served from 07:00 to 11:00 on Saturday and Sunday and from 06:00 until 10:30 from Monday to Friday.

Please note that when booking more than 5 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply .

name: Best Western Premier Masqhotel
description:
The Best Western Masqhotel is a design hotel located a 5-minute walk from La Rochelle’s Vieux Port
It offers contemporary rooms, a lounge bar and free WiFi.

Rooms and suites at the Masqhotel are air-conditioned and feature original artwork
They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk and tea and coffee making facilities.

A buffet breakfast with hot and cold dishes is served each morning at the hotel
Guests are also invited to relax in the hotel’s lounge bar, which offers a large selection of drinks and free newspapers.

The hotel’s reception desk is open 24 hours a day
A laundry service and private parking are available at an additional cost.

An Eco-Label awarded hotel, Best Western Masqhotel is located 150 metres from La Rochelle Train Station and 6 km from La Rochelle Airport.

name: Maison des Ambassadeurs
description:
Nestled in the heart of La Rochelle and set in an 18th-century building, Maison des Ambassadeurs is just a 5-minute walk from the Old Harbour and offers a 24-hour front desk as well as a concierge service.

Featuring a high end décor, each room and suite at Maison des Ambassadeurs has an en-suite bathroom with free toiletries.

In the evening, guests can sip a drink at the piano bar or on the property’s terrace
Guests can also relax in the hotel’s lounges or along its outdoor dipping pool.

La Rochelle Aquarium and the Beach are just 1.5 km from the hotel, while Ile-de-Ré Bridge is a 15-minute drive away
Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

name: Central Park Hôtel & Spa
description:
The 4-star Central Park Hôtel & Spa is situated a 10-minute walk from the heart of La Rochelle, within walking distance from the beach, and next to the Old Harbour
Guests can enjoy the wellness centre featuring a gym, hot tubs, sauna, hammam, massages, and beauty treatments at an extra cost.

At this modern, yet eco-friendly hotel, all rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries
The suites feature a seating area where you can relax, and some suites have a terrace with a hot tub
A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available in each bedroom.

In the morning, a buffet breakfast is served
It includes local and organic products
Set in a residential area, the hotel is also a few steps from shops and restaurants.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge at the property.

Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 1.7 km from Central Park Hôtel & Spa, while La Rochelle Grosse Horloge is 600 metres from the property
The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 3 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Les Brises
description:
Situated on the sea front, just 2 kilometres from La Rochelle’s old port, Hotel Les Brises has a panoramic view of the sea and nearby islands
It offers free Wi-Fi .
The guest rooms at the Brises are equipped with satellite TV
Private bathrooms have luxury toiletries.

Guests can relax on the large sea-side terrace with panoramic views, or enjoy a drink in the bar
Additional facilities include a lift.

Les Brises is 2 km from the centre of La Rochelle, and is next to the Franck Delmas Park.

name: Hôtel La Monnaie Art & Spa
description:
Ideally set in the historic La Rochelle, this 17th-century building overlooks the old harbour
Hôtel De La Monnaie is decorated by artworks and features a terrace and a wellness centre.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hôtel De La Monnaie offer views of the indoor courtyard or the old city encircled with fortifications
Each has a TV and free WiFi, tea/coffee making facilities, and a private bathroom.

Guests can have a drink at the bar and enjoy breakfast in the quaint living room, the sunny courtyard or in the privacy of their room.

The central location of the De La Monnaie hotel allows guests to stroll in the pedestrian streets and discover the many local restaurants, and the nearby market selling regional products
Private parking is available at an additional cost for guests arriving by car.

name: Hôtel François 1er
description:
Located in the heart of historic La Rochelle, this hotel is set in a 16th century building just a 5 minute walk from the Old Port and local market
Hôtel François 1er offers free unlimited WiFi and a 24-hour reception.

All room at Hôtel François 1er are spacious, and feature a design and cosy décor inspired by the themes of rock, movie, painting, graffiti or photography
They are fitted with a TV, and come with a private bathroom.

Various facilities are available at the property such as the room service, a bar lounge, and a chill out area
Upon prior request and at an extra cost, guests can park their car in the property's secure parking located in the city centre.

The hotel is within walking distance from several shops, restaurants and lively bars
Hôtel François 1er is also close to attractions such as the Aquarium, the Natural History Museum, the city's parks and beaches.

La Rochelle Train Station is conveniently located 1.9 km from Hôtel François 1er.

name: Première Classe La Rochelle Centre - Les Minimes
description:
Première Classe La Rochelle Centre - Les Minimes is located 500 metres from the Vieux Port and 2 km from Minimes Beach
It offers free Wi-Fi access, a 24-hour reception and private parking at a fee.

The rooms at Première Classe La Rochelle Centre - Les Minimes are decorated in a contemporary style and include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels
The en suite bathroom is complete with a shower.

After enjoying the buffet breakfast, you can visit La Rochelle’s historical district, which is 2 km away
La Rochelle Airport is 11 km away and both the aquarium and convention centre are 1 km from the property.

name: Tour de Nesle La Rochelle Vieux Port 3 etoiles
description:
The charming Hotel de la Tour de Nesle is ideally placed at the heart of the old town, in front of the 2 towers at the entrance to the port.

The hotel offers comfortable rooms with simple, functional decor and free Wi-Fi internet access
Some rooms offer a view of the famous medieval towers.

Start the day with a generous breakfast in the breakfast room.

The picturesque area surrounding the Tour de Nesle is full of restaurants, shops and cafes.

name: Le Champlain
description:
Le Champlain is located opposite Parc Charruyer in the heart of La Rochelle
It offers spacious air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen cable TV and free WiFi.

Guestrooms at the Hotel Champlain are all serviced by a lift.

The hotel provides an express check in service and a 24-hour reception
Guests can relax in the gardens or in the hotel bar with a selection of international newspapers.

Hotel Champlain is just 5 minutes from the Old Port.

name: Logis Hôtel Le Rochelois
description:
Logis Hôtel Le Rochelois features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a tennis court
WiFi is free of charge throughout the property
There is also a hot tub with with a massage water jets bath, sauna and hammam, which guests can enjoy at an extra cost.

The rooms feature a flat-screen TV
The private bathrooms include a walk-in shower or bath tub and toilet.

The continental breakfast of French pastries, cheeses, fruit, eggs, cereals, jams, ham, honey and tea is available daily.

Logis Hôtel Le Rochelois is 5 km from La Rochelle Train Station
A limited number of free private parking spaces can be found onsite and private underground parking is available for an extra charge.

name: Hôtel La Fabrique
description:
Hôtel La Fabrique offers accommodation in La Rochelle
Guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV
Hôtel La Fabrique features free WiFi throughout the property.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property
Paid public parking is available nearby.

L'Espace Encan is 600 metres from Hôtel La Fabrique, while Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 700 metres from the property
The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Hotel Inn Design La Rochelle
description:
Located in La Rochelle, 2.5 km from the centre town and a 15-minute drive from the Vieux Port, Hotel Inn Design offers a 24-hour reception and
Other facilities provided by this hotel include free WiFi access and free on-site private parking.

In the Hotel Inn Design rooms, guests will find a flat-screen TV and a welcome tray
Rooms also come with a bathroom featuring a bath tub, a hairdryer and private toilets
Rooms with access for disabled guests are also available at the hotel.

In the morning, guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet composed of hot beverage, pastries, ham and cheese, yoghurts, crepes, cakes, fruit and juice.

La Rochelle Parc Expo is located 5 km away and this property is serviced by the A837 Motorway situated just beside
La Rochelle Train Station is a 7-minute drive away and the Airport is 7 km away.

name: Hôtel Le Bord'O Vieux Port
description:
Set in an 18-century building, Hôtel Le Bord'O Vieux Port is located on a lively pedestrian street just 30 metres from La Rochelle’s Old Port
It offers air-conditioned rooms and a terrace
Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

The rooms at Hôtel Le Bord'O Vieux Port are equipped with a TV, telephone and private bathroom with shower and hairdryer.

Hôtel Le Bord'O Vieux Port serves a buffet breakfast that guests can have on the terrace during the summer.

Public parking is available nearby, at an extra cost
Hôtel Le Bord'O Vieux Port is 500 metres from La Rochelle’s train station and a 3-minute walk from the Aquarium and the Conference Centre.

name: Hotel La Marine, Vieux Port
description:
Hotel La Marine, Vieux Port is situated in the centre of La Rochelle on the Old Port area in front of the medieval towers
It offers non-smoking rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Some of the guest rooms offer a view of the port and others, a view of the interior, flowered courtyard
All rooms have a TV.

Breakfast is available daily and served to your room.

The area surrounding the Hotel La Marine, Vieux Port has a number of restaurants and bars, as well as the aquarium and La Coursive Theatre
A shuttle to the islands (Oléron, Ré..) and Fort Boyard is available 5 minutes' walk from the hotel
The secure parking is located 500 metres away.

name: Hôtel de l'Océan
description:
Built in 1646, Hotel de L’Ocean is located on the Old Port, in the heart of La Rochelle
It offers soundproofed rooms equipped with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi.

Some rooms offer a view of the Bay of Biscay and the harbour.

A continental breakfast can be served on the outside terrace, in the breakfast room or in the room.

Hotel de L’Ocean is a 2-minute walk from La Rochelle’s main tourist attractions and La Rochelle Aquarium is a 15-minute walk away
Boat shuttles to Ile d'Aix, Fort Boyard, and Ré and Oléron islands are available in front of the hotel.

name: Hôtel Le Yachtman, The Originals Collection
description:
Located in La Rochelle, Le Yachtman features a heated swimming pool and a terrace with views of the harbour
It offers en suite accommodation and is just 500 metres from the train station.

The guest rooms at Le Yachtman come with a flat-screen TV and some have a lounge area
Guests have access to free Wi-Fi access.

You can enjoy a drink in the bar while reading the newspapers provided at Le Yachtman
A buffet breakfast with fruit salad, honey and orange juice is served every morning in the dining room, which offers views of the Old Port.

Nearby sights include La Rochelle Aquarium, La Rochelle Towers and the medieval town centre
Paid private parking is possible at a nearby location.

name: Hotel de Paris
description:
The Hotel de Paris is located in the city centre of La Rochelle, in a pedestrian street between Place de Verdun and Place du Marché.

Just a 5-minute walk from the old port and parks, the hotel offers guests a traditional and relaxing setting, comfortable accommodation and a garden courtyard for an enjoyable stay


Guestrooms are quiet, cosy and can sleep from 1 to 4 people
They are well equipped with modern en suite facilities and offer TV and Wi-Fi internet access.

There are many restaurants near the hotel where you can enjoy traditional and regional cuisine

name: Le Manoir Hôtel
description:
Set in a 19th-century building in La Rochelle, this hotel is just 500 metres from the city centre and the harbour
It offers air-conditioned guest rooms with free Wi-Fi and cable TV.

Each soundproofed guest room is equipped with a flat-screen TV
All of the elegant rooms feature antique parquet flooring and high ceiling
The private bathrooms include amenities.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the contemporary breakfast room at hotel Le Manoir.

Saint-Jean d'Acre Park is 200 metres from the hotel and La Rochelle Train Station is 2 km from Le Manoir
La Rochelle Beach is a 12-minute walk away and the bus that leads to La Rochelle Airport and the train station stops near the hotel.

name: Hôtel Saint Nicolas
description:
Situated in the lively Saint Nicolas district in La Rochelle, this hotel is surrounded by antique dealers, bars and cafés
It offers free Wi-Fi and a conservatory with large sofas and tropical plants.

The air-conditioned guest rooms each have a flat-screen TV with canal+ and satellite channels
Private bathrooms are equipped with a shower or a bathroom and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast featuring hot and fresh items is served daily in the conservatory
A continental breakfast can also be delivered directly to guests’ rooms
Local drinks, tea and coffee can be enjoyed in the bar.

Limited private secured parking can be booked at an extra cost, upon availability
The maximum height is 1m90 and the width of the parking spaces is about 2m.

Saint Nicolas Tower that guards the entrance to the old port is 550 metres from the hotel
La Rochelle Train Station is 700 metres away.

name: Hôtel Atlantic
description:
The Atlantic Hotel is located in the centre of La Rochelle, a few steps from the beach and the Cours des Dames and 50 metres from the Vieux Port.

The hotel offers rooms with TVs and free Wi-Fi internet access
Most of the rooms overlook the garden.

Ferries to the Ilde-de-Ré, Oleron and Aix leave from behind the Atlantic Hotel and the SNCF station is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel Le Rupella
description:
Located in the heart of La Rochelle, just a 10-minute walk from the train station and right next to the harbour, Hôtel Le Rupella offers en-suite rooms with free WiFi access and a desk.

All rooms at Hôtel Le Rupella also have a flat-screen TV as well as a private bathroom fitted with a bathtub or a shower and free toiletries
Some rooms feature a balcony.

Offering panoramic views over the harbour, the hotel’s restaurant serves traditional French cuisine
Guests can also sip a drink at the on-site bar and enjoy their breakfast in their room.

The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and is located 850 metres from the city’s Aquarium and a 5-minute drive from La Rochelle Parc Expo.

name: Hôtel Kyriad La Rochelle Centre Ville
description:
Situated just 1 km from the old harbour and the train station of La Rochelle, Hôtel Kyriad La Rochelle Centre Ville welcomes you in a modern setting.

Hôtel Kyriad La Rochelle Centre Ville offers 45 fully-equipped rooms, including 2 rooms for disabled guests
Each room comes with all the modern comfort and satellite television.

For your convenience, Hôtel Kyriad La Rochelle Centre Ville provides an enclosed car park, our parking is extra and by reservation and WiFi Internet access.

Enjoy the comfort of a 3-star hotel where everything is designed for both a relaxing and satisfying business stay.

name: B&B HOTEL La Rochelle Centre Les Minimes
description:
"NEW ROOMS!!!"

The team of the B&B HOTEL La Rochelle Centre Les Minimes welcomes you 24/7 in our hotel with secure pay parking, a 10-minute walk from the SNCF train station and the city centre.


Many other activities are close to our establishment, including the Aquarium de la Rochelle (800m away), where more than 12,000 marine animals live, and the Maritime Museum (400m away).

name: B&B HOTEL La Rochelle Centre
description:
Set in the La Rochelle City Centre district in La Rochelle, 500 metres from Parc Expo de La Rochelle, B&B HOTEL La Rochelle Centre boasts air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi
Private and secure parking is available on site at an extra cost.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV
Each room is equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a shower.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

L'Espace Encan is 600 metres from B&B HOTEL La Rochelle Centre, while La Rochelle Grosse Cloche is 800 metres from the property
The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 4 km from the property.
